T02avsata_u:5: somo vaḍikaḥ padmāṅkaḥ pañcālo dhūpa eva ca |
T02avsata_u:6: rājānaṃ paścimaṃ kṛtvā vargo hy eṣa samudditaḥ || AVŚ_1 ||
T02avsata_u:9: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:10: tatra bhagavato 'cirābhisaṃbuddhabodher yaśasā ca sarvaloka āpūrṇaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:11: atha dakṣiṇāgiriṣu janapade saṃpūrṇo nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:12: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalas tyāgaruciḥ pradānaruciḥ pradānābhirato mahati tyāgo vartate ||
T02avsata_u:13: yāvad asau sarvapāṣaṇḍikaṃ yajñam ārabdho yaṣṭum*, yatrānekāni tīrthikaśatasahasrāṇi bhuñjate sma |
T02avsata_u:14: yadā bhagavatā rājā bimbisāraḥ saparivāro vinītaḥ, tasya ca vinayād bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi
T02avsata_u:15: upagatāni, tadā rājagṛhāt pūrṇasya jñātayo 'bhyāgatya pūrṇasya purastād buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣayituṃ pravṛttā dharmasya saṃghasya ca |
T02avsata_u:16: atha pūrṇo brāhmaṇamahāśālo bhagavato guṇasaṃkīrtanaṃ pratiśrutya mahāntaṃ prasādaṃ
T02avsata_u:18: tataḥ śaraṇam abhiruhya rājagṛhābhimukhaḥ sthitvā ubhau jānumaṇḍale pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya puṣpāṇi kṣipan*, dhūpam udakaṃ ca
T02avsata_u:19: bhagavantam āyācituṃ pravṛttaḥ: āgacchatu bhagavān yajñaṃ me anubhavituṃ yajñavāṭam iti
T02avsata_u:20: atha tāni puṣpāṇi buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvenopari bhagavataḥ puṣpamaṇḍapaṃ kṣiptvā tasthuḥ dhūpo
T02avsata_u:22: athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṃ papraccha: kuta idaṃ bhadanta nimantraṇam āyātam iti |
T02avsata_u:23: bhagavān āha: dakṣiṇāgiriṣv ānanda janapade saṃpūrṇo nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati,
T02avsata_u:26: bhagavān bhikṣusahasraparivṛtto dakṣiṇāgiriṣu janapade cārikāṃ caritvā pūrṇasya brāhmaṇamahāśālasya yajñavāṭasamīpe sthitvā cintām āpede: yanv ahaṃ pūrṇabrāhmaṇam ṛddhiprātihāryeṇāvarjayeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:27: atha bhagavāṃs taṃ bhikṣusahasram antardhāpya ekaḥ pātracarakavyagrahastaḥ pūrṇasmīpe sthitaḥ
T02avsata_u:28: | atha pūrṇo brāhmaṇamahāśālo bhagavantaṃ dadarśa dvātriṃśatā
T02avsata_u:29: mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyaṃjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:30: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tvaritatvaritaṃ bhagavataḥ samīpam upasaṃkramya bhagavantam uvāca: svāgataṃ bhagavan, niṣīdatu bhagavān,
T02avsata_u:32: bhagavān āha: yadi te parityaktaṃ dīyatām asmin pātra iti |
T02avsata_u:33: atha pūrṇo brāhmamahāśālaḥ pañcamāṇavakaśataparivṛto bhagavato vividhabhakṣyabhojyakhādyalehyapeyacoṣyādibhir āhārair ārabdhaḥ pātraṃ
T02avsata_u:35: bhagavān api svakāt pātrād bhikṣupātreṣv āhāraṃ saṃkramayati |
T02avsata_u:36: yadā bhagavato viditaṃ pūrṇāni bhikṣusahasrasya pātrāṇīti,
T02avsata_u:40: udīritam: pūrṇāni bhagavato bhikṣusahasrasya ca pātrāṇīti |
T02avsata_u:41: tataḥ prātihāryadarśanāt pūrṇaḥ prasādajāto mūlanikṛtta iva drumo hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditaḥ udagraprītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhiṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena
T02avsata_u:42: deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayitā, amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā,
T02avsata_u:44: atha bhagavān pūrṇasya brāhmaṇamahāśālasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt* |
T02avsata_u:45: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
T02avsata_u:47: yā adhastād gacchanti tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti, ye śītanarakās teṣu uṣṇībhūtā nipatanti |
T02avsata_u:49: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti
T02avsata_u:51: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ, nāpy
T02avsata_u:52: anyatropapannāḥ, api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti |
T02avsata_u:53: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ
T02avsata_u:55: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān, yāmāṃs tuṣitān
T02avsata_u:57: nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti, gāthādvayaṃ ca bhāṣante:
T02avsata_u:59: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_1.1 ||
T02avsata_u:60: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:61: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati || AVŚ_1.2 || iti atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
T02avsata_u:62: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:74: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati, uṣṇīṣe antardhīyante ||
T02avsata_u:75: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:78: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantād divākareṇodayatā yathaiva || AVŚ_1.3 ||
T02avsata_u:81: nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitam upadarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ || AVŚ_1.4 ||
T02avsata_u:82: tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṝṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām* |
T02avsata_u:83: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ || AVŚ_1.5 ||
T02avsata_u:84: nākāsmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ |
T02avsata_u:86: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrāḥ taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ || AVŚ_1.6 ||
T02avsata_u:87: <Speyer 7> bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat |
T02avsata_u:88: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
T02avsata_u:90: anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya pūrṇabhadro nāma samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati, daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca |
T02avsata_u:91: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti || yadā bhagavatā pūrṇo brāhmaṇamahāśālo
T02avsata_u:95: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ, śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya
T02avsata_u:100: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||

T02avsata_u:106: atha pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghpuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
T02avsata_u:107: sāvadānīṃ vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā yena siṃhasya senāpater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:109: atha siṃhasya senāpateḥ snuṣā yasomatī nama abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā |
T02avsata_u:110: sā bhagavato vicitralakṣaṇojjvalakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā atyarthaṃ prasādaṃ labdhavatī |
T02avsata_u:111: sā śvaśuraṃ papraccha: asti kaścid upāyo yenāham apy evaṃguṇayuktā syām iti |
T02avsata_u:114: yadi punar iyaṃ pratyayam āsādayet, kuryād anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānam iti viditvoktavān*: dārike yadi hetuṃ samādāya vartiṣyasi, tvam apy evaṃvidhā bhaviṣyasi yādṛśo bhagavān
T02avsata_u:116: <Speyer 9> tataḥ siṃhena senāpatinā yaśomatyāḥ prasādābhivṛddhyarthaṃ prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ ratnāni ca dattāni |
T02avsata_u:117: tato yaśomatyā dārikayā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ |
T02avsata_u:119: adhivāsitaṃ ca bhagavatā tasyā anugrahārtham* || atha yaśomatī dārikā
T02avsata_u:120: suvarṇamayāni puṣpāṇi kārayitvā rūpyamayāṇi ratnamayāni prabhūtagandhamālyavilepanasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā śatarasam āhāraṃ sajjīkṛtya bhagavato dūtena kālam ārocayati: samayo bhadanta, sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti |
T02avsata_u:121: atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena siṃhasya senāpater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
T02avsata_u:122: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:123: atha yaśomatī dārikā sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śatarasenāhāreṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpya puṣpāṇi bhagavati kṣeptum ārabdhā |
T02avsata_u:124: atha tāni puṣpāṇi upari bhagavato ratnakūṭāgāro ratnacchatraṃ ratnamaṇḍapa ivāvasthitam*, yan na na śakyaṃ suśikṣitena karmakāreṇa karmāntevāsinā vā kartum*, yathāpi tad buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devānubhāvena

T02avsata_u:181: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittasyābhiprasāda iti
T02avsata_u:183: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:186: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme ||
T02avsata_u:187: śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī prativasati, āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo
T02avsata_u:190: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:191: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā |
T02avsata_u:192: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ: anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛham* |
T02avsata_u:194: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:195: sa śramaṇabrāhmaṇanaimittikasuhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavair ucyate: devatāyācanaṃ kuruṣveti || asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti |
T02avsata_u:197: yady evam abhaviṣyat, ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ |
T02avsata_u:198: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca |
T02avsata_u:203: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca |
T02avsata_u:205: putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate sma |
T02avsata_u:206: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ |
T02avsata_u:207: sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityānubandhā api devatā āyācate sma |
T02avsata_u:209: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmāt satvanikāyāc cyutvā tasyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:212: raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti, viraktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti |
T02avsata_u:219: saced dārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati |
T02avsata_u:220: saced dārikā bhavati vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati |
T02avsata_u:221: sā āttamanāttamanāḥ svāmina ārocayati: diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhase |
T02avsata_u:223: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:227: udānam udānayati: apy evāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam* |
T02avsata_u:233: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā kṛtyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyati: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti |
T02avsata_u:235: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyais tiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitair āhārair hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharimāṃ bhūmim* |
T02avsata_u:236: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya |
T02avsata_u:237: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:241: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:243: ūcuḥ: yasmād asya janmani sarvakulaṃ nanditam, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya
T02avsata_u:245: tasya nanda iti nāma vyavasthāpitam* || nando dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:246: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:248: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ paṃcavarṣaḥ ṣaḍvarṣo vā, tadā kusīdaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ
T02avsata_u:251: tena tīkṣṇaniśitabuddhitayā antargṛhasthenaiva śāstrāṇy adhītāni || atha śreṣṭhina etad abhavat: so 'pi me kadācit karhicid devatārādhanayā putro jātaḥ, so 'pi kusīdaḥ paramakusīdaḥ |
T02avsata_u:253: tat kiṃ mamānenedṛgjātīyena putreṇa, yo nāma svasthaśarīro bhūtvā paśur iva
T02avsata_u:255: tena ṣaṭ tīrthikāḥ śāstāraḥ svagṛham āhūtāḥ: api nāma ayaṃ dārakas teṣāṃ darśanād
T02avsata_u:257: atha kusīdo dārakas tāṃś chāstṝn dṛṣṭvā cakṣuḥsaṃprekṣaṇām api na kṛtavān*, kaḥ punar vāda
T02avsata_u:258: utthāsyati vā abhivādayiṣyati vā, āsanena vā upanimantrayiṣyati |
T02avsata_u:259: atha sa gṛhapatis tām evāvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā suṣṭhutaram utkaṇṭhitaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:260: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* |
T02avsata_u:261: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām
T02avsata_u:264: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya ca buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ
T02avsata_u:266: 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca
T02avsata_u:276: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet || AVŚ_3.1 ||
T02avsata_u:277: paśyati bhagavān: ayaṃ dārakaḥ kusīdo maddarśanād vīryam ārapsyate
T02avsata_u:279: tato bhagavatā tīrthyānāṃ madadarpacchittyarthaṃ dārakasya ca kuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ
T02avsata_u:280: utsṛṣṭāḥ, yais tad gṛhaṃ samantād avabhāsitam* |
T02avsata_u:281: kalpasahasraparibhāvitāś ca maitryaṃśava utsṛṣṭāḥ, yair asya spṛṣṭamātraṃ śarīraṃ prahlāditam*
T02avsata_u:282: sa itaś cāmutaś ca prekṣitum ārabdhaḥ: kasya prabhāvān mama śarīraṃ prahlāditam iti |
T02avsata_u:283: tato bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtas tad gṛhaṃ praviveśa |
T02avsata_u:284: dadarśa kusīdo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣulakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛta aśītyā cānuvyaṃjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:285: | dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ paraṃ prasādam āpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:286: sahasā svayam evotthāya bhagavato 'rthe āsanaṃ prajñapayati |
T02avsata_u:288: bhagavataḥ, niṣīdatu bhagavān prajñapta evāsana iti |
T02avsata_u:289: athāsya mātāpitarāv antarjanaś cādṛṣṭapūrvaprabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ vismayam āpannāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:290: tataḥ kusīdo dārako harṣavikasitābhyāṃ nayanābhyāṃ bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:291: tasmai bhagavatā anekaprakāraṃ kausīdyasyāvarṇo bhāṣitaḥ, vīryārambhasya cānuśaṃsaḥ |
T02avsata_u:292: candanamayīṃ cāsya yaṣṭim anuprayacchati: imāṃ dāraka yaṣṭim ākoṭayeti |
T02avsata_u:294: athāsau yaṣṭir ākoṭyamānā manojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ karoti, vividhāni ca ratnanidhānāni paśyati
T02avsata_u:295: tasyaitad abhavat: mahān batāyaṃ vīryārambhe viśeṣo yanv ahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā vīryam ārabheyeti
T02avsata_u:296: sa śrāvastyāṃ ghaṇṭāv avaghoṣaṇaṃ sārthavāham ātmānam udghoṣya ṣaḍvārān mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ
T02avsata_u:297: tataḥ siddhayānapātreṇa mahāratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā bhagavān antarniveśane saśrāvakasaṃgho bhojitaḥ
T02avsata_u:299: atha bhagavān kusīdasya dārakasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt
T02avsata_u:300: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti, kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti |
T02avsata_u:303: adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu
T02avsata_u:304: śītībhūtā nipatanti, ye śītanarakās teṣu uṣṇībhūtā nipatanti, tena teṣāṃ satvānāṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabhyante |
T02avsata_u:305: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti |
T02avsata_u:307: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ, nāpy anyatropapannāḥ
T02avsata_u:308: api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti |
T02avsata_u:309: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti |
T02avsata_u:310: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn
T02avsata_u:311: paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety
T02avsata_u:314: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_3.1 ||
T02avsata_u:315: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:316: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati || AVŚ_3.2 || iti atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
T02avsata_u:317: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:329: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati, uṣṇīṣe antardhīyante ||
T02avsata_u:330: atha ca tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe
T02avsata_u:335: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantād divākareṇodayatā yathaiva || AVŚ_3.3 ||
T02avsata_u:339: nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitam upadarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ || AVŚ_3.4 ||
T02avsata_u:340: tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṝṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām* |
T02avsata_u:341: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ || AVŚ_3.5 ||
T02avsata_u:342: nākāsmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ |
T02avsata_u:343: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrāḥ taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ || AVŚ_3.6 || iti bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat |
T02avsata_u:344: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
T02avsata_u:345: paśyasy ānanda anena kusīdena dārakeṇa mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:347: eṣa ānanda kuśido dārako 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrya atibalavīryaparākramo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati, daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca |
T02avsata_u:348: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti ||
T02avsata_u:350: āttamanasas te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam
T02avsata_u:354: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme ||
T02avsata_u:355: śrāvastyām anyatamo mahāsārthavāho mahāsamudrād bhagnayānapātra āgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:356: sa dvir api trir api svadevatāyācanaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇo bhagnayānapātra evāgataḥ
T02avsata_u:359: āpede: ko me upāyaḥ svādyena dhanārjanaṃ kuryām iti |
T02avsata_u:361: ayaṃ buddho bhagavān sarvadevaprativiśiṣṭataraḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahādharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ, yanv aham idānīm asya nāmnā punar api mahāsamudram avatareyam* |
T02avsata_u:362: siddhayānapātras tv āgaccheyaṃ ced upārdhena dhanenāsya pūjāṃ kuryām iti
T02avsata_u:364: sa evaṃ kṛtavyavasāyaḥ punar api mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:365: buddhānubhāvena ca ratnadvīpaṃ saṃprāpya mahāratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā kuśalasvastinā svagṛham anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:366: sa mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya bhāṇḍaṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:367: tasya nānāvicitrāṇi ratnāni dṛṣṭvā mahāṃllābha utpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:368: cintayati ca: mayā īdṛśānāṃ ratnānāṃ śramaṇasya gautamasya upārdhaṃ dātavyaṃ bhaviṣyati
T02avsata_u:369: yanv aham etāni svasyāḥ patnyā āyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:370: tena kārṣāpaṇadvayena vikrīya bhagavato gandhaṃ dadyām iti |
T02avsata_u:374: atha bahagavāṃs tad rūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yena sa dhūpa upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya sarvāṃ ca śrāvastīṃ sphuritvā mahadabhrakūṭavad avasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:375: tasya tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahān prasāda utpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:376: sa svacittaṃ paribhāṣitavān: naitan mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnair nābhyarcayeyam iti || atha tena sārthavāhena bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho 'ntarniveśane bhaktenopanimantritaḥ tataḥ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya mahāratnair avakīrṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:377: tatas tāni ratnāni upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya mūrdhni bhagavato ratnakūṭāgāro ratnacchatraṃ ratnamaṇḍapaś cāvasthitaḥ, yan na śakyaṃ suśikṣitena karmakāreṇa karmāntevāsinā vā kartum*, yathāpi tad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena ||
T02avsata_u:378: atha sārthavāho dviguṇajātaprasādas tatpratihāryadarśanān mūlanikṛtta iva drumo bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita, amuktānāṃ
T02avsata_u:380: atha bhagavāṃs tasya sārthavāhasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāviṣkārṣīt
T02avsata_u:381: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti, kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti |
T02avsata_u:382: yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ
T02avsata_u:383: hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti, ye śītanarakās teṣūṣṇībhūtā nipatanti |
T02avsata_u:385: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti |
T02avsata_u:387: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutā nāpy anyatropapannāḥ
T02avsata_u:388: api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti |
T02avsata_u:389: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ
T02avsata_u:391: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān, yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn
T02avsata_u:394: parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety
T02avsata_u:397: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_4.1 ||
T02avsata_u:398: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:399: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati || AVŚ_4.2 || iti atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
T02avsata_u:400: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:412: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati, uṣṇīṣe antardhīyante ||
T02avsata_u:413: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:416: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantād divākareṇodayatā yathaiva || AVŚ_4.3 ||
T02avsata_u:419: nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitam upadarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ || AVŚ_4.4 ||
T02avsata_u:420: tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṝṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām* |
T02avsata_u:421: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ || AVŚ_4.5 ||
T02avsata_u:422: nākāsmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ |
T02avsata_u:424: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrāḥ taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ || AVŚ_4.6 || iti bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat |
T02avsata_u:425: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
T02avsata_u:426: paśyasy ānanda anena sārthavāhena mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:428: eṣa ānanda sārthavāho 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭ
T02avsata_u:429: pāramitāḥ paripūrya ratnottamo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati, daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca |
T02avsata_u:430: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittasyābhiprasādaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:432: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:437: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme ||
T02avsata_u:438: śrāvastyām anyatamo gṛhapatiḥ śreṣṭhī prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:440: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:441: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ gṛhapateḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:443: dārako jāto abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ || tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā vaḍika iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtavān pitā |
T02avsata_u:444: vaḍiko dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattaḥ aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:445: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiś
T02avsata_u:448: | yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ pañcavarṣo ṣaḍvarṣo vā, tadā gurau bhaktiṃ kṛtvā sarvaśāstrāṇi adhītāni
T02avsata_u:450: tad anantaraṃ tasya vaḍikasya kiṃcit pūrvajanmakṛtakarmavipākena śarīre kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ patitam iti duḥkhī bhūtaś cintāparaḥ sthitaḥ: kiṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā, yad idaṃ kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ mama śarīre jātam* |
T02avsata_u:451: tasya pitāpi putrasyedaṃ kāyikaṃ duḥkhabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahadudvignaḥ putrātyayaśaṅkhayā dīnamānasaḥ śokāśruvyāptavadanas tvaritaṃ vaidyam āhūya tasya putrasya rogaṃ darśayati: ko rogaḥ,
T02avsata_u:453: kena hetunā mama putrasya dehe jāta iti |
T02avsata_u:454: tataḥ sa vaidyas tasya rogacihnaṃ dṛṣṭvā cikitsāṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:457: pitā putrasya rogaṃ vṛddhaṃ jātaṃ dṛṣṭvā avaśyaṃ putro mariṣyati, yad vaidyenāpi cāsya rogasya cikitsituṃ na
T02avsata_u:459: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūyo 'pi putrasya cintā jātā |
T02avsata_u:462: 'śakyo 'pi vadituṃ kathaṃcit pitaraṃ babhāṣe: mā tāta sāhasam* |
T02avsata_u:464: mamātyayāśaṅkayā mā bhūs tvam api mādṛśaḥ |
T02avsata_u:465: mama nāmnā devānāṃ pūjāṃ kuru, dānaṃ dehi |
T02avsata_u:467: | sa gṛhapatir iti putrasya vaca ākarṇya sarvadevebhyaḥ pūjāṃ kṛtavān* |
T02avsata_u:471: sarvadeveṣu pūjā kṛtā, dāno 'pi dattaḥ pitrā mama, tathāpi svasthā na
T02avsata_u:473: tatas tathāgataguṇān anusmṛtya buddhaṃ namaskāraṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:474: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* |
T02avsata_u:475: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya <ca> buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ
T02avsata_u:477: 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca
T02avsata_u:481: kasyājñānatimirapaṭalaparyavanaddhanetrasya jñānāñjanaśalākayā cakṣur viśodhayāmi |> kasyānavaropitāni kuśalamulāny avaropayeyam* |
T02avsata_u:486: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet || AVŚ_6.1 ||
T02avsata_u:487: tato bhagavatā vaḍikasya gṛhapateḥ putrasya tām avasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇā marīcayaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ, yais tad gṛhaṃ
T02avsata_u:494: āha: praviśatu bhagavān, svāgataṃ bhagavate, ākāṅkṣāmi bhagavato darśanam
T02avsata_u:496: atha bhagavān praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:497: niṣadya bhagavān vaḍikam uvāca: kiṃ te vaḍika bādhata iti |
T02avsata_u:502: tato 'sya bhagavatā sarvasatveṣu maitryupadiṣṭā: ayaṃ te cetasikasya pratipakṣa iti |
T02avsata_u:503: laukikaṃ ca cittam utpādayāmāsa: aho bata śakro devendro gandhamādanāt parvatāt kṣīrikām oṣadhīm ānayed iti |
T02avsata_u:504: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakro devendro gandhamādanāt parvatāt kṣīrikām oṣadhīm ānīya bhagavate dattavān* |
T02avsata_u:505: bhagavatā ca svapāṇinā gṛhītvā vaḍikāya dattā: iyaṃ te kāyikasya duḥkhasya paridāhaśamanīti
T02avsata_u:506: sa kāyikaṃ prasrabdhisukhaṃ labdhvā bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādayāmāsa |
T02avsata_u:507: prasannacittaś ca rājñaḥ prasenajito nivedya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā śatasahasreṇa vastreṇācchadya sarvapuṣpamālyair abhyarcitavān* |
T02avsata_u:508: tataś cetanāṃ puṣṇāti sma, praṇidhiṃ ca cakāra: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena yathaivāhaṃ bhagavatā anuttareṇa vaidyarājena cikitsitaḥ, evam aham apy
T02avsata_u:509: anāgate 'dhvani andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita, amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā,
T02avsata_u:511: atha bhagavān vaḍikasya dhātuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt |

T02avsata_u:566: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme || yadā bhagavāṃl loke notpanna āsīt, tadā rājā prasenajit tīrthikadevatārcanaṃ kṛtavān puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanaiḥ yadā tu bhagavāṃl loke utpannaḥ,
T02avsata_u:567: rājā ca prasenajid daharasūtrodāharaṇena vinīto bhagavacchāsane śraddhāṃ
T02avsata_u:568: pratilabdhavān, tadā prītisaumanasyajātas trir bhagavantam upasaṃkramya dīpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanair abhyarcayati ||
T02avsata_u:569: athānyatama ārāmiko navaṃ padmam ādāya rājñaḥ prasenajito 'rthaṃ
T02avsata_u:571: tīrthikopāsakena ca dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭhaś ca: kim idaṃ padmaṃ vikrīṇiṣye? sa kathayati: āmeti
T02avsata_u:572: sa kretukāmo yāvad anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis taṃ pradeśam anuprataḥ || tena tasmād dviguṇena
T02avsata_u:574: tataḥ parasparaṃ vardhamānau yāvac chatasahasraṃ vardhitavantau |
T02avsata_u:578: tena saṃśayajātena sa tīrthikābhiprasannaḥ puruṣaḥ pṛsṭaḥ: kasyārthe bhavān evaṃ vardhata iti |
T02avsata_u:579: sa āha: ahaṃ bhagavato nārāyaṇasyārthe iti ||
T02avsata_u:580: anāthapiṇḍada āha: ahaṃ bhagavato buddhasyārthe iti |
T02avsata_u:581: ārāmika āha: ka eṣa buddho nāmeti? tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena vistareṇāsya buddhaguṇā ākhyātāḥ
T02avsata_u:582: tata ārāmiko 'nāthapiṇḍadam āha: gṛhapate ahaṃ svayam eva taṃ bhagavantam
T02avsata_u:584: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir ārāmikam ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:585: dadarśārāmiko buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyaṃjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:586: sahadarśanāc ca ārāmikeṇa tat padmaṃ bhagavati
T02avsata_u:588: tataḥ kṣiptamātraṃ śakaṭacakramāṇaṃ bhūtvā upari bhagavataḥ
T02avsata_u:590: atha sa ārāmikas tat pratihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūlanikṛtta iva drumo bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭaś cetanāṃ puṣṇāti, praṇidhiṃ ca kartum ārabdhaḥ: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ
T02avsata_u:591: tārayita, amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā, aparinirvṛtānāṃ parinirvāpayiteti ||
T02avsata_u:592: atha bhagavāṃs tasyārāmikasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt
T02avsata_u:593: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti, kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti |
T02avsata_u:596: gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti, ye śītanarakās teṣūṣṇībhūtā nipatanti |
T02avsata_u:598: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ
T02avsata_u:601: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutā nāpy anyatropapannāḥ
T02avsata_u:604: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti, yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti |
T02avsata_u:605: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān, yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān
T02avsata_u:606: apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti, gāthādvayaṃ ca bhāṣante:
T02avsata_u:608: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_7.1 ||
T02avsata_u:609: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:610: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati || AVŚ_7.2 || iti atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
T02avsata_u:611: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:623: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati, uṣṇīṣe antardhīyante ||
T02avsata_u:624: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:627: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantād divākareṇodayatā yathaiva || AVŚ_7.3 ||
T02avsata_u:631: nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitam upadarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ || AVŚ_7.4 ||
T02avsata_u:632: tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṝṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām* |
T02avsata_u:633: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ || AVŚ_7.5 ||
T02avsata_u:634: nākāsmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ |
T02avsata_u:635: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrāḥ taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ || AVŚ_7.6 || iti bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat |
T02avsata_u:636: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
T02avsata_u:637: paśyasy ānanda anenārāmikeṇa prasādajātena mamaivaṃvidhāṃ pūjām kṛtām* |
T02avsata_u:639: eṣa ārāmiko 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭ
T02avsata_u:640: pāramitāḥ paripūrya padmottamo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati, daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca |
T02avsata_u:641: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti ||
T02avsata_u:643: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:646: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme || tena khalu samayenottarapañcālarājo dakṣiṇapañcālarājena saha prativiruddho
T02avsata_u:649: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalyo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:650: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:651: ekānte niṣaṇṇo rājā prasenajit kauśalyo bhagavantam idam avocat* : bhagavān nāma bhadanta anuttaro dharmarājo vyasanagatānāṃ satvānāṃ paritrātā,
T02avsata_u:653: ayaṃ cottarapañcālo rājā dakṣiṇapañcālarājena saha prativiruddhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:659: adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalyasya tūṣṇībhāvena |
T02avsata_u:660: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalyo bhagavatas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:661: atha bhagavāṃs tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya yena vārāṇasī kāśīnāṃ nagaraṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:662: anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ caran vārāṇasīm anuprāpto vārāṇasyāṃ viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:663: yāvat tayor viditaṃ bhagavān asmadvijitam anuprāpta iti |
T02avsata_u:664: yāvad bhagavatā ṛddhibalena caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ nirmāyottarapañcālarājas trāsitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:665: sa bhīta ekaratham abhiruhya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:667: sa taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā bhagavatsakāśe pravrajite |
T02avsata_u:668: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* ||
T02avsata_u:672: deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita, amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā,
T02avsata_u:674: atha bhagavāṃs dakṣiṇapañcālarājasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt
T02avsata_u:675: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti, kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti |

T02avsata_u:677: hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti, ye śītanarakās teṣūṣṇībhūtā nipatanti |
T02avsata_u:679: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti |
T02avsata_u:681: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca evaṃ bhavati: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutā nāpy anyatropapannāḥ
T02avsata_u:682: api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti |
T02avsata_u:683: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ
T02avsata_u:685: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān, yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn
T02avsata_u:686: paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety
T02avsata_u:689: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_8.1 ||
T02avsata_u:691: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |

T02avsata_u:710: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantād divākareṇodayatā yathaiva || AVŚ_8.3 ||
T02avsata_u:713: nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitam upadarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ || AVŚ_8.4 ||
T02avsata_u:714: tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṝṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām* |
T02avsata_u:715: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ || AVŚ_8.5 ||
T02avsata_u:716: nākāsmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ |
T02avsata_u:717: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrāḥ taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ || AVŚ_8.6 || iti bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat |
T02avsata_u:718: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
T02avsata_u:719: paśyasy ānanda dakṣiṇapañcālarājena mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:721: eṣa ānanda pañcālarājo 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena
T02avsata_u:724: ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya vijayo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati, daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca |
T02avsata_u:725: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasādaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:727: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:730: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme || tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ dvau śreṣṭhinau |
T02avsata_u:732: tābhyām ekaḥ pūraṇo 'bhiprasannaḥ, dvitīyo buddhe bhagavati |
T02avsata_u:733: tatas tayoḥ parasparaṃ kathāsāṃkathyaviniścaye vartamāne pūraṇopāsaka āha:
T02avsata_u:735: buddhopāsaka āha: bhagavān samyaksaṃbuddho viśiṣṭatara iti |
T02avsata_u:738: tenāmātyānām ājñā dattā: tayor mīmāṃsā kartavyeti |
T02avsata_u:739: tatas tair amātyaiḥ sarvavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*: saptame divase buddhatīrthikopāsakayor mīmāṃsā bhaviṣyati, ye cādbhutāni draṣṭukāmās te āgacchantv iti |
T02avsata_u:740: tataḥ saptame divase vistīrṇāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe 'nekeṣu prāṇiśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu gaganatale cānekeṣu devatāsahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu gomayamaṇḍalake kḷpte
T02avsata_u:742: kṛtam*: yena satyena pūraṇaprabhṛtayaḥ ṣaṭ śāstāro loke śreṣṭhāḥ, anena satyenemāni puṣpāṇi ayaṃ ca dhūpaḥ idaṃ ca pānīyaṃ tān upagacchantv iti ||
T02avsata_u:743: evaṃ pravyāhatamātre (Speyer: pravyāhṛtamātre) tāni puṣpāṇi bhūmau
T02avsata_u:744: patitāni, agnir nirvṛtaḥ, pānīyaṃ pṛthivyām astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gatam* |
T02avsata_u:745: tato mahājanakāyena kilakilāprakṣveḍoccair nādo muktaḥ, yam abhivīkṣya tīrthyopāsakas tūṣṇībhūto maṅkubhūtaḥ (Speyer: madgubhūtaḥ),
T02avsata_u:748: tato bhagavacchrāvakeṇa harṣotkaṇṭhajātena prasādavikasitābhyāṃ nayanābhyām ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya satyopayācanaṃ kṛtam*: yena satyena bhagavān sarvasatvānām
T02avsata_u:749: agryaḥ, anena satyenemāni puṣpāṇi dhūpa udakaṃ bhagavantam upagacchantv iti |
T02avsata_u:750: evaṃ pravyāhṛtamātro tāni puṣpāṇi haṃsapaṃktir ivākāśe jetavanābhimukhaṃ saṃprasthitāni, dhupo 'bhrakūṭavat*, udakaṃ
T02avsata_u:752: atha sa mahājanakāyas tat prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā kilakilāpravekṣveḍoccaiḥśabdhaṃ kurvaṃs teṣāṃ saṃprasthitānāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:754: tatas tāni puṣpāṇi bhagavata upari sthitāni, dhūpa udakaṃ cāgrataḥ |
T02avsata_u:755: tataḥ sa mahājanakāyo labdhaprasādo bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśrāvaṇāya
T02avsata_u:756: teṣāṃ bhagavān idaṃ sūtraṃ bhāṣate sma:
T02avsata_u:760: buddhe agraprajñaptiḥ katamā? ye kecid brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ satvā apadā vā dvipadā vā bahupadā vā, rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā, saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā,
T02avsata_u:761: naivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ, tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas teṣām agra
T02avsata_u:764: teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyo deveṣu vā
T02avsata_u:768: ye kecid dharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā, virāgo dharmas teṣām agra ākhyātaḥ |
T02avsata_u:770: teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyo deveṣu vā
T02avsata_u:774: ye kecit saṃghā vā gaṇā vā pūgā vā pariṣado vā, tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghas teṣām agra ākhyātaḥ
T02avsata_u:776: | teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyo deveṣu vā
T02avsata_u:779: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe teṣāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ kaiścid buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu prasādaḥ pratilabdhaḥ, kaiścic charaṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītāni, kaiścit pravrajya idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā, sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikaraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya, sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:780: tena ca tīrthyopāsakena tathāgatāntike prasādaḥ pratilabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:781: tato mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ {bhagavataḥ} pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena
T02avsata_u:782: deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita, amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā,
T02avsata_u:784: atha bhagavāṃs tasya tīrthikopāsakasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt
T02avsata_u:785: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti, kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti |
T02avsata_u:786: yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ
T02avsata_u:787: hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti, ye śītanarakās teṣūṣṇībhūtā nipatanti |
T02avsata_u:789: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti |
T02avsata_u:793: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutā nāpy anyatropapannāḥ |
T02avsata_u:794: api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā
T02avsata_u:796: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti, yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti
T02avsata_u:797: | yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān, yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān
T02avsata_u:798: mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti, gāthādvayaṃ ca bhāṣante:
T02avsata_u:800: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_9.1 ||
T02avsata_u:801: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:802: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati || AVŚ_9.2 || iti atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
T02avsata_u:803: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:815: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati, uṣṇīṣe antardhīyante ||
T02avsata_u:816: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:819: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantād divākareṇodayatā yathaiva || AVŚ_9.3 ||
T02avsata_u:822: nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitam upadarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ || AVŚ_9.4 ||
T02avsata_u:824: tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṝṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām* |
T02avsata_u:825: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ || AVŚ_9.5 ||
T02avsata_u:826: nākāsmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ |
T02avsata_u:827: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrāḥ taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ || AVŚ_9.6 || iti bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat |
T02avsata_u:828: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
T02avsata_u:829: paśyasy ānanda anena tīrthikopāsakena mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:831: eṣa ānanda tīrthopāsako 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena {deyadharmaparityāgena} ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya acalo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati, daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ
T02avsata_u:833: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti ||
T02avsata_u:835: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:838: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:839: tena khalu samayena rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājā ca ajātaśatruḥ ubhāv apy etau parasparaṃ viruddhau babhūvatauḥ |
T02avsata_u:840: athā rājā ajātaśatruś caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnahya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalam abhiniryāto yuddhāya ||
T02avsata_u:841: aśrauṣīd rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ: rājā ajātaśatruś caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnahya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ ca abhiniryāto yuddhāyeti |
T02avsata_u:842: śrutvā ca caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnahya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ rājānam ajātaśatruṃ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya |
T02avsata_u:843: atha rājñā ajātaśatruṇā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya sarvo hastikāyaḥ paryastaḥ, aśvakāyo rathakāyaḥ pattikāyaḥ paryastaḥ |
T02avsata_u:844: rājā prasenajit kauśalo jito bhīto bhagnaḥ parājitaḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛta ekarathena śrāvastīṃ praviṣṭaḥ
T02avsata_u:847: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ śokāgaraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ
T02avsata_u:848: tatra ca śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:849: tena śrutaṃ yathā rājā prasenajit kauśalo jito bhagnaḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtaḥ, ekaratheneha praviṣṭa iti |
T02avsata_u:850: śrutvā ca punar yena rājā prasenajit kauśalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:851: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā ca (Speyer: uvāca):
T02avsata_u:852: kimarthaṃ deva śokaḥ kriyate? ahaṃ devasya tāvat suvarṇam anuprayacchāmi,
T02avsata_u:853: yena devaḥ punar api yatheṣṭapracāraṇaṃ kariṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:854: tena tasya mahān suvarṇarāśiḥ kṛtaḥ, yatropaviṣṭaḥ puruṣa utthitaṃ puruṣaṃ na paśyati,
T02avsata_u:856: atha rājñā prasenajitkauśalyena svaviṣaye carapuruṣāḥ samantata
T02avsata_u:858: yāvaj jetavane dvau mallāv anyonyaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurutaḥ: asti kesarī nāma saṃgrāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:859: tatra ye kātarāḥ puruṣās te saṃgrāmaśirasi sthāpyante, ye madhyās te madhye, ye utkṛṣṭāḥ śūrapuruṣās te pṛṣṭhata iti |
T02avsata_u:861: śrutvā ca rājā prasenajit kauśalas tathā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ ca rājānam ajātaśatrum abhiniryāto yuddhāya |
T02avsata_u:863: vaidehīputrasya sarvo hastikāyaḥ paryastaḥ, aśvakāyo rathakāyaḥ pattikāyaḥ
T02avsata_u:865: rājānam apy ajātaśatruṃ vaidehīputraṃ jitaṃ bhītabhagnaparājitaṃ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtaṃ jīvagrāhaṃ gṛhītvā ekarathe 'bhiropya
T02avsata_u:867: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣīdati |
T02avsata_u:868: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā prasenajitkauśalo bhagavantam ity avocat: ayaṃ hi bhadanta rājā ajātaśatrur
T02avsata_u:873: muñca mahārājety uktvā bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
T02avsata_u:874: jayo vairaṃ prasavati duḥkhaṃ śete parājitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:875: upaśāntaḥ sukhaṃ śete hitvā jayaparājayam* || AVŚ_10.1 ||
T02avsata_u:876: atha rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasyaitad abhavat: yan mayā rājyaṃ
T02avsata_u:878: yanv aham enaṃ vareṇa pravārayeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:879: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalas taṃ śreṣṭhinaṃ vareṇa prāvarayati |
T02avsata_u:880: sa kathayati: ākāṃkṣāmi varam*, saptāhaṃ me yathābhirucitaṃ
T02avsata_u:883: kāritam*: dattaṃ me śreṣṭhine saptāham ekaṃ rājyam iti |
T02avsata_u:884: yāvat tena śreṣṭhinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ saptāhaṃ bkahtenopanimantritaḥ,
T02avsata_u:887: prativasanti, teṣāṃ dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam*: saptāhaṃ yūyaṃ sakalā
T02avsata_u:893: māmakaṃ ca bhojanaṃ muñjānās tathāgataṃ paryupāsadhvam iti |
T02avsata_u:894: tena saptāhaṃ bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho mahatā satkāreṇa satkṛtaḥ,
T02avsata_u:896: saptāhasyātyayena bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya cetanāṃ puṣṇāti, praṇidhiṃ ca cakāra: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita, amuktānāṃ
T02avsata_u:898: atha bhagavāṃs tasya śreṣṭhino hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt
T02avsata_u:899: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti, kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti |

T02avsata_u:901: hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti, ye śītanarakās teṣūṣṇībhūtā nipatanti |
T02avsata_u:903: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti |
T02avsata_u:905: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutā nāpy anyatropapannāḥ
T02avsata_u:906: api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti |
T02avsata_u:907: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ
T02avsata_u:909: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān, yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn
T02avsata_u:910: paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety
T02avsata_u:913: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_10.1 ||
T02avsata_u:914: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:915: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati || AVŚ_10.2 || iti atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
T02avsata_u:916: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:930: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati, uṣṇīṣe antardhīyante ||
T02avsata_u:931: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:934: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantād divākareṇodayatā yathaiva || AVŚ_10.3 ||
