T02avsata_u:939: tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṝṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām* |
T02avsata_u:940: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ || AVŚ_10.5 ||
T02avsata_u:941: nākāsmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ |
T02avsata_u:942: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrāḥ taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ || AVŚ_10.6 || iti bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat |
T02avsata_u:943: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
T02avsata_u:944: paśyasi tvam ānanda anena śreṣṭhinā tathāgatasya saśrāvakasaṃghasyaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ
T02avsata_u:947: eṣa ānanda śreṣṭhī 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭ
T02avsata_u:948: pāramitāḥ paripūrya abhayaprado nāma samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati, daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca |
T02avsata_u:949: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti ||
T02avsata_u:951: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:955: nāvā stambhaṃ ca snātraṃ ca tathetiḥ pratisārakam* (pratihāryakam*) |
T02avsata_u:959: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati nadyā ajiravatyā adhastān nāvikagrāme |
T02avsata_u:960: atha te nāvikā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
T02avsata_u:961: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte nyaṣīdan* |
T02avsata_u:962: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāṃs tān nāvikān bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati |
T02avsata_u:963: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* |
T02avsata_u:964: atha te nāvikā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam ūcuḥ:
T02avsata_u:965: adhivāsayatu bhagavān asmākaṃ nadyā ajiravatyās tīre śvo bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena |
T02avsata_u:968: atha nāvikā nadyā ajiravatyās tīram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpayāmāsur ucchritacchatradhvajapatākaṃ
T02avsata_u:971: prabhūtaṃ ca puṣpasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā nausaṃkramaṃ puṣpamaṇḍapair alaṃkārayāmāsuḥ |
T02avsata_u:972: bhagavataś ca dūtena kālam ārocayāmāsuḥ: samayo bhadanta sajjaṃ bhaktam*,
T02avsata_u:974: atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena nāvikagrāmakas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
T02avsata_u:975: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat* |
T02avsata_u:976: atha te nāvikāḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati |
T02avsata_u:977: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcatarāṇy āsanāni gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:978: atha bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ nāvikānām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ
T02avsata_u:979: kṛtavān, yāṃ śrutvā anekair nāvikaiḥ srotaāpattiphalāni prāptāni, kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalāni kaiścid anāgāmiphalāni, kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*, kaiścic chrāvakabodhau cittāny
T02avsata_u:980: utpāditāni, kaiścit pratyekabodhau, kaiścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T02avsata_u:981: sarvā ca sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā |
T02avsata_u:982: tatas tair nāvikair bhagavān mahatā satkāreṇa nausaṃkrameṇottāritaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena
T02avsata_u:984: bhikṣavo buddhapūjādarśanād āvarjitamanaso buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kutremāni bhagavataḥ kuśalamūlāni kṛtānīti |
T02avsata_u:986: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny
T02avsata_u:989: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:991: loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
T02avsata_u:992: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
T02avsata_u:994: sa dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛto janapadacārikāṃ caran gaṅgātīram anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:999: atha dadarśa sārthavāho bhāgīrathaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:1001: prasannacittaś ca bhagavantam āmantritavān: tatprathamataram eva bhagavantaṃ tārayiṣyāmīti
T02avsata_u:1003: tatas tena sārthavāhena bhāgīrathaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛto mahatyā vibhūtyā nausaṃkrameṇottāritaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1004: praṇītena cāhāreṇa saṃtarpyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam* ||
T02avsata_u:1005: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:1010: tasya me karmaṇo vipākenānantasaṃsāre mahatsukham anubhūtam* |
T02avsata_u:1011: idānīm apy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyaivavidhā pūjā |
T02avsata_u:1013: śikṣitavyam: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1014: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1017: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:1020: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kauravyeṣu janapadacārikāṃ caran kauravyaṃ nagaram anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1021: sa ca kauravyo janakāyo buddhavaineya udāracitaḥ pradānaruciś ca |
T02avsata_u:1022: tato bhagavata etad abhavat*: yanv ahaṃ śakraṃ devendraṃ marudgaṇaparivṛtam āhveyeyam, yaddarśanād eṣāṃ kuśalamūlavivṛddhiḥ
T02avsata_u:1025: tato bhagavāṃl laukikaṃ cittam utpādayati: aho bata śakro
T02avsata_u:1026: devendro marudgaṇasahāyo gośīrṣacandanamayaṃ stambham ādāya gacched iti ||
T02avsata_u:1027: sahacittotpādāc chakro devendro marudgaṇaparivṛto āgato yatra viśvakarmā catvāraś ca mahārājā anekadevanāgayakṣakumbhāṇḍaparivṛto gośīrṣacandanastambham ādāya |
T02avsata_u:1028: hāhākārakilakilāprakṣveḍoccair nādaṃ kurvāṇā bhagavato 'rthe gośīrṣacandanamayaṃ prāsādam abhisaṃskṛtavantaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1029: tatas tasmin prāsāde śakreṇa devendreṇa bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho divyenāhāreṇa divyena śayanāsanena divyair gandhamālyapuṣpaiḥ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjitaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:1030: atha kauravyo janakāyas tāṃ divyāṃ vibhūṣikāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpanna imāṃ cintām āpede: nūnaṃ buddho bhagavāṃl loke 'gryaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1031: yat tu nāma sendrair devaiḥ pūjyata iti āvarjitamanā bhagavantam upasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1033: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ kauravyo janakāyas tasmin prāsāde 'tyarthaṃ prasādam utpādayati ||
T02avsata_u:1034: tena bhagavāṃs tat prāsādam antardhāpya anityatāpratisaṃyuktāṃ tādṛśīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān*, yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ kauravyanivāsibhir manuṣyaiḥ srotaāpattiphalāny anuprāptāni, kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalāni kaiścid anāgāmiphalāni, kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ
T02avsata_u:1035: sākṣātkṛtam*, kaiścic chrāvakabodhau cittāny utpāditāni, kaiścit pratyekāyāṃ bodhau, kaiścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T02avsata_u:1036: sarvā ca sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā |
T02avsata_u:1037: tatas te bhikṣavo bhagavato divyapūjādarśanād āvarjitamanaso buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kutremāni bhagavatā kuśalamūlāni kṛtānīti |
T02avsata_u:1038: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny
T02avsata_u:1041: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:1042: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani brahmā nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
T02avsata_u:1043: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
T02avsata_u:1045: atha brahmā samyaksaṃbuddho dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛto janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1046: aśrauṣīd rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ: brahmā samyaksaṃbuddho dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛto janapadacārikāṃ carann asmākaṃ vijitam anuprāpta iti |
T02avsata_u:1047: śrutvā ca punar mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena yena bhagavān brahmā samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1048: upasaṃkramya brahmaṇaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte nyaṣīdat* |
T02avsata_u:1049: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ bhagavān bodhikarakair dharmaiḥ samādāpayati
T02avsata_u:1050: atha sa labdhaprasāda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat*: adhivāsayatu
T02avsata_u:1055: atha sa rājā mūrdhābhiṣikto bhagavato 'rthe gośīrṣacandanamayaṃ prāsādaṃ kārayāmāsa |
T02avsata_u:1056: sa taṃ vicitrair vastrālaṃkārair alaṃkṛtaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ gandhaghaṭikādhūpitaṃ bhagavataḥ saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātya traimāsyaṃ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya vividhair vastraviśeṣair ācchādyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhiṃ cakāra ||
T02avsata_u:1057: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:1058: samayena rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ |
T02avsata_u:1059: yan mayā brahmaṇaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaivaṃvidhā pūjā kṛtā, tasya me karmaṇo
T02avsata_u:1061: idānīm apy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyaivavidhā pūjā |
T02avsata_u:1063: śikṣitavyam: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1064: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1067: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:1070: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:1071: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni kāntāramārgapratipannāni |
T02avsata_u:1073: te dharmaśramaparipīḍitāḥ kṣīṇapathyādanāś ca madhyāhnasamaye tīkṣṇakararaśmisaṃtāpitā jaloddhṛtā iva matsyāḥ pṛthivyām āvartante duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānāḥ tāni devatāsahasrāṇy āyācante: tadyathā śivavaruṇakuberavāsavādīni |
T02avsata_u:1078: tata ekaraveṇa sarva eva buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:1079: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* |
T02avsata_u:1080: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām
T02avsata_u:1083: navānupūrva{vihāra}samāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir
T02avsata_u:1084: divasasya <ca> buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ
T02avsata_u:1087: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*, kasya kāmapaṅkanimagnasya hastoddhāram
T02avsata_u:1090: jñānāñjanaśalākayā cakṣur viśodhayāmi |> kasyānavaropitāni kuśalamulāny avaropayeyam*, kasyāvaropitāni paripācayeyam*, kasya paripakvāni vimocayeyam* |
T02avsata_u:1093: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet || AVŚ_13.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1094: yāvat paśyati bhagavān saṃbahulān vaṇijo vyasanasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptān* |
T02avsata_u:1099: tato bhagavatā laukikaṃ cittam utpāditam*: aho bata śakro devendro māhendraṃ varṣam utsṛjatu, śītalāś ca vāyavo vāntv iti |
T02avsata_u:1100: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakreṇa māhendraṃ varṣam utsṛṣṭam*, śītalāś ca vāyavaḥ preṣitāḥ, yatas teṣāṃ vaṇijāṃ tṛṣā vigatā, dāhaś ca praśāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1102: bhagavatā caiṣāṃ mārga ākhyāto yena śrāvastīm anuprāptāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:1103: te mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya tato bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ |
T02avsata_u:1104: teṣāṃ bhagavatā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
T02avsata_u:1105: yāṃ śrutvā kaiścit srotaāpattiphalam adhigatam*, kaiścit
T02avsata_u:1106: sakṛdāgāmiphalam*, kaiścid anāgāmiphalam*, kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*, kaiścic chrāvakabodhau cittāny
T02avsata_u:1107: utpāditāni, kaiścit pratyekāyāṃ bodhau, kaiścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T02avsata_u:1108: yadbhūyasā ca sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā ||
T02avsata_u:1109: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhagavān*, yāvad ime vaṇijo bhagavatā kāntāramārgāt paritrātāḥ |
T02avsata_u:1112: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:1114: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:1115: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:1117: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api |
T02avsata_u:1118: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_13.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1119: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani candano nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
T02avsata_u:1123: atha candanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1124: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto yena candanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1125: upasaṃkramya candanasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte
T02avsata_u:1127: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ candanaṃ samyaksaṃbuddo bodhikarakair dharmaiḥ samādāpayati |
T02avsata_u:1128: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena candanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya candanaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat*: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān asyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ traimāsyavāsāya sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti adhivāsayati candanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho rājñas tūṣṇībhāvena |
T02avsata_u:1129: tatra ca samayena mahatī anāvṛṣṭiḥ prādurbhūtā, yayā nadyudapānāny alpasalilāni
T02avsata_u:1130: saṃvṛttāni, puṣpaphalaviyuktāś ca pādapāḥ || tato rājā candanaṃ
T02avsata_u:1132: bhagavann asmin nagaramadhye puṣkariṇīṃ gandhodakaparipūrṇāṃ karayiṣyāmi, yatra bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ snāsyati |
T02avsata_u:1133: apy eva nāma bhagavataḥ snānād asmin me vijite devo varṣed iti |
T02avsata_u:1134: adhivāsayati bhagavāṃś candanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho rajñas tuṣṇībhāvena |
T02avsata_u:1135: tato rajñā kṣatriyeṇa mūrdhābhiṣiktenāmātyebhya ājñā dattā:
T02avsata_u:1136: gandhodakaṃ sajjīkurvantu bhavantaḥ, ratnamayāṃś ca kumbhān*, yena vayaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ snāpayiṣyāma iti |
T02avsata_u:1137: tato rājñā āmātyagaṇaparivṛtena tan nagaram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpitum ucchritadhvajapatākaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ gandhodakapariṣiktaṃ vicitradhūpadhūpitam* |
T02avsata_u:1139: tato bhagavāṃś candanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddaḥ sarvānugrahārtham ekacīvarakaḥ puṣkariṇyāṃ sthitaḥ
T02avsata_u:1140: tato rājñāmātyagaṇaparivṛtena candanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saśrāvakasaṃgho nānāgandhaparibhāvitenodakena snāpitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1141: sahasnānād eva candanasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śakreṇa devendreṇa tathāvidhaṃ māhendraṃ varṣam utsṛṣṭaṃ yena sarvasasyāni niṣpannāni |
T02avsata_u:1142: taddhaitukaṃ ca mahājanakāyena buddhe bhagavati śraddhā pratilabdhā |
T02avsata_u:1144: ye ca tatra candanaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ, sarve te parinirvṛtāḥ |
T02avsata_u:1146: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1147: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1150: āttamanasas te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam
T02avsata_u:1154: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:1157: tato janakāyo rogaiḥ pīḍitaḥ tāni tāni devatāsahasrāṇy āyācate śivavaruṇakuberavāsavādīni
T02avsata_u:1158: na cāsya sā ītir upaśamaṃ gacchati |
T02avsata_u:1160: sa nāḍakantheyān brāhmaṇagṛhapatīn idam avocat: eta yūyaṃ buddhaṃ śarāṇaṃ gacchata, taṃ ca bhagavantam āyācadhvam ihāgamanāya |
T02avsata_u:1161: apy eva bhagavatā svalpakṛcchreṇāsyā īter vyupaśamaḥ syād iti |
T02avsata_u:1162: atha nāḍakantheyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavantam āyācituṃ pravṛttāḥ: āgacchatu bhagavān asmād vyasanasaṃkaṭān mocanāyeti ||
T02avsata_u:1163: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* |
T02avsata_u:1164: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrva{vihāra}samāpattikuśalānāṃ
T02avsata_u:1165: daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya <ca> buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya
T02avsata_u:1166: jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko
T02avsata_u:1168: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*, kasya kāmapaṅkanimagnasya hastoddhāram
T02avsata_u:1171: jñānāñjanaśalākayā cakṣur viśodhayāmi |> kasyānavaropitāni kuśalamulāny avaropayeyam*, kasyāvaropitāni paripācayeyam*, kasya paripakvāni vimocayeyam* |
T02avsata_u:1174: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet || AVŚ_14.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1175: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto nāḍakanthām anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1176: tato bhagavatā tan nagaraṃ sarvaṃ hṛdimaitryā sphuṭam*, yato marakāḥ prakrāntāḥ, ītiś ca vyupaśāntā
T02avsata_u:1177: tatas teṣāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ buddhadarśanān mahāprasāda utpannaḥ,
T02avsata_u:1179: tatas tebhyo bhagavatā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā
T02avsata_u:1180: kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā anekair brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ srotaāpattiphalam anuprāptam*, aparaiḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam, aparaiḥ anāgāmiphalam*, aparaiḥ pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:1181: sarvaṃ ca tan nagaraṃ buddhanimnaṃ dharmapravaṇaṃ saṃghaprāgbhāraṃ saṃvṛttam* ||
T02avsata_u:1182: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yāvad ime satvā bhagavataḥ prasādād vyasanagatāḥ santo vyasanāt parimuktā iti |
T02avsata_u:1184: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:1187: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:1188: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
T02avsata_u:1191: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_14.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1192: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani candro nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
T02avsata_u:1193: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
T02avsata_u:1195: atha candraḥ samyaksaṃbuddho janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1196: aśrauṣīd rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ: candraḥ samyaksaṃbuddho 'smākaṃ vijitam anuprāpta iti |
T02avsata_u:1197: śrutvā ca punar mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena samanvāgato yena candraḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1198: upasaṃkramya candrasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte nyaṣīdat* |
T02avsata_u:1199: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ candraḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bodhikarakair dharmaiḥ samādāpayati |
T02avsata_u:1200: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto labdhaprasāda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena candraḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya candraṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat*: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān iha vāsaṃ traimāsyaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena |
T02avsata_u:1203: tasya ca rājño nagare tena samayena mahājanamarako babhūva, ītiś ca, yena sa mahājanakāyo
T02avsata_u:1206: sādhu bhagavan kriyatām asyā īter upaśamopāya iti |
T02avsata_u:1207: tato bhagavāṃś candraḥ samyaksaṃbuddho rājānam uvāca: gaccha mahārāja imāṃ saṃghāṭīṃ dhvajāgre baddhā mahatā satkāreṇa sve vijite
T02avsata_u:1208: paryāṭaya, asya ca mahāntam utsavaṃ kuru |
T02avsata_u:1211: tato rājñā yathānuśiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ tathaiva ca kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:1213: tataḥ sa janakāyo labdhaprasādo rājāmātyapaurāś ca buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ, dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:1214: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:1216: mayāsau candrasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya mahatī pūjā kṛtā |
T02avsata_u:1217: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena devamanuṣyasaṃprāpakaṃ saṃsāre mahatsukham anubhūtam* |
T02avsata_u:1218: idānīm api taddhaituky eva vibhūtiḥ, yena yac cintayāmi yat prārthaye tat tathaiva sarvaṃ samṛdhyati |
T02avsata_u:1219: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1220: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1223: āttamanasas te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam
T02avsata_u:1228: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:1229: yadā rājñā ajātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ, svayam eva ca rājye
T02avsata_u:1230: pratiṣṭhitaḥ, tadā ye aśrāddhās te balavanto jātāḥ, śrāddhās tu durbalāḥ
T02avsata_u:1232: yāvad anyatamo vṛddhāmātyo 'śrāddho bhagavacchāsanavidveṣī, sa brāhmaṇebhyo yajñam ārabdho yaṣṭum* |
T02avsata_u:1234: taiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ: na kenacic chramaṇagautamaṃ
T02avsata_u:1236: atha te brāhmaṇāḥ kṛtāvayaḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā vīthīmadhye vedoktena vidhinā śakram āyācituṃ pravṛttāḥ: ehy ehi ahalyājāra ||
T02avsata_u:1237: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* |
T02avsata_u:1238: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrva{vihāra}samāpattikuśalānāṃ
T02avsata_u:1239: daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya <ca> buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya
T02avsata_u:1240: jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko
T02avsata_u:1242: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*, kasya kāmapaṅkanimagnasya hastoddhāram
T02avsata_u:1245: jñānāñjanaśalākayā cakṣur viśodhayāmi |> kasyānavaropitāni kuśalamulāny avaropayeyam*, kasyāvaropitāni paripācayeyam*, kasya paripakvāni vimocayeyam* |
T02avsata_u:1248: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet || AVŚ_15.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1251: akalyāṇamitrasaṃsārgād idānīṃ macchāsanaṃ vidviṣanti, yanv aham eṣāṃ
T02avsata_u:1253: atha bhagavāñ chakraveṣam abhinirmāya taṃ yajñavāṭaṃ divyenāvabhāsenāvabhāsya avataritum ārabdhaḥ
T02avsata_u:1256: ekasamūhenoktavantaḥ: ehy ehi bhagavan, svāgataṃ bhagavata iti |
T02avsata_u:1257: tato bhagavān śakraveṣadhārī prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1258: eṣa śabdo rājagṛhe samantato visṛtaḥ: yajñe śakro devendro 'vatīrṇa iti |
T02avsata_u:1260: tato bhagavān āvarjitā brāhmaṇā iti viditvā śakraveṣam antardhāpya buddhaveṣeṇaiva sthitvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān, yāṃ śrutvā ṣaṣṭyā
T02avsata_u:1261: brāhmaṇasahasrair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*, anekaiś ca prāṇiśatasahasrair
T02avsata_u:1263: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yāvad ebhir brāhmaṇair bhagavantam āgatya satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam*, anekaiś ca prāṇiśatasahasrair
T02avsata_u:1265: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:1267: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na
T02avsata_u:1268: tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
T02avsata_u:1271: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_15.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1273: loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
T02avsata_u:1274: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
T02avsata_u:1276: sa janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1279: mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ: indradamanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho 'smākaṃ vijitam anuprāpta iti |
T02avsata_u:1280: śrutvā ca punar mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena samanvāgato yenendradamanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1281: upasaṃkramya bhagavata indradamanasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ
T02avsata_u:1282: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktam indradamanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bodhikarakair (Speyer: bodhisatvakarakair) dharmaiḥ samādāpayati |
T02avsata_u:1283: atha sa rājā labdhaprasāda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yenendradamanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya indradamanaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat*: adhivāsayatu me bhagavāṃs traimāsyavāsāya |
T02avsata_u:1286: āha: asti te mahārāja vijite kaścid vihāro yatrāgantukā gamikāś ca
T02avsata_u:1287: bhikṣavo vāsaṃ kalpayiṣyantīti? rājovāca: nāsti bhagavan, kiṃ tarhi tiṣṭhatu bhagavān, ahaṃ vihāraṃ kārayiṣyāmi, yatrāgantukā gamikāś ca
T02avsata_u:1289: tato rājñā tathāgatasyārthe vihāraḥ kāritaḥ aviddhaprākāratoraṇo
T02avsata_u:1295: tato bhagavatā indradamanena samyaksaṃbuddhena rājño 'dhyeṣayā mahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ
T02avsata_u:1296: yaddarśanād rājā sāmātyanaigamajānapadaḥ sarve ca nāgarāḥ suprasannāḥ śāsane saṃraktatarāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:1297: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:1299: mayā sā indradamanasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyaivaṃvidhā pūjā kṛtā |
T02avsata_u:1300: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ sukham anubhūtam* |
T02avsata_u:1301: idānīṃ me tathāgatasya sata iyaṃ śāsanaśobhā |
T02avsata_u:1302: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo
T02avsata_u:1304: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1308: āttamanasas te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam
T02avsata_u:1312: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:1314: 'narthasahasrāṇi kṛtāni, na ca śakitaṃ bhagavato romeñjanam api kartum*,
T02avsata_u:1315: tadā rājānam ajātaśatrum āmantritavān*: kriyatāṃ rājagṛhe kriyākāro na kenacic chramaṇasya gautamasyopasaṃkramitavyam*, piṇḍakena vā pratipādayitavyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1316: evam ayam alabdhalābho 'labdhasaṃmāno niyatam anyadeśaṃ saṃkrāntiṃ kariṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:1318: tatra ye upāsakā dṛṣṭasatyās te rodituṃ pravṛttāḥ: hā kaṣṭam anāthībhūtaṃ rājagṛhanagaraṃ yatra hi nābhodumbarapuṣpadurlabhaprādurbhāvaṃ (Speyer:
T02avsata_u:1319: nāmodumbarapuṣpadurlabhaprādurbhāvaṃ) buddhaṃ bhagavantam āsādya tasya na śakyate saṃgrahaḥ kartum iti |
T02avsata_u:1323: āha: alpotsukas tvam ānanda bhava, tathāgatā evātra kālajñāḥ |
T02avsata_u:1324: api tu yāvac chāsanaṃ me tāvac chrāvakāṇām upakaraṇavaikalyaṃ na bhaviṣyati prāg evedānīm iti ||
T02avsata_u:1325: atrāntare śakrasya devānām indrasyādhastāj jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate |
T02avsata_u:1327: sahadarśanād eva dāyakadānapatīnāṃ utsāhasaṃjananārthaṃ buddhotpādasya māhātmyasaṃjananārtham ajātaśatror devadattasya ca madadarpacchittyartham ātmanaś ca prasādasaṃjananārthaṃ sakalaṃ rājagṛham udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsyoccaiḥśabdham udāritavān: eṣo 'ham adyāgreṇa bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ divyaiś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair upasthāsyāmi ity uktvā yena
T02avsata_u:1330: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte sthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1331: atha śakro devendro bhagavantam idam avocat:
T02avsata_u:1332: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān asminn eva rājagṛhe nagare |
T02avsata_u:1334: bhagavān āha: alaṃ kauśika kṛtam etad yāvad eva cittam
T02avsata_u:1337: śakraḥ prāha: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān pañca varṣāṇi |
T02avsata_u:1339: bhagavān āha: alaṃ kauśika kṛtam etad yāvac cittam abhiprasannam* |
T02avsata_u:1341: śakraḥ prāha: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān pañca divasān iti |
T02avsata_u:1342: tato bhagavān svapuṇyabalapratyakṣīkaraṇārthaṃ śakrasya ca devendrasyānugrahārtham anāgatapañcavārṣikaprabandhahetoś cādhivāsitavāṃs tūṣṇībhāvena ||
T02avsata_u:1343: atha śakro devendro bhagavas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā tad veṇuvanaṃ vaijayantaṃ prāsādaṃ pradarśitavān*, divyāni cāsanāni, divyāḥ puṣkaraṇīr divyaṃ ca bhojanam* |
T02avsata_u:1344: atha bhagavān prajñapta eva āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1345: tataḥ śakro devendraḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā anekadevatāsahasraparivṛtaḥ svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati |
T02avsata_u:1346: anekaparyāyeṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcataram āsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:1347: tato bhagavān śakraṃ devendraṃ saparivāraṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati |
T02avsata_u:1348: paśyati ca rājā ajātaśatrur upariprāsādatalagataḥ san bhagavato veṇuvane evaṃvidhāṃ pūjāṃ*
T02avsata_u:1349: dṛṣṭvā ca punar vipratisārajāto mahāntaṃ prasādaṃ praveditavān* |
T02avsata_u:1350: rājagṛhanivāsinaś ca paurā dharmavegapṛaptā rājānam upasaṃkramyaivam ūcuḥ: muṣyante deva mahārāja rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ, yatra nāma devāḥ pramattāḥ santaḥ pramādavihāriṇo divyān viṣayān apahāya bhagavantaṃ pūjayanti |
T02avsata_u:1352: tato rājñā ajātaśatruṇā kriyākāram udghāṭya rājagṛhe nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*: kriyatāṃ bhagavataḥ satkāro yathāsukham iti |
T02avsata_u:1353: tato rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ saparivārā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditā udagraprītisaumanasyajātāḥ puṣpagandhamālyāny ādāya bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
T02avsata_u:1354: tato devair manuṣyaiś ca bhagavato mahān satkāraḥ
T02avsata_u:1355: kṛtaḥ, bhagavatā ca tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ tādṛśī
T02avsata_u:1356: caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā anekair
T02avsata_u:1358: bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśayajātā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
T02avsata_u:1359: papracchuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavataḥ śāsane evaṃvidha utsava iti |
T02avsata_u:1360: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi
T02avsata_u:1361: kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
T02avsata_u:1364: 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:1367: na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:1371: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_16.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1373: loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
T02avsata_u:1374: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
T02avsata_u:1376: sa janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1377: tasyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ dharmabuddhir nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati tasyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ mahatī ītiḥ |
T02avsata_u:1378: tatas tena rājñā ītipraśamanahetor bhagavān śrāvakasaṃghatraimāsye bhaktenopanimantritaḥ |trāyāṇāṃ māsānām atyayena sā
T02avsata_u:1380: tato rājño nāgaraiś cāvarjitamānasais tathāgatasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya pañcavārṣikaṃ kṛtam*
T02avsata_u:1383: avīṣṭaḥ śāntikāmena akārṣīt pañcavārṣikam* || AVŚ_16.2 || iti ||
T02avsata_u:1384: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ |
T02avsata_u:1385: yan mayā ratnaśailasya tathāgatasya pañcavārṣikaṃ kṛtam*, tena me saṃsāre mahatsukham anubhūtam*
T02avsata_u:1387: parinirvṛtasya ca me śāsane anekāni pañcavārṣikaśatāni bhaviṣyati |
T02avsata_u:1389: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1390: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1393: āttamanasas te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam
T02avsata_u:1397: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:1398: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ pañcamātrāṇi gāndharvikaśatāni goṣṭhikānāṃ prativasanti |
T02avsata_u:1399: tatra ca kāle supriyo nāma gāndharvikarājo 'bhyāgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:1400: tasyaivaṃvidhā śaktiḥ: ekasyāṃ tantryāṃ sāpta svarān ādarśayati,
T02avsata_u:1402: sa ṣaṇmahānagarāṇy apaṭukāny udghoṣayamāṇaḥ śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1404: | rājāha: alpotsukā bhavantu bhavantaḥ, vayam atra kālajñā bhaviṣyāma iti ||
T02avsata_u:1406: atha supriyasya gāndharvikarājasyaitad abhavat: evam anuśrūyate rājā
T02avsata_u:1408: yanv aham anena saha vādam ārocayeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:1409: tataḥ supriyo gāndharvikarājo yena rājā prasenajit kauśalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1410: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalam idam āvocat*: śrutaṃ me rājan yathā tvaṃ gāndharvakuśala iti |
T02avsata_u:1413: tato rājñā prasenajitā tasya vikṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1415: sādho asti me gurur jetavane sthito 'nuttaro gāndharvikarājaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1417: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ pañcamātrair gāndharvikaśataiḥ parivṛtaḥ supriyeṇa gāndharvikarājenānekaiś ca prāṇiśatasahasrair jetavanaṃ gataḥ ||
T02avsata_u:1418: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* |
T02avsata_u:1419: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya <ca> buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ
T02avsata_u:1422: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*, kasya kāmapaṅkanimagnasya hastoddhāram
T02avsata_u:1425: jñānāñjanaśalākayā cakṣur viśodhayāmi |> kasyānavaropitāni kuśalamulāny avaropayeyam*, kasyāvaropitāni paripācayeyam*, kasya paripakvāni vimocayeyam* |
T02avsata_u:1428: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet || AVŚ_17.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1429: tato bhagavān vaineyajanānugrahārthaṃ laukikaṃ cittam utpāditavān* |
T02avsata_u:1430: aho bata pañcaśikho gandharvaputraḥ saptagandharvasahasraparivṛto vaiḍūryadaṇḍāṃ vīṇām ādāya matsakāśam upasaṃkrāmed iti |
T02avsata_u:1431: sahacittotpādāt pañcaśikho gandharvaputraḥ saptagandharvasahasraparivṛto bhagavantaṃ yathāvad abhyarcya bhagavato vaiḍūryadaṇḍāṃ vīṇām upanayati sma |
T02avsata_u:1432: tataḥ supriyo gandharvarājo bhagavataḥ purastād vīṇām anuśrāvitum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1433: yata ekasyāṃ tantryāṃ sapta svarāṇi ekaviṃśatiṃ mūrcchanāś ca darśayitum
T02avsata_u:1434: ārabdhaḥ, yac chravaṇād rājā prasenajid anyatamaś ca mahājanakāyaḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ
T02avsata_u:1435: tato bhagavān api vaiḍūryadaṇḍāṃ vīṇām āśrāvitavān*:
T02avsata_u:1436: yata ekaikasyāṃ tantryām aneke svaraviśeṣā mūrcchanāś ca bahuprakārā darśitāḥ, te ca śūnyākāreṇaiva
T02avsata_u:1439: yac chravaṇād āvarjitaḥ supriyo gandharvarājo vīṇāṃ gandhakuṭyāṃ niryātya bhagavatsakāśe pravrajitaḥ
T02avsata_u:1440: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā
T02avsata_u:1443: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1446: tata āvarjitā devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā bhhagavacchāsane rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ |
T02avsata_u:1447: pañcānām api gāndharvikaśatānāṃ prītisaumanasyajātānām etad abhavat*: vayaṃ nīce karmaṇi vartāmahe kṛcchravṛttayaś ca |
T02avsata_u:1448: yan nu vayaṃ rājānaṃ vijñāpya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ nagarapraveśenopanimantrayemahīti
T02avsata_u:1449: yāvat tair gāndharvikair labdhānujñair bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ
T02avsata_u:1450: adhivāsitaṃ ca bhagavatā teṣāṃ gāndharvikāṇāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena |
T02avsata_u:1451: tatas tair gāndharvikair rājāmātyapaurajānapadasahāyaiḥ sarvā śrāvastī nagarī apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallā gandhodakapariṣiktā nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇā vicitradhūpadhūpitā puṣpavitānamaṇḍitā |
T02avsata_u:1452: te ca gāndharvikāḥ svayam eva vīṇām ādāya mṛdaṅgaveṇupaṇavādiviśeṣair upasthānaṃ cakruḥ, praṇītena cāhāreṇa bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ saṃtarpayāmāsuḥ ||
T02avsata_u:1454: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti, tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā
T02avsata_u:1455: arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti, kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti |
T02avsata_u:1456: yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ
T02avsata_u:1457: hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti, ye śītanarakās teṣūṣṇībhūtā nipatanti |
T02avsata_u:1459: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ, āhosvid anyatropapannā iti |
T02avsata_u:1461: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ, nāpy anyatropapannāḥ
T02avsata_u:1462: api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti |
T02avsata_u:1463: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ
T02avsata_u:1465: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān, yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn
T02avsata_u:1466: paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety
T02avsata_u:1469: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_17.2 ||
T02avsata_u:1470: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:1473: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
T02avsata_u:1474: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:1475: anāgataṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, purastād antardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:1488: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:1491: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantād divākareṇodayatā yathaiva || AVŚ_17.4 ||
T02avsata_u:1494: nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitam upadarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ || AVŚ_17.5 ||
T02avsata_u:1495: tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṝṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām* |
T02avsata_u:1496: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ || AVŚ_17.6 ||
T02avsata_u:1497: nākāsmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ |
T02avsata_u:1498: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrāḥ taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ || AVŚ_17.7 || iti bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat |
T02avsata_u:1499: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
T02avsata_u:1500: paśyasy ānanda ebhir gāndharvikair mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:1502: ete ānanda gāndharvikāḥ anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yathākālānugatāṃ pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya anāgate 'dhvani varṇasvarā nāma pratyekabuddhā bhaviṣyanti hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā
T02avsata_u:1504: ayam eṣāṃ deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti
T02avsata_u:1506: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayānāṃ chettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
T02avsata_u:1507: papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta bhagavatā kuśalamūlāni kṛtāni yeṣām ayam anubhāva iti |
T02avsata_u:1508: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:1510: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:1511: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:1515: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_17.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1517: loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
T02avsata_u:1518: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
T02avsata_u:1520: sa janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1522: atha sa bhagavāṃs tad udyānaṃ praviśya rājānugrahārtham anyatamaṃ vṛkṣam upaniśritya niṣaṇṇaḥ
T02avsata_u:1524: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ strīmayena tūryeṇa vādyamānenodyānaṃ praviṣṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1525: atha sa rājā tad udyānam anuvicaran dadarśa bhagavantaṃ prabodhanaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ prāsādikaṃ prasādanīyaṃ śāntamānasaṃ parameṇa cittadamavyupaśamena samanvāgataṃ suvarṇayūpam iva śriyā jvalantam* |
T02avsata_u:1526: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prasādajātaḥ sa rājā sāntaḥpuro vividhena vādyena vādyamānena bhagavantaṃ tataḥ samādheḥ prabodhayāmāsa, praṇītena cāhareṇa pratipāditavān*, anuttarāyāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtavān* ||
T02avsata_u:1527: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ |
T02avsata_u:1528: yan mayā prabodhanasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjā kṛtā,
T02avsata_u:1529: tenaiva hetunā idānīṃ mama gāndharvikair evaṃvidhaṃ satkāraḥ kṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1530: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo
T02avsata_u:1532: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1536: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:1539: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:1540: atha śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ pāradāriko maline karmaṇi vartate |
T02avsata_u:1543: tato rājñā aparādhika iti kṛtvā vadhya utsṛṣṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1544: sa rājapuruṣair nīlāmbaravasanair udyataśastraiḥ karavīramālābaddhakaṇṭheguṇo rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv anuśrāvyamāṇo dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa apanīyate ||
T02avsata_u:1545: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* |
T02avsata_u:1546: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrva{vihāra}samāpattikuśalānāṃ
T02avsata_u:1547: daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya <ca> buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya
T02avsata_u:1548: jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko
T02avsata_u:1550: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*, kasya kāmapaṅkanimagnasya hastoddhāram
T02avsata_u:1553: jñānāñjanaśalākayā cakṣur viśodhayāmi |> kasyānavaropitāni kuśalamulāny avaropayeyam*, kasyāvaropitāni paripācayeyam*, kasya paripakvāni vimocayeyam* |
T02avsata_u:1556: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet || AVŚ_18.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1557: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* |
T02avsata_u:1558: dadarśa sa puruṣo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam śītyānuvañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:1559: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat*: varāho 'smi bhagavan*, iṣṭaṃ me jīvitaṃ
T02avsata_u:1561: tato bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate: gaccha ānanda rājānaṃ prasenajitam* |
T02avsata_u:1564: athāyuṣmān ānando yena rājā prasenajit kauśalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1566: bhagavadvacanenovāca: anujānīhi, bhagavān etaṃ puruṣaṃ pravrājayatīti |
T02avsata_u:1569: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣākṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:1570: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1573: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayānāṃ chettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
T02avsata_u:1574: papracchuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavatā sarvaṃ cintitamātraṃ
T02avsata_u:1576: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu
T02avsata_u:1578: jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:1580: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:1581: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:1585: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_18.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1587: loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
T02avsata_u:1588: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
T02avsata_u:1590: sa janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1592: athendradhvajaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya tāṃ rājadhānīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* |
T02avsata_u:1593: adrākṣīt sa brāhmaṇa indradhvajaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyaṃjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:1594: | dṛṣṭvā ca punar mūlanikṛtta iva drumo bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatyovāca:
T02avsata_u:1595: vāraho 'smi sugata, niṣīdatu bhagavān agrāsana iti |
T02avsata_u:1596: atha bhagavān indradhvajaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tasyānugrahārtham agrāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1597: agrāsane niṣaṇṇaś cendradhvajaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tena brāhmaṇena padaśatena stutaḥ, praṇītena cāhareṇa pratipāditaḥ, anuttarāyāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:1599: tat kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena brāhmaṇo babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ
T02avsata_u:1600: yan me indradhvajasya tathāgatasya pūjā kṛtā,
T02avsata_u:1601: taddhaitukaṃ ca me saṃsāre anantaṃ sukham anubhūtam* |
T02avsata_u:1605: śikṣitavyam: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1606: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1609: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:1612: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:1613: yadā rājñā bimbisāreṇānekaprāṇiśatasahasraparivāreṇa satyāni dṛṣṭāni, tadā tena kṛtapratyupakārasaṃdarśanārthaṃ
T02avsata_u:1616: saśrāvakasaṃgho rājakule bhaktenopanimantritaḥ, māgadhakānāṃ ca paurāṇām
T02avsata_u:1617: ājñā dattā: bhagavato nagarapraveśe puṣpagandhamālyavilepanaiḥ pūjā
T02avsata_u:1618: kartavyā, sarvaṃ ca rājagṛhaṃ nagaram apagatapāṣāṇasarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpayitavyam*, nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇam ucchritadhvajapatākaṃ yāvac ca veṇuvanaṃ yāvac ca rājagṛham*, atrāntarā sarvo mārgo vicitrair vastrāir ācchādayitavya iti |
T02avsata_u:1620: tato rājā bimbisāraḥ svayam eva bhagavato mūrdhni śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ dhārayati, pariśeṣāḥ paurāḥ bhikṣusahasrasya ||
T02avsata_u:1621: atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta āśvastaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhann
T02avsata_u:1622: arhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ prāsādikaḥ prāsādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gaja iva kalabhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ siṃha iva daṃṣṭrigaṇaparivṛto haṃsa iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛto suparṇīva pakṣigaṇaparivṛto vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ svaśva iva
T02avsata_u:1623: turagagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto deśika ivādhvagagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva paurajanaparivṛtaḥ koṭṭarāja iva mantrigaṇaparivṛtaś cakravartīva putrasahasraparivṛtaś candra iva nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva
T02avsata_u:1624: raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto virūḍha iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto virūpākṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛto dhanada iva yakṣagaṇaparivṛto vemacitrīvāsuragaṇaparivṛtaḥ śakra iva tridaśagaṇaparivṛto brahmā iva brahmakāyikaparivṛtaḥ stimita iva jalanidhiḥ sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva gajapatiḥ sudāntair indriyair asaṃkṣobhiteryāpathapracāro 'nekair āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ parivṛto
T02avsata_u:1626: yadā ca bhagavatā indrakīle pādo nyastaḥ, tadeyaṃ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā |
T02avsata_u:1627: bhagavataḥ purapraveśe evaṃrūpāṇy adbhutāni bhavanty anyāni ca |
T02avsata_u:1628: tadyathā: saṃkṣiptāni viśālībhavanti, hastinaḥ krośanti aśvāś ca heṣante ṛṣabhā nardante gṛhagatāni
T02avsata_u:1629: svayaṃ nadanti, andhāś cakṣūṃṣi pratilabhante, badhirāḥ śrotraṃ mūkāḥ
T02avsata_u:1632: anyonyavairiṇo maitrīṃ pratilabhante, gurviṇyaḥ svastinaḥ prajāyante,
T02avsata_u:1633: bandhanabaddhā vimucyante, adhanā dhanāni pratilabhante, āntarikṣāś ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā divyaṃ puṣpam utsṛjanti ||
T02avsata_u:1634: atha bhagavān evaṃvidhayā vibhūtyā rājakulaṃ praveṣṭum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1635: rājā ca bimbisāraḥ svayam eva bahirdvāraśālastho gośirṣacandanodakena pādyaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ pādau bhikṣusaṃghasya ca prākṣalayati |
T02avsata_u:1636: sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śatarasenāhāreṇa pratipādayāmāsa |
T02avsata_u:1639: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kutremāni bhagavatā kuśalamūlāni kṛtāni, yato bhagavata evaṃvidhā pūjā bhikṣusaṃghasya ceti |
T02avsata_u:1641: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi
T02avsata_u:1642: kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
T02avsata_u:1645: 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:1646: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca |
T02avsata_u:1649: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_19.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1651: loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
T02avsata_u:1652: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
T02avsata_u:1654: sa janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1655: aśrauṣīd rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ: kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksaṃbuddho janapadacārikāṃ carann asmākaṃ rājadhānīm anuprāpta iti |
T02avsata_u:1656: śrutvā ca mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena samanvāgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:1658: upasaṃkramya kṣemaṃkarasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1659: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktam kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bodhikarakair dharmaiḥ samādāpayati |
T02avsata_u:1660: atha sa rājā labdhaprasādaḥ kṣemaṃkaraṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ rājakule nimantrya śatarasenāhāreṇa pratipādayāmāsa |
T02avsata_u:1662: parinirvṛtasya ca samantayojanaṃ stūpaṃ kāritavān krośam uccatvena ||
T02avsata_u:1663: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ |
T02avsata_u:1664: yan mayā kṣemaṃkarasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyaivaṃvidhāṃ pūjā kṛtā, tena mayā saṃsāre 'nantaṃ sukham anubhūtam* |
T02avsata_u:1665: idānīṃ tenaiva hetunā rājā bimbisāreṇāpi tathāgatasya me evaṃvidhā pūjā kṛtā |
T02avsata_u:1666: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1667: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1670: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:1673: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:1674: tatra anyataraḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
T02avsata_u:1677: sa āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanenāvarjitaḥ śāsane ca avatārito bhagavaty atyartham abhiprasannaḥ
T02avsata_u:1679: tenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana uktaḥ: sahāyo me bhava, icchāmi bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kartum iti |
T02avsata_u:1680: adhivāsayaty āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tasya gṛhapates tūṣṇībhāvena, athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas taṃ gṛhapatim ādāya yena
T02avsata_u:1681: bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1682: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavantam idam avocat: ayaṃ bhadanta gṛhapatir ākāṅkṣati bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayitum* |
T02avsata_u:1683: tad asya bhagavān adhivāsayed anukampām upādāyeti |
T02avsata_u:1685: atha sa gṛhapatir bhagavatas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā śatarasam āhāraṃ
T02avsata_u:1687: āyuṣmatāpi mahāmaudgalyāyanena śakro devendro 'dhīṣṭaḥ: kriyatām asya gṛhapater
T02avsata_u:1689: tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇa veṇuvanaṃ nandavanam abhinirmitam*, airāvaṇasupratiṣṭhitasadṛśāni ca nāgasahasrāṇi [gap?]
T02avsata_u:1692: ŚtumburuŚ) cānekāni gandharvasahasrāṇy upanītāni ye vicitrair vādyaviśeṣair vādyaṃ kurvanti, divyaṃ ca sudhābhojanam* |
T02avsata_u:1693: tataḥ sa gṛhapatir divyamānuṣair upakaraṇair bhagavantam upasthāya sarvāṅgeṇa bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇīdhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita, amuktānāṃ
T02avsata_u:1695: atha bhagavāṃs tasya gṛhapater hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt
T02avsata_u:1696: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti, kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti |
T02avsata_u:1697: yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ
T02avsata_u:1698: hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti, ye śītanarakās teṣūṣṇībhūtā nipatanti |
T02avsata_u:1700: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti |
T02avsata_u:1702: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutā nāpy anyatropapannāḥ
T02avsata_u:1703: api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti |
T02avsata_u:1704: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ
T02avsata_u:1706: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān, yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn
T02avsata_u:1709: brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti, gāthādvayaṃ ca bhāṣante:
T02avsata_u:1711: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_20.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1712: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:1713: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati || AVŚ_20.2 || iti atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
T02avsata_u:1714: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:1725: pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati, ūrṇāyām antardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:1726: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati, uṣṇīṣe antardhīyante ||
T02avsata_u:1727: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:1730: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantād divākareṇodayatā yathaiva || AVŚ_20.3 ||
T02avsata_u:1733: nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitam upadarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ || AVŚ_20.4 ||
T02avsata_u:1736: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ || AVŚ_20.5 ||
T02avsata_u:1738: nākāsmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ |
T02avsata_u:1739: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrāḥ taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ || AVŚ_20.6 || iti bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat |
T02avsata_u:1740: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
T02avsata_u:1741: paśyasy ānanda anena gṛhapatinā mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:1743: eṣa ānanda gṛhapatir anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya divyānnado nāma samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaviṣyanti daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca |
T02avsata_u:1744: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasādaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1745: etac ca prakaraṇaṃ rājā bimbisāro māgadhakāś ca paricārakāḥ śrutvā paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ
T02avsata_u:1746: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: paśya bhagavan yāvad anena gṛhapatinā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho divyamānuṣībhir ṛddhibhir abhyarcita iti || bhagavān āha:
T02avsata_u:1747: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:1750: pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:1751: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
T02avsata_u:1754: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_20.1 ||
T02avsata_u:1755: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani pūrṇo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
T02avsata_u:1756: lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
T02avsata_u:1758: atha pūrṇaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1759: aśrauṣīd rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ: pūrṇaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho janapadacārikāṃ carann asmākaṃ rājadhānīm anuprāpta iti |
T02avsata_u:1760: śrutvā ca punar mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena samanvāgato yena bhagavān pūrṇaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1761: upasaṃkramya pūrṇasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1762: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ pūrṇaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bodhikarakair dharmaiḥ samādāpayati |
T02avsata_u:1763: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ pūrṇaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsyaṃ
T02avsata_u:1766: adhivāsitaṃ ca pūrṇena samyaksaṃbuddhena rājñas tūṣṇībhāvena |
T02avsata_u:1767: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ pūrṇasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā traimāsyaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair upasthāpya bhagavato ratnamayapratimāṃ kārayitvā buddhaharṣaṃ kāritavān*, yatrānekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrair mahāprasādo labdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1770: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ |
T02avsata_u:1771: yan mayā pūrṇasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tādṛśī pūjā kṛtā,
T02avsata_u:1772: tena me saṃsāre 'nantaṃ sukham anubhūtam*, tenaiva ca hetunā tathāgatasya ca me śreṣṭhinā śakreṇa ca īdṛśī pūjā kṛtā |
T02avsata_u:1774: śikṣitavyam: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1775: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1778: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:1782: candano hy atha padmaś ca cakraṃ daśaśirās tathā |
T02avsata_u:1784: nirmalo valgusvaraś ca vargo bhavati sattamaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:1787: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran gaṅgātīram anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1788: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaṅgātīrasya nātidūre stūpam avarugṇaṃ vātātapābhyāṃ pariśīrṇam*
T02avsata_u:1789: bhikṣubhir dṛṣṭvā bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ kasya bhagavann ayaṃ stūpa iti |
T02avsata_u:1794: bhagavān āha: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śrotuṃ yathā candanasya pratyekabuddhasyotpattir nāmābhinirvṛttiś ca? evaṃ bhadanta |
T02avsata_u:1795: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:1797: nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* |
T02avsata_u:1799: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate tadyathā:
T02avsata_u:1800: ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ |
T02avsata_u:1801: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate |
T02avsata_u:1802: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca |
T02avsata_u:1804: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1805: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca |
T02avsata_u:1808: saṃnipatitau, mātā {ca} kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī, gandharvaś ca pratyupasthito bhavati |
T02avsata_u:1809: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca |
T02avsata_u:1813: tad divase divase vardhate na tu phullati |
T02avsata_u:1815: rajñā uktaḥ parīkṣyatām etat padmam iti |
T02avsata_u:1816: yāvad apareṇa samayena sūryodaye tat padmaṃ vikasitam* |
T02avsata_u:1817: tasya ca padmasya karṇikāyāṃ dārakaḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvāvasthitaḥ, abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ
T02avsata_u:1819: prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtagātro 'śītyānuvyañjanair virājitagātraḥ tasya mukhāt padmagandho vāti śarīrāc ca candanagandhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1821: tato rājā sāmātyaḥ sāntaḥpuraś ca tad udyānaṃ gataḥ |
T02avsata_u:1822: sahadarśanāt tena dārakeṇa rājā saṃbhāṣitaḥ: ehi tāta, ahaṃ te 'putrasya
T02avsata_u:1824: tato rājā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita uvāca: evam eva putra yathā vadasīti |
T02avsata_u:1825: tato rājā padminīm avagāhya taṃ dārakaṃ padmakarṇikāyāṃ gṛhītvā pāṇitale sthāpitavān* |
T02avsata_u:1826: yatra yatra sa dārakaḥ pādau sthāpayati, tatra tatra padmāni prādurbhavanti |
T02avsata_u:1827: tatas tasya candana iti nāma kṛtam* ||
T02avsata_u:1828: yadā candano dārako 'nupūrveṇa mahān saṃvṛttaḥ, tadā nāgarai rājā
T02avsata_u:1830: tad arhati devaś candanaṃ kumāram utsraṣṭam* (Speyer: utsraṣṭum)| asmābhiḥ saha parvānubhaviṣyati, padmaiś ca sarvam adhiṣṭhānam alaṃkariṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:1834: vividhair vādyair vādyamānai rājakulād bahir upayāti nagaraparva
T02avsata_u:1836: tatra tasya gacchataḥ padavinyāse padavinyāse padmāni prādurbhavanti darśanīyāni manoramāṇi ca |
T02avsata_u:1838: atha tasya śuddhasatvasya kalyāṇāśayasya pūrvabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlasya taddarśanād yoniśo manasikāra utpannaḥ:
T02avsata_u:1839: yathemāni padmāni utpannamātrāṇi śobhante, arkaraśmiparitāpitāni mlāyanti śuṣyanti, evam etad api śarīram iti |
T02avsata_u:1840: tasyaivaṃ cintayatas tulayata uparīkṣamāṇasya saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyadharmā abhimukhībhūtāḥ
T02avsata_u:1841: te tasyaiva janakāyasya madhye sthitena pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā |
T02avsata_u:1842: yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikair devais tasmai kāṣāyāṇy upanāmitāni |
T02avsata_u:1843: tāni ca prāvṛtya gaganatalam utpatitaḥ, vicitrāṇi ca prātihāryāṇi kartuṃ pravṛttaḥ,
T02avsata_u:1844: yaddarśanād rājñāmātyanaigamasahāyena mahān prasādaḥ pratilabdho vicitrāṇi ca kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni |
T02avsata_u:1845: bhagavān āha: ataś candanasya pratyekabuddhasyotpattir nāmābhinirvṛttiś ceti ||
T02avsata_u:1846: bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta candanena
T02avsata_u:1847: pratyekabuddhena karmāṇi kṛtāni yenāsya śarīraṃ sugandhi tīkṣṇendriyaś ceti |
T02avsata_u:1848: bhagavān āha: kāśyape bhagavati pravrajito babhūva, tatrānena keśanakhastūpe gandhāvasekaḥ kṛtaḥ, puṣpāṇi cāvaropitāni, pratyekabodhau cānena mārgo bhāvitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:1849: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ |

T02avsata_u:2051: yāvat pitrānujñātaḥ keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2052: tena vinopadeśena saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān āmukhīkṛtya pratyekā bodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā
T02avsata_u:2053: sa gaganatalam utpatya pituḥ sakāśe vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi cakāra |
T02avsata_u:2055: sa śarīrabhārodvahanaparikhinno vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi darśayitvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirvṛtim
T02avsata_u:2057: atha bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta daśaśirasā karmāṇi kṛtāni, yena mātuḥ kukṣau nopapannaḥ, padma upapanna iti || bhagavān āha: daśaśirasaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:2058: daśaśirasā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:2059: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:2064: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_24.1 ||
T02avsata_u:2065: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:2067: atha vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* |
T02avsata_u:2068: anyataraś ca sārthavāhaḥ padmam ādāya vīthīṃ pratipannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2069: athāsau paśyati vipaśyinaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:2070: sahadarśanād bhagavata upari tat padmaṃ cikṣepa |
T02avsata_u:2071: tat kṣiptamātraṃ bhagavata upari śakaṭacakramātraṃ bhūtvā bhagavantaṃ gacchantam upagacchati, tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati |
T02avsata_u:2072: yāvad vipaśyinā samyaksaṃbuddhena sa sārthavāhaḥ pratyekabodhau vyākṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2074: prajāpatī cāsya tena kālena prajāyamānā sasvaraṃ kranditavatī |
T02avsata_u:2075: tena paricārikā pṛṣṭā: kim idam iti |
T02avsata_u:2077: tataḥ sārthavāhaḥ saṃvignaḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ: mā kadācit saṃsāre mātuḥ kukṣāv upapadyeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:2078: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:2079: samayena sārthavāho babhūva, ayaṃ sa daśaśirāḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2080: tena kuśalamūlenaikaviṃśatiṃ kalpān na kadācin mātuḥ kukṣāv upapannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2082: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yad buddhapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakeṣu kārān kariṣyāmaḥ
T02avsata_u:2086: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:2089: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:2090: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ prabhūtavittopakaraṇaḥ parbhūtasatvasvāpateyaḥ prabhūtamitrāmātyajñātisālohitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2091: sa ca gṛhapatiḥ śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ
T02avsata_u:2092: tasyaitad abhavat: ime bhogāḥ jalacandrasvabhāvāḥ marīcisadṛśā anityā adhruvā anāśvāsikā vipariṇāmadharmāṇaḥ pañcabhir ugradaṇḍaiḥ sādhāraṇāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2093: yanv aham asārebhyo bhogebhyaḥ sāram ādadyām iti |
T02avsata_u:2099: tataḥ susvādaśītarasapānāni bhakṣyabhojyāni ca sajjīkṛtya bhagavato dūtena kālam ārocayati: samayo bhadanta, sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti |
T02avsata_u:2100: tato bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2101: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2102: atha sa gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaviṣṭaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītenāhāreṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati |
T02avsata_u:2103: svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcatarāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:2104: atha bhagavān gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati |
T02avsata_u:2105: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya tūṣṇīṃbhūtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2106: atha sa gṛhapatir labdhaprasādaḥ pādayor nipatya cetanāṃ puṣṇāti |
T02avsata_u:2108: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti, tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
T02avsata_u:2110: yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ
T02avsata_u:2111: narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti, ye śītanarakās teṣūṣṇībhūtā nipatanti
T02avsata_u:2113: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ, āhosvid anyatropapannā iti |
T02avsata_u:2114: teṣāṃ satvānāṃ prasādasaṃjananārthaṃ bhagavān nirmitaṃ visarjayati |
T02avsata_u:2116: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ, nāpy anyatropapannāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2117: api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā
T02avsata_u:2119: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti, yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti
T02avsata_u:2120: | yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān, yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān
T02avsata_u:2121: mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti, gāthādvayaṃ ca bhāṣante:
T02avsata_u:2123: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_25.1 ||
T02avsata_u:2124: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:2126: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
T02avsata_u:2127: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:2129: anāgataṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, purastād antardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:2141: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2144: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantād divākareṇodayatā yathaiva || AVŚ_25.3 ||
T02avsata_u:2147: nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitam upadarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ || AVŚ_25.4 ||
T02avsata_u:2148: tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṝṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām* |
T02avsata_u:2149: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ || AVŚ_25.5 ||
T02avsata_u:2150: nākāsmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2151: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrāḥ taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ || AVŚ_25.6 || iti bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat |
T02avsata_u:2152: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
T02avsata_u:2153: paśyasy ānanda anena śreṣṭhinā mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:2155: eṣa ānanda śreṣṭhī anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca sūkṣmatvag iti nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati |
T02avsata_u:2156: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasādaḥ iti |

T02avsata_u:2161: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||

T02avsata_u:2166: śrāvastyāṃ anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:2167: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ
T02avsata_u:2169: abhavat: ime bhogā jalacandrasvabhāvā gajakarṇasadṛśā anityā adhruvā
T02avsata_u:2171: yanv aham asārebhyo bhogebhyaḥ sāram ādadyām iti |
T02avsata_u:2172: tena grīṣmakāle vartamāne bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho bhaktenopanimantritaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2173: gṛhaṃ cāpagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ candanavāripariṣiktaṃ vicitragandhaghaṭikāsurabhidhūpadhūpitaṃ nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇam* |

T02avsata_u:2232: eṣa ānanda gṛhapatir anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca śītaprabho nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati |
