T02avsata_u:2234: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yad buddhapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakeṣu kārān kariṣyāmaḥ
T02avsata_u:2238: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:2241: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran gaṅgātīram anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2242: atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena nāvikās tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2243: upasaṃkramya nāvikān idam avocat*: uttārayantu bhavanto mām imāṃ nadīm iti |
T02avsata_u:2245: tato bhagavāṃs tān nāvikān idam avocat*: aham api bhavanto nāvikaḥ pūrvam āsam* |
T02avsata_u:2246: mayā hi rāganadīpatito nandas tāritaḥ, dveṣārṇavapatito aṅgulimālaḥ,
T02avsata_u:2247: mānārṇavapatito mānastabdho māṇavaḥ, mohārṇavapatito urubilvakāśyapas tāritaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2248: na ca me tarapaṇyaṃ yācitā iti |
T02avsata_u:2250: anyatamena nāvikena bhagavato aṣṭāṅgopetaṃ svaraṃ śrutvā tāṃ ca rūpasaṃpadaṃ dṛṣṭvā prasādajātenoktam*: ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃgham
T02avsata_u:2253: bhagavān ṛddhyā agrata eva tasya nāvikasyāpārimāt tīrāt pārime tīre sthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2254: tataḥ sa nāvikas tad ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā āvarjitamanāḥ pādayor nipatitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2255: tasmai bhagavatā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā tena nāvikena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ
T02avsata_u:2257: sa dṛṣṭasatyas trir udānam udānayati: idam asmākaṃ -------------------- Vaidya, p. 69 --------------------
T02avsata_u:2258: bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:2263: tavānubhāvāt pihitaḥ sughoro hy apāyamārgo bahudoṣayuktaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2264: apāvṛtā svargagatiḥ supuṇyā nirvāṇamārgaś ca mayopalabdhaḥ || AVŚ_27.1 ||
T02avsata_u:2265: tvadāśrayāc cāptam apetadoṣaṃ mayādya śuddhaṃ suviśuddhacakṣuḥ |
T02avsata_u:2267: prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padam āryakāntaṃ tīrṇaś ca duḥkhārṇavapāram asmi || AVŚ_27.2 ||
T02avsata_u:2271: bhavasahasrasudurlabhadarśana saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* || AVŚ_27.3 || iti dvitīyasya nāvikasya mahān vipratisāra utpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2272: tena bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya atyayo deśitaḥ, bhagavāṃś ca saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ
T02avsata_u:2274: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti, tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā
T02avsata_u:2275: arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti, kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti |
T02avsata_u:2276: yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ
T02avsata_u:2277: hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti, ye śītanarakās teṣūṣṇībhūtā nipatanti |
T02avsata_u:2279: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ, āhosvid anyatropapannā iti |
T02avsata_u:2281: teṣāṃ {taṃ} nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati: na hy eva {vayaṃ} bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ, nāpy anyatropapannāḥ
T02avsata_u:2282: api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti |
T02avsata_u:2283: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ
T02avsata_u:2285: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān, yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn
T02avsata_u:2286: paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety
T02avsata_u:2289: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_27.4 ||
T02avsata_u:2290: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:2293: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
T02avsata_u:2294: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:2295: anāgataṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, purastād antardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:2307: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2310: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantād divākareṇodayatā yathaiva || AVŚ_27.6 ||
T02avsata_u:2313: nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitam upadarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ || AVŚ_27.7 ||
T02avsata_u:2314: tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṝṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām* |
T02avsata_u:2315: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ || AVŚ_27.8 ||
T02avsata_u:2316: nākāsmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2317: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrāḥ taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ || AVŚ_27.9 || iti bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat |
T02avsata_u:2318: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
T02avsata_u:2319: paśyasy ānanda anena nāvikena mamāntike cittaṃ prasāditam* |

T02avsata_u:2332: ācaritam etan madhyadeśe: bhūyasā madhyadeśanivāsino jānapadā vicitrair anulepanair gātram anulimpanti |
T02avsata_u:2334: tasya dārikā śrāddhā bhadrā kalyāṇāśayā lohitacandanaṃ pinaṣṭi |
T02avsata_u:2335: bhagavāṃś ca pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* |
T02avsata_u:2336: adrākṣīt sā dārikā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:2337: | dṛṣṭvā ca dārikāyā mahān prasāda utpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2339: abhavat*: kiṃ mamānenaivaṃvidhena jīvitena yāham īdṛśaṃ kṣetram āsādya na śaknomi dāridryadoṣād bhagavataḥ kārān kartum iti ||

T02avsata_u:2341: tato dārikā tat pratihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā prasannacittā bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya cetanāṃ puṣṇāti: anena kuśalamūlena pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣāt kuryām iti ||

T02avsata_u:2412: yena me mahān saṃmānaḥ syād iti |
T02avsata_u:2414: sacarācare loke jaṅgamaṃ puṇyakṣetram abandhyamahāphalaṃ ca |
T02avsata_u:2415: yanv aham idaṃ buddhāya bhagavate dadyām iti ||

T02avsata_u:2419: atha bhagavān ārāmikasyānugrahārthaṃ gajabhujasadṛśaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya gṛhītavān*, gṛhītvā bhakṣitavān*, bhakṣayitvā cainam ārāmikasyāgrato
T02avsata_u:2420: visarjitavān*, visarjya tad dantakāṣṭhaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikhātavān* |
T02avsata_u:2421: nikhātamātram eva ca tacchākhāpatrapuṣpaphalasamṛddho mahānyagrodhaḥ parimaṇḍalas tatraiva kṣaṇe nirvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2422: yasya cchāyāyāṃ niṣadya bhagavatā anekeṣāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ dharmo deśitaḥ |

T02avsata_u:2442: mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti, gāthādvayaṃ ca bhāṣante:
T02avsata_u:2444: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_29.1 ||
T02avsata_u:2445: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:2447: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
T02avsata_u:2448: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:2462: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2465: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantād divākareṇodayatā yathaiva || AVŚ_29.3 ||
T02avsata_u:2469: nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitam upadarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ || AVŚ_29.4 ||
T02avsata_u:2470: tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṝṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām* |
T02avsata_u:2471: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ || AVŚ_29.5 ||
T02avsata_u:2472: nākāsmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2473: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrāḥ taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ || AVŚ_29.6 || iti bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat |
T02avsata_u:2474: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
T02avsata_u:2475: paśyasy ānanda anenārāmikeṇa mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:2477: eṣa ānanda ārāmiko 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trayodaśa kalpān vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyati, paścime bhave paścime nikete paścime samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe nirmalo nāma pratyekabuddho
T02avsata_u:2479: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti |
T02avsata_u:2480: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2481: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2484: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:2487: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:2488: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat*
T02avsata_u:2489: | saṃbahulāś ca goṣṭhikā madyamadākṣiptā vīṇāmṛdaṅgapaṇavair vividhair
T02avsata_u:2490: vādyair vādyamānair nṛtyanto gāyanta utpalapadmapuṇḍarīkavārṣikādibhir udārapuṣpair āsaktakaṇṭheguṇā viśiṣṭāmbaravasanā bahiḥ śrāvastyā nirgacchanti |
T02avsata_u:2492: dadṛśus te goṣṭhikā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ
T02avsata_u:2497: tato vigatamadyamadāḥ prasādāvarjitamanaso nṛtyagītavādyair bhagavataḥ upasthānaṃ cakruḥ,
T02avsata_u:2499: nikṣiptāni copari bhagavato nīlakūṭāgāro nīlacchatraṃ nīlamaṇḍapa ivāvasthitāni |
T02avsata_u:2500: tāni ca bhagavantaṃ gacchantam anugacchati, tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhanti |
T02avsata_u:2503: atha the goṣṭhikā labdhaprasādāḥ cetanāṃ puṣṇānti: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkūryāmeti ||
T02avsata_u:2505: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti, tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
T02avsata_u:2507: yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ
T02avsata_u:2508: narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti, ye śītanarakās teṣūṣṇībhūtā nipatanti
T02avsata_u:2510: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ, āhosvid anyatropapannā iti |
T02avsata_u:2512: teṣāṃ {taṃ} nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati: na hy eva
T02avsata_u:2513: vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ, nāpy anyatropapannāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2514: api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā
T02avsata_u:2516: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti, yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti
T02avsata_u:2517: | yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān, yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān
T02avsata_u:2518: mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti, gāthādvayaṃ ca bhāṣante:
T02avsata_u:2520: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_30.1 ||
T02avsata_u:2521: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:2523: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
T02avsata_u:2524: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante |
T02avsata_u:2539: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2542: avabhāsitā yena diśaḥ samantād divākareṇodayatā yathaiva || AVŚ_30.3 ||
T02avsata_u:2545: nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitam upadarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ || AVŚ_30.4 ||
T02avsata_u:2546: tatkālaṃ svayam adhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṝṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām* |
T02avsata_u:2547: dhīrābhir munivṛṣa vāgbhir uttamābhir utpannaṃ vyapanaya saṃśayaṃ śubhābhiḥ || AVŚ_30.5 ||
T02avsata_u:2548: nākāsmāl lavaṇajalādrirājadhairyāḥ saṃbuddhāḥ smitam upadarśayanti nāthāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2549: yasyārthe smitam upadarśayanti dhīrāḥ taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ || AVŚ_30.6 || iti bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat |
T02avsata_u:2550: nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti |
T02avsata_u:2551: paśyasy ānanda ebhir goṣṭhikair mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:2553: ete ānanda goṣṭhikā anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca viṃśatyantarakalpān vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyanti, paścime bhave paścime nikete paścime samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe valgusvarā nāma pratyekabuddhā bhaviṣyanti |
T02avsata_u:2554: ayam eṣāṃ deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti |
T02avsata_u:2555: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yad buddhapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakeṣu kārān kariṣyāmaḥ
T02avsata_u:2559: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:2563: padmakaḥ kavaḍaś caiva dharmapālaḥ śibis tathā |
T02avsata_u:2565: anāthapiṇḍaḥ subhadraś ca vargo bhavati samudditaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:2568: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:2569: śaratkālasamaye bhikṣavo rogeṇa bādhyante pītapāṇḍukāḥ kṛśaśarīrā durbalāṅgāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2571: taddarśanād bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: paśya bhadanta ete bhikṣavaḥ śāradikena rogeṇa bādhyante, pītapāṇḍukāḥ kṛśaśarīrā durbalāṅgāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2572: bhagavāṃs tv alpābādho 'lpātaṅko balavān arogajātīyaḥ, samapākayā ca grahaṇyā samanvāgata iti ||
T02avsata_u:2573: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat
T02avsata_u:2577: 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:2578: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
T02avsata_u:2579: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api |
T02avsata_u:2581: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_31.1 ||
T02avsata_u:2582: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ padmako nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca
T02avsata_u:2583: ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam (Speyer:
T02avsata_u:2585: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahatī tyāge vartate |
T02avsata_u:2586: tasmiṃś ca samaye vārāṇasyāṃ kālavaiṣamyād dhātuvaiṣamyād vā vyādhir utapannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2588: tato rājñā tān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇikam utpāditam: mayā hy eṣāṃ paritrāṇaṃ karaṇīyaṃ cikitsā ceti
T02avsata_u:2589: | tataḥ sa rājā sarvaviṣayanivāsino vaidyān saṃnipātya teṣāṃ satvānāṃ nidānam āśayānuśayaṃ
T02avsata_u:2591: svayam ārabdhaś cikitsāṃ sarvauṣadhasamudānayaṃ ca kartum* |
T02avsata_u:2592: tataś cikitsyamānānāṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ bahavaḥ kālā atikrāntāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2593: na ca śakyante vaidyadravyauṣadhaparicārakasaṃpannā api cikitsitum* |
T02avsata_u:2594: tato rājñā sarvavaidyān āhūya ādarajātena punaḥ pṛṣṭāḥ: ko 'tra hetur na me
T02avsata_u:2596: vaidyā vicārya guṇadoṣānekamatenāhuḥ: deva kālavaiṣamyād dhātuvaiṣamyāc ca lakṣyāmahe |
T02avsata_u:2597: api tu deva asty ekabhaiṣajyaṃ rohito nāma matsyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2598: yadi tasya prāptiḥ syāt, śakyante cikitsitum iti |
T02avsata_u:2599: tato rājā rohitaṃ matsyaṃ samanveṣitum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2600: sa bahubhir api cārapuruṣair mṛgyamāṇo na labhyate |
T02avsata_u:2602: atha rājā apareṇa samayena bahiryāṇāya nirgacchati |
T02avsata_u:2603: te ca vyādhina ekasamūhena sthitvā rājānam ūcuḥ: paritrāyasva mahārāja asmān asmād vyādheḥ
T02avsata_u:2605: tato rājā karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair ucyamānas tadāturavacanaṃ śrutvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ sāśrudurdinavadanaṃ cintayāmāsa: kiṃ mamānenaivaṃvidhena jīvitena
T02avsata_u:2606: rājyaiśvaryādhipatyena vā īdṛśena, yo 'haṃ pareṣāṃ duḥkhārtānāṃ na śakto
T02avsata_u:2608: evaṃ vicintya rājā mahāntam arthotsargaṃ kṛtvā jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājyaiṣvaryādhipatyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya bandhujanaṃ kṣamayitvā paurāmātyāṃś ca kṣamayitvā dīnān samāśvāsya aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgataṃ vrataṃ samādāya upariprāsādatalam abhiruhya dhūpapuṣpagandhamālyavilepanaṃ ca kṣiptvā prāṅmukhaṃ praṇidhiṃ kartuṃ prārabdhaḥ: yena satyena satyavacanena mahāvyasanagatān satvān vyādhiparipīḍitān dṛṣṭvā svajīvitam
T02avsata_u:2610: anena satyena satyavākyena asyāṃ vālukāyāṃ nadyāṃ mahān rohitamatsyaḥ prādurbhaveyam* |
T02avsata_u:2612: sa patitamātraḥ kālagato nadyāṃ vālukāyāṃ mahān rohitamatsyaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2613: iti devatābhiḥ sarvavijite śabda utsṛṣṭaḥ: eṣa dīrghakālamahāvyādhyutpīḍitānām amṛtakalpo nadyāṃ vālukāyāṃ mahān
T02avsata_u:2615: yataḥ sahaśravaṇān mahājanakāyaḥ śastravyagrakaraḥ piṭakān ādāya nirgatya vividhais tīkṣṇaiḥ śastrair jīvita eva māṃsāny utkartitum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2616: sa ca bodhisatvo vikartyamānaśarīras tān sarvān maitryā sphuran sabāṣpāśruvadanaś
T02avsata_u:2617: cintayāmāsa: lābhā me sulabdhāḥ yan nāma ime satvā madīyena māṃsarudhireṇa
T02avsata_u:2619: tad anenopakrameṇa satvān dvādaśavarṣāṇi svakena māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpayāmāsa, na cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheś cittaṃ
T02avsata_u:2621: yadā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ sa vyādhir upaśāntas tadā tena rohitamatsyena śabda udīritaḥ: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ satvāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2623: mayā yuṣmākam arthe svajīvitaparityāgenāyam evaṃvidha ātmabhāva upāttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2627: abhisaṃbhotsye, ahaṃ tadā yuṣmān atyantavyādheḥ parimocya atyantaniṣṭhe
T02avsata_u:2629: tacchravaṇāt sa janakāyo labdhaprasādo rājāmātyapaurāś ca puṣpadhūpamālyavilepanair abhyarcya praṇidhānaṃ kartum
T02avsata_u:2630: ārabdhāḥ: atiduṣkarakāraka, yadā tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
T02avsata_u:2631: abhisaṃbudhyethāḥ, tadā te vayaṃ śrāvakāḥ syāmeti |
T02avsata_u:2632: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:2633: samayena padmako nāma rājā babhūva, ahaṃ sa |
T02avsata_u:2636: idānīm apy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ, samapākayā ca grahaṇyā samanvāgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:2637: yena me aśitapītakhāditāsvāditaṃ samyak sukhena pariṇamati |
T02avsata_u:2639: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yat sarvasatveṣu dayāṃ bhāvayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2642: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:2645: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:2646: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: saced bhikṣavaḥ satvā jānīyur dānasya dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākaṃ yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipakām*, apīdānīṃ yo 'sāv apaścimakaḥ kavaḍaś carama ālopaḥ, tato 'pi nādatvā asaṃvibhajya paribhuñjīta sacel labheta dakṣiṇīyaṃ pratigrāhakam* |
T02avsata_u:2647: na caiṣām utpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya
T02avsata_u:2649: yasmāt tarhi satvā na jānanti dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam*, yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca
T02avsata_u:2650: phalavipākam*, tasmāt te adatvā asaṃvibhajya paribhuñjate āgṛhītena
T02avsata_u:2651: cetasā, utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati ||
T02avsata_u:2653: idam uktvā sugato hy athāparam etad uvāca
T02avsata_u:2655: evaṃ hi satvā jānīyur yathā proktaṃ maharṣiṇā |
T02avsata_u:2656: vipākaḥ saṃvibhāgasya yathā bhavati mahārthikaḥ || AVŚ_32.1 ||
T02avsata_u:2657: nādatvā paribhuñjīran na syur matsariṇas tathā |
T02avsata_u:2658: na caiṣām āgrahe cittam utpadyeta kadācana || AVŚ_32.2 ||
T02avsata_u:2660: yasmāt tu na prajānanti bālā mohatamovṛtāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2661: tasmāt tu bhuñjate satvā āgṛhītena cetasā |
T02avsata_u:2662: utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati || AVŚ_32.3 ||
T02avsata_u:2663: yadā bhagavatā etat sūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavān dānasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam iti
T02avsata_u:2664: | bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yat tathāgato dānasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate, dānasaṃvibhāgasya phalavipākam iti |
T02avsata_u:2667: tac chruṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye 'ham* ||
T02avsata_u:2668: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* (Speyer:
T02avsata_u:2671: sa rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca |
T02avsata_u:2673: yāvad apareṇa samayena mahaddurbhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ durbhikṣāntarakalpasadṛśam* |
T02avsata_u:2674: tatas te janakāyā durbhikṣākālabhayabhītāḥ kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭhakapolāḥ pretāśrayasadṛśāḥ saṃgamya samāgamyaikasamūhena rājānam upasṛtya jayenāyuṣā vardhayitvocuḥ: deva paritrāyasva asmān asmād
T02avsata_u:2678: āmantritavān*: asti bho puruṣa koṣṭhāgāre annapānaṃ yad asmākaṃ syād eṣāṃ
T02avsata_u:2679: ca janakāyānām*? iti śrutvā koṣṭhāgārika āha: parigaṇya deva sasyāni
T02avsata_u:2681: tato gaṇitakuśalair gaṇanāṃ kṛtvā sarveṣāṃ viṣayanivāsināṃ divase divase ekakavaḍo rājño dvau kavaḍāv iyantaṃ kālaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
T02avsata_u:2683: tato rājā janakāyān āhūyoktavān*: tena hi bhavanto
T02avsata_u:2684: divasānudivasam āgatya rājakule kavaḍam abhyavahṛtya gacchateti |
T02avsata_u:2685: tatas te pratidivasam āgatya pratyekam ekaikaṃ kavaḍam abhyavahṛtya yatheṣṭaṃ gacchanti ||
T02avsata_u:2687: parebhyaś ca śrutvā rājānam uvāca: deva janapadagatena me śrutā gaṇanā |
T02avsata_u:2689: tato rājā svakāt kavaḍadvayād ekaṃ brāhmaṇāya dattavān* |
T02avsata_u:2693: abhavat*: atiduṣkaraṃ bata vārāṇaseyo rājā karoti, yanv aham enaṃ
T02avsata_u:2695: atha śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya bhojanakāle rājānam upasṛptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2696: jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvovāca: bubhukṣito kuruṣva svakakavaḍenānugraham iti |
T02avsata_u:2697: tato rājā svajīvitaparityāgaṃ vyavasāyakāruṇyāt svakavaḍaṃ brāhmaṇāya datvānāhāratāṃ pratipannaḥ
T02avsata_u:2699: taṃ ca mahājanakāyaṃ bhuñjānaṃ dṛṣṭvā parāṃ prītim āpede |
T02avsata_u:2701: vyavasāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svena rūpeṇa sthitvā rājānaṃ saṃvardhayāmāsa: sādhu sādhu mahārāja, āvarjitā
T02avsata_u:2703: vayaṃ bhavatānena duṣkareṇa vyavasāyena, sanāthaś cāyaṃ janakāya īdṛśena prajāpālakena |
T02avsata_u:2704: na duṣyatāṃ tava vijite sarvabījāni, vāpy antām* |
T02avsata_u:2705: ahaṃ saptame divase tathāvidhaṃ māhendraṃ varṣam utsrakṣyāmi, yena sarvasasyāni niṣpatsyanta iti |
T02avsata_u:2707: śakreṇāpi tathāvidhaṃ mahendraṃ varṣam utsṛṣṭam*, yena durbhikṣaṃ vinivartitaṃ subhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtam*
T02avsata_u:2708: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:2709: samayena brahmadatto nāma rājā babhūva, ahaṃ sa |
T02avsata_u:2710: mayā tāny evaṃvidhe durbhikṣe vartamāne svajīvitaparityāgād evaṃvidhāni dānāni dattāni |
T02avsata_u:2711: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yad dānāni dāsyāmaḥ puṇyāni kariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2714: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:2717: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:2718: yadā devadattena mohapuruṣeṇa bhagavato vadhārthena dhanapālako hastināga
T02avsata_u:2719: utsṛṣṭaḥ, udapāno viṣacūrṇena cāvakīrṇaḥ, vadhakapuruṣāś cotsṛṣṭāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2720: sa bhagavato dīrgharātraṃ vadhakaḥ pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitraḥ, bhagavāṃś cāsya maitracitto hitacitto 'nukampācittena na pratyupasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2721: tadā bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: paśya bhagavan yāvad ayaṃ devadatto bhagavato vadhāyodyataḥ, bhagavāṃś cāsya maitracitto hitacitto
T02avsata_u:2723: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ tathāgato vigatarāgo vigatadveṣo vigatamohaḥ parimukto jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvākārajñaḥ sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2725: sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohena daharakavayasyavasthitena vadhāya parākrāntasyāsyāntike naivaṃ cittaṃ dūṣitam* |
T02avsata_u:2726: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye 'ham* ||
T02avsata_u:2728: nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* ekaputram iva rājyaṃ pālayati |
T02avsata_u:2729: sa rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahatī tyāge vartate |
T02avsata_u:2730: tasya ca rājño durmatir nāma devī caṇḍā roṣaṇī sāhasikā |
T02avsata_u:2731: ekaputraś ca dharmapālo nāmnā tasyā eva durmatyāḥ sakāśāj jātaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2732: sa ca dharmapālo dayāvān śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya
T02avsata_u:2735: sarveṣāṃ ca vārāṇaseyānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām iṣṭaḥ kāntaḥ priyo manāpo darśanena |
T02avsata_u:2736: sa copādhyāyasakāśaṃ gatvā dārakaiḥ saha lipiṃ paṭhati ||
T02avsata_u:2737: yāvad rājā apareṇa samayena vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvañjīvakanirghoṣite vanaṣaṇḍe devyā sahāntaḥpuraparivṛta udyānabhūmiṃ nirgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:2739: 'ntaḥpurajanena saha krīḍata īrṣyāroṣaparītā durmatir devī kupitā |
T02avsata_u:2742: putrasyāhaṃ rudhiraṃ pibeyam*, yady ahaṃ tavārdhaṃ pītakaṃ pibeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:2743: kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya nāsti kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karmākaraṇīyam iti |
T02avsata_u:2744: tato rājā brahmadatto dhārmiko 'pi san kāmarāgaparyavasānavigamād antaḥpurajanena sāntvyamāno 'pi krodhāgninā prajvalitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2745: tatas tena saṃpravṛddhakrodhenājñā dattā: gacchata, dharmapālasya galaṃ chitvā
T02avsata_u:2747: tato dārakaśālāvasthito dharmapālaḥ kumāraḥ śrutvā rodituṃ pravṛttaḥ
T02avsata_u:2748: | evaṃ cāha: dhik satvasabhāgatāṃ saṃsāre, yatra nāma krodhavaśād
T02avsata_u:2750: tato dharmapālaḥ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaḥ pituḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati: sādhu tāta prasīda
T02avsata_u:2752: iṣṭāś ca sarveṣāṃ pitṝṇāṃ putrā iti |
T02avsata_u:2753: rājā kathayati: putraka yadi te mātā kṣamate, aham api kṣame iti |
T02avsata_u:2754: tato dharmapālaḥ prarudan mātuḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭa uvāca: amba kṣamasva, mā māṃ jīvitād vyaparopayeti |
T02avsata_u:2755: sā evaṃ karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair ucyamānā na kṣamate |
T02avsata_u:2756: tato vadhyaghātais tīkṣṇena śastreṇa dharmapālasya kumārasya galaṃ chitvā durmatir devī rudhiraṃ pāyitā |
T02avsata_u:2758: dharmapālo 'pi kumāro mātāpitṛvadhyaghāteṣu cittaṃ prasādya kālagataḥ ||
T02avsata_u:2759: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:2760: samayena dharmapālo nāma kumāro babhūva, ahaṃ saḥ |
T02avsata_u:2762: tadāpi me vadhakahastagatenāsya maitraṃ cittam utpāditam* |
T02avsata_u:2763: idānīm apy aham asya vadhāyodyatasya maitracitto hitacittaḥ anukampācittaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2764: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yat sarvasatveṣu maitraṃ cittaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2767: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:2770: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ
T02avsata_u:2773: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dvau saṃnipātau bhavataḥ |
T02avsata_u:2774: eka āṣāḍhyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ dvitīyaḥ kārtikyāṃ pūrṇamāsyām* |
T02avsata_u:2775: tatra bhikṣavaḥ pātrāṇi pacanti, cīvarāṇi dhāvayanti, pāṃsukūlāni ca sīvyanti |
T02avsata_u:2776: yāvad anyatamo bhikṣuś cīvaraṃ syotukāmaḥ sūcīchidraṃ sūtrakaṃ na śaknoti
T02avsata_u:2778: sa karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair uvāca: ko loke puṇyakāma iti |
T02avsata_u:2780: tato bhagavān gambhīramadhuraviśadakalaviṅkamanojñadundubhinirghoṣo gajabhujasadṛśabāhum abhiprasārya kathayati: ahaṃ bhikṣo loke puṇyakāma iti |
T02avsata_u:2781: tato 'sau bhikṣur bhagavataḥ pañcāṅgopetaṃ svaram upaśrutya saṃbhrāntas tvaritatvaritaṃ bhagavataḥ pāṇiṃ gṛhītvā svaśirasi
T02avsata_u:2782: sthāpayitvāha: bhagavan*, anena te pāṇinā trīṇi kalpāsaṃkhyeyāni dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñā upacitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:2783: atha ca punar bhagavān enam āha: atṛpto 'haṃ bhikṣo puṇyaiḥ, labdharaso 'haṃ bhikṣo puṇyaiḥ, ato me tṛptir nāstīti ||
T02avsata_u:2784: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavān puṇyamayaiḥ, saṃskārair atṛpta iti |
T02avsata_u:2785: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ tathāgato vigatarāgo vigatadveṣo vigatamohaḥ parimukto jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvākārajñaḥ sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2789: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
T02avsata_u:2792: nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* ekaputram iva rājyaṃ pālayati |
T02avsata_u:2793: sa ca śibī rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca |
T02avsata_u:2795: sa kalyam (Speyer: kālyam ) evotthāya yajñavāṭaṃ praviśya annam annārthibhyaḥ prayacchati, vastraṃ vastrārthibhyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2798: na cāsau puṇyamayaiḥ saṃskārais tṛptiṃ gacchati |
T02avsata_u:2799: so 'ntaḥpuraṃ praviśyāntaḥpurajanasya bhaktācchādanaṃ prayacchati, kumārāṇām amātyānāṃ bhaṭabalāgrasya naigamajānapadānām* ||
T02avsata_u:2800: atha rājñaḥ śiber etad abhavat*: saṃtarpitā anena manuṣyabhūtāḥ,
T02avsata_u:2802: sa parityaktavibhavasarvasva ekaśāṭakanivasitaḥ svaśarīrāvaśeṣaś cintām āpede
T02avsata_u:2804: sa śastreṇa svaśarīraṃ takṣayitvā yatra daṃśamaśakās tatrotsṛṣṭakāyaḥ pratiṣṭhate |
T02avsata_u:2808: bahavat*: kim ayaṃ śibī rājā satvānām artham evaṃ karoti, uta karuṇayā?
T02avsata_u:2812: gṛdhraveśam ātmānam abhinirmāya rājñe śibeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkramya mukhatuṇḍakenākṣyutpāṭayituṃ pravṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2814: kiṃ tu maitrīviśālābhyāṃ nayanābhyāṃ taṃ gṛdhram ālokya kathayati: vatsa,
T02avsata_u:2815: yan madīyāc charīrāt prayuñjase, tena praṇayaḥ kriyatām iti |
T02avsata_u:2816: tataḥ āvarjitaḥ śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya rājñaḥ śibeḥ purastāt sthitvā: sādhu pārthiva, dīyatām etan nayanadvayam iti |
T02avsata_u:2817: rājovāca: mahābrāhmaṇa gṛhyatāṃ yad abhirucitam*, na me 'tra vighnaḥ kaścid astīti |
T02avsata_u:2818: tataḥ śakro devendro bhūyasyā mātrayābhiprasanno brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svarūpeṇa sthitvā rājānam abhyutsāhayann uvāca:
T02avsata_u:2819: sādhu sādhu bhoḥ pārthiva, suniścitā te buddhiḥ, akampyas te praṇidhiḥ;
T02avsata_u:2820: anugatā te satveṣu mahākaruṇā, yatra nāma tvaṃ saṃtrāsakareṣu dharmeṣu viśāradoḥ |
T02avsata_u:2821: na cirāt tvam anena vyavasāyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase ||
T02avsata_u:2822: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:2823: samayena śibir nāma rājā babhūva, ahaṃ sa |
T02avsata_u:2824: tadānīm api puṇyamayaiḥ saṃskārais tṛptir nāsti, prāg evedānīm* |
T02avsata_u:2826: śikṣitavyam: yad dānāni dāsyāmaḥ, puṇyāni kariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:2829: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
