T02avsata_u:3038: mātrā coktaḥ: mā me putraka asya karmaṇo vipākam anubhavethā iti ||
T02avsata_u:3039: yāvad asau grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīpaṭṭanāny avalokayan samudratīram anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3040: sa pañcabhiḥ purāṇaśatair vahanaṃ bhṛtvā paṃca pauruṣeyān gṛhītvā āhāraṃ nāvikaṃ kaivartaṃ karṇadhāraṃ ca trir api ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3041: yāvad vahantaṃ makareṇa matsyajātenānayād vayasanam āpāditam* |
T02avsata_u:3042: tato maitrakanyakaḥ phalakam āsādya sthalam anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3043: tataḥ sthale cañcūryamāṇo nadūrān nagaraṃ ramaṇakaṃ nāmnā dṛṣṭavān* |
T02avsata_u:3048: maitrakanyaka, svāgataṃ te, idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ
T02avsata_u:3051: sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim
T02avsata_u:3056: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati sadāmattaṃ nāma nagaram* |
T02avsata_u:3058: yāvat tasmād apy aṣṭāv apsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3060: svāgataṃ te, idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ
T02avsata_u:3063: sa tābhiḥ sahānekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān*
T02avsata_u:3066: tā apy asya dakṣiṇāṃ paddhatiṃ vārayanti |
T02avsata_u:3067: sa yato dakṣiṇāyāḥ paddhater nivāryate, tataḥ suṣṭhutaram utkaṇṭhito gantum* |
T02avsata_u:3068: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati nandanaṃ nāma nagaram* |
T02avsata_u:3070: yāvat tasmād api ṣoḍaśāpsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3072: kathayanti: ehi maitrakanyaka, svāgataṃ te, idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ
T02avsata_u:3076: sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān*
T02avsata_u:3078: tā apy asya dakṣiṇāṃ paddhatiṃ vārayanti |
T02avsata_u:3079: sa yato dakṣiṇāyāḥ paddhater nivāryate, tataḥ suṣṭhutaram utkaṇṭhito gantum* |
T02avsata_u:3080: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati brahmottaraṃ nāma prāsādam* |
T02avsata_u:3082: yāvat tasmād api dvātriṃśad apsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3083: tāḥ kathayanti: ehi maitrakanyaka, svāgataṃ te, idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ
T02avsata_u:3087: sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān*
T02avsata_u:3089: tā apy asya dakṣiṇāṃ paddhatiṃ vārayanti |
T02avsata_u:3090: sa yato dakṣiṇāyāḥ paddhater nivāryate, tataḥ suṣṭhutaram utkaṇṭhito gantum* ||
T02avsata_u:3091: yathā dakṣiṇā paddhatiṃ gacchati, tathāsyecchā vardhate |
T02avsata_u:3092: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena yathā gacchan paśyaty ayomayaṃ nagaram* |
T02avsata_u:3099: mūrdhni cāsya ayomayaṃ cakraṃ bhramaty ādīptaṃ pradīptaṃ saṃprajvalitam ekajvālībhūtam* |
T02avsata_u:3102: tato maitrakanyakas taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān*: bho
T02avsata_u:3105: udāhṛtamātre ca tena puruṣeṇa maitrakanyakasya tat karmābhimukhībhūtam*: aham api mātur
T02avsata_u:3106: apakārīti manye tenaivāhaṃ karmaṇā ihākṛṣṭa iti |
T02avsata_u:3107: atha tasminn antare ākāśāc chabdo nirgataḥ: ye baddhās te muktāḥ, ye muktās te baddhāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3108: ity uktamātre tasya puruṣasya mūrdhni cakram antarhitam*, maitrakanyakasya mūrdhni prādurbhūtam*
T02avsata_u:3109: tato duḥkhārtaṃ maitrakanyakam avekṣya sa puruṣo gāthayā pratyabhāṣata:
T02avsata_u:3111: brahmottaraṃ ca prāsādaṃ kena tvam ihāgataḥ || AVŚ_36.1 ||
T02avsata_u:3114: brahmottaraṃ ca prāsādam icchayāham ihāgataḥ || AVŚ_36.2 ||
T02avsata_u:3115: dūraṃ hi karṣate karma dūrāt karma pravartate |
T02avsata_u:3116: tatra prakarṣate karma yatra karma vipacyate || AVŚ_36.3 ||
T02avsata_u:3119: ādīptaṃ saṃprajvalitaṃ mama prāṇoparodhakam* || AVŚ_36.4 || iti puruṣa prāha:
T02avsata_u:3121: pādenābhyāhatā mūrdhni tasya te karmaṇaḥ phalam* || AVŚ_36.5 || iti maitrakanyakaḥ prāha:
T02avsata_u:3123: ādīptaṃ saṃprajvalitaṃ mama prāṇoparodhakam* || AVŚ_36.6 || iti puruṣa prāha:
T02avsata_u:3125: ādīptam āyasaṃ cakraṃ tava mūrdhni bhramiṣyati || AVŚ_36.7 || iti maitrakanyaka āha: bhoḥ puruṣa, asti kaścid anyo 'pīhāgamiṣyatīti?
T02avsata_u:3127: tato maitrakanyako duḥkhavedanābhibhūtaḥ satvānām antike kāruṇyaṃ janayitvā taṃ puruṣam āha: icchāmy ahaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa sarvasatvānām arthe
T02avsata_u:3131: ity uktamātre maitrakanyakasya bodhisatvasya tac cakraṃ saptatālamātraṃ mūrdhni udgamyākāśe sthitam* |
T02avsata_u:3132: sa ca kālaṃ kṛtvā tuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:3133: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:3135: yan mayā saṃvyavaharatā mātā kārṣāpaṇaiḥ pratipāditā, tasya me karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu mahānagareṣu
T02avsata_u:3137: yataś ca mātuḥ parītto 'pakāraḥ kṛtaḥ, tasya me karmaṇo phalavipākenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhūtam* |
T02avsata_u:3138: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yan mātāpitṛṣu kārān kariṣyāmo nāpakārān* |
T02avsata_u:3139: tad ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti ye maitrakanyakasya |
T02avsata_u:3140: pṛthagjanasya eṣa eṣa guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati yas tasyaiva devaputrabhūtasya |
T02avsata_u:3143: tat kasya hetoḥ? duṣkarakārakau hi bhikṣavaḥ putrasya mātāpitarau āpyāyakau poṣakau saṃvardhakau stanyasya dātārau, citrasya jambūdvīpasya darśayitārau |
T02avsata_u:3144: ya ekenāṃsena putro mātaraṃ dvitīyena pitaraṃ pūrṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ pariharet*, yad vā asyāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ maṇayo muktā
T02avsata_u:3146: dakṣiṇāvartaḥ, ity evaṃrūpe vā aiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpayet*, na iyatā putreṇa mātāpitroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syād upakṛtaṃ vā |
T02avsata_u:3147: yas tv asāv aśrāddhaṃ mātāpitaraṃ śraddhāsaṃpadi samādāpayati, vinayati, niveśayati,
T02avsata_u:3148: pratiṣṭhāpayati, duḥśīlaṃ śīlasaṃpadi, matsariṇaṃ tyāgasaṃpadi, duṣprajñaṃ
T02avsata_u:3149: prajñāsaṃpadi, samādāpayati, vinayati, niveśayati, pratiṣṭhāpayati, iyatā putreṇa mātāpitroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syād upakṛtaṃ vā ||
T02avsata_u:3151: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:3155: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:3156: śrāvastyāṃ anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:3158: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:3159: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:3160: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:3163: pitā cāsya dhanakṣayam anuprāpto bhogakṣayam anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3164: sa ca vistīrṇasuhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavas taṃ putraṃ kālānukālaṃ jñātisakāśaṃ preṣayati |
T02avsata_u:3165: sa tair jñātibhis tathā lālito yathā teṣu pravṛddhasnehaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:3167: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:3168: | sa prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya
T02avsata_u:3170: yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāre doṣadarśī nirvāṇe guṇadarśī mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ
T02avsata_u:3171: sa evaṃ pravrajitaḥ san jñātibhiḥ saha saṃsṛṣṭo viharati |
T02avsata_u:3172: tato bhagavāṃs taṃ gṛhisaṃsargān nivārya araṇye niyojayate |
T02avsata_u:3174: yāvad bhagavāṃs taṃ trir api gṛhisaṃsargān nivārayati: vatsa anekadoṣaduṣṭo 'yaṃ gṛhisaṃsargaḥ
T02avsata_u:3175: santi cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi iṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni kāmopasaṃhitāni rañjanīyāni |
T02avsata_u:3177: rasāḥ, kāyavijñeyāni spraṣṭavyāni, manovijñeyā dharmāḥ iṣṭāḥ kāntāḥ priyā manāpāḥ kāmopasaṃhitā rañjanīyāḥ kaṇṭakabhūtāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3178: anekaparyāyeṇa cāsya araṇyaguṇāḥ saṃvarṇitāḥ, yatra sthitasya kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vṛddhir bhavati |
T02avsata_u:3179: yāvat tena kulaputreṇa bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya araṇyavāsena vasatā yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānenedam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād
T02avsata_u:3181: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3185: 'syātiduṣkarāṇi dṛṣṭvā bhagavantam upasaṃkramya sagauravaḥ stauti mānayati
T02avsata_u:3188: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: paśya bhadanta, yāvad ayaṃ kulaputro bhagavatā yāvat trir api grāmāntān nivārya araṇye niyojitaḥ, yāvad arhatve pratiṣṭhāpita iti |
T02avsata_u:3189: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
T02avsata_u:3190: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena ayaṃ kulaputro yāvan trir api grāmāntān nivārya araṇye niyojitaḥ, yāvad arhatve pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena
T02avsata_u:3191: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair ayaṃ kulaputraḥ svajīvitaparityāgena grāmāntān nivārya araṇyavāse niyuktaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3193: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:3194: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani anyatarasmin girikandare prasravaṇapuṣpaphalakandasaṃpanno ṛṣiḥ prativasati kaṣṭatapāḥ phalamūlāmbubhakṣo 'jinavalkalavāsī agnihotrikaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3195: tasya ca ṛṣeḥ śaśo vayasyo mānuṣapralāpī |
T02avsata_u:3199: yāvat kālāntareṇa mahaty anāvṛṣṭiḥ prādurbhūtā, yayā nadyudapānāny alpasalilāni saṃvṛttāni,
T02avsata_u:3201: tataḥ sa ṛṣis tatrāśramapade upabhogaviharān nābhiramate |
T02avsata_u:3203: atha śaśas taṃ tathā pravṛttaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭavān*: maharṣe kva gamiṣyasīti |
T02avsata_u:3204: ṛṣir āha: grāmāntam eva gamiṣyāmi (Speyer: avagamiṣyāmi),
T02avsata_u:3206: tataḥ sa ṛṣivacanam upaśrutya jātasaṃtāpo mātāpitṛviyogam iva manyamānaḥ pādayor nipatya tam ṛṣim uvāca:
T02avsata_u:3210: sa bahv apy ucyamāno na nivartate |
T02avsata_u:3211: tataḥ sa śaśenocyate: yady avaśyaṃ gantavyam*, kiṃ nu adyeha tāvat pratīkṣasva, śvo yathābhipretaṃ yāsyasīti |
T02avsata_u:3212: tatas tasya ṛṣer etad abhavat*: niyatam ayaṃ mām āhārajātenopanimantrayitukāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3213: yasmād ime tiryagyonigatāḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃcayaparā iti |
T02avsata_u:3215: atha kṛtāhnikam āhārakāle śaśa upasaṃkramya tam ṛṣiṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya kṣamayitum ārabdhaḥ: kṣamasva mama maharṣe yan mayā ūhāpohavirahitena
T02avsata_u:3216: tiryagyonāv upapannena tava kiṃcid apakṛtaṃ syāt* |
T02avsata_u:3218: tataḥ sa ṛṣir jātasaṃvego bāṣpadurdinamukhaḥ priyaikaputram ivopaguhyovāca (Speyer: ivopagṛhyovāca):
T02avsata_u:3223: na santi mudgā na tilā na taṇḍulā vane vivṛddhasya śaśasya kecana |
T02avsata_u:3224: śarīram etat tv analābhisaṃskṛtaṃ mamopayojyādya tapovane vasa ||
T02avsata_u:3227: tataḥ sa ṛṣiḥ śaśavacanam upaśrutya jātasaṃvega uvāca: yady evaṃ tava
T02avsata_u:3228: priyatayā kāmam ihaiva jīvitaṃ parityakṣyāmi, na ca grāmāntam
T02avsata_u:3231: ūrdhvamukhaś ca gaganatalam abhivīkṣya yācituṃ pravṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3233: araṇye me samāgamya viveke ramate manaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3234: anena satyavākyena māhendraṃ deva varṣa nu || AVŚ_37.2 ||
T02avsata_u:3236: devatānāṃ cādhastāj jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate: kiṃ kṛtam api |
T02avsata_u:3238: yāvac chakreṇa devendreṇa māhendravarṣaṃ vṛṣṭaṃ yena tadāśramapadaṃ punar api tṛṇagulmauṣadhipuṣpaphalasamṛddhaṃ saṃvṛttam* ||
T02avsata_u:3239: tatas tena ṛṣiṇā śaśaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya tatra vasatā pañcābhijñāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3240: tataḥ sa ṛiṣiḥ śaśam uvāca: bhoḥ śaśa, tena duṣkareṇa vyavasāyena kāruṇyabhāvāc ca kiṃ prārthayase iti |
T02avsata_u:3241: tenoktam*: andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,
T02avsata_u:3243: tataḥ sa ṛṣir idaṃ vacanam upaśrutya śaśam abravīt: yadā tvaṃ buddho
T02avsata_u:3246: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:3249: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yat kalyaṇāmitrā vihariṣyāmaḥ kalyāṇasahāyāḥ
T02avsata_u:3250: kalyāṇasaṃparkāḥ, na pāpamitrā na pāpasahāyā na pāpasaṃparkā |
T02avsata_u:3252: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat*: iha mama bhadanta ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasyaivaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā
T02avsata_u:3253: kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ, na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti |
T02avsata_u:3254: bhagavān āha: mā tvam ānanda evaṃ vocaḥ: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya
T02avsata_u:3255: yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ, na pāpamitratā na
T02avsata_u:3257: sakalam idam ānanda kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ, na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3258: tat kasya hetoḥ? māṃ hy ānanda kalyāṇāmitram āgamya jātidharmāṇaḥ satvā jātidharmatayā (Speyer: jātidharmatāyāḥ) parimucyante,
T02avsata_u:3260: tad anenaiva te ānanda paryāyeṇa veditavyaṃ yat sakalam idaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ, na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3264: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:3268: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:3269: ācaritam etad anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ: kalyam evotthāya bhagavato
T02avsata_u:3271: athānyatamena kālena anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ kaścid vyākṣepaḥ samutpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3272: tato bhagavān puṇyakāmānāṃ satvānāṃ puṇyatīrthopadarśanārthaṃ svayam eva saṃmārjanīṃ gṛhītvā jetavanaṃ saṃmārṣṭuṃ pravṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3273: bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāśrāvakā api śāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanakāśyapanandarevataprabhṛtayaḥ saṃmārṣṭuṃ pravṛttāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3274: tato jetavanaṃ saha śrāvakaiḥ saṃmṛjya upasthānaśālāṃ praviśya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3275: niṣadya bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: pañceme bhikṣava ānuśaṃsāḥ saṃmārjane |
T02avsata_u:3281: kāyasya ca bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyate |
T02avsata_u:3283: tataś catasraḥ parṣado bhagavataḥ sakāśāt saṃmārjanasyeti pañcānuśaṃsān upaśrutya prasādajātāḥ prītisaumanasyaprasannacittāḥ svasvāsanād utthāya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantam etad
T02avsata_u:3284: ūcuḥ: vayaṃ bhagavan bhagavata upasthāpakāḥ (Speyer: upasthāyakāḥ) sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ sadā saṃmārṣṭum icchāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3287: tatas tāś catasraḥ parṣado bhagavato 'dhivāsanāṃ viditvā saṃmārjanīgṛhītvā sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ saṃmārṣṭuṃ pravṛttāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3288: sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ cārāmamārgaparyantaṃ saṃmārjya bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ śrotum ekānte niṣaṇṇā ādarayuktāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:3289: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir api taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3290: tena śrutaṃ yathā bhagavatā mahāśrāvakasahāyena svayam eva jetavanaṃ saṃmṛṣṭam iti |
T02avsata_u:3291: bhagavatā deśitān saṃmārjane pañcāsnuśaṃsān upaśrutya vipratisārībhūtaḥ iti cintitavān: kimarthaṃ mayā bhagavato vihāre tasmin puṇyakṣetre,
T02avsata_u:3292: yatrādyaivāropitaṃ bījam adyaiva phalaṃ saṃpadyate, svalpasyānantaṃ phalaṃ niṣpadyate, tathāgatasaṃmukhībhūte sarvaśrāvakasaṃvāsite 'tīva
T02avsata_u:3293: manoramabhūmau sarvadevāsuramanuṣyagandharvagaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇāṃ manoharṣāspadībhūte sarvabhūtapretapiśācayakṣarākṣasanārakadrohiṇām anavakāśe sarvamāramārakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cānavakāśabhuvane bhagnābhibhavajāte rāgadveṣamohamātsaryerṣyāmānaduṣṭasatvānām aviditaprabhāve pāpācārāṇām alabdhāgamane pāpamitrahastagatānām amanāpajāte śraddhāvigatānāṃ tyāgadharmarahitānām adṛṣṭacintitabhāvane duḥśīlānāṃ kuvṛttinām amanogamane dayābhāvavirahitānāṃ krodhināṃ paruṣabhāṣiṇām alabdhaśaraṇe vīryahīnakusīdavṛttināṃ tyaktārambhāśamināṃ sudūrībhūte dhyānacyutamuṣitasmṛtīnāṃ kudṛṣṭicāriṇāṃ kumārgaprasthitānām andhakārībhūte duṣprajñānāṃ kubuddhilabdhajñānāntarāṇām aprāptāgamanabhāve dātṝṇām atīva manorathakṛte suśīlayuktānāṃ manoramavāse kṣamācāriṇām
T02avsata_u:3295: ādarāgamanalabdhe vīryārabdhānāṃ nityānugamanaprāpte dhyānaratānām ālīnabhūvane prajñādhāriṇāṃ prabodhaprakāśāparityaktakṣetre etādṛśe buddhavikrīḍite vihāre saṃmārṣṭuṃ cittākṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ na punaḥ kadāpi mayā tathā kṣamaṃ kartum* |
T02avsata_u:3296: iti niścitya punas tasyaitad abhavat: yatra bhagavatā mahāśrāvakasahāyena svayaṃ saṃmārjanaṃ kṛtam*, katham aham asyopari yāsyāmi?
T02avsata_u:3299: tena bhikṣavaḥ pṛṣṭāḥ: ka eṣa iti |
T02avsata_u:3300: bhikṣava ūcuḥ: anāthapiṇḍado bhadanta bhagavato lajjāyamānarūpo 'patrāpyaparigatahṛdayo necchati bhagavataḥ sakāśam atropariṣṭāt pādanyāsenopasaṃkramitum*, yatra nāma bhagavatā
T02avsata_u:3303: āha: gṛhapate buddhavacanaṃ <possibly restore: śrutvā bhagavatā>
T02avsata_u:3305: kasmāt? saddharmagauravā hi buddhā bhagavantaḥ, dharmo hy arhatāṃ gurur iti |
T02avsata_u:3306: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gāthābhigītena gāyan yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3307: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastād ekānte niṣaṇṇo dharmakathāśravaṇāya
T02avsata_u:3308: tato bhagavatā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3310: bhagavatā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ saṃprakrāntaḥ
T02avsata_u:3311: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavān dharme sādarajātaḥ
T02avsata_u:3313: paśya bhadanta yāvad dharmaratnasyāmī bhājanahūtaḥ satvā ādareṇa sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ saṃmārṣṭuṃ
T02avsata_u:3314: pravṛttāḥ, dharmaṃ ca śrotavyaṃ manyanta iti |
T02avsata_u:3315: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ tathāgato vigatarāgadveṣamoho 'tha parimukto jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair dharme
T02avsata_u:3320: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:3322: nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* ekaputram iva rājyaṃ pālayati |
T02avsata_u:3323: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahatī tyāge vartate |
T02avsata_u:3325: 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:3326: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa sā devī satvavatī saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:3327: dohadaś cāsyāḥ samutpannaḥ: subhāṣitaṃ śṛṇuyām iti |
T02avsata_u:3330: ta ūcuḥ: deva asya satvasyānubhāva iti |
T02avsata_u:3331: tatas tena rājā saubhāṣaṇikasyārthe suvarṇapiṭako grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu
T02avsata_u:3335: yāvat paripūrṇair navabhir māsaiḥ sā devī prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:3337: kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3338: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatv asya dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:3339: amātyā ūcuḥ: yasmād ayaṃ dārako 'jāta eva subhāṣitaṃ gaveṣate tasmād bhavatu dārakasya subhāṣitagaveṣī nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:3343: aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:3345: kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:3347: yadā krameṇa mahān saṃvṛttas tadāpi subhāṣitaṃ gaveṣate, na ca labhate ||
T02avsata_u:3348: sa pitur atyayād rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ amātyānām ājñāpayati: subhāṣitena me grāmaṇyaḥ prayojanam*
T02avsata_u:3350: tatas tair amātyaiḥ sakale jambūdvīpe hiraṇyapiṭakāḥ subhāṣitahetoḥ saṃdarśitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3353: tataḥ sa rājā subhāṣitaśravaṇahetor utkaṇṭhati paritapyati ||
T02avsata_u:3358: atha śakro devānām indro guhyakarūpadhārī bhūtvā vikṛtakaracaraṇanayano rājñaḥ purastād gāthāṃ
T02avsata_u:3359: dharmaṃ caret sucaritaṃ nainaṃ duścaritaṃ caret* |
T02avsata_u:3360: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete asmiṃl loke paratra ca || AVŚ_38.1 || iti ||
T02avsata_u:3361: tato rājā vismitotphulladṛṣṭis (Speyer: vismayotphulladṛṣṭis) taṃ guhyakam uvāca: brūhi brūhi guhyaka tāvan me, etāṃ gāthāṃ śroṣyāmīti |
T02avsata_u:3362: tato guhyako rājānam uvāca: yadi yad bravīmi tan me kariṣyasi, evam aham api yadājñāpayiṣyasi, tat kariṣyāmīti |
T02avsata_u:3364: guhyaka uvāca: saptāhorātrāṇi khadirakāṣṭhair agnikhadāṃ tāpayitvā tatra yady ātmānam utsrakṣyasi, tatas te 'haṃ punar gāthāṃ vakṣyāmīti |
T02avsata_u:3365: tacchravaṇāc ca rājā prītamanās taṃ guhyakam uvāca: evam astv iti |
T02avsata_u:3366: tato rājñā guhyakaṃ pratijñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sarvavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ
T02avsata_u:3367: kāritam* saptame divase rājā subhāṣitaśravaṇahetor agnikhadāyām ātmānam
T02avsata_u:3370: tato 'nekeṣu prāṇiśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu gaganataleṣu cānekeṣu devatāśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu bodhisatvasyādhyāśayaśuddhitām avagamyādbhutabhāvaṃ ca draṣṭum ihāvatasthuḥ |
T02avsata_u:3371: atha sa guhyaka ākāśam utpatya bodhisatvam uvāca: kriyatāṃ mahārāja yathāpratijñātam iti |
T02avsata_u:3372: tato rājā jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya amātyān naigamajānapadāṃś ca
T02avsata_u:3373: kṣamayitvā janakāyaṃ cāśvāsya agnikhadāsamīpam upagamya imāṃ gāthāṃ
T02avsata_u:3376: eṣāṅgārakhadā mahābhayakarī jvālārkaraktopamā dharmārthe prapatāmi niścitamanā niḥsādhvaso jīvite |
T02avsata_u:3377: eṣā cāgnikhadā bhaviṣyati śubhā puṇyānubhāvān mama śītā candanapaṅkavāsitajalā padmākulā padminī ity uktvā bodhisatvas tasyām agnikhadāyāṃ patitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3379: tataḥ śakro devānām indras tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā yakṣarūpam antardhāpya svarūpeṇa sthitvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
T02avsata_u:3380: dharma caret sucaritaṃ nainaṃ duścaritaṃ caret* |
T02avsata_u:3381: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete loke 'smiṃ ca paratra || AVŚ_38.3 || iti ||
T02avsata_u:3382: atha bodhisatvena tāṃ gāthām udgṛhītvā suvarṇapatreṣv abhilikhya kṛtsne jambudvīpe grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhāniṣu paryaṭitā ||
T02avsata_u:3383: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:3385: tadāpi me subhāṣitaśravaṇahetoḥ svajīvitaṃ parityaktaṃ prāg evedānīm* |
T02avsata_u:3387: śikṣitavyam: yad dharmaṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3388: dharmaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3391: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:3394: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:3395: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastyāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat*
T02avsata_u:3399: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:3400: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ suciraṃ nirīkṣya pṛthivyāṃ lekhāṃ niṣkṛṣya (Speyer: nikṛṣya) bhagavantam uvāca:
T02avsata_u:3401: gautama, na tāvad ut te lekhā laṅghayitavyā,
T02avsata_u:3404: tato bhagavān karmaṇām avipraṇāśasaṃdarśanārtham adattādānavairamaṇyārthaṃ ca indrakīla iva tasmin pradeśe sthitaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:3405: eṣa ca śabdaḥ śrāvastyāṃ samantato visṛtaḥ: yathā kila bhagavān
T02avsata_u:3406: rājamārge 'nyatamena brāhmaṇena pañcānāṃ purāṇaśatānām arthaṃ vidhārita iti |
T02avsata_u:3407: tato rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ sahaśravaṇād evāmātyagaṇaparivṛtto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
T02avsata_u:3412: tathā viśākhā mṛgāramātā ṛṣidattapurāṇau sthapatī śakrabrahmādayo devā vaiśravaṇaprabhṛtayaś catvāro lokapālā hiraṇyasuvarṇam upādāya bhagavantam upasṛptāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3413: tān api bhagavān uvāca: na bhavadbhir etāni dātavyānīti |
T02avsata_u:3415: sa hiraṇyasuvarṇasya helāṃ pūrayitvā upari pañca purāṇaśatāni datvā bhagavantam upagataḥ: bhagavan*, idaṃ pratigṛhyatām iti |
T02avsata_u:3421: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarājikā ca parṣat sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: paśya bhagavan yāvad anena brāhmaṇena bhagavān vidhārito 'nāthapiṇḍadena ca kārṣāpaṇā dattāḥ kutaś ca prabhṛti bhagavān asmai dhārayata iti |
T02avsata_u:3424: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye |
T02avsata_u:3426: tathāgatenaitāni up to khalu dehinām is out of place here.> bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu avaśyaṃbhāvīni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni |
T02avsata_u:3428: pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ bāhye pṛthivīdhātau nābdhātau, na
T02avsata_u:3429: tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca |
T02avsata_u:3431: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_39.1 ||
T02avsata_u:3433: nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* ekaputram iva rājyaṃ pālayati |
T02avsata_u:3436: samayena vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvañjīvakanirghoṣite vanaṣaṇḍe amātyaputraparivṛtaḥ krīḍati ramate |
T02avsata_u:3440: tato 'mātyaputras tena puruṣeṇa pañca purāṇaśatāni nirjitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3442: <There seem to be a long gap.> tena me saṃsāre 'nantam
T02avsata_u:3446: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ,
T02avsata_u:3448: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
T02avsata_u:3449: adattādānasya ca prahāṇāya vyāyantavyam*, yathā evaṃvidhā doṣās tasya |
T02avsata_u:3452: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:3455: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kuśinagaryāṃ viharati sma mallānām upavartane yamakaśālavane |
T02avsata_u:3456: atha bhagavāṃs tad eva parinirvāṇakālasamaye āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma: prajñāpaya ānanda tathāgatasya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcam* |
T02avsata_u:3457: adya tathāgatasya rātryā madhyame yāme nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
T02avsata_u:3458: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaṃ prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3460: ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat |
T02avsata_u:3461: prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirā mañcaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3463: upasaṃkramya dakṣinena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati pāde pādam ādhāya alokasaṃjño smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan nirvāṇasaṃjñām eva manasi kurvan ||
T02avsata_u:3464: tena khalu samayena kuśinagaryāṃ subhadraḥ parivrājakaḥ prativasati jīrṇavṛddho mahallakaḥ
T02avsata_u:3465: sa viṃśatiśatavayaskaḥ kauśināgarāṇāṃ mallānāṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rhan saṃmataḥ
T02avsata_u:3466: aśrauṣīt subhadraḥ parivrājakaḥ: atra śramaṇasya gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T02avsata_u:3468: āśā ca me saṃtiṣṭhate, pratibalaś ca me sa bhagavān gautamaḥ
T02avsata_u:3470: śrutvā ca punaḥ kuśinagaryā niṣkramya yena yamakaśālavanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:3471: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān ānando bahir vihārasyābhyavakāśe caṃkrame caṃkramyate |
T02avsata_u:3473: dūrād eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar yenāyuṣmān ānandas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3474: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmatānandena sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisāryaikānte 'sthāt* |
T02avsata_u:3475: ekāntasthitaḥ subhadraḥ parivrājaka āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat*: śrutaṃ me ānanda adya śramaṇasya gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
T02avsata_u:3478: asti ca me dharmeṣu kāṅkṣāyitatvam*, āśā ca me
T02avsata_u:3479: saṃtiṣṭhate, pratibalaś ca me sa bhagavān gautamas tatkāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ
T02avsata_u:3481: saced bhagavata ānanda asty aguru, praviśema, pṛcchema kaṃcid eva pradeśam*, saced avakāśaṃ kuryāt praśnavyākaraṇāya |
T02avsata_u:3487: dvir api trir api subhadraḥ parivrājaka āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat* śrutaṃ bho ānanda adya śramaṇasya gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati, asti ca me dharmeṣu kāṅkṣāyitatvam* |
T02avsata_u:3489: pratibalaś ca me sa bhagavān gautamas tatkāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ prativinodayitum* |
T02avsata_u:3490: saced bhagavata ānanda, asty aguru, praviśema, pṛcchema kaṃcid eva pradeśam*, saced avakāśaṃ kuryāt praśnasya vyākaraṇāya |
T02avsata_u:3491: dvir api trir api āyuṣmān ānandaḥ subhadraṃ parivrājakam idam avocat: alaṃ subhadra, mā tathāgataṃ viheṭhaya, śrāntakāyo bhagavān*, klāntakāyaḥ sugataḥ |
T02avsata_u:3492: punar api subhadraḥ parivrājaka āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat*: śrutaṃ bho ānanda purāṇānāṃ parivrājakānām antikāj jīrṇānāṃ buddhānāṃ (Speyer: vṛddhānāṃ) mahatāṃ
T02avsata_u:3493: caraṇācāryāṇām*: kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke
T02avsata_u:3495: tasya cādya bhagavato gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T02avsata_u:3498: pratibalaś ca me sa bhagavān gautamas tatkāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ prativinodayitum* |
T02avsata_u:3499: saced bhagavata ānanda asty aguru, praviśema, pṛcchema kaṃcid eva pradeśam*,
T02avsata_u:3501: punar apy ānandaḥ subhadraṃ parivrājakam idam avocat*: alaṃ subhadra |
T02avsata_u:3504: imāṃ ca punar āyuṣmatā ānandasya subhadreṇa parivrājakenā sārdham antarākathāṃ viprakṛtām aśrauṣīd bhagavān divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa |
T02avsata_u:3505: śrutvā ca punar āyuṣmantam ānandam idam
T02avsata_u:3510: ayaṃ me paścimo bhaviṣyati anyatīrthikaparivrājakaiḥ sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ |
T02avsata_u:3511: ayaṃ ca me caramo bhaviṣyati sākṣācchrāvakāṇām ehibhikṣukayā pravrajitānām*, yaduta subhadra parivrājakaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3512: atha subhadra parivrājako bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśo hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3513: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisāryaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3514: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ subhadraḥ parivrājako bhagavantam idam avocat: yānīmāni bho gautama
T02avsata_u:3515: pṛthagloke tīrthyāyatanāni: tadyathā pūraṇaḥ kāsyapaḥ, māskarī
T02avsata_u:3516: gośālīputraḥ, sañjayī vairūṭīputraḥ, ajitaḥ keśakambalaḥ, kukudaḥ
T02avsata_u:3517: kātyāyanaḥ, nirgrantho jñātaputraḥ, pratyajñāsiṣur me svāṃ svāṃ pratijñāṃ ||
T02avsata_u:3518: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
T02avsata_u:3519: ekānnatriṃśatko vayasā subhadra yat prāvrajaṃ kiṃkuśalaṃ gaveṣī |
T02avsata_u:3520: pañcāśad varṣāṇi samādhikāni yasmād ahaṃ pravrajitaḥ subhadra || AVŚ_40.1 ||
T02avsata_u:3522: śīlaṃ samādhiś caraṇaṃ ca vidyā caikāgratā cetaso bhāvitā me |
T02avsata_u:3523: āryasya dharmasya pradeśavaktā ito bahir vai śramaṇo 'sti nānyaḥ || AVŚ_40.2 ||
T02avsata_u:3524: yasya subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo nopalabhyate, prathamaḥ śramaṇas tatra nopalabhyate
T02avsata_u:3525: dvitīyas tṛtīyaś caturthaḥ śramaṇas tatra nopalabhyate |
T02avsata_u:3526: yasmiṃs tu subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga upalabhyate prathamaḥ śramaṇas tatropalabhyate
T02avsata_u:3528: asmiṃs tu subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga upalabhyate |
T02avsata_u:3531: na santi ito bahiḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā |
T02avsata_u:3532: śūnyāḥ parapravādāḥ śramaṇair vā brāhmaṇair vā |
T02avsata_u:3534: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe subhadrasya parivrājakasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* |
T02avsata_u:3535: atha subhadraḥ parivrājako dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanadharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān
T02avsata_u:3536: ānandas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam idam avocat |
T02avsata_u:3537: lābhā bhadanta ānandena sulabdhā yad bhagavatā ānando mahācāryeṇa mahācāryāntevāsikābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ
T02avsata_u:3538: api tu asmākam api syur lābhāḥ sulabdhā yad vayaṃ labhemahi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* |
T02avsata_u:3539: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat*: ayaṃ bhadanta subhadraḥ parivrājaka ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām
T02avsata_u:3543: saiva tasyāyuṣmataḥ pravrajyābhūt sopasaṃpat, sa bhikṣubhāvaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:3544: evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmān eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vyahārṣīt* |
T02avsata_u:3545: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan* yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti, tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā
T02avsata_u:3546: sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya pravedayati: kṣīṇā me jātiḥ, uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nānyam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi |
T02avsata_u:3548: athāyuṣmataḥ subhadrasyārhatvaprāptasya vimuktisukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayata etad abhavat*: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ śāstāraṃ parinirvāpayantaṃ paśyeyam* |
T02avsata_u:3550: tatrāyuṣmān subhadraḥ prathamataraṃ parinirvṛtaḥ, tataḥ paścād bhagavān*
T02avsata_u:3551: yadā bhagavatā paścimaśayanopagatena dharmoparodhikāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ vartamānāyām*, chidyamāneṣu dharmeṣu, mucyamāneṣu saṃdhiṣu, subhadro
T02avsata_u:3552: 'rhatve pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ, bahavaś ca kauśīnāgarā mallā dharme niyuktāḥ, tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
T02avsata_u:3553: papracchuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhadanta, yad ayaṃ subhadraḥ parivrājako bhagavatā chidyamāneṣu dharmeṣu mucyamānāsu saṃdhiṣu saṃsāravāgurāyā mocayitvā yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpita iti bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava
T02avsata_u:3554: āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ subhadraḥ parivrājakaḥ saṃasāravāgurāyā mocayitvā yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe
T02avsata_u:3557: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair ūhāpohavirahitena tiryagyonāv upapannena svajīvitaparityāgena subhadraḥ paritrātaḥ, kauśīnāgarāś ca mallāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3558: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:3559: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani anyatarasyāṃ parvatadaryāṃ mṛgayūthapaḥ prativasati anekamṛgasahasraparivāraḥ paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī
T02avsata_u:3560: | tac ca mṛgayūthaṃ lubdhakena vicārya rājñe niveditam* |
T02avsata_u:3561: tato rājñā caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena nirgatya tan mṛgayūthaṃ sarvaṃ saṃkaṭīkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:3562: tato yūthapater etad abhavat*: yady aham idānīm imān na rakṣiṣyāmi, adyaiva te sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyantīti |
T02avsata_u:3564: ārabdhaḥ: katamena pradeśenāsya mṛgakulasya niḥsaraṇaṃ syād iti |
T02avsata_u:3565: sa paśyati tasyāṃ parvatadaryāṃ nadīṃ vahamānām* |
T02avsata_u:3568: tato yūthapatiḥ sahasā tāṃ nadīm avatīrya madhye sthitvā śabdam udīrayati: āgacchantu bhavantaḥ, etasmāt kūlād utplutya mama pṛṣṭe pādān sthāpayitvā paratra kūle pratitiṣṭhata |
T02avsata_u:3569: anenopāyena jīvitaṃ vaḥ paśyāmi, ato 'nyathā maraṇam iti |
T02avsata_u:3573: na cāsya vyavasāyo nivṛttaḥ tadgatakāruṇyo mṛgāṇām antike |
T02avsata_u:3575: 'valokayituṃ pravṛttaḥ: mā kaścid atrālaṅghitaṃ (Speyer: Śto) bhaviṣyatīti
T02avsata_u:3577: tato yūthapatiś chidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamānāsu saṃdhiṣu iṣṭajīvitam agaṇayitvā kūlam uttīrya mṛgaśāvakaṃ pṛṣṭham adhirohya nadīm uttārya kūle sthāpayitvā taṃ mṛgagaṇam uttīrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā maraṇakāle praṇidhiṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ: yathā me ime mṛgā ayaṃ ca mārgaśāvaka iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditāḥ, vyasanāt paritrātāḥ, evam apy aham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya etān saṃsāravāgurāyā mocayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:3578: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:3582: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta subhadreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena paścimaḥ sākṣācchrāvakāṇām iti |
T02avsata_u:3586: vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva
T02avsata_u:3587: skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca |
T02avsata_u:3589: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_40.1 ||
T02avsata_u:3590: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02avsata_u:3591: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:3592: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:3598: sa svādhīnaṃ mokṣaṃ manyamāno na vyāyacchate |
T02avsata_u:3600: bhagavāṃś ca kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgniḥ paścimaśayanopagataḥ, aśokaś ca bhikṣur aśokasyādhastāt pratisaṃlīno babhūva |
T02avsata_u:3601: atha yā devatā tasminn aśokavṛkṣe vyuṣitā, sā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvāṇaṃ śrutvā rodituṃ pravṛttā |
T02avsata_u:3604: athāśoka ūrdhvamukhas tāṃ devatāṃ rudantīm āha:
T02avsata_u:3606: devatovāca: adya rātryā madhyame yāme bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:3607: athāśoko devatāvacanam upasṛtya marmaviddha iva pracalitavān* |
T02avsata_u:3616: apakṛṣṭatvād adhvano na śakṣyāmi viśeṣam adhigantum iti |
T02avsata_u:3617: devatovāca: yadi punar ahaṃ bhavantaṃ bhagavatsakāśam upanayeyam*, kiṃ śakyam iti |
T02avsata_u:3618: aśoka uvāca: tathā hi me buddhiḥ paripakvā, yathā sahadarśanād eva bhagavataḥ śakṣyāmi viśeṣam adhigantum iti |
T02avsata_u:3619: tato devatayā aśoko bhagavatsakāśam ṛddhyanubhāvān nītaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3621: prasādajātasya ca bhagavatā kāśyapena tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ yacchravaṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
T02avsata_u:3622: prathamataraṃ cāyuṣmān aśokaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ, tato bhagavān kāśyapaḥ
T02avsata_u:3624: tataḥ sā devatā āyuṣmato 'śokasya parinirvāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītim
T02avsata_u:3626: cintayati ca: yaḥ kaścid anenāyuṣmatā viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ,
T02avsata_u:3628: evam apy aham anāgate 'dhvani yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava
T02avsata_u:3629: varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha
T02avsata_u:3630: iti, tasyāham eva paścimaśayanopagatasya caramaḥ sākṣācchravakāṇām ehibhikṣukayā pravrajitānāṃ bhaveyam*, pūrvataraṃ ca bhagavataḥ
T02avsata_u:3632: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau devatā, ayaṃ sa subhadraḥ
T02avsata_u:3633: | tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kalyāṇamitratā vihariṣyāmaḥ kalyāṇsahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ, na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3635: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat: iha mama bhadanta ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā
T02avsata_u:3636: kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ, na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti |
T02avsata_u:3637: {bhagavān āha:} mā tvam ānanda evaṃ vocaḥ: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya
T02avsata_u:3638: yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ, na pāpamitratā na
T02avsata_u:3642: kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ, na pāpamitratā na
T02avsata_u:3644: tat kasya hetoḥ? māṃ hy ānanda
T02avsata_u:3645: kalyāṇamitram āgamya jātidharmāṇaḥ satvā jātidharmatāyāḥ parimucyante,
T02avsata_u:3647: tad anenaiva te ānanda paryāyeṇa veditavyaṃ yat sakalam idaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ, na pāpasahāyatā na pāpamitratā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3651: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:3655: guḍaśālā ca bhaktaṃ ca toyaṃ varcaghaṭena ca |
T02avsata_u:3656: koliko hy uttaraś cāpi jātyandhaḥ śreṣṭhir eva ca |
T02avsata_u:3657: putro jāmbālakaś caiva vargo bhavati samudditaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:3660: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:3661: yadā bhagavatā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā, tadāyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyām iyaṃ pratijñā kṛtā: na tāvat piṇḍakaṃ
T02avsata_u:3662: paribhokṣyāmahe (Speyer: paribhokṣyāvahe), yāvan narakatiryakpretebhya ekasatvam api na mocayāva iti |
T02avsata_u:3663: tatas tāv āyuṣmatau kālena kālaṃ kadācin narakacārikāṃ carataḥ, kadācit tiryakpretacārikāṃ carataḥ |
T02avsata_u:3664: tau tatra satvānāṃ vividhayātanābhyāhatānām asatpralāpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān āgatya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām ārocayataḥ |
T02avsata_u:3666: tatas tau tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kurutaḥ, yayā aneke satvā viśeṣam
T02avsata_u:3668: yāvad apareṇa samayenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretacārikāṃ carann adrākṣīt pretaṃ parvatakūṭaprakhyaṃ samudrasadṛśakukṣiṃ sūcīchidropamamukhaṃ svakeśasaṃchannam ādīptaṃ samyakprajvalitam ekajvālībhūtaṃ dhyāyantam ārtasvaraṃ krandantam*, duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ
T02avsata_u:3669: kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanām anubhavantam*, yena yenoccāraprasrāvabhūmis tena
T02avsata_u:3672: papraccha: kiṃ te bhoḥ karma kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ
T02avsata_u:3674: preta āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* |
T02avsata_u:3678: tena khalu samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* |
T02avsata_u:3679: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ
T02avsata_u:3680: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ priyālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ
T02avsata_u:3683: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*: ehi maudgalyāyana svāgataṃ te, kutas tvam etarhy āgacchasīti |
T02avsata_u:3684: maudgalyāyana āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3685: tatrāhaṃ pretam adrākṣaṃ sūcīchidropamamukhaṃ parvatopamakukṣiṃ svakeśasaṃchannaṃ durgandhaṃ paramadurgandham* |
T02avsata_u:3691: kapālapāṇir ghoraś ca krandan samabhidhāvati || AVŚ_41.2 ||
T02avsata_u:3694: kiṃ tena prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* || AVŚ_41.3 || iti bhagavān āha: pāpakārī maudgalyāyana sa pretaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3695: icchasi tasya karmaplotiṃ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta |
T02avsata_u:3696: tena hi maudgalyāyana śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:3697: bhūtapūrvaṃ maudgalyāyana rājagṛhe nagare 'nyataraḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:3699: asati ca buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya |
T02avsata_u:3701: sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* |
T02avsata_u:3705: śreṣṭhinā ca sa pratyekabuddho dṛṣṭaḥ kāyaprāsādikaś cittaprāsādikaś ca |
T02avsata_u:3709: tatas tena gṛhapatinā bhṛtakapuruṣasyājñā dattā āryasyekṣurasaṃ prayaccheti |
T02avsata_u:3710: sa ca gṛhapatiḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena bahir yānāya saṃprasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3711: atha tasya puruṣasya parakīye dravye mātsaryam
T02avsata_u:3712: utpannam*: yady aham asya rasaṃ dāsye, punar apy eṣa āgamiṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:3713: tena aniṣṭagatitrayaprapātanamreṇa sarvābhimatagatidvayanirākariṣṇunā atyantadūrāpagatenāryadharmebhyaḥ pāpaṃ cittam utpādya sa pratyekabuddha
T02avsata_u:3714: uktaḥ: āhara bhikṣo pātram*, dehi, rasaṃ te dāsyāmīti |
T02avsata_u:3715: asamanvāhṛtya arhacchrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartata iti |
T02avsata_u:3716: hīnadīnānukampitayā bhṛtyapuruṣo 'yam asyānugrahaḥ kartavya iti tat pātram upanāmitam*
T02avsata_u:3717: tato 'sau durācāro nirghṛṇahṛdayas tad gṛhītvā pratiguptaṃ pradeśaṃ gatvā prasrāveṇā pūrayitvā upari ikṣurasenācchādya tasmai pratyekabuddhāyānupradadau |
T02avsata_u:3718: tena saṃlakṣitam* sa cintayati: bahv anena tapasvinā pāpaṃ kṛtam api |
T02avsata_u:3721: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyase maudgalyāyana yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:3722: samayena bhṛtakapuruṣa āsīt', ayaṃ sa pretaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3723: tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ duḥkham anubhūtavān* |
T02avsata_u:3724: idānīm api pretabhūtaḥ prakṛṣṭataraṃ duḥkham anubhavati |
T02avsata_u:3725: tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur ye pretasya |
T02avsata_u:3726: iti hi maudgalyāyana ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
T02avsata_u:3728: tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3731: āttamanā āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan*
T02avsata_u:3734: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ {śrāvastyāṃ} viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:3735: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ anyatarasmin vṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇo divāvihārāya |
T02avsata_u:3736: aśrauṣīd āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretyāḥ śabdam ārtasvaraṃ krandantyāḥ, duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ
T02avsata_u:3737: vedayamānāyā bhaktaṃ mārgantyāḥ: bubhukṣitāsmi mārṣāḥ, pipāsitāsmi mārṣā iti |
T02avsata_u:3738: tataḥ sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanena pretī dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭā ca: kiṃ te pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhāni duḥkhāny anubhaviṣyasīti |
T02avsata_u:3739: pretī āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* |
T02avsata_u:3740: bhagavantam etam arthaṃ pṛccha, sa te asmākīnāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākariṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:3742: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* |
T02avsata_u:3743: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ
T02avsata_u:3744: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ priyālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca
T02avsata_u:3745: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*: ehi maudgalyāyana svāgataṃ te, kutas tvam etarhy āgacchasīti |
T02avsata_u:3746: maudgalyāyana āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3747: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣiṃ svakeśasaṃchannāṃ nagnām ārtasvaraṃ krandantīṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānām* |
T02avsata_u:3757: ārtasvaraṃ krandamānā duḥkhāṃ vindanti vedanām* || AVŚ_42.3 ||
T02avsata_u:3758: kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* |
T02avsata_u:3759: yena evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavati bhayānakam* || AVŚ_42.4 || iti bhagavān āha: pāpakāriṇī maudgalyāyana sā pretī |
T02avsata_u:3760: icchasi tasyā karmaplotiṃ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta |
T02avsata_u:3761: tena hi maudgalyāyana śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:3762: bhūtapūrvaṃ maudgalyāyana atīte 'dhvani viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
T02avsata_u:3764: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:3765: tasyāṃ ca vārāṇasyām anyatamā gṛhapatipatnī matsariṇī kuṭukuñcikā āgṛhītapariṣkārā kākāyāpi baliṃ na pradātuṃ vyavasyati, prāg evānyeṣāṃ yācakānām* |
T02avsata_u:3767: yāvad anyataraḥ piṇḍapātikas tasyā gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3769: cittaṃ ca pradūṣya imāṃ cintām āpede: yady aham asya
T02avsata_u:3770: satkāraṃ kariṣyāmi, punar apy eṣa āgamiṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:3771: tatas tayā pāpakāriṇyā aniṣṭaṃ paralokabhayam avigaṇayya sa bhikṣur upanimantrya dvāraṃ baddhvā bhaktacchedaṃ kāritaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3772: bahu ca paribhāṣyoktaḥ: iyaṃ te bhikṣo satkriyā |
T02avsata_u:3774: sā tena mātsaryeṇāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena preteṣūpapannā |
T02avsata_u:3777: ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti, te tasyāḥ pretyā iti ||

T02avsata_u:3783: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretacārikāṃ caran pretīm adrākṣīd dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśīṃ svakeśasaṃchannāṃ
T02avsata_u:3785: sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣim ādīptāṃ pradīptāṃ prajvalitām ekajvālībhūtāṃ dhmāyantīṃ tṛṣārtāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānām* |
T02avsata_u:3787: yadā devo varṣati, tadā tasyā upari savisphuliṅgāṅgāravarṣaṃ patati |
T02avsata_u:3788: dṛṣṭvā tām āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana āha: kiṃ tvayā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavasīti |
T02avsata_u:3792: sa te asmākīnāṃ karmaplotiṃ kathayiṣyati, yāṃ śrutvā anye 'pīha satvāḥ pāpāt karmaṇaḥ
T02avsata_u:3795: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* |
T02avsata_u:3796: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ
T02avsata_u:3797: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ priyālāpina ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca
T02avsata_u:3798: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*: ehi maudgalyāyana svāgataṃ te, kutas tvam etarhy āgacchasīti |
T02avsata_u:3801: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśīṃ svakeśasaṃchannāṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣim ādīptāṃ pradīptāṃ prajvalitām ekajvālībhūtāṃ dhmāyantīm ārtasvaraṃ kradantīṃ tṛṣārtāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānām* |
T02avsata_u:3803: yadā devo varṣati tadā asyā upari savisphuliṅgam aṅgāravarṣaṃ patati |
T02avsata_u:3808: tena hi maudgalyāyana śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:3809: bhūtapūrvaṃ maudgalyāyana atīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrakalpe
T02avsata_u:3810: viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:3817: sā āgṛhītapariṣkārā bhikṣum uvāca: bhikṣo yadi mriyase, na te dadāmi pānīyam*, ghaṭo me ūno
T02avsata_u:3821: dārikā tena mātsaryeṇāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena kālaṃ kṛtvā preteṣūpapannā |

T02avsata_u:3823: tasmāt tarhi maudgalyāyana evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyaṃsyāmahe |
T02avsata_u:3826: āttamanā āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
