T02avsata_u:3831: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat*
T02avsata_u:3832: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamarpya yena gṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvatas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3833: upasaṃkramya gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam avagāhyānyatarad vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇo divāvihārāya
T02avsata_u:3834: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretīm ādrakṣīd dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśīṃ nagnāṃ svakeśasaṃchannāṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣim ādīptāṃ pradīptāṃ prajvalitām ekajvālībhūtāṃ dhmāyantīm ārtasvaraṃ kradantīṃ tṛṣārtāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānām* durgandhāṃ paramadurgandhāṃ varcaḥsadṛśīṃ varcohārāṃ tad api kṛcchreṇāsādayantīm* |
T02avsata_u:3835: dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ saṃvignaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3837: kiṃ tvayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yasya te īdṛśaṃ phalam iti |
T02avsata_u:3838: pretī āha: pāpakāriṇy <MS: prāgapakāriṇy> ahaṃ bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana |
T02avsata_u:3840: sa te asmākīnāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākariṣyati (Speyer: Śṣyatīti) |
T02avsata_u:3844: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* |
T02avsata_u:3847: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ priyālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca
T02avsata_u:3848: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*: ehi maudgalyāyana svāgataṃ te, kutas tvam etarhy āgacchasīti |
T02avsata_u:3849: maudgalyāyana āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3850: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśīṃ nagnāṃ svakeśasaṃchannāṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣim ādīptāṃ pradīptāṃ prajvalitām ekajvālībhūtām ārtasvaraṃ krandantīṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānām* |
T02avsata_u:3852: yadā devo varṣati, tadā tasyā upari savisphuliṅgam aṅgāravarṣaṃ patati, durgandhāṃ paramadurgandhāṃ varcaḥsadṛśāṃ ca varcāhārāṃ tad api kṛcchreṇāsādayantīm*
T02avsata_u:3855: ārtasvaraṃ krandamānā duḥkhāṃ vindati vedanām* || AVŚ_44.1 ||
T02avsata_u:3857: yena hi varcadhānāni tena dhāvati duḥkhitā |
T02avsata_u:3858: varcaḥ pāsyāmi bhokṣye ca tac ca duḥkhena labhyate || AVŚ_44.2 ||
T02avsata_u:3859: kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* |
T02avsata_u:3860: yena evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavati bhayānakam* || AVŚ_44.3 ||
T02avsata_u:3861: bhagavān āha: pāpakāriṇī maudgalyāyana sā pretī |
T02avsata_u:3862: icchasi tasyāḥ karmaplotiṃ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta |
T02avsata_u:3863: tena hi maudgalyāyana śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:3864: bhūtapūrvaṃ maudgalyāyana vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho hīnadīnānukampī prāntaśayanāsanasevī ca |
T02avsata_u:3866: yāvad asya vaidyena sāṃpreyaṃ bhojanam upadiṣṭam* |
T02avsata_u:3868: tena ca śreṣṭhinā dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaś ca: kena te ārya prayojanam iti |
T02avsata_u:3870: tataḥ śreṣṭhinā vadhvā ājñā dattā: āryāya sāṃpreyaṃ bhojanaṃ dātavyam iti |
T02avsata_u:3872: yady aham asmai adya bhojanaṃ pradāsyāmi, śvo bhūya āgamiṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:3873: tayā ekāntam apasṛtya varcasaḥ pātraṃ pūrayitvā upari bhaktena pracchādya tasmai pratyekabuddhāya dattam* |
T02avsata_u:3880: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyase maudgalyāyana yāsau tena kālena tena samayena śreṣṭhivadhukā, iyaṃ sā pretī |
T02avsata_u:3882: | tataḥ prabhṛti nityaṃ narakatiryakpreteṣūpapadyate, nityaṃ ca varcāhārā
T02avsata_u:3883: | tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā ete doṣā na syur ye tasyāḥ pretyā |
T02avsata_u:3886: āttamanā āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:3889: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:3890: tena khalu punaḥ samayena antarā ca rājagṛham antarā ca veṇuvanam atrāntare pañca pretaśatāni dagdhasthūṇākṛtīni nagnāni svakeśasaṃchannāni parvatopamakukṣīṇi sūcīchidropamamukhāni ādīptāni pradīptāni saṃprajvalitāny ekajvālībhūtāny ārtasvaraṃ pralapamānāni duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām
T02avsata_u:3892: amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānāni vāyumaṇḍalavadākāśe paribhramanti, na kvacit pratiṣṭhāṃ labhante
T02avsata_u:3893: athāyuṣmān mahamaudgalyāyanaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat*
T02avsata_u:3897: upasaṃkramya karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair ekaraveṇocuḥ: vayaṃ smo bhadanta
T02avsata_u:3900: svayaṃ tāvad asmābhir dānapradānāni na dattāni, pareṣām api dānapradāneṣu dīyamāneṣu vighnāḥ kṛtāḥ, dakṣiṇīyāś ca bahavaḥ pretavādena paribhāṣitāḥ: pretopapannā iva yūyaṃ nityaṃ paragṛhebhyo bhaikṣyam aṭatha (Speyer: aṭhatha) |
T02avsata_u:3901: ete vayaṃ kālaṃ kṛtvā evaṃvidheṣu preteṣūpapannāḥ |
T02avsata_u:3902: iti bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana ye 'smākaṃ jñātayo rājagṛhe prativasanti, teṣām asmākīnāṃ karmaplotiṃ
T02avsata_u:3903: nivedya chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kārayitvā cāsmākaṃ pretayoner mokṣaḥ syād iti
T02avsata_u:3905: tata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena teṣāṃ jñātigṛhebhyaś cchandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo bhaktenopamantritaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3906: pretānāṃ ca niveditam*: śvo bhagavān sabhikṣusaṃgho bhaktenopanimantritaḥ, tatra yuṣmābhir āgantavyam iti |
T02avsata_u:3907: jñātīnām apy ārocitam*: bhavadbhir āgantavyaṃ tatra jñātibhojane |
T02avsata_u:3909: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ svayam evodyukto bhojanaṃ pratijāgaritum* ||
T02avsata_u:3910: atha prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām āhāre sajjīkṛte gaṇḍīdeśakāle saṃprāpte tān pretān na paśyati |
T02avsata_u:3911: tata āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano divyena cakṣuṣā tān pretān samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3916: tato yāvad asya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate, tato vyavalokayituṃ pravṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3918: tata āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ saṃvigno bhagavate nivedayāmāsa: bhagavan, na me dānapatayo dṛśyanta iti |
T02avsata_u:3920: āha: ayaṃ maudgalyāyana mā khedam āpadyasva |
T02avsata_u:3927: tato gaṇḍyām ākoṭitāyāṃ sarvo bhikṣusaṃghaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ, pretajñātayo 'nye ca kautūhalyābhyāgatāḥ
T02avsata_u:3929: tato bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathā darśitaṃ yathā pretā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhuñjānaṃ
T02avsata_u:3930: smṛtiṃ ca pratilabhante: jñātayo asmad arthe buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayantīti
T02avsata_u:3931: tato bhagavān pañcāṅgopetena svareṇa dakṣiṇām ādiśati:
T02avsata_u:3932: ito dānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat pretān anugacchatu |
T02avsata_u:3933: uttiṣṭhantāṃ kṣipram ete pretalokāt sudāruṇāt* || AVŚ_44.1 || iti ||
T02avsata_u:3935: yāvad bhagavatā tad adhiṣṭhānā tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā anekair prāṇiśatasahasrair mātsaryamalaṃ prahāya satyadarśanaṃ
T02avsata_u:3937: te ca pretā bhagavati cittam abhiprasādya kālagatāḥ, praṇīteṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:3938: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyakāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante: kutaś cyutaḥ kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇeti |
T02avsata_u:3939: paśyanti pretebhyaś cyutāḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ, bhagavato
T02avsata_u:3942: abhavat: nāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ syāt, yad vayaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmema
T02avsata_u:3943: yan nu vayam aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmemeti |
T02avsata_u:3944: atha pretapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitramaulayaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrās tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmapuṇḍarīkamandāravādīnāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā samantato venuvaṃ kalandakanivāpam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair ākīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:3945: atha bhagavān pretapūrviṇāṃ devaputrāṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān, yāṃ śrutvā pretapūrvikair devaputrair mahān viśeṣo
T02avsata_u:3947: te labdhalābhā iva vaṇijo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraivāntarhitāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:3955: tata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena teṣāṃ jñātīnām ārocitam* |
T02avsata_u:3956: te śrutvā paraṃ vismayam upagatā bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādayāmāsur bhūyaś ca satkāraṃ pracakrur iti |
T02avsata_u:3957: tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyam* |
T02avsata_u:3958: ete doṣā na bhavanti ye teṣāṃ pretānām iti ||
T02avsata_u:3960: āttamanā āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:3963: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:3964: rājagṛhe 'nyataraḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
T02avsata_u:3970: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:3971: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:3973: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:3974: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād uttare nakṣatre jātas tasmād bhavatūttara iti nāma |
T02avsata_u:3975: uttaro dārako unnīto vardhito mahān saṃvṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3981: tasya bhagavatsaṃdarśanāt saddharmaśravaṇāc ca bhagavacchāsane prasādo jātaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3983: sa mātaraṃ vijñāpayāmāsa: amba anujānīhi māṃ bhagavacchāsaneṣu pravrajiṣyāmīti |
T02avsata_u:3984: tato mātā kathayati: putra tvam ekaputrakaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3985: yāvad ahaṃ jīvāmi, tāvan na pravrajitavyam* |
T02avsata_u:3987: sa cottaro yat kiṃcid upārjayati tat sarvaṃ mātre 'nuprayacchati: anena amba śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakān
T02avsata_u:3989: sā cāsya mātā lubdhā kuṭukuñcikā matsariṇī āgṛhītapariṣkārā tān kārṣāpaṇān gopayitvā ye śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ piṇḍārthinas tad gṛhaṃ praviśanti, tān paribhāṣate: pretopapannā iva yūyaṃ nityaṃ paragṛhebhyo bhaikṣam aṭatheti |
T02avsata_u:3990: sā ca putraṃ visaṃvādayati: aham adya iyatāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ bhojanaṃ prayacchāmīti ||
T02avsata_u:3992: uttaraś ca mātṛviyogād dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3993: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣākṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:3994: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:3998: sā cāsya mātā pretalokopapannā nagnā dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśī svakeśaromasaṃchannā sūcīchidropamamukhī parvatopamakukṣir ādīptā saṃprajvalitā ekajvālībhūtā ārtasvaraṃ kradantī āyuṣmantam uttaram upasaṃkrāntā |
T02avsata_u:3999: yāvad āyuṣmatā uttareṇa sā pretī dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭā ca: kā tvam evaṃvidheti |
T02avsata_u:4001: ahaṃ te jananī snigdhā yayā jāto 'si putraka |
T02avsata_u:4003: pañcaviṃśati varṣāṇi yataḥ kālagatā hy aham* |
T02avsata_u:4004: nābhijānāmi pānīyaṃ kuto bhaktasya darśanam* || AVŚ_46.2 ||
T02avsata_u:4005: saphalān vṛkṣān gacchāmi niṣphalā me bhavanti te |
T02avsata_u:4006: pūrṇāni sarāṃsi gacchāmi tāni śuṣkāṇi santi me || AVŚ_46.3 ||
T02avsata_u:4008: sukhaṃ bhadantasya hi vṛkṣamūlaṃ udakaṃ bhajate śītala bhājanesmim* |
T02avsata_u:4009: kṛpā janayitvā {janetvā} kṛpaṇāyai mahyaṃ dadasva toyaṃ tṛṣārtitāyai || AVŚ_46.4 ||
T02avsata_u:4010: tata uttaro mātaram uvāca: amba nanu purā tvaṃ mayā manuṣyabhūtā
T02avsata_u:4013: mātsaryābhibhūtayā dānāni dattāni, puṇyāni vā kṛtāni |
T02avsata_u:4015: tad idānīṃ putraka jñātigṛhaṃ gatvā chandanabhikṣaṃ kṛtvā mama nāmnā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojaya, dakṣiṇām ādeśaya, deśanāṃ ca kāraya |
T02avsata_u:4016: evaṃ pretayoner mama mokṣaḥ syād iti |
T02avsata_u:4018: kiṃ tu tvayā buddhānte sthātavyam iti |
T02avsata_u:4019: pretī āha: putrakā, apatrape nagnā hriyānviteti |
T02avsata_u:4020: uttara āha: amba yadā pāpaṃ karoṣi, tadā nāpatrapitā |
T02avsata_u:4024: tata uttareṇa jñātigṛhebhyaś chandanabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo bhaktenopanimantritaḥ
T02avsata_u:4028: te tāṃ pretīṃ vikṛtāśrayāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ saṃvegam upagatāḥ bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādayāmāsuḥ
T02avsata_u:4029: tataḥ āyuṣmān uttaro buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya pretyā nāmnā dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kārayāmāsa |
T02avsata_u:4030: bhagavāṃś ca pañcāṅgopetena svareṇa svayam eva dakṣiṇādeśanām ādiśati:
T02avsata_u:4031: ito dānād dhi yat punyaṃ tat pretīm anugacchatu |
T02avsata_u:4032: uttiṣṭhatāṃ kṣipram iyaṃ pretalokāt sudāruṇāt || AVŚ_46.5 || iti ||
T02avsata_u:4033: yāvad bhagavatā tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tasyāḥ pretyā mahataś ca janakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā anekaprāṇiśatasahasrair
T02avsata_u:4035: sā ca prasannacittā kālagatā pretamaharddhikeṣūpapannā || āyuṣmatottareṇa samanvāhṛtā pretamaharddhikeṣūpapannā
T02avsata_u:4036: tata āyuṣmatā uttareṇoktam*: amba asti te
T02avsata_u:4043: adyāpi te tiṣṭhati tac charīraṃ vivṛddhanirmāṃsatvagasthicarmam* |
T02avsata_u:4044: lobhāndhakārāvṛtalocanāyā nivartitaṃ yat tvayā pretaloke || AVŚ_46.6
T02avsata_u:4046: yāvad āyuṣmatā uttareṇa subahu paribhāṣya ekā yamalī labdhā |
T02avsata_u:4048: yena ca bhikṣuṇā saṃghamadhyāt sā yamalī krītā, tena mānavake sthāpitā |
T02avsata_u:4050: tatas tena bhikṣuṇā āyuṣmata uttarāya niveditam* |
T02avsata_u:4051: uttareṇa gatvā pretīṃ paribhāṣya punar apy ānīya dattā |
T02avsata_u:4052: evaṃ yāvat trir api tasya bhikṣoḥ sakāśād apahṛtā,
T02avsata_u:4054: bhikṣuṇā ca sā pāṭayitvā cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vilepanikāyāṃ
T02avsata_u:4058: ata eva mātsaryaṃ satvānāṃ viḍambanakaraṃ dṛṣṭvā mātsaryaprahāṇāya dhyāyitavyam* |
T02avsata_u:4059: tathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur yathā tasyāḥ pretyā iti ||
T02avsata_u:4061: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan*
T02avsata_u:4064: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:4065: athāyuṣmān nandakaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamarpya pretacārikāṃ carati sma |
T02avsata_u:4066: adrākṣīd āyuṣmān nandakaḥ pretīṃ dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśīṃ jātyandhāṃ svakeśaromasaṃchannāṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣiṃ durgandhāṃ śmaśānasadṛśīṃ kākair gṛdhraiḥ śvabhiḥ śṛgālaiś cābhidrutām* ye 'syāḥ samantata utpāṭyotpāṭya māṃsaṃ
T02avsata_u:4068: sā marmavedanābhyāhatā ārtasvaraṃ krandati duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti |
T02avsata_u:4070: pṛchati: kiṃ tvayā bhagini prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavasīti |
T02avsata_u:4071: pretī āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* |
T02avsata_u:4074: yāṃ śrutvā anye 'pīha satvāḥ pāpāt prativiraṃsyantīti |
T02avsata_u:4076: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* |
T02avsata_u:4077: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ
T02avsata_u:4078: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca |
T02avsata_u:4079: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ nandakam idam avocat*: ehi nanadaka, svāgataṃ te, kutas tvaṃ nandaka etarhy āgacchasīti |
T02avsata_u:4082: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśīṃ svakeśaromasaṃchannāṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣiṃ durgandhāṃ śmaśānasadṛśīṃ kākair gṛdhraiḥ śvabhiḥ śṛgālaiś cābhidrutām*, ye 'syāḥ
T02avsata_u:4084: sā marmavedanābhyāhatā ārtasvaraṃ krandati duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānām* |
T02avsata_u:4092: ārtasvaraṃ krandamānā duḥkhāṃ vindati vedanām* || AVŚ_47.3 ||
T02avsata_u:4093: kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* |
T02avsata_u:4094: yena evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavati bhayānakam* || AVŚ_47.4 || iti ||
T02avsata_u:4095: bhagavān āha: pāpakāriṇī nandaka sā pretī |
T02avsata_u:4098: tena hi nandaka śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:4099: bhūtapūrvaṃ nandaka asminn eva bhadrakalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:4100: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:4103: yāvad asau dharmaṃ śrutvā saṃsāradoṣadarśinī nirvāṇe guṇadarśinī saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:4106: sā tatra śaikṣāśaikṣībhir bhikṣuṇībhiḥ sārdhaṃ prativasati |
T02avsata_u:4109: tatas tayā dānapatir gṛhebhyaḥ pravṛttakāni chandakāni <The gap may be filled ou by
T02avsata_u:4110: Speyer: kurkuraiḥ śṛgālaiś ca.> śaikṣāśaikṣīṇāṃ ca avarṇo bhāṣitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4111: bhikṣavaś ca ye śīlavantaḥ, tān dṛṣṭvā nayane nimīlitavatī ||
T02avsata_u:4112: kiṃ manyase nandaka yā sā śreṣṭhiduhitā, iyaṃ sā pretī |
T02avsata_u:4113: yat tayā varṣake mātsaryaṃ kṛtam*, tena preteṣūpapannā |
T02avsata_u:4114: yat tayā naityakasamucchedaḥ kṛtas tena kākair gṛdhraiḥ kurkuraiś cābhidrutā |
T02avsata_u:4115: yat tayā śaikṣāśaikṣīṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām avarno bhāṣitaḥ, tena daurgandhyam āsāditam* |
T02avsata_u:4116: yat tayā śīlavato bhikṣūn dṛṣṭvā nayane nimīlite, tena jātyandhā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:4117: iti hi nandaka ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo
T02avsata_u:4119: tasmāt tarhi te nandaka ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
T02avsata_u:4123: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe daśabhiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:4124: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: ime cānye ca ādīnavā mātsarye vāgduścarite ceti jñātvā mātsaryasya vāgduścaritasya ca prahāṇāya vyāyantavyam* |
T02avsata_u:4127: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan*
T02avsata_u:4131: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:4132: śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:4134: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:4135: | dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:4136: tasmai bhagavatā saṃsāravairāgyikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāradoṣadarśī nirvāṇe guṇadarśī bhūtvā bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4137: pravrajitaś ca jñāto mahāpuṇyaḥ saṃvṛtto lābhī
T02avsata_u:4139: sa gṛhītapariṣkāro labdhaṃ labdhaṃ saṃcayaṃ karoti, na tu sabrahmacāribhiḥ
T02avsata_u:4141: sa tena mātsaryeṇa sevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena pariṣkārādhyavasitaḥ kālagataḥ svake layane
T02avsata_u:4142: tato 'sya sabrahmacāribhir muṇḍikāṃ gaṇḍīṃ parāhatya śarīrābhinirhāraḥ kṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4143: tato 'sya śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā vihāram āgatāḥ |
T02avsata_u:4144: tato layanadvāraṃ vimucya pātracīvaraṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhāḥ |
T02avsata_u:4145: yāvat paśyanti taṃ pretaṃ vikṛtakaracaraṇanayanaṃ paramabībhatsāśrayaṃ pātracīvaram avaṣṭabhyāvasthitam*
T02avsata_u:4146: tathāvikṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhikṣavaḥ saṃvignā bhagavate niveditavantaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4147: tato bhagavāṃs tasya kulaputrasyānugrahārthaṃ śiṣyagaṇasyodvejanārthaṃ mātsaryasya cāniṣṭavipākasaṃdarśanārthaṃ bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4149: 'sau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:4155: sādhu mamāntike cittaṃ prasādaya, asmāc ca pariṣkārāc cittaṃ virāgaya |
T02avsata_u:4156: mā haiva itaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā narakeṣūpapatsyasa iti |
T02avsata_u:4157: tataḥ pretaḥ saṃghe pātracīvaraṃ niryātya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya atyayaṃ deśitavān* |
T02avsata_u:4158: tato bhagavatā pretasya nāmnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā:
T02avsata_u:4159: ito dānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat pretam anugacchatu |
T02avsata_u:4160: uttiṣṭhatu kṣipram ayaṃ pretalokāt sudāruṇāt* || AVŚ_48.1 || iti ||
T02avsata_u:4161: tataḥ sa preto bhagavati cittaṃ prasādya kālagataḥ pretamarddhikeṣūpapannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4162: tataḥ pretamaharddhikaś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitramauliḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras
T02avsata_u:4164: tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:4165: bhagavatā tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā prasādajātaḥ prakrāntaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:4167: tair dṛṣṭo bhagavato 'ntike udāro 'vabhāsaḥ, yaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃdigdhā
T02avsata_u:4168: bhagavantaṃ paprachuḥ: kiṃ bhagavan asyām rātrau brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān
T02avsata_u:4169: āha: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ
T02avsata_u:4170: api sa pretaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā pretamaharddhikeṣūpapannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4175: ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti, ye tasya śreṣṭhinaḥ pretabhūtasya |
T02avsata_u:4178: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan*
T02avsata_u:4181: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:4182: athāyuṣmān nāladaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* |
T02avsata_u:4183: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamarpya pretacārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:4184: sa gṛdhrakūṭaparvatasāmantake pretīṃ dadarśa yamarākṣasasadṛśīṃ rudhirabinducitām asthiśakalāparivṛtāṃ śmaśānamadhya ivāvasthitam* |
T02avsata_u:4185: rātriṃdivena pañca putrān prasūya tādṛśaṃ duḥkham anubhūya putrasnehe saty api kṣutkṣāmatayā putrāṃs tān bhakṣayantīm* |
T02avsata_u:4187: pṛṣṭavān: kiṃ tvayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavasīti |
T02avsata_u:4188: pretī āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* |
T02avsata_u:4191: yāṃ śrutvā anye 'pīha satvāḥ pāpāt karmaṇaḥ prativiraṃsyantīti |
T02avsata_u:4193: tena khalu samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* |
T02avsata_u:4194: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ
T02avsata_u:4197: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca |
T02avsata_u:4198: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ nāladam idam avocat*: ehi nālada, svāgataṃ te, kutas tvaṃ nālada etarhy āgacchasīti |
T02avsata_u:4199: nālada āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ |
T02avsata_u:4200: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ yamarākṣasasadṛśīṃ rudhirabinducitām asthiśakalāparivṛtāṃ śmaśānamadhya ivāvasthitam* |
T02avsata_u:4202: pañca putrān ahaṃ rātrau divā pañca tathāparān* |
T02avsata_u:4203: bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptas tathāpi me || AVŚ_49.1 || iti kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* |
T02avsata_u:4204: yena evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavati bhayānakam* || AVŚ_49.2 || iti bhagavān āha: pāpakārī nālada sā pretī |
T02avsata_u:4207: tena hi nālada śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:4209: śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī
T02avsata_u:4211: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:4212: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato naiva putro na duhitā |
T02avsata_u:4213: sa kare kapolaṃ kṛtvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ: anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛham* |
T02avsata_u:4215: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:4216: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate sma |
T02avsata_u:4217: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ |
T02avsata_u:4218: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate sma |
T02avsata_u:4219: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti |
T02avsata_u:4221: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4222: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca |
T02avsata_u:4223: katameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānām*? mātāpitarāu raktau bhavataḥ
T02avsata_u:4224: saṃnipatitau, mātā kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī, gandharvaś ca pratyupasthito
T02avsata_u:4226: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca |
T02avsata_u:4227: tasya devatārādhane 'pi sati na putro na duhitā ||
T02avsata_u:4228: tasyaivaṃ buddhir utpannā: dvitīyāṃ bhāryām anayāmi |
T02avsata_u:4230: tena sadṛśāt kulād dvitīyā bhāryā ānītā |
T02avsata_u:4231: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:4232: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa sā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:4233: tayā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditayā svāmine niveditam: diṣṭyā āryputra vardhase |
T02avsata_u:4235: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
T02avsata_u:4237: so 'py āttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udanayati: apy evāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ
T02avsata_u:4245: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyate: idaṃ tayor yatrayatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti |
T02avsata_u:4246: āpannasatvāṃ caināṃ viditvopariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyais tiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitair āhāraiḥ |
T02avsata_u:4247: hārārdhahāravirājitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharimāṃ bhūmim* |
T02avsata_u:4248: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya ||
T02avsata_u:4249: tatas tasyāḥ pūrvikāyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ prathamapatnyās tāṃ bahumānāl lālitāṃ (Speyer: laḍitaṃ) dṛṣṭvā īrṣyā samutpannā |
T02avsata_u:4250: cintayanti: yady eṣā putraṃ janayiṣyati, niyataṃ māṃ bādhayiṣyati |
T02avsata_u:4254: tayā aniṣṭagatiprapātanamugdhayā visrambham utpādya tathāvidhaṃ garbhaśātanaṃ dravyaṃ dattaṃ yena pītamātreṇaiva tasyās tapasvinyāḥ srasto garbhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4255: tatas tayā dvitīyapatnyā sarvajñātīn saṃnipātya sā prathamā patnī samanuyujyate:
T02avsata_u:4256: tvayā me visrambham utpādya śātanaṃ dravyaṃ dattam*, yena me srasto garbha iti |
T02avsata_u:4257: tato 'sau prathamapatnī jñātimadhye śapathaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttā: yadi mayā garbhaśātanaṃ dravyam anupradattaṃ syāt*, ahaṃ pretī bhūtvā jātāñ jātān putrān bhakṣayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:4258: kiṃ manyase nālada yāsau śreṣṭhibhāryā, iyaṃ sā pretī |
T02avsata_u:4259: yat tayā īrṣyāprakṛtayā garbhaśātanaṃ dattaṃ tena preteṣūpapannā |
T02avsata_u:4260: yat tayā mṛṣāvādena śapathaḥ kṛtaḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātriṃdivena pañca putrān prasūya tān eva bhakṣayati |
T02avsata_u:4261: tasmāt tarhi te nālada vāgduścaritaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur ye tasyāḥ pretyāḥ |
T02avsata_u:4264: āttamanā āyuṣmān nālado 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan*
T02avsata_u:4267: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho vaiśālīm upaniśritya viharati markaṭahradatīre
T02avsata_u:4269: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyām anyatarasyāṃ nagaraparikhāyāṃ pañca pretaśatāni prativasanti vāntāśāny ujjhitāśāni kheṭamūtropajīvīni pūyaśoṇitaviṣṭhāhārāṇi ghorāṇi prakṛtiduḥkhitāni ca |
T02avsata_u:4277: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:4278: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:4280: tatas tena brāhmaṇena naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāḥ |
T02avsata_u:4282: kathayanti: yo 'yam udarastho dārakas tasyāyaṃ prabhāva iti |
T02avsata_u:4283: yāvad asau navānāṃ māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:4284: dārako jāto durvarṇo durdarśano avakoṭimako 'medhyamrakṣitagātro durgandhaś ca |
T02avsata_u:4285: tathāpy asau snehapāśānubaddhābhyāṃ paramabībhatso 'pi mātṛpitṛbhyāṃ saṃvardhitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4287: 'medhyasthāneṣv evābhiramate saṃkārakūṭe jambāle, keśāṃl luñcati, amedhyaṃ mukhe prakṣipati
T02avsata_u:4288: tasya bālo jāmbāla iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā ||
T02avsata_u:4289: yāvad asāv itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman pūraṇena kāśyapena dṛṣṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4290: tasyaitad abhavat: yādṛśeṣu sthāneṣv ayam abhiramate, nūnam ayaṃ siddhapuruṣaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4292: sa tena pravrājito nagnaḥ paryaṭati satkriyāsu ca vartate |
T02avsata_u:4293: tatas tena paryaṭatā vaiśālīparikhāyāṃ pañca pretaśatāni dṛṣṭāni |
T02avsata_u:4294: sa pūrvakarmavipākasaṃbandhāt tāṃ nagaraparikhām avatīrya taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgamya samāgamya saṃmodate, sakhitvaṃ cābhyupagataḥ |
T02avsata_u:4295: yāvad apareṇa samayena jāmbālo dārakaḥ kvacit prayojanena vyākṣipto vaiśālīṃ praviṣṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4297: dadṛśus te pretā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:4299: bhagavatā uktāḥ: kiṃ bhavatāṃ bādhata iti |
T02avsata_u:4300: te ūcuḥ: pipāsitāḥ smo bhagavann iti |
T02avsata_u:4301: tato bhagavatā pañcabhyo 'ṅgulibhyo 'ṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya pañca dhārā
T02avsata_u:4302: utsṛṣṭāḥ, yena tāni pañca pretaśatāni saṃtarpitāni |
T02avsata_u:4306: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyakāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante: kutaś cyutaḥ kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇeti |
T02avsata_u:4307: te paśyanti pretebhyaś cyutāḥ, praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ,
T02avsata_u:4308: bhagavato 'ntike cittam ahiprasādyeti || atha pretapūrviṇāṃ devaputrāṇām
T02avsata_u:4309: etad abhavat: nāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ syāt, yad vayaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsā
T02avsata_u:4311: yan nu vayam aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmemeti |
T02avsata_u:4312: atha pretapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitramaulayaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrās tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvāṃ kūṭāgāraśālāṃ udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:4315: dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān, yāṃ śrutvā pañcabhir devaputraśatair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam anuprāptam* |
T02avsata_u:4317: saṃpannasasyā iva karṣakāḥ, śūrā iva vijitasaṃgrāmāḥ, sarvarogaparimuktā ivāturā yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatās tayaiva vibhūtyā bhagavantaṃ
T02avsata_u:4319: atha jāmbālo nagaraparikhām āgatas tān pretān nādrākṣīt* |
T02avsata_u:4321: sa ca tān parimārgamāṇaḥ khedam āpanno na ca tān āsādayati ||
T02avsata_u:4322: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* |
T02avsata_u:4323: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya <ca> buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ
T02avsata_u:4326: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*, kasya kāmapaṅkanimagnasya hastoddhāram
T02avsata_u:4329: jñānāñjanaśalākayā cakṣur viśodhayāmi |> kasyānavaropitāni kuśalamulāny avaropayeyam*, kasyāvaropitāni paripācayeyam*, kasya paripakvāni vimocayeyam* |
T02avsata_u:4332: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet || AVŚ_50.2 ||
T02avsata_u:4333: tato bhagavāñ jāmbālasya kulaputrasyānugrahārthaṃ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* |
T02avsata_u:4334: yāvad anupūrveṇa piṇḍapātam aṭan vīthīm avatīrṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4335: jāmbālaś ca itas tato 'nvāhiṇḍamāno bhagavato 'grataḥ sthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4336: atha dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:4338: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭa uvāca: yadi bhagavan mādṛśānāṃ
T02avsata_u:4339: satvānām asmin dharmavinaye pravrajyāsti; labheyaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye
T02avsata_u:4341: tato bhagavān mahākaruṇāparigatahṛdayaḥ satvānām āśayānuśayajñas taṃ bhavyarūpaṃ viditvā rajabhujasadṛśaṃ suvarṇavarṇabāhum abhiprasāryedam avocat*: ehi bhikṣor cara brahmacaryam* |
T02avsata_u:4342: ity uktamātre bhagavatā saptāhāvaropitair iva keśair dvādaśavarṣopasaṃpannasyeva bhikṣor īryāpathena pātrakarakavyagrahasto 'vasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4345: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaś ca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4346: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthāv evaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena ||
T02avsata_u:4348: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣākṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:4349: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4353: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ lūhādhimuktānām*, yaduta jāmbālo bhikṣur iti ||
T02avsata_u:4354: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kiṃ bhadanta jāmbālena sthavireṇa karma kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavatīti |
T02avsata_u:4355: bhagavān āha: jāmbalenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:4357: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:4358: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:4360: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api |
T02avsata_u:4361: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_50.4 ||
T02avsata_u:4362: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksaṃbuddho
T02avsata_u:4363: loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:4365: tasyāṃ ca rājadhānyām anyatamena gṛhapatinā vihāraḥ kārito yatra nānādigdeśavāsino bhikṣava āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ ca manyante |
T02avsata_u:4366: tasmiṃś ca vihāre pṛthagjano bhikṣur naivāsikaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4368: āgantukān bhikṣūn dṛṣṭvā 'bhiṣajyate kupyati vyāpadyate madguḥ pratitiṣṭhati kopaṃ saṃjanayati
T02avsata_u:4369: ye tu tasmād vihārād bhikṣavaḥ prakrāmanti, tān dṛṣṭvā prītiprāmodyabahalaḥ pratyudgamyābhāṣate ca |
T02avsata_u:4370: yāvad apareṇa samayena janapadād arhadbhikṣur āgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:4373: tataḥ prasādajātena śvo bhaktena jentākasnātreṇa copanimantritaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena |
T02avsata_u:4375: yāvad dvitīye divase jentākasnātre pratipādite bhakte sajjīkṛte āvāsiko bhikṣur āgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:4377: paśyati vihārasvāminam ekaśāṭakanivasitam āgantukasya bhikṣoḥ parikarma
T02avsata_u:4382: vākkarma niścāritam*: varaṃ khalu te bhikṣo amedhyena śarīram upaliptam*,
T02avsata_u:4383: na tu evaṃvidhasya dānapateḥ sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkṛtam iti |
T02avsata_u:4384: tatas tenārhatā tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsitam*: mā haivāyaṃ tapasvī gāḍhatarasya karmaṇo bhāgī bhaviṣyatīti
T02avsata_u:4385: yāvat sāmagrīdeśakāle saṃprāpte naivāsikena bhikṣuṇā śrutam*: arhato 'ntike tvayā cittaṃ pradūṣitam iti |
T02avsata_u:4387: tato 'rhato bhikṣoḥ pādayor nipatyāha: kṣamasva ārya yan mayā tvayi paruṣā vāg niścāriteti
T02avsata_u:4388: tato 'rhaṃs tasya prasādābhivṛddhyarthaṃ gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi
T02avsata_u:4391: tena tasya purastāt tat karma atyayenādeśitaṃ prakāśitam uttānīkṛtam*, ca na cānena śakitaṃ naiṣṭhikaṃ jñānam utpādayitum* |
T02avsata_u:4392: yāvan maraṇakālasamaye praṇidhiṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ: yan mayārhato 'ntike cittaṃ pradūṣitam*, kharaṃ ca vākkarma niścaritam*, mā asya karmaṇo vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyam* |
T02avsata_u:4393: yat tu mayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ dānapradānāni dattāni saṃghasya copasthānām
T02avsata_u:4394: kṛtam*, tasya karmaṇo vipākena anāgatān samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:4395: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayenāvāsiko
T02avsata_u:4397: yad anenārhato 'ntike kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam*, asya karmaṇo vipākenānantaṃ saṃsāre duḥkham anubhūtam* |
T02avsata_u:4398: tenaiva ca karmāvaśeṣeṇa etarhi paścime bhave evaṃ durgandhaḥ paramadurgandho 'medhyāvaskarasthānanivāsābhiprāyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4399: yat punar anena tatra paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalam āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam*,
T02avsata_u:4400: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:4401: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyam * |
T02avsata_u:4402: tat kasya hetoḥ? ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti, ye jāmbālasya pṛthagjanabhūtasya |
T02avsata_u:4407: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan*
T02avsata_u:4411: kṛṣṇasarpaś ca candraś ca sālaḥ śrīmatir eva ca |
T02avsata_u:4412: vastraṃ śukaś ca dūtaś ca mahiṣaḥ poṣadhaś ca vai |
T02avsata_u:4416: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:4417: rājagṛhe nagaradvāre 'nyataro gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho
T02avsata_u:4419: sa ca matsarī kuṭukuñcaka āgṛhītapariṣkāraḥ kākāyāpi baliṃ na pradātuṃ vyavasyati |
T02avsata_u:4421: svake codyāne mahān hiraṇyasuvarṇasya rāśiḥ sthāpitaḥ
T02avsata_u:4423: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā tasyaivopari āśīviṣa utapanno mahān kṛṣṇasarpo dṛṣṭiviṣaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4424: atha ye tad udyānaṃ janakāyāḥ praviśanti, tān prekṣitamātreṇa jīvitād vyaparopayati |
T02avsata_u:4425: eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtaḥ: ye amukam udyānaṃ praviśanti, sarve te nidhanam upayāntīti |
T02avsata_u:4427: atha rājño bimbisārasyaitad abhavat*: kas taṃ śakyati vinetum anyatra buddhād bhagavata iti |
T02avsata_u:4428: atha rājā bimbisāro mahājanakāyaparivṛto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4429: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4430: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati
T02avsata_u:4431: | anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya
T02avsata_u:4433: atha rājā bimbisāra utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat*: iha bhagavan rājagṛhe nagare 'muṣminn udyāne mahānāśīviṣaḥ kṛṣṇasarpo dṛṣṭiviṣaḥ
T02avsata_u:4435: sādhu bhagavāṃs tam vinayed anukampām upādāyeti |
T02avsata_u:4437: atha rājā bimbisāro bhagavatas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:4438: atha bhagavāṃs tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya yena tad udyānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4439: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇā marīcaya utsṛṣṭāḥ,
T02avsata_u:4442: kalpasahasraparibhāvitāś ca maitryaṃśava utsṛṣṭāḥ, yair asya spṛṣṭamātraṃ śarīraṃ prahlāditam*
T02avsata_u:4443: atha sa āśīviṣa itaś cāmutaś ca prekṣitum ārabdhaḥ: kasya prabhāvān mama
T02avsata_u:4445: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:4448: prassannacittasya ca bhagavatā tan mayyā gatyās tan mayyā yonyā dharmo deśitaḥ: bhadramukha tvayaivaitad dravyam upārjitam* |
T02avsata_u:4450: sādhu mamāntike cittaṃ prasādya, asmāc ca nidhānāc cittaṃ virāgaya |
T02avsata_u:4451: mā haiva itaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā narakeṣūpapatsyasa iti |
T02avsata_u:4452: yadāsya bhagavatā jātiḥ smāritā, tadā rodituṃ pravṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4453: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate:
T02avsata_u:4457: tiryagyoniṃ virāgyeha tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyasi || AVŚ_51.2 || iti ||
T02avsata_u:4458: yāvad bhagavatā pātre prakṣipya veṇuvanaṃ nītaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4459: atrāntare rājñā māgadhena janakāyena ca śrutaṃ yathāsāv āśīviṣo bhagavatā vinīta iti ||
T02avsata_u:4461: bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādya kālagataḥ, praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4462: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante: kutaś cyutaḥ kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇeti |
T02avsata_u:4464: āśīviṣebhyaś cyutaḥ, praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ, bhagavato
T02avsata_u:4466: na mama pratirūpaṃ syāt*, yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ
T02avsata_u:4468: yan nu aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:4469: athāśīviṣapūrvako devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāsam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsayan bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:4470: atha bhagavān āśīviṣapūrvikasya devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān, yāṃ śrutvā āśīviṣapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptam* sa dṛṣṭasatyas trir udānam udānayati: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:4476: tavānubhāvāt pihitaḥ sughoro hy apāyamārgo bahudoṣayuktaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4477: apāvṛtā svargagatiḥ supuṇyā nirvāṇamārgaś ca mayopalabdhaḥ || AVŚ_51.3 ||
T02avsata_u:4478: tvadāśrayāc cāptam apetadoṣaṃ mayādya śuddhaṃ suviśuddhacakṣuḥ |
T02avsata_u:4479: prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padam āryakāntaṃ tīrṇaś ca duḥkhārṇavapāram asmi || AVŚ_51.4 ||
T02avsata_u:4481: bhavasahasrasudurlabhadarśana saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* || AVŚ_51.5 || iti avanamya tataḥ pralambahāraḥ caraṇau dvāv abhivandya jātaharṣaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4482: parigamya ca dakṣiṇaṃ jitārīṃ suralokābhimukho divaṃ jagāma || AVŚ_51.6 ||
T02avsata_u:4483: athāśīviṣapūrvako devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ, saṃpannasasya iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ, sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā
T02avsata_u:4484: vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam upagatas tayaiva vibhūtyā tasyām eva rātrau rājño bimbisārasya sakāśam upasaṃkramya sarvaṃ rājakulam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya rājānaṃ prabodhya etad uvāca: mahārāja uttiṣṭha uttiṣṭha, kiṃ svapiṣīti |
T02avsata_u:4485: atha rājā prabuddhaḥ paśyati tam udāram avabhāsaṃ taṃ ca devaputram* |
T02avsata_u:4486: dṛṣṭvā prītamanās taṃ papraccha kas tvam iti |
T02avsata_u:4487: sa kathayati: ahaṃ sa dṛṣṭyāśīviṣo bhagavatā tatrodyāne vinītaḥ,
T02avsata_u:4489: bhagavantaṃ ca me paryupāsya satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:4491: gatvā tad udyānam amukasmāt pradeśān mahānidhānam utpāṭya mama nāmnā bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojaya, dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ ca kārayeti |
T02avsata_u:4493: athāśīviṣapūrvako devaputro rājñas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:4494: atha sa rājā bimbisāras tasyām eva rātrau māgadhānāṃ paurajānapadānāṃ nivedya tad udyānaṃ gatvā nidhānam utpāṭya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsyaṃ bhojayitvā bhagavantaṃ papraccha: kāni bhagavann aśīviṣapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni, yenāśīviṣeṣūpapannaḥ: kāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yena deveṣūpapannaḥ, satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti? bhagavān
T02avsata_u:4495: āha: yat tenātimātro lobha utpāditaḥ, śramaṇabrāhmaṇavanīpakānāṃ cāntike cittaṃ praduṣitam*, tenāśīviṣeṣūpapannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4498: kāśyape ca samykasaṃbuddhe upāsakabhūtena śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam*, tena satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam iti |
T02avsata_u:4500: ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti ye āśīviṣasya |
T02avsata_u:4501: eṣa eva guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati, yas tasyaiva devaputrasyety evaṃ te mahārāja śikṣitavyam* |
T02avsata_u:4502: atha rājā bimbisāro bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:4504: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan*
T02avsata_u:4508: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:4512: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:4513: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:4514: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:4516: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:4518: ūcuḥ: yasmād asya jātau sarvalokānāṃ nayanaprahlādanam*, tasmād bhavatu asya dārakasya candra iti nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:4519: sa ca tena brāhmaṇena kṛcchreṇa labdhaḥ
T02avsata_u:4522: sa sarvalokaprahlādanakaratvād brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ kṛtsnaṃ nagaram anvāhiṇḍyata iti |
T02avsata_u:4523: sa brāhmaṇas tasmin bhūyasyā mātrayādhyavasito nityam eva kramasthānaśayyāsu saṃrakṣaṇaparo 'vatiṣṭhite |
T02avsata_u:4525: | atha sa brāhmaṇadārako 'nāthapiṇḍadasaṃsargāj jetavanaṃ gatvā buddhavacanaṃ śṛṇoti |
T02avsata_u:4527: sa cālpāyuṣkaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:4528: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante: kutaś cyutaḥ, kutropapannaś ca kena karmaṇeti |
T02avsata_u:4529: paśyati manuṣyebhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ,
T02avsata_u:4531: atha brāhmaṇapūrviṇo devaputrasyaitad abhavat: na mama pratirūpaṃ syāt*, yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam* |
T02avsata_u:4532: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:4533: atha brāhmaṇapūrvako devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ
T02avsata_u:4535: atha bhagavān brāhmaṇapūrvakasya devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān, yāṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam prāptam* sa dṛṣṭasatyas trir udānam udānayati: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:4541: tavānubhāvāt pihitaḥ sughoro hy apāyamārgo bahudoṣayuktaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4542: apāvṛtā svargagatiḥ supuṇyā nirvāṇamārgaś ca mayopalabdhaḥ || AVŚ_52.1 ||
T02avsata_u:4543: tvadāśrayāc cāptam apetadoṣaṃ mayādya śuddhaṃ suviśuddhacakṣuḥ |
T02avsata_u:4544: prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padam āryakāntaṃ tīrṇaś ca duḥkhārṇavapāram asmi || AVŚ_52.2 ||
T02avsata_u:4546: bhavasahasrasudurlabhadarśana saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* || AVŚ_52.3 || iti avanamya tataḥ pralambahāraś caraṇau dvāv abhinandya jātaharṣaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4547: parigamya ca dakṣiṇaṃ jitāriṃ suralokābhimukho divaṃ jagāma || AVŚ_52.4 ||
T02avsata_u:4548: atha brāhmaṇapūrvako devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ, sasyasaṃpanna iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva {vi}jitasaṃgrāmaḥ, sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā
T02avsata_u:4549: hi vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ ||
T02avsata_u:4552: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃdigdhā bhagavantaṃ paprachuḥ: kiṃ bhagavann asyāṃ rātryāṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya
T02avsata_u:4553: brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān
T02avsata_u:4554: āha: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ, api yo 'sāv ekaputro 'sya brāhmaṇasya putro 'lpāyuṣkaḥ kālagataḥ, sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya praṇīteṣu deveṣu
T02avsata_u:4556: tasya mayā dharmo deśitaḥ, dṛṣṭasatyaś ca svabhavanaṃ gataḥ ||
T02avsata_u:4557: atra cāntare sa brāhmaṇas tam ekaputrakam iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ manāpaṃ kṣāntam apratikūlaṃ śmaśāne nirhṛtyotsaṅge kṛtvā karuṇakaruṇaṃ vilapan*
T02avsata_u:4559: jñātayaḥ subahv api śokavinodanaṃ kurvaṇā na śaknuvanty utthāpayitum* |
T02avsata_u:4560: sa kākakuraraśvaśṛgālagṛdhraparivṛtaḥ prakīrṇakeśībhiḥ strībhir anugato mahājanakāyena codvīkṣyamāṇas tiṣṭhati |
T02avsata_u:4561: tato 'sya putro devabhūtaḥ pitaraṃ paridevamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ pituḥ
T02avsata_u:4562: śokavinodanārtham ṛṣiveṣadhāriṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya śmaśānasamīpe pañcatapāvasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4563: atha sa brāhmaṇas tam ṛṣiṃ papraccha: bho maharṣe anena tapasā kiṃ prārthayasa iti |
T02avsata_u:4564: ṛṣir āha: rājyaṃ prārthaye, sauvarṇaś ca me rathaḥ syān nānāratnavicitraḥ, sūryācandramasau rathacakre syātām*,
T02avsata_u:4570: na lapsyase 'pi tat sthānaṃ paramatapasāpi hi || AVŚ_52.5 || iti ||
T02avsata_u:4571: ṛṣiḥ kathayati: tvaṃ ca punar anena mṛtakuṇapenāśucinā paramadurgandhena śavena kāṣṭhabhūtena kiṃ prārthayasa iti |
T02avsata_u:4573: prāha: priyo me ekaputrakaḥ kālagataḥ, taṃ prārthaya iti |
T02avsata_u:4577: na lapsyase 'pi taṃ putraṃ ruditena hi kiṃ tava || AVŚ_52.6 || iti ||
T02avsata_u:4578: tatas tasya brāhmaṇasya bhūtam ṛṣivacanam avagatya prasādo jātaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4580: tata ṛṣis taṃ veṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā pitaram āha: ahaṃ te sa ekaputrako bhagavato
T02avsata_u:4584: ehi tvaṃ tāta buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ
T02avsata_u:4585: gaccha, apy eva tvam api saṃsārasamatikrāmaṃ kuryā iti ||
T02avsata_u:4586: atha sa brāhmaṇo mṛtaśarīram apahāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4587: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:4588: tasmai bhagavatā caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā tena brāhmaṇeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam prāptam* sa labdhodayo labdhalābho bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāntaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:4589: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: paśya bhagavan, yāvad anena devaputreṇāyaṃ pitā śokaṃ vinodya satyadarśane pratiṣṭhāpita iti |
T02avsata_u:4590: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad anenaitarhi dṛṣṭasatyena pitā paritrātaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4591: yat tv anena atīte 'dhvani pṛthagjanena satā yāvat trir api pitā jīvitād vyavaropyamāṇaḥ paritrātaḥ
T02avsata_u:4592: tac chruṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:4598: tataḥ putreṇa yāvat trir api rājānaṃ vijñāpya iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:4599: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:4600: samayena pāradārika āsīt*, ayaṃ sa brāhmaṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4602: bhikṣava ūcuḥ: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena pitāputrābhyāṃ satyadarśanaṃ
T02avsata_u:4607: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ, sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ,
T02avsata_u:4608: śāntaṃ nirvāṇam iti nirvāṇe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4612: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan*
T02avsata_u:4616: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:4617: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śrāvastyāṃ sālabhañjikā nāma parva pratyupasthitam* |
T02avsata_u:4618: tatrānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatya sālapuṣpāṇy ādāya krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti
T02avsata_u:4619: yāvad anyatarā śreṣṭhidārikā sālapuṣpāṇy ādāya śrāvastīṃ praviśati |
T02avsata_u:4620: bhagavāṃś ca bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā nirgacchati |
T02avsata_u:4621: dadarśa sā dārikā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:4622: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prasādajātayā bhagavān sālapuṣpair avakīrṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4623: tataḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pratinivṛttā: bhūyo 'nyāni gṛhasyārthe āneṣyāmīti |
T02avsata_u:4625: bhagavataḥ kṛtopasthānā kālagatā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā yāvat sālapuṣpavimānālaṃkṛtā devasamitim upasaṃkrāntā ||
T02avsata_u:4626: tasmiṃś ca kāle śakro devendraḥ sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ devagaṇasya madhye buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate, dharmasya saṃghasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate |
T02avsata_u:4627: dadarśa śakro devendras tāṃ devakanyāṃ sālapuṣpavimānālaṃkṛtām
T02avsata_u:4630: gātraṃ kena vimṛṣṭakāñcananibhaṃ padmotpalābhaṃ tava gātraśrīr atulā kṛteyam iha te dehāt prabhā niḥsṛtā |
T02avsata_u:4631: vaktraṃ kena vibuddhapadmasadṛśaṃ cāmīkarābhaṃ tava brūhi tvaṃ mama devate phalam idaṃ yat karmajaṃ bhujyate ||
T02avsata_u:4634: tat karma kuśalaṃ kṛtvā rājate 'bhyadhikaṃ mama |
T02avsata_u:4638: yatra nyastaṃ tvayā bījam iṣṭaṃ svargopapattaye || AVŚ_53.3 ||
T02avsata_u:4641: yatrādhikārajanitāni varāṅganānāṃ rejur mukhāni kamalāyatalocanani || AVŚ_53.4 ||
T02avsata_u:4642: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante: kutaś cyutaḥ, kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇeti |
T02avsata_u:4644: paśyati: manuṣyebhyaś cyutā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā,
T02avsata_u:4647: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam*
T02avsata_u:4648: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:4649: atha sā devakanyā calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrī maṇiratnavicitracūḍā kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrī anekadevatāśatasahasraparivṛtā tenaiva sālapuṣpavimānena saha bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntā bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:4650: atha bhagavāṃs tasyā devatāyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān, yāṃ śrutvā tayā
T02avsata_u:4651: devakanyayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:4653: udānayati: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na devatābhir na rājñā neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:4658: tavānubhāvāt pihitaḥ sughoro hy apāyamārgo bahudoṣayuktaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4659: apāvṛtā svargagatiḥ supuṇyā nirvāṇamārgaś ca mayopalabdhaḥ || AVŚ_53.5 ||
T02avsata_u:4660: tvadāśrayāc cāptam apetadoṣaṃ mayādya śuddhaṃ suviśuddhacakṣuḥ |
T02avsata_u:4662: prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padam āryakāntaṃ tīrṇā ca duḥkhārṇavapāram asmi || AVŚ_53.6 ||
T02avsata_u:4664: bhavasahasrasudurlabhadarśana saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* || AVŚ_53.7 || iti avanamya tataḥ pralambahārā caraṇau dvāv abhivandya jātaharṣā |
T02avsata_u:4665: parigamya ca dakṣiṇaṃ jitāriṃ suralokābhimukhī divaṃ jagāma || AVŚ_53.8 ||
T02avsata_u:4666: athāsau devakanyā vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ, sasyasaṃpanna iva karṣakaḥ
T02avsata_u:4667: śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ, sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatā tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gatā ||
T02avsata_u:4670: tair dṛṣṭo bhagavato 'ntike udāro 'vabhāsaḥ, yaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃdigdhā
T02avsata_u:4671: bhagavantaṃ paprachuḥ: kiṃ bhadanta imāṃ rātriṃ brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān
T02avsata_u:4672: āha: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ
T02avsata_u:4673: api tu dṛṣṭā yuṣmābhiḥ sā dārikā, yayā aham antarmārgo sālapuṣpair avakīrṇaḥ? evaṃ bhadanta
T02avsata_u:4674: saiṣā mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagatā praṇīteṣū deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā |
T02avsata_u:4676: tasyā mayā dharmo deśitaḥ, dṛṣṭasatyā ca svabhavanaṃ gatā |
T02avsata_u:4677: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4678: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4681: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:4684: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:4685: rājagṛhe nagare rājā bimbisāro rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam ekaputram iva rājyaṃ pālayati |
T02avsata_u:4686: yadā rājñā bimbisāreṇa bhagavataḥ sakāśāt satyāni
T02avsata_u:4687: dṛṣṭāni, tadā rātriṃ bhagavantam upasaṃkrāmati sārdham antaḥpureṇa |
T02avsata_u:4688: atha rājā bimbisāro 'pareṇa samayena saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvañjīvakanirghoṣite vanaṣaṇḍe devyā sahāntaḥpuraparivṛta udyānabhūmiṃ nirgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:4689: tatra cāntaḥpurikābhī rājā vijñaptaḥ: deva vayaṃ na śaknumo 'hanyahani bhagavantam
T02avsata_u:4691: tat sādhu devo 'sminn antaḥpure tathāgatasya keśanakhastūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed* yatra vayam asakṛtpuṣpair gandhair mālyair vilepanaiś chatrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ pūjāṃ kuryāmeti yāvad rājñā bimbisāreṇa bhagavān vijñaptaḥ: dīyatām asmabhyaṃ keśanakhaṃ yena vayaṃ tathāgatastūpam antaḥpuramadhye pratiṣṭhāpayāma iti |
T02avsata_u:4693: rājñā bimbisāreṇa mahatā satkāreṇāntaḥpurasahāyena tathāgatasya keśanakhastūpo 'ntaḥpuramadhye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4695: yadā punā rājñā ajātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ, svayaṃ ca rājyaṃ pratipannaḥ, tadā bhagavacchāsane sarvedeyadharmāḥ samucchinnāḥ |
T02avsata_u:4697: kriyākāraś ca kārito na kenacit tathāgatastūpe kārāḥ kartavyā iti |
T02avsata_u:4698: yadā pañcadaśyāṃ pravāraṇā saṃvṛttā, tadā tatra keśanakhastūpe na kaścit saṃmārjanaṃ dīpadhūpapuṣpadānaṃ vā kurute |
T02avsata_u:4700: keśanakhastūpaṃ tathāvidhaṃ rājānaṃ ca bimbisāram anusmṛtya karuṇakaruṇaṃ roditum ārabdhāḥ: hā kaṣṭaṃ dharmarājaviyogād vayaṃ puṇyāt prahīṇā iti |
T02avsata_u:4702: sā svakaṃ jīvitam agaṇayitvā buddhaguṇāṃś cānusmṛtya keśanakhastūpaṃ saṃmṛjya dīpamālām akārṣīt*
T02avsata_u:4703: yāvad ajātaśatrur upariprasādatalagataḥ tam udāram avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā papraccha kim idam iti
T02avsata_u:4704: yāvad anyayā kathitam*: śrīmatyā keśanakhastūpe dīpamālā kṛteti |
T02avsata_u:4705: tataḥ śrīmatīm āhūya kathayati: kim arthaṃ rājaśāsanam
T02avsata_u:4707: sā kathayati: yady api mayā tava śāsanam atikrāntam*, kiṃ tu dharmarājasya mayā bimbisārasya śāsanaṃ nātikrāntam iti |
T02avsata_u:4708: tatas tena kupitena cakraṃ kṣiptvā jīvitād vyavaropitā |
T02avsata_u:4709: sā bhagavati prasannacittā kālagatā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā ||
T02avsata_u:4711: atha śrīmatī devakanyā samantayojanaṃ divyaprabhāmaṇḍalāvabhāsitā devasamitim upasaṃkrāntā
T02avsata_u:4712: tataḥ śakro devendras tam udāram avabhāsaṃ divyāṃ ca prabhāṃ samantayojanaṃ dṛṣṭvā papraccha:
T02avsata_u:4713: gātraṃ kena vimṛṣṭakāñcananibhaṃ padmotpalābhaṃ tava gātraśrīr atulā kṛteyam iha te dehāt prabhā niḥsṛtā |
T02avsata_u:4714: vaktraṃ kena vibuddhapadmasadṛśaṃ cāmīkarābhaṃ tava brūhi tvaṃ mama devate phalam idaṃ yat karmajaṃ bhujyate ||
T02avsata_u:4716: trailokyanāthaṃ jagataḥ pradīpaṃ nirīkṣya buddhaṃ varalakṣaṇāḍhyam* |
T02avsata_u:4717: cakāra dīpaṃ vadatāṃ varasya tamonudaṃ kleśatamonudasya || AVŚ_54.2
T02avsata_u:4718: dṛṣṭvā prabhāṃ candramarīcivarṇāṃ cakāra bhāvena munau prasādam* |
T02avsata_u:4719: prabhāṃ ca harṣāt samudīkṣya śāstuś cakre praṇāmaṃ vadatāṃ varasya ||
