T02avsata_u:4762: sā mamāntike cittaṃ prasādya kālagatā praṇīteṣū deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā |
T02avsata_u:4764: tasyā mayā dharmo deśitaḥ, dṛṣṭasatyā ca svabhavanaṃ gatā |
T02avsata_u:4765: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4766: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4769: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:4772: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:4773: yadā anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya jetavanaṃ
T02avsata_u:4774: niryātitam*, krameṇa {ca} koṭiśataṃ bhagavacchāsane dattam*, tadā tasya buddhir abhavat*: kim atrāścaryaṃ yad ahaṃ dānāni dadāmi, puṇyāni vā karomi, yanv ahaṃ daridrajanānugrahārthṃ śrāvastīnivāsino janakāyāc chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃgham upatiṣṭheyam* evaṃ me mahājanānugrahaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati, bahu cānena puṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:4775: tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā eṣa vṛttānto rājñe niveditaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4776: rājñā sarvasyāṃ śrāvastyāṃ ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ śrāvastīnivāsinaḥ paurāḥ
T02avsata_u:4777: adya saptame divase anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir hastiskandhābhirūḍhas tathāgatasya saśrāvakasaṃghasyārthāya cchandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kartukāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4778: yasya vo yan mātraṃ parityaktaṃ tad anupradātavyam iti |
T02avsata_u:4779: yāvat saptame divase anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir hastiskandhādhirūḍhas tathāgatasya saśrāvakasaṃghasyārthāya chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttam* |
T02avsata_u:4780: tatra yeṣāṃ yan mātro vibhavas te tan mātraṃ dātuṃ pravṛttāḥ |
T02avsata_u:4784: kecid aṅgulimudrām*, kecin muktāhāram*, kecid dhiraṇyam*, kecit suvarṇam*,
T02avsata_u:4788: tayā tribhir māsaiḥ kṛcchreṇa paṭaka upārjitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4789: sā taṃ paṭakaṃ prāvṛtya vīthīm avatīrṇā |
T02avsata_u:4790: anāthapiṇḍadaś ca tayā dūrata evāgacchan*, śaṅkhapaṭahair vādyamānair avalokitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4791: tayānyatama upāsakaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ: yadi tāvad ayaṃ gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoho 'ntarbhūmau nigūḍhāny api nidhānāni paśyati, kasmād ayaṃ parakulebhyo bhaikṣyam aṭatīti |
T02avsata_u:4793: ye 'samamarthā bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayitum*, teṣām arthe 'nugrahaṃ karoti |
T02avsata_u:4794: kathaṃ bahavaḥ sametā bhagavantaṃ pratipādayeyur iti |
T02avsata_u:4795: tatas tayā dārikāyā buddhir utpannā: ahaṃ tāvad akṛtapuṇyā, na me śaktir
T02avsata_u:4796: asti, yad aham ekākinī bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojanena
T02avsata_u:4798: yanv aham atra kiṃcid anupradadyām iti |
T02avsata_u:4799: sā svakaṃ vibhavam avalokayantī na kiṃcit paśyati ṛte paṭakāt* |
T02avsata_u:4800: sā cintayituṃ pravṛttā: yady aham ihasthaiva paṭakaṃ pradāsyāmi, nagnā bhaviṣyāmi |
T02avsata_u:4801: yanv ahaṃ śaraṇapṛṣṭham abhiruhya paṭakaṃ kṣipeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:4802: tataḥ sā śaraṇapṛṣṭham abhiruhya svaśarīrāt paṭakam avanīya anāthapiṇḍadasyopari kṣiptavatī
T02avsata_u:4803: sā gṛhapatinā saṃlakṣitā: nūnam asyā eṣa eva vibhavo yad anayā śaraṇasaṃsthayā kṣiptam iti
T02avsata_u:4805: gacchantu bhavantaḥ, avalokayantu kenāyaṃ paṭakaḥ kṣipta iti |
T02avsata_u:4808: tayā coktam*: yo me vibhava āsīt sa me bhagavadguṇānukīrtanaṃ pratiśrutya dāridryabhayabhītayā
T02avsata_u:4811: tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā paramavismayajātenā sā dārikā vicitrair vastrair ābharaṇaiś cācchāditā |
T02avsata_u:4812: sā cālpāyuṣkā kālagatā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā |
T02avsata_u:4813: upapannamātrāyās tasyās tathāvidhāni vastrāṇi prādurbhūtāni, na kasyacid anyasya devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā ||
T02avsata_u:4814: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante: kutaś cyutaḥ, kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇeti |
T02avsata_u:4816: paśyati: manuṣyebhyaś cyutā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā,
T02avsata_u:4818: tato vastradāyikā devakanyā calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrī maṇiratnavicitracūḍā kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrī tām eva rātriṃ divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ
T02avsata_u:4820: atha bhagavān paṭakapradāyikāyā devakanyāyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān, yāṃ śrutvā paṭakapradāyikāyā devakanyāyā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* sā dṛṣṭasatyā trir udānam udānayati: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ
T02avsata_u:4824: apāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ smo devamanuṣyeṣu |
T02avsata_u:4826: tavānubhāvāt pihitaḥ sughoro hy apāyamārgo bahudoṣayuktaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4827: apāvṛtā svargagatiḥ supuṇyā nirvāṇamārgaś ca mayopalabdhaḥ || AVŚ_55.1 ||
T02avsata_u:4828: tvadāśrayāc cāptam apetadoṣaṃ mayādya śuddhaṃ suviśuddhacakṣuḥ |
T02avsata_u:4830: prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padam āryakāntaṃ tīrṇā ca duḥkhārṇavapāram asmi || AVŚ_55.2 ||
T02avsata_u:4832: bhavasahasrasudurlabhadarśana saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* || AVŚ_55.3 ||
T02avsata_u:4833: avanamya tataḥ pralambahārā caraṇau dvāv abhivandya jātaharṣā |
T02avsata_u:4834: parigamya ca dakṣiṇaṃ jitāriṃ suralokābhimukhī divaṃ jagāma || AVŚ_55.4 ||
T02avsata_u:4835: atha paṭapradāyikā devakanyā vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ, sasyasaṃpanna iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ, sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā
T02avsata_u:4836: vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatā tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gatā ||
T02avsata_u:4839: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃdigdhā bhagavantaṃ paprachuḥ: kiṃ bhagavann asyāṃ rātrau bhagavantaṃ darśanāya
T02avsata_u:4840: brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān
T02avsata_u:4841: āha: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ
T02avsata_u:4842: yā daridradārikā anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateś chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇasya paṭaṃ datvā kālagatā, praṇīteṣū deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā, sā imāṃ rātriṃ matsakāśam upasaṃkrāntā |
T02avsata_u:4844: sā prasādajātā prakrāntā, dṛṣṭasatyā ca svabhavanaṃ gatā
T02avsata_u:4845: | tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam: yad buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu kārān
T02avsata_u:4849: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:4852: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:4853: rājagṛhe nagare rājā bimbisāro rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* |
T02avsata_u:4855: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya
T02avsata_u:4858: yāvad asau bhagavaddarśanotkaṇṭhitaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4859: tato 'mātyar uktaḥ: kimarthaṃ deva śokaḥ kriyata iti |
T02avsata_u:4862: | aśrauṣīd bhagavān divāvihāropagato divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa rājā bimbisāra utkaṇṭhita iti |
T02avsata_u:4863: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* |
T02avsata_u:4864: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛtt{ak}ānām
T02avsata_u:4865: ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ
T02avsata_u:4867: 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ, kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca
T02avsata_u:4870: <kasyājñānatimirapaṭalaparyavanaddhanetrasya jñānāñjanaśalākayā cakṣur viśodhayāmi |> kasyānavaropitāni kuśalamulāny avaropayeyam*,
T02avsata_u:4874: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet || AVŚ_56.1 ||
T02avsata_u:4875: tato bhagavān rājño bimbisārasyānugrahārthaṃ trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvaro niṣṭḥitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaram janapadacārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4876: anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ carann anyatamaṃ vanaṣaṇḍam anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4877: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe manuṣyapralāpī śukaḥ prativasati |
T02avsata_u:4879: tatas tvaritatvaritaṃ bhagavantam uvāca: etu bhagavān, svāgataṃ bhagavate, kriyatām asmākam anugrahaḥ, ihaiva vanaṣaṇḍe ekāṃ rātriṃ prativaseti |
T02avsata_u:4880: tato bhagavāñ chukasyānugrahārthaṃ yatra vkṣe śukasyālayas tatra tṛṇasaṃstaraṃ saṃstīrya paryaṅkeṇa niṣaṇṇaḥ, anyavṛkṣeṣu mahāśrāvakāḥ, tataḥ śukaḥ kṛtsnāṃ rātrim itas tatas taṃ vanaṣaṇḍaṃ paryaṭati, mā haiva kaścid bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ viheṭhayiṣyatīti manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā yakṣo vā rākṣaso vā śvāpadaś caṇḍaśṛṅgo veti |
T02avsata_u:4881: tataḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣīṇīkṛtya kṣamayitum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4882: kṣamasva bhagavaṃs tiryagyonigato 'ham*, nāsti me vibhavo yena bhagavantam abhyarcayeyam*,
T02avsata_u:4888: tasmiṃś ca samaye rājā upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati
T02avsata_u:4894: tad arhati devo bhaktaṃ sajjīkartum iti |
T02avsata_u:4895: tato rājā tvaritatvaritaṃ prāsādād avatīryāmātyagaṇaparivṛto bhagavato 'rthena
T02avsata_u:4896: āsanakāni prajñapya chatradhvajapatākābhir vicitraiś ca gandhapuṣpadhūpair bhagavantaṃ pratyudgataḥ
T02avsata_u:4897: tato rājñā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho mahatā satkāreṇa praveśitaḥ, praṇītena cāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ
T02avsata_u:4898: atha śukasyaitad abhavat*: yad bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgha evaṃvibhūtis tat sarvaṃ māmāgamya
T02avsata_u:4899: iti viditvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto rājñaḥ purastād itaś cāmutaś ca
T02avsata_u:4903: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante: kutaś cyutaḥ, kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇeti |
T02avsata_u:4905: paśyati: tiryagbhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
T02avsata_u:4908: abhavat*: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam*
T02avsata_u:4909: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:4910: atha śukapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ
T02avsata_u:4912: atha bhagavāṃś chukapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān, yāṃ śrutvā śukapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:4913: sa dṛṣṭasatyas trir udānam udānayati: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:4918: tavānubhāvāt pihitaḥ sughoro hy apāyamārgo bahudoṣayuktaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4919: apāvṛtā svargagatiḥ supuṇyā nirvāṇamārgaś ca mayopalabdhaḥ || AVŚ_56.2 ||
T02avsata_u:4920: tvadāśrayāc cāptam apetadoṣaṃ mayādya śuddhaṃ suviśuddhacakṣuḥ |
T02avsata_u:4922: prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padam āryakāntaṃ tīrṇaś ca duḥkhārṇavapāram asmi || AVŚ_56.3 ||
T02avsata_u:4924: bhavasahasrasudurlabhadarśana saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* || AVŚ_56.4 ||
T02avsata_u:4925: avanamya tataḥ pralambahāraś caraṇau dvāv abhivandya jātaharṣaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4926: parigamya ca dakṣiṇaṃ jitāriṃ suralokābhimukho divaṃ jagāma || AVŚ_56.5 ||
T02avsata_u:4928: atha śukapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ, sasyasaṃpanna iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ, sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā
T02avsata_u:4929: vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ ||
T02avsata_u:4932: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃdigdhā bhagavantaṃ paprachuḥ: kiṃ bhagavann asyāṃ rātrau bhagavantaṃ darśanāya
T02avsata_u:4933: brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān
T02avsata_u:4934: āha: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ
T02avsata_u:4935: api tu dṛṣṭaḥ sa yuṣmābhiḥ śuko yena vayaṃ tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe rātriṃ vastum upanimintritā iti? bhikṣava ūcuḥ: evaṃ bhadanteti |
T02avsata_u:4936: bhagavān āha: sa eṣa bhikṣavaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā, praṇīteṣū deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapanna iti
T02avsata_u:4938: devaputreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena śukeṣūpapannaḥ, kāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yena
T02avsata_u:4941: śukapūrvakeṇaiva bhikṣavo devaputreṇa pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:4944: 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:4945: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:4946: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api |
T02avsata_u:4947: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_56.6 ||
T02avsata_u:4948: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02avsata_u:4950: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati sma |
T02avsata_u:4954: yan mayāntike cittaṃ prasāditam*, tena deveṣūpapannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4955: yat tena pariṣiṣṭāni śikṣāpadāni rakṣitāni, tena satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:4956: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo
T02avsata_u:4958: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4961: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:4965: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛhe varṣā upagato veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:4966: atha anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir yena rājā prasenajit kauśalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4967: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā vijñāpayati:
T02avsata_u:4968: yat khalu deva jānīyāś ciradṛṣṭo 'smābhir bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:4971: tato rājā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim uvāca: kaccit te gṛhapate śrutaṃ kutra bhagavān
T02avsata_u:4972: etarhi varṣā upagata iti? anāthapiṇḍada uvāca: śrutaṃ me deva bhagavān rājagṛhe varṣā upagata iti ||
T02avsata_u:4973: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena anāthapiṇḍadādyaiś ca paurajānapadāmātyair anyatamaḥ puruṣo dūtyenāhūyoktaḥ: ehi tvaṃ bho
T02avsata_u:4975: upasaṃkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva, alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛccha alpātaṅkaṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca
T02avsata_u:4977: evaṃ ca vada: rājā bhadanta kauśalaḥ
T02avsata_u:4978: śrāvastīnivāsinaś ca paurā ākāṅkṣanti bhagavato darśanam* |
T02avsata_u:4983: sādhu bhagavāñ chrāvastīm āgacched anukampām upādāyeti |
T02avsata_u:4984: evaṃ deveti sa puruṣo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya sāmātyapaurajānapadasya pratiśrutya śrāvastīto 'nupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇo rājagṛhaṃ nagaram anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4985: tataḥ pūrvaṃ rājagṛhaṃ nagaram avalokya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4986: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:4987: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ sa puruṣo bhagavantam idam avocat*: rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśalaḥ śrāvastīnivāsinaś ca paurā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā alpābādhatāṃ pṛcchanti, alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca
T02avsata_u:4992: sādhu bhagavāñ chrāvastīm āgacched anukampām upādāyeti |
T02avsata_u:4994: sacen me bhoḥ puruṣa rājā bimbisāro 'nujñāsyati; gamiṣyāmīti |
T02avsata_u:4995: tataḥ sa dūto rājānaṃ bimbisāram anujñāpya bhagavantam idam avocat*: anujñāto 'si
T02avsata_u:4996: bhagavan rājñā bimbisāreṇa gamanāya, yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti |
T02avsata_u:4998: atha bhagavāṃs trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ mahatā parivāreṇa śrāvastyabhimukho
T02avsata_u:5001: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ padbhyāṃ saṃprasthitam* |
T02avsata_u:5002: tato rathād avatīrya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat*: pratigṛhyatāṃ bhagavann asmākīno ratho 'nukampām upādāyeti ||
T02avsata_u:5006: vicarāmi mahīṃ kṛtsnām akṣataḥ kleśakaṇṭhakaiḥ || AVŚ_57.1 || iti ||
T02avsata_u:5007: dūtaḥ prāha: yady api bhagavān ṛddhipādayānayāyī; tathāpi tu kriyatāṃ
T02avsata_u:5009: atha bhagavān dūtasyānugrahārtham ṛddhyā rathasyopari sthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5012: atha rājā sāmātyaḥ sapaurajānapado bhagavantaṃ pratyudgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:5013: tatraiva ca jetavane rātriṃvāsam upagato dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:5014: sa ca dūto 'lpāyuṣko dharmaṃ śrutvā tasyām eva rātrau kālagataḥ |
T02avsata_u:5015: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:5016: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante: kutaś cyutaḥ, kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇeti |
T02avsata_u:5018: paśyati: manuṣyebhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
T02avsata_u:5021: abhavat*: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam*
T02avsata_u:5022: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:5023: atha dūtapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ
T02avsata_u:5025: atha bhagavān dūtapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān, yāṃ śrutvā dūtapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5026: sa dṛṣṭasatyas trir udānam udānayati: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5031: tavānubhāvāt pihitaḥ sughoro hy apāyamārgo bahudoṣayuktaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5032: apāvṛtā svargagatiḥ supuṇyā nirvāṇamārgaś ca mayopalabdhaḥ || AVŚ_57.2 ||
T02avsata_u:5033: tvadāśrayāc cāptam apetadoṣaṃ mayādya śuddhaṃ suviśuddhacakṣuḥ |
T02avsata_u:5035: prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padam āryakāntaṃ tīrṇaś ca duḥkhārṇavapāram asmi || AVŚ_57.3 ||
T02avsata_u:5037: bhavasahasrasudurlabhadarśana saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* || AVŚ_57.4 ||
T02avsata_u:5038: avanamya tataḥ pralambahāraś caraṇau dvāv abhivandya jātaharṣaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5039: parigamya ca dakṣiṇaṃ jitāriṃ suralokābhimukho divaṃ jagāma || AVŚ_57.5 ||
T02avsata_u:5041: atha dūtapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ, sasyasaṃpanna iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ, sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā hi vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ ||
T02avsata_u:5042: tato rājā prasenajid upariprāsādatalagatas tam udāram avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ bhagavantaṃ papracha: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ
T02avsata_u:5043: rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān āha: na mahārāja brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ, api tu tāvako dūtaḥ sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ praṇīteṣū deveṣu
T02avsata_u:5048: tato rājā vismayajātaḥ kathayati: aho buddho aho dharmaḥ aho saṃgho yatra nāma parīttaṃ karma kṛtvā mahān vipāka iti |
T02avsata_u:5049: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:5050: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: tisra imā bhikṣavo
T02avsata_u:5052: katamās tisraḥ? buddhe agraprajñaptir dharme saṃghe
T02avsata_u:5054: buddhe 'graprajñaptiḥ katamā? ye kecid satvā apadā vā dvipadā vā bahupadā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo va saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā
T02avsata_u:5055: naivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ, tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas teṣām agra
T02avsata_u:5058: teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyo deveṣu vā
T02avsata_u:5062: dharme 'graprajñaptiḥ katamā? ye kecid dharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā, virāgo dharmas teṣām agra ākhyātaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5065: teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyo deveṣu vā devabhūtānāṃ manuṣyeṣu
T02avsata_u:5069: 'graprajñaptiḥ katamā? ye kecit saṃghā vā gaṇā vā pūgā vā pariṣado vā,
T02avsata_u:5073: teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyo deveṣu vā devabhūtānāṃ manuṣyeṣu
T02avsata_u:5077: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:5080: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ
T02avsata_u:5082: saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carann anyatamavanaṣaṇḍam anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5083: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe mahān mahiṣīyūthaḥ prativasati,
T02avsata_u:5085: yāvat tatrānyatamo mahiṣo balavān parameṇa balena samanvāgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:5088: tato mahiṣīpālair bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho dūrata eva dṛṣṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5090: uktaḥ: bhagavan, imaṃ mārgaṃ varjaya, duṣṭamahiṣo 'tra prativasatīti |
T02avsata_u:5093: athāsau duṣṭamahiṣo bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā lāṅgūlam unnāmya yena bhagavāṃs tena pradhāvitaḥ
T02avsata_u:5094: tato bhagavatā purastāt pañca kesariṇaḥ saṭādhāriṇaḥ (Speyer: keśariṇaḥ saṭadhāriṇaḥ) siṃhā nirmitāḥ, vāme dakṣiṇe ca pārśve dvāv agniskandhau, upariṣṭān mahatyayomayī śilā |
T02avsata_u:5095: tataḥ sa mahiṣaḥ samantato mahābhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavataḥ pādau niśritya dīnavadanaś ca bhagavantaṃ prekṣyate (Speyer: prekṣate) |
T02avsata_u:5096: tato 'sya bhagavatā tanmayyā gatyās tanmayyā yonyās tribhiḥ pādair dharmo deśitaḥ: iti hi bhadramukha
T02avsata_u:5097: sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ, sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ, śāntaṃ nirvāṇam iti |
T02avsata_u:5100: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate:
T02avsata_u:5103: sādhu prasādyatāṃ cittaṃ mayi kāruṇike jine |
T02avsata_u:5104: tiryagyoniṃ virāgyeha tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyasi || AVŚ_58.2|| iti ||
T02avsata_u:5107: sa āśu kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:5108: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante: kutaś cyutaḥ, kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇeti |
T02avsata_u:5110: paśyati: tiryagbhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
T02avsata_u:5112: atha mahiṣapūrviṇo devaputrasyaitad abhavat*: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ
T02avsata_u:5114: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:5115: atha mahiṣapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ taṃ vanaṣaṇḍam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:5116: atha bhagavān mahiṣapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān, yāṃ śrutvā mahiṣapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5117: sa dṛṣṭasatyas trir udānam udānayati: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na
T02avsata_u:5119: devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5124: tavānubhāvāt pihitaḥ sughoro hy apāyamārgo bahudoṣayuktaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5125: apāvṛtā svargagatiḥ supuṇyā nirvāṇamārgaś ca mayopalabdhaḥ || AVŚ_58.3 ||
T02avsata_u:5126: tvadāśrayāc cāptam apetadoṣaṃ mayādya śuddhaṃ suviśuddhacakṣuḥ |
T02avsata_u:5128: prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padam āryakāntaṃ tīrṇaś ca duḥkhārṇavapāram asmi || AVŚ_58.4 ||
T02avsata_u:5130: bhavasahasrasudurlabhadarśana saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* || AVŚ_58.5 ||
T02avsata_u:5131: avanamya tataḥ pralambahāraś caraṇau dvāv abhivandya jātaharṣaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5132: parigamya ca dakṣiṇaṃ jitāriṃ suralokābhimukho divaṃ jagāma || AVŚ_58.6 ||
T02avsata_u:5133: atha tair mahiṣīpālaiḥ sa udāro 'vabhāso dṛṣṭaḥ, yaṃ dṛṣṭvā kutūhalajātā bhagavantaṃ paprachuḥ: ka eṣa bhagavan*, rātrau divyam avabhāsaṃ kṛtvā bhagavatsakāśam anuprāpta iti |
T02avsata_u:5134: bhagavān āha: sa eṣa bhavanto mahiṣo mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5138: tatas te mahiṣīpālāḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ: āścaryaṃ yan nāma ayaṃ tiryagyonigato bhūtvā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āsādya deveṣūpapannaḥ, satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5139: kathaṃ nāma vayaṃ manuṣyabhūtā viśeṣaṃ nādhigacchemeti? tatas te buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya bhagavato
T02avsata_u:5141: tair yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* ||
T02avsata_u:5142: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta mahiṣapūrvikeṇa devaputreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena
T02avsata_u:5143: mahiṣeṣūpapannaḥ? ebhiś ca mahiṣīpālaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yenāhartvaṃ
T02avsata_u:5144: sākṣātkṛtam*? bhagavān āha: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu
T02avsata_u:5145: karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
T02avsata_u:5148: 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:5149: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:5151: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_58.7 ||
T02avsata_u:5152: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02avsata_u:5157: tatra ca kāle bhikṣūṇāṃ viniścaye vartamāne tripiṭo bhikṣuḥ pañcaśataparivāro viniścaye 'avasthitaḥ
T02avsata_u:5161: tena kupitena kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam*: ime ca mahiṣā kiṃ prajānantīti |
T02avsata_u:5162: śiṣyair apy asyoktam: ime mahiṣīpālāḥ kiṃ prajānantīti ||
T02avsata_u:5163: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau mahiṣaḥ, ayam asau tripiṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5164: ye te śiṣyāḥ, ime te mahiṣīpālāḥ |
T02avsata_u:5167: yan mamāntike cittaṃ prasāditaṃ tena deveṣūpapannaḥ, satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5168: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava vāgduścaritaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti ye mahiṣasya mahiṣīpālāṇāṃ ca |
T02avsata_u:5169: eṣa eva guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati yas tasyaiva devaputrabhūtasya |
T02avsata_u:5173: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:5176: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:5177: tena khalu punaḥ samayena devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānām upoṣadho nāma devaputro
T02avsata_u:5179: yāvad apareṇa samayena upoṣadho nāma devaputraḥ pañcaśataparivāro yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ
T02avsata_u:5180: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:5181: atha bhagavān upoṣadhasya devaputrasya āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān, yāṃ śrutvā upoṣadhena devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5182: sa dṛṣṭasatyas trir udānam udānayati: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5187: tavānubhāvāt pihitaḥ sughoro hy apāyamārgo bahudoṣayuktaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5188: apāvṛtā svargagatiḥ supuṇyā nirvāṇamārgaś ca mayopalabdhaḥ || AVŚ_59.1 ||
T02avsata_u:5190: tvadāśrayāc cāptam apetadoṣaṃ mayādya śuddhaṃ suviśuddhacakṣuḥ |
T02avsata_u:5192: prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padam āryakāntaṃ tīrṇaś ca duḥkhārṇavapāram asmi || AVŚ_59.2 ||
T02avsata_u:5194: bhavasahasrasudurlabhadarśana saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* || AVŚ_59.3 ||
T02avsata_u:5195: avanamya tataḥ pralambahāraś caraṇau dvāv abhivandya jātaharṣaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5196: parigamya ca dakṣiṇaṃ jitāriṃ suralokābhimukho divaṃ jagāma || AVŚ_59.4 ||
T02avsata_u:5197: tato bhikṣavaḥ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktā viharanti
T02avsata_u:5199: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃvignā bhagavantaṃ paprachuḥ: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya
T02avsata_u:5200: brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān
T02avsata_u:5201: āha: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ
T02avsata_u:5202: api tu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu upoṣadho nāma devaputraḥ pañcaśataparivāro māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ
T02avsata_u:5205: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kuto bhadanta upoṣadhasya devaputrasyotpattir nāmābhinirvṛttiś ceti |
T02avsata_u:5207: icchatha yūyaṃ hikṣavaḥ śrotum? evaṃ bhadanta |
T02avsata_u:5209: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:5211: viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:5212: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:5213: yāvad apareṇa samayena kṛkī rājā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmati paryupāsanāya |
T02avsata_u:5214: yāvad dvau brāhmaṇāu ṛṣipatanaṃ gatau kenacit karaṇīyena |
T02avsata_u:5215: tābhyāṃ rājā drṣṭo mahatyā rājaṛddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena |
T02avsata_u:5218: pṛṣṭaḥ: bho buddhopāsaka, kiṃ karma kṛtvā yac cintayati yat prārthayate tad asya sarvaṃ samṛdhyatīti
T02avsata_u:5219: upāsakenoktam*: ya pariśuddham aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasati, yac cintayati yat prārthayate tad asya sarvaṃ samṛdhyatīti |
T02avsata_u:5220: tatas tau brāhmaṇau āṣāḍhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśād aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upalabhyopoṣitau
T02avsata_u:5222: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā rājñaḥ kṛkeḥ putratvam abhyupagataḥ |
T02avsata_u:5227: tasyopari divase divase saptakṛtvaḥ taptavālukā nipatati yayā so 'sthiśeṣaḥ kriyate |
T02avsata_u:5228: tasyaitad abhavat*: kasyedaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ kasyāyaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalavipāko yenāham īdṛśaṃ duḥkham anubhavāmīti |
T02avsata_u:5230: aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgataṃ me upavāsaṃ samādāya śikṣāśaithilyaṃ kṛtaṃ yenāham īdṛśaṃ mahadduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi |
T02avsata_u:5231: yena punaḥ samādāya rakṣitaṃ tena rājyaṃ pratilabdham iti |
T02avsata_u:5232: tasyaitad abhavat: yanv aham idānīm api
T02avsata_u:5235: apy eva nāma nāgayoner mokṣaḥ syād iti |
T02avsata_u:5236: tato nāgavarṇam antardhāpya brāhmaṇavarṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ
T02avsata_u:5238: vardhayitvovāca: aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatena me mahārāja upavāsena prayojanam* |
T02avsata_u:5240: atha na paryeṣase, niyataṃ devasya saptadhā mūrdhānaṃ sphālayāmi |
T02avsata_u:5242: tato rājā bhītas trastaḥ saṃvigna āhṛṣṭaromakūpo hiraṇyapiṭakaṃ dhvajāgre baddhvā sarvavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayāmāsa:
T02avsata_u:5243: yo me 'ṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsaṃ deśayiṣyati, tasyaitaṃ hiraṇyapiṭakaṃ dāsyāmi, mahatā satkāreṇa satkariṣyāmīti |
T02avsata_u:5245: tayā rājñaḥ stambho darśitaḥ: atra me stambhe pitā asakṛdgandhadhūpapuṣpārcanaṃ kṛtavān* |
T02avsata_u:5247: tato rājñā pauruṣeyāṇām ājñā dattā: ayaṃ stambha utpāṭyatām iti |
T02avsata_u:5250: saha pañca copāsakaśikṣāpadāni saptatriṃśac ca bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ |
T02avsata_u:5251: tato rājñā tasya nāgasyāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgata upavāso likhitvā dattaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5252: ṛṣipatananivāsibhiś ca dvādaśabhir ṛṣisahasraiḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ pratyakṣīkṛtāḥ
T02avsata_u:5253: sa ca nāgo 'ṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upoṣya sthalam udgamyotsṛṣṭakāyo
T02avsata_u:5255: so 'nāhāratāṃ pratipaṇṇaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā pañcaśataparivāraḥ praṇīteṣū deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ
T02avsata_u:5258: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:5261: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:5262: śrāvastyāṃ rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* |
T02avsata_u:5264: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā prasenajit kauśalo jetavanaṃ nirgato bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya |
T02avsata_u:5265: rājñā ca pañcālena rājñaḥ prasenajit kauśalasya prābhṛtaṃ pañca haṃsaśatāni preṣitāni |
T02avsata_u:5266: yadā rājā jetavanaṃ nirgatas tadā tāni pañca haṃsaśatāny upanāmitāni |
T02avsata_u:5267: tato rājñā prasenajitā teṣām abhayapradānaṃ datvā tatraiva jetavanae samutsṛṣṭāṇi |
T02avsata_u:5268: yadā bhagavān mahāśrāvakaparivṛto 'jine (Speyer: 'śana) upaniṣīdati, tadā te haṃsā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāmanti |
T02avsata_u:5269: bhagavān api tebhya ālopam anuprayacchanti mahāśrāvakāś ca |
T02avsata_u:5272: yadā bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, tadā te haṃsā
T02avsata_u:5274: te cālpāyuṣkāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:5275: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante: kutaś cyutaḥ, kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇeti |
T02avsata_u:5276: paśyanti haṃsebhyaś cyutāḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ, bhagavato
T02avsata_u:5278: atha haṃsapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitracūḍāḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrās tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ
T02avsata_u:5280: atha bhagavān haṃsapūrviṇāṃ devaputrāṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān, yāṃ śrutvā haṃsapūrvibhir devaputrair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptam* |
T02avsata_u:5282: labdhalābhāḥ, sasyasaṃpannā iva karṣakāḥ śūrā iva vijitasaṃgrāmāḥ,
T02avsata_u:5283: sarvarogaparimuktā ivāturāḥ yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatās tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:5286: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃdigdhā bhagavantaṃ paprachuḥ: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya
T02avsata_u:5287: brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān
T02avsata_u:5288: āha: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ
T02avsata_u:5289: api tu dṛṣṭās te yuṣmābhir bhikṣavas tāni pañca haṃsaśatāni rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena ihotsṛṣṭāni? evaṃ bhadanta |
T02avsata_u:5290: tāni mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagatāni, praṇīteṣu deveṣūpapannāni |
T02avsata_u:5294: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta haṃsapūrvakair devaputraiḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni yena
T02avsata_u:5295: haṃseṣūpapannāḥ, kāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yena deveṣūpapannāḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti? bhagavān āha: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat
T02avsata_u:5299: 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:5300: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:5302: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_60.1 ||
T02avsata_u:5304: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:5305: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:5309: yan mamāntike cittaṃ prasāditaṃ tena deveṣūpapannāḥ |
T02avsata_u:5310: yat pariśiṣṭāni śikṣāpadāni tena satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam iti
T02avsata_u:5311: | iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
T02avsata_u:5313: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5316: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:5320: suvarṇābhaḥ sugandhiś ca vapuṣmān balavān priyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5324: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme |
T02avsata_u:5325: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:5327: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:5328: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:5329: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:5330: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇaṃ jāmbūnadaniṣkasadṛśaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5331: suvarṇavarṇayā cānena prabhayā sarvaṃ kapilavastu nagaram avabhāsitam* |
T02avsata_u:5332: taddarśanān mātāpitarāv anye ca kutūhalābhyāgatāḥ satvāḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ |
T02avsata_u:5333: cintayanti ca: kuto 'yam īdṛśaḥ satvaviśeṣa iti |
T02avsata_u:5334: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:5335: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād anena jātena suvarṇavarṇayā prabhayā sarvaṃ kapilavastu nagaram avabhāsitam*, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya
T02avsata_u:5338: dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:5340: dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:5342: sa ca paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:5343: yāvad apareṇa samayena rūpamadamatto bahir adhiṣṭhānasya krīḍati |
T02avsata_u:5345: tatas tena suvarṇābhena dṛṣṭāḥ pṛṣṭāś ca: kva bhavanto gacchantīti |
T02avsata_u:5346: tair uktam*: nyagrodhārāmaṃ gacchāmo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ draṣṭum iti |
T02avsata_u:5347: suvarṇābhasya buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ nāma śrutvā sarvaromakūpāṇy āhṛṣṭani, paramaṃ ca kutūhalam
T02avsata_u:5349: tasyaitad abhavat*: yanv aham api buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:5351: tatas tatra dadarśa suvarṇābhakumāro buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:5355: sa bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:5357: sa taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajyābhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5359: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
T02avsata_u:5360: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ
T02avsata_u:5363: tato bhagavān gajabhujasadṛśaṃ suvarṇavarṇabāhum abhiprasārya suvarṇābhadārakam idam avocat*: ehi kumāra, cara brahmacaryam iti |
T02avsata_u:5364: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaś ca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5365: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthāv evaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena ||
T02avsata_u:5366: yāvat saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśrur dvādaśavarṣopasaṃpanneryāpathaḥ pātrakaravyagrahasto bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5368: tena yujyamānena vyāyacchamānena ghaṭamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikaraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5369: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5372: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta suvarṇābhena karmāṇi kṛtāni yenaivaṃrūpo
T02avsata_u:5373: darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ pravrajya ca acirād (Speyer: cāciraṃ) arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti |
T02avsata_u:5374: bhagavān āha: suvarṇābhenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:5376: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:5377: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:5379: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api |
T02avsata_u:5380: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_61.2 ||
T02avsata_u:5381: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:5383: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5384: tato rājñā bandhumatā bhagavataḥ śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaḥ stūpaś catūratnamayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena
T02avsata_u:5387: yāvad anyatamo gṛhapatis tasmin stūpamahe vartamāne nirgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:5388: tena tasmāt stūpāt sauvarṇavarṇa ādarśaḥ patito dṛṣṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5389: sa tenāvataṃsakaṃ kārayitvā tatra stūpe āropitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5390: gandhadhūpapuṣpārcanaṃ kṛtvā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyāmi, evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:5391: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:5392: samayena gṛhapatir āsīt*, ayaṃ sa suvarṇābhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5393: yat tena vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya stūpe kārāḥ kṛtāḥ, tenāsyaivaṃvidho rūpaviśeṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5394: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tad ihaiva janmany arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
T02avsata_u:5395: | iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
T02avsata_u:5397: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5400: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:5403: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme |
T02avsata_u:5404: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ kulaputraḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:5406: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:5407: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko atikrānto
T02avsata_u:5409: tasya mukhān nīlotpalagandho vāti sarvaśarīrāc candanagandhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5410: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:5411: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya mukān nīlotpalagandho vāti, śarīrāc candanagandhaḥ, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya sugandhir iti nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:5412: sugandhir dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:5414: dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:5416: sa pūrvahetubalādhānāc chrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5417: yadā sugandhir dārakaḥ keyūrahārakaṭakālaṃkṛto vīthīm avatarati, tadā candanagandhena sarvaṃ nagaram āpūrayati |
T02avsata_u:5418: janakāyaś ca divyaṃ gandham āghrāya paraṃ vismayam āpadyte |
T02avsata_u:5419: evaṃ cāha: aho puṇyānāṃ sāmarthyam iti |
T02avsata_u:5421: yāvad apareṇa samayena sugandhir dārako nyagrodhārāmaṃ gataḥ |
T02avsata_u:5422: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:5424: prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:5425: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā sugandhidārakeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5426: sa dṛṣṭasatyo mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5427: tena yujyamānena vyāyacchamānena ghaṭamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikaraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5428: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5431: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta sugandhinā karmāṇi kṛtāni yenāsya mukhān nīlotpalagandho vāti, sarvaśarīrāc candanagandhaś ca |
T02avsata_u:5433: sugandhinaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:5436: pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:5437: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:5439: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_62.1 ||
T02avsata_u:5440: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:5442: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5443: tato rājñā bandhumatā bhagavataḥ śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaḥ stūpaś catūratnamayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena |
T02avsata_u:5445: tatrānyatamena gṛhapatinā prasādajātena vicitrair gandhaiḥ pralepaṃ datvā dhūpapuṣpārcanaṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ
T02avsata_u:5446: kṛtam*: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyāmi |
T02avsata_u:5449: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:5450: samayena gṛhapatir āsīt*, ayaṃ sa sugandhiḥ |
T02avsata_u:5451: yad anena vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya stūpe kārāḥ kṛtās tena tena sugandhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5453: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ teneha janmany arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5454: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām
T02avsata_u:5456: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv

T02avsata_u:5471: yasmād asya divyaṃ vapuḥ, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya vapuṣmān iti nāmeti |

T02avsata_u:5476: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ sarvalokeṣu pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca |

T02avsata_u:5489: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5492: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta vapuṣmatā karmāṇi kṛtāni yenāsyaivaṃvidha āśrayo
T02avsata_u:5495: anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:5497: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:5498: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:5501: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_63.1 ||
T02avsata_u:5502: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:5504: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5505: tato 'sya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena |
T02avsata_u:5506: tatra ca rājñā bandumatā saputravargeṇa sāmātyagaṇaparivṛtena stūpamahaḥ kṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5507: yāvad anyatamasmin divase 'nyatamo daridrapuruṣaḥ stūpāṅgaṇaṃ praviṣṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5508: tatra tena puṣpāṇi mlānāni dṛṣṭāni, rajasā ca stūpāṅgaṇo
T02avsata_u:5510: tatas tena buddhaguṇān anusmṛtya prasādajātena saṃmārjanīṃ gṛhītvā stūpaḥ saṃmṛṣṭo nirmālyaṃ cāpanītam* |
T02avsata_u:5511: tato 'pagatarajaṃ stūpaṃ nirmalaṃ dṛṣṭvā prasādajātaḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: anenāhaṃ kuśalena cittotpādena caivaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyāmīty evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyam*, mā virāgayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:5513: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:5514: samayena daridraḥ puruṣa āsīt*, ayaṃ sa vapuṣmān* |
T02avsata_u:5517: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ teneha janmany arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5518: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ |
T02avsata_u:5519: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5522: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:5525: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme |
T02avsata_u:5526: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:5528: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:5529: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrāntapauruṣabalaḥ
T02avsata_u:5530: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:5531: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād ayaṃ dārako balavān, prāptaṃ syād asya balavān iti nāma |
T02avsata_u:5532: balavān dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:5533: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:5535: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ
T02avsata_u:5537: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā {c}ānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:5539: prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |

T02avsata_u:5541: viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
T02avsata_u:5542: sa dṛṣṭasatyo mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5543: tena yujyamānena vyāyacchamānena ghaṭamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ
T02avsata_u:5546: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |

T02avsata_u:5566: tatas tena gṛhapatinā buddhaguṇān anusmṛtya prasādajātena tailavyāmiśro gandhakāyo dattaḥ, praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam*: apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām* |

T02avsata_u:5653: padmākṣo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ
T02avsata_u:5655: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:5657: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmas tyāgaruciḥ pradānābhirato mahati tyāge vartate |
T02avsata_u:5658: sa yena yena gacchati, tena devamanuṣyaiḥ pūjyate 'bhyarcyate ca ||
T02avsata_u:5659: yatha padmākṣo dārako 'pareṇa samayena nyagrodhārāmaṃ gataḥ |
T02avsata_u:5660: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:5662: prasādajātaś ca bhagavatpādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:5663: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā padmākṣeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5664: sa dṛṣṭasatyo dānapradānāni datvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakaduḥkhitān saṃtarpayitvā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5665: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5666: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5670: atha sa padmākṣo bhagavataḥ sakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavantaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa: sādhu me bhagavāṃs tathā karotu yathā maṇiratnam antardhīyeta |
T02avsata_u:5671: bhagavān āha: karmajaṃ hy etat*, na śakyam antardhāpayitum* |
T02avsata_u:5672: api tu tathā kariṣyāmi yac chrāddhā drakṣyanti nāśrāddhā iti |
T02avsata_u:5674: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta padmākṣeṇa karmāṇi kṛtāny {upacitāni} yenaivaṃ mahāśakhyo 'rhatvaṃ ca prāptam iti |
T02avsata_u:5675: bhagavān āha: padmākṣeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:5679: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
T02avsata_u:5680: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva
T02avsata_u:5681: skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:5683: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_66.1 ||
T02avsata_u:5684: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:5686: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvendhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe
T02avsata_u:5687: parinirvṛtaḥ, tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā
T02avsata_u:5689: tatra anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kārān kṛtvā svargamokṣaparāyaṇāni bhavanti |
T02avsata_u:5692: tena vipaśyinaḥ stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāgataguṇān anusmṛtya tan maṇiratnaṃ vipaśyinaḥ stūpavarṣasthālyām upari nibaddham* |
T02avsata_u:5694: padmaiś ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: aham apy evaṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*, evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:5695: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:5696: samayena sārthavāha āsīt*, ayaṃ sa padmākṣaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5697: yat tena vipaśyinaḥ stūpe maṇiratnam āropitaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenāsya maṇiratnaṃ śirasi prādurbhūtam* |
T02avsata_u:5698: yan nīlapadmaiḥ pūjā kṛtā tenābhinīlapadmanetraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ
T02avsata_u:5699: | yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā teneha janmany arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5700: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām
T02avsata_u:5702: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv
T02avsata_u:5706: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:5709: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme |
T02avsata_u:5710: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:5715: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo
T02avsata_u:5718: tasya jatau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:5720: ūcuḥ: yasmād ayaṃ dārako dundubhisvaraḥ, tasmād asya bhavatu dundubhisvara iti nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:5722: aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:5723: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś
T02avsata_u:5726: | sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalas tyāgaruciḥ pradānarucir mahati tyāge vartate |
T02avsata_u:5727: yāvad apareṇa samayena dundubhisvaro dārako nyagrodhārāmaṃ gataḥ |
T02avsata_u:5728: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:5730: prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:5731: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā dundubhisvareṇa dārakeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5732: sa dṛṣṭasatyo dānapradānāni datvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇavanīpakān duḥkhitān saṃtarpayitvā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5733: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:5734: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5737: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta dundubhisvareṇa karmāṇi kṛtāny yenābhirūpo
T02avsata_u:5740: dundubhisvareṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:5743: pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:5744: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:5746: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_67.1 ||
T02avsata_u:5748: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:5750: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvendhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe
T02avsata_u:5751: parinirvṛtaḥ, tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā
T02avsata_u:5752: samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena |
T02avsata_u:5753: tatrānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kārān kṛtvā svargamokṣaparāyaṇāni bhavanti
T02avsata_u:5754: | yāvad anyatareṇa gṛhapatinā vicitrāṇi vādyabhāṇḍāni puruṣāś ca śikṣayitvā tatra stūpe niryātitāḥ, ye tatra stūpe ahanyahani vādyaviśeṣaiḥ satkāraṃ kurvanti ||
T02avsata_u:5755: {bhagavān āha:} kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:5756: samayena gṛhapatir āsīt*, ayaṃ sa dundubhisvaraḥ |
T02avsata_u:5757: yat tena vipaśyinaḥ stūpe vādyabhāṇḍāni niryātitāni, tenedānīṃ dundubhisvaraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5759: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānāṃ karmanām ekāntaśuklaḥ,
T02avsata_u:5761: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5764: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:5767: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme |
T02avsata_u:5768: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:5770: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:5771: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:5772: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:5773: mahatī mahatī māṃsapeśī jātā, yāṃ dṛṣṭvā mātāpitarau viṣaṇṇau, anye ca gṛhavāsinaḥ paricārakā jñātayaś ca:
T02avsata_u:5775: yāvad asau gṛhapatiḥ śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ: kasya nivedayeyam*, ko jñāsyati kim etad iti |
T02avsata_u:5776: tasya buddhir utpannā: ayaṃ buddho bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī |
T02avsata_u:5781: āha: mā bhaiṣīs tvaṃ gṛhapate, mā bhaiṣīḥ |
T02avsata_u:5784: māṃsapeśīṃ sthāpayitvā trir divasasya pāṇināpamṛjya kṣīreṇa punaḥ pariprokṣasva yāvat saptāham*
T02avsata_u:5787: iti śrutvā gṛhapatiḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:5788: cintayati ca: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me īdṛśāḥ putrā utpatsyantīti |
T02avsata_u:5790: yāvat saptame divase sā māṃsapeśī sphuṭitā |
T02avsata_u:5792: sarve abhirūpā darśanīyāḥ prāsādikāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā mahānagnabalinaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:5793: yāvat krameṇa unnītā vardhitā mahāntaḥ saṃvṛttāś ca |
T02avsata_u:5794: sarve yauvanamadamattā itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramanto nyagrodhārāmaṃ gatāḥ |
T02avsata_u:5795: atha te dadṛśur buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:5796: | sahadarśanāc bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇā
T02avsata_u:5798: teṣāṃ bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā sarvair
T02avsata_u:5799: evaṃ viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
T02avsata_u:5800: te dṛṣṭasatyā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:5801: taiḥ sarvair yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
T02avsata_u:5802: arhanto babhūvas traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhāḥ |
T02avsata_u:5803: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyāś ca saṃvṛttāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:5804: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta kumāraśatena karmāṇi kṛtāny yena
T02avsata_u:5805: mahānagnabalinaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ, sahitāś ca bhrātara iti |
T02avsata_u:5806: bhagavān āha: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni
T02avsata_u:5810: pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye

T02avsata_u:5816: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe
T02avsata_u:5817: parinirvṛtaḥ, tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā
T02avsata_u:5818: samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena,

T02avsata_u:5993: sā aṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:5995: sā dārikā śrāddhā bhadrā kalyāṇāśayā ātmahitaparahitapratipannā |
T02avsata_u:5996: tasyā ye ye yācanakā āgacchanti, tebhyas tebhyaḥ kaṇṭhād alaṃkāram avamucya prayacchati |
T02avsata_u:5998: yāvad asau dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā, tadā tasyā bahavo yācanakā
T02avsata_u:6000: tair upadrūyamāṇaḥ pitā cāsyāḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ: yady ekasmai dāsyāmi, anye me amitrā bhaviṣyantīti |
T02avsata_u:6001: yāvad asau dārikā pitaraṃ cintāparam avekṣyovāca: tāta kim asi cintāpara iti |
T02avsata_u:6004: dārikā kathayati: tāta na te śokaḥ kartavyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6005: svayam evāhaṃ saptame divase svayaṃvaram avatariṣyāmīti |
T02avsata_u:6006: tataḥ śreṣṭhī rājñaḥ prasenajito nivedya śrāvastyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayāmāsa: saptame divase suprabhā dārikā svayaṃvaram avatariṣyati, yena vo yat karaṇīyaṃ sa tat karotv iti ||
T02avsata_u:6008: tataḥ saptame divase suprabhā dārikā rathābhirūḍhā kāṣāyaṃ dhvajam ucchrāpya buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ citrapaṭe lekhayitvā abhiṣṭuvatī vīthīm avatīrṇā |
T02avsata_u:6009: sā tatra rājaputrair amātyaputraiḥ śreṣṭhiputraiś ca
T02avsata_u:6010: sotkaṇṭhK‍h̲dvīkṣyamāṇā vicitrābhiḥ kathābhiḥ saṃjñapyovāca: sarvathāhaṃ na kenacid aṃśena bhavatāṃ paribhavaṃ karomi |
T02avsata_u:6015: suprabhāpi dārikā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:6016: tasyā bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā suprabhayā dārikayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*, abhinirhāraś ca kṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6017: atha suprabhā dārikā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvam* |
T02avsata_u:6019: tato bhagavān saṃlakṣayati: anayā asmāc chāsane (Speyer: asmacchāsane)
T02avsata_u:6021: tato bhagavatoktā: gaccha dārike parṣadam avalokayeti |
T02avsata_u:6022: tataḥ suprabhā dārikā jetavanān nirgatya tatrāgatā
T02avsata_u:6025: tataḥ suprabhā dārikā tair upakramyamāṇā vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi darśayitum ārabdhā |
T02avsata_u:6027: tatas te tad atyadbhūtaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā uddaṇḍaromāṇo mūlanikṛtta iva drumāḥ pādayor nipatya vijñāpayitum ārabdhāḥ: avatara avatara bhagini,
T02avsata_u:6029: asthānam etad yat tvaṃ kāmān paribhuñjīthā iti |
T02avsata_u:6031: gagaṇatalād) avatīrya janakāyasya purastāt sthitvā tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavatī, yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6034: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6035: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā |
T02avsata_u:6036: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyābhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā ||
T02avsata_u:6037: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta suprabhayā dārikayā karmāṇi kṛtāny, yenābhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā, maṇiratnaṃ ca kaṇṭhe prādurbhūtam*, pravrajya cārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti |
T02avsata_u:6044: kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau,
T02avsata_u:6045: na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:6048: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_71.1 ||
T02avsata_u:6049: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:6051: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvendhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe
T02avsata_u:6052: parinirvṛtaḥ, tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā
T02avsata_u:6053: samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena |
T02avsata_u:6054: yā bandhumato rājño 'gramahiṣī vṛddhībhūtā, tayā vicitrāṇy ābharaṇāni śarīrād avamucya tatra stūpe dattāni |
T02avsata_u:6056: anena kuśalamūlema cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena cārhatvaṃ prāpnuyām iti ||
T02avsata_u:6057: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yā sā tena kālena tena samayena
T02avsata_u:6058: rājño bandhumato agramahiṣī āsīt*, iyaṃ sā suprabhā |
T02avsata_u:6059: yad anayā vipaśyinaḥ stūpe vicitrāṇy ābharaṇāni samāropitāni, tenābhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā
T02avsata_u:6061: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*, tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6062: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ |
T02avsata_u:6063: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6066: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:6069: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:6070: tena khalu samayena anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6071: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:6072: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā śrāvastyadhivāsino janakāyasyātīva priyā |
T02avsata_u:6073: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārikāyā nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:6074: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād iyaṃ priyā sarvajanasya, tasmād bhavatu dārikāyāḥ supriyeti nāmeti
T02avsata_u:6077: dattaṃ hi dānaṃ bahu vālpakaṃ vā vistīryate kṣetraviśeṣayogāt* |
T02avsata_u:6080: āthāsyā mātāpitarāv anye ca gṛhavāsinas taṃ vākyavyāhāraṃ śrutvā bhītās trastāḥ saṃvignā ākṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ (Speyer: āhṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ)
T02avsata_u:6082: sā kathayati: amba nāhaṃ piśācī nāpi
T02avsata_u:6085: tato 'syā mātrā anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveditam*: evam eṣā dārikā brūta iti |
T02avsata_u:6086: tatas tena gṛhapatinā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditena bhagavān antargṛhe sabhikṣusaṃgho
T02avsata_u:6087: bhojitaḥ, tasyāś ca nāmnā dakṣiṇādeśanaṃ kāritam* ||
T02avsata_u:6088: yāvad asau dārikā krameṇa saptavarṣā saṃvṛttā, mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitā
T02avsata_u:6089: sā sarvāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām iṣṭā kāntā priyā manāpā |
T02avsata_u:6090: yāvat tatra kālena mahādurbhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ durbhikṣāntarakalpasadṛśam*, yatrānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi annapānaviyogāt kālaṃ kurvanti |
T02avsata_u:6091: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma: gaccha ānanda, madvacanāt supriyāṃ vada: catasras te parṣadas traimāsyaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ pratipādayitavyā iti |
T02avsata_u:6092: tata āyuṣmān ānandaḥ supriyāṃ gatvovāca: bhagavān
T02avsata_u:6093: āha: catasras te pariṣadas traimāsyaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ pratipādayitavyā iti |
T02avsata_u:6094: tataḥ supriyā kṛtakarapuṭā bhagavata ājñāṃ śirasi kṛtvā kathayati: evam astv iti ||
T02avsata_u:6097: sa tvaritaṃ supriyāyā agrato bhūtaḥ kathayati: supriye kva gacchasīti |
T02avsata_u:6100: anāthapiṇḍada uvāca: alpotsukā bhava, ahaṃ tvāṃ sarveṇa pravārayāmīti |
T02avsata_u:6101: supriyā kathayati: kim atrāścaryaṃ yadi tāto dṛṣṭasatyaḥ pravārayati samantato 'ntarhitāni nidhānāny abhisamīkṣya |
T02avsata_u:6105: ṛṣidattapurāṇābhyāṃ sthapatibhyāṃ, viśākhayā mṛgāramātrā, rājñā prasenajitā |
T02avsata_u:6107: tayā evaṃ pravāryamāṇayā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghas traimāsyam upasthitaś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ
T02avsata_u:6108: tatraiva ca traimāsye yujyamānaghaṭamānavyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6109: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā |
T02avsata_u:6110: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyābhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā ||
T02avsata_u:6112: atha bhagavāṃs traimāsyātyayāt kṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ śrāvastyā rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ sārdhaṃ śrāvakasaṃghena |
T02avsata_u:6113: tataḥ supriyayā bhagavān antarmārge alpotsukaḥ kṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6114: yāvad asau {alpo}dikām aṭavīm anuprāptaḥ, gaṇḍīdeśakālo jātaḥ, pathyadanaṃ ca nāsti |
T02avsata_u:6117: pratiṣṭhāpyovāca, pravyāhṛtavatī: yadi puṇyānām asti vipākaḥ, pātram evaṃvidhabhakṣyabhojyādinā paripūryeteti |
T02avsata_u:6120: tataḥ supriyayā anuparipāṭikayā sarvasya bhikṣusaṃghasya pātrāṇi pūritāni |
T02avsata_u:6121: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: eṣā agrā me
T02avsata_u:6122: bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ kṛtapuṇyānāṃ yaduta supriyā bhikṣuṇī ||
T02avsata_u:6123: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta supriyayā dārikayā karmāṇi kṛtāny, yenāḍhye kule jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā abhimatā sarvajanasya, pravrajya cārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti |
T02avsata_u:6125: anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:6127: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:6128: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:6131: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_72.2 ||
T02avsata_u:6132: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02avsata_u:6134: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:6135: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ purvāhṇe nivāsya pātracivaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vārāṇasīṃ nagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* |
T02avsata_u:6136: yāvad anyataraḥ śreṣṭhī saparijana udyānaṃ gataḥ, prabhūtaṃ ca khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ nītam*
T02avsata_u:6137: yāvat tasya preṣyadārikayā <Acording to Kalpadrumāvadāna it is: peśām ādāya paiṣṭikīm.>
T02avsata_u:6139: tasyāḥ prasādajātāyā buddhir utpannā: kiṃ māṃ svāmī dvir api dāsīkariṣyati, yanv ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhojayeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:6140: tatas tayā bandhanatāḍanam agaṇayitvā bhaktapeḍām uddhāṭya bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho vicitreṇāhāreṇa
T02avsata_u:6142: yāvac chreṣṭhinā uktā: dārike kva sā bhaktapeḍeti |
T02avsata_u:6143: sā kathayati: bhagavān me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6147: tatas tena hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditenoktā: gaccha dārike, adyāgreṇa tvam adāsī bhava, yā tvaṃ mama suptasya jāgarṣīti |
T02avsata_u:6152: bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya pravacane daśavarṣasahasrāṇi vaiyāvṛtyaṃ kṛtam*,
T02avsata_u:6154: nimittikair) dīpamālābhiḥ kaṭhinacīvarair dānapradānāni datvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: yan mayā bhagavate kāśyapāya kṛcchreṇa samudānīya dānapradānāni
T02avsata_u:6155: dattāni, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ pravrajyāhartvaṃ prāpnuyām iti ||
T02avsata_u:6156: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau preṣyadārikā, iyam asau supriyā |
T02avsata_u:6157: yad anayā bhagavān kāsyapaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ, tena āḍhye kule jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā abhimatā sarvajanasya |
T02avsata_u:6158: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6159: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ,
T02avsata_u:6161: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6164: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:6167: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme |
T02avsata_u:6168: śākyeṣu rohiṇo nāma śākyaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:6170: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
