T02avsata_u:6171: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ na putro na duhitā |
T02avsata_u:6172: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ: anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛham*, na me putro
T02avsata_u:6174: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:6176: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberavāsavādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate |
T02avsata_u:6177: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ |
T02avsata_u:6178: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate sma |
T02avsata_u:6179: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti |
T02avsata_u:6181: yady evam abhaviṣyat*, ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat
T02avsata_u:6183: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca |
T02avsata_u:6187: raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau, mātā ca kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī, gandharvaś ca pratyupasthito bhavati |
T02avsata_u:6188: eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca ||
T02avsata_u:6190: anyatamā ca dārikā anyatamasmāt devanikāyāc cyutvā tasya prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntā |
T02avsata_u:6192: tataḥ svāminocyate: bhadre yadi putraṃ janiṣyasīty evaṃ kuśalam*, atha duhitaram*, tayaiva saha tvāṃ niṣkāsayāmīti |
T02avsata_u:6193: yāvad asāv aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:6194: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā atikrāntā mānuṣyāṃ varṇam asaṃprāptā ca divyaṃ varṇam*, śuklair vastraiḥ prāvṛtā anupaliptaiva garbhamalena |
T02avsata_u:6195: yāvad rohiṇena śrutaṃ prajāptī te prasūtā dārikā jāteti, sa kupitaḥ praviṣṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6197: tato rohiṇaḥ śākyo dārikāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6198: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārikāyā nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:6200: yasmād iyaṃ śuklavastraparivṛtā jātā, tasmād bhavatu dārikāyāḥ śukleti nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:6201: śuklā dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattā dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ
T02avsata_u:6203: sā aṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:6205: yathā yathā ca śuklā dārikā vardhate, tathā tathā tāny api vastrāṇi vardhante na ca malinībhavanti, na cāsyāḥ kāyo malenābhibhūyate ||
T02avsata_u:6206: yadā śuklā dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā, tadāsyā bahavo yācanakā
T02avsata_u:6208: tatas tair upadrūyamāṇaḥ pitā cāsyāḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ: yady ekasmai
T02avsata_u:6210: yāvad asau dārikā pitaraṃ cintāparam avekṣyovāca: tāta kim asi cintāpara iti |
T02avsata_u:6212: dārikā kathayati: tāta na te śokaḥ kartavyaḥ, nāhaṃ
T02avsata_u:6213: kāmenārthinī, bhagavacchāsane pravrajiṣyāmi, anujānīhi māṃ tāteti |
T02avsata_u:6214: yāvad asau mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitā |
T02avsata_u:6215: yenaiva vastreṇa prāvṛtā jātā, tata eva paripūrṇaṃ pañcacīvaraṃ saṃpannam* |
T02avsata_u:6216: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6217: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā |
T02avsata_u:6218: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyābhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā ||
T02avsata_u:6219: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta śuklayā dārikayā karmāṇi kṛtāny, yenāḍhye kule jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā, śuklavastraprāvṛttā pravrajya cārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti |
T02avsata_u:6221: anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:6225: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na
T02avsata_u:6226: tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:6228: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_73.1 ||
T02avsata_u:6229: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02avsata_u:6231: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:6232: yāvad anyatarā śreṣṭhibhāryā śrāddhā bhadrā kalyāṇāśayā kenacid eva karaṇīyena ṛṣipatanaṃ gatā |
T02avsata_u:6233: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:6234: | sahadarśanāc ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:6236: tayā labdhaprasādayā bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃgham antargṛhe bhojayitvā bhikṣusaṃghāya kaṭhinacīvaram anupradattam*, krameṇa ca mātāpitarāv
T02avsata_u:6238: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau śreṣṭhibhāryā, eṣaivāsau śuklā bhikṣuṇī
T02avsata_u:6239: | yad anayā bhikṣusaṃghāya kaṭhinacīvaram anupradattaṃ tena
T02avsata_u:6241: yad brahmacaryavāsaḥ paripālitas teneha janmany arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6242: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ |
T02avsata_u:6243: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6246: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:6249: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:6250: śrāvastyām anyatamo brāhmaṇa āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāragataḥ sanighaṇṭakaiṭabhānāṃ sākṣaraprabhedānām itihāsapañcamānāṃ padaśo vyākaraṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6251: sa pañca māṇavakaśatāni brāhmaṇakān mantrān pāṭhayati |
T02avsata_u:6255: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:6256: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6257: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:6258: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā |
T02avsata_u:6259: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārikāyā nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:6263: somā dārikā unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:6265: yadā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā, sā paṇḍitā vyaktā medhāvinī paṭupracārā smṛtimatī śrutidharā ca |
T02avsata_u:6266: yāvad asyāḥ pitā māṇavakān mantrān pāṭhayati, sā śrutamātreṇodgṛhṇāti |
T02avsata_u:6267: śrutvā ca teṣāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ pūrvāpareṇa vyākhyānaṃ karoti |
T02avsata_u:6268: tato 'syā yaśasā sarvā śrāvastī sphuṭā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6269: tīrthyāś cāsyā ahanyahani darśanāyopasaṃkrāmanti, tayā ca saha viniścayaṃ kurvanti |
T02avsata_u:6270: yadā bhagavān anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ tadā śrāvastīm āgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:6271: prāyeṇa ye paṇḍitāḥ paṇḍitasaṃkhyātāḥ, te bhagavato darśanāyopasaṃkrāmanti
T02avsata_u:6272: | tataḥ sā tān na paśyantī antarjanam āmantrayate: ko 'tra bhavanto hetur yenaitarhi śāstravido nopasaṃkrāmantīti |
T02avsata_u:6273: te kathayanti: bhagavān sarvajñaḥ śākyamunir nāmeha saṃprāptaḥ, sarve tatpravaṇāḥ saṃvṛttā iti |
T02avsata_u:6274: tato buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvāsyāḥ sarvaromakūpā hṛṣṭāḥ (Speyer: sarvaromakūpāhṛṣṭāḥ tatra somā dārikā buddhaśabdaśravaṇād bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntā |
T02avsata_u:6275: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:6276: sahadarśanāc ca bhagavatpādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:6277: atha bhagavān somāyā dārikāyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān*, yāṃ śrutvā somayā
T02avsata_u:6278: viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
T02avsata_u:6280: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6281: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā |
T02avsata_u:6282: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyābhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā ||
T02avsata_u:6283: yadā bhagavatā bhikṣubhya ājñā dattā: yūyam eva bhikṣavo
T02avsata_u:6285: uddiśatu bhagavān prātimokṣam*, uddiśatu sugataḥ prātimokṣam iti |
T02avsata_u:6286: bhagavān āha: na hi bhikṣuṇyas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ padaśo dharmam uddiśanti
T02avsata_u:6288: sakṛduktaṃ dhārayitum*, evam aham uddiśeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:6289: tena khalu samayena sā bhikṣuṇī tasyām eva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇā saṃnipatitā |
T02avsata_u:6290: atha sā bhikṣuṇī utthāyāsanād yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam etad
T02avsata_u:6295: tato bhagavatā vistareṇoddiṣṭaḥ, somayā sakṛdukto dhāritaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6296: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: eṣā agrā me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ bahuśrutānāṃ śrutadharīṇāṃ yaduta somā bhikṣuṇī ||
T02avsata_u:6297: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta somayā bikṣuṇyā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
T02avsata_u:6298: yenāḍhye kule jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā śrutidharā ca saṃvṛtteti |
T02avsata_u:6299: bhagavān āha: somayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny
T02avsata_u:6303: pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:6304: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:6306: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_74.1 ||
T02avsata_u:6307: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02avsata_u:6309: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:6310: yāvad anyatarā brāhmaṇadārikā bhagavataḥ kāsyapasya śāsane pravrajitā |
T02avsata_u:6311: tayā tatroddiṣṭaṃ paṭhitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6312: na tu śaktitaṃ naiṣṭhikaṃ jñānam utpādayitum* |
T02avsata_u:6314: pravrajitāsīt*, sā bhagavatā kāśyapena śrutadharīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā |
T02avsata_u:6315: tataḥ somayā bhikṣuṇyā maraṇakāle praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: yathā me upādhyāyikā
T02avsata_u:6316: śrutadharīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā, evam aham apy anāgate 'dhvani yo 'sau
T02avsata_u:6317: bhagavatā kāśyapenottaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava
T02avsata_u:6318: varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha
T02avsata_u:6319: iti, tasya śāsane pravrajitā bhagavatā śākyamuninā śrutidharīṇām agrā nirdiśyeya ||
T02avsata_u:6320: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau brāhmaṇadārikā āsīt*, iyaṃ sā somā
T02avsata_u:6322: yad anayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*, tena śrutidharīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā
T02avsata_u:6323: | yad anayā tasyoddiṣṭaṃ paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitam*, tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6324: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo
T02avsata_u:6326: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6329: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:6333: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:6334: tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe nagare girivalgusamāgamo nāma parva pratyupasthitam* |
T02avsata_u:6335: tatra sarvebhyaḥ ṣaḍbhyo mahānagarebhyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatati |
T02avsata_u:6337: tasya duhitā kuvalayā nāma abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā |
T02avsata_u:6339: yadā raṅgamadhyam avatarati, tadā sarvaprekṣakaiḥ sotkaṇṭhair udvīkṣyate |
T02avsata_u:6341: tatra yadā parva pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati, tadā pūraṇaprabhṛtayaḥ saparṣatkā upasaṃkrāmanti
T02avsata_u:6342: tataḥ kuvalayā dārikā janakāyam uvāca: asti bhavanto rājagṛhe nagare kaścin manuṣyabhūto yo me rūpeṇa samo viśiṣṭataro veti |
T02avsata_u:6345: kuvalayovāca: kim asau manuṣyabhūto 'tha deva iti |
T02avsata_u:6347: tatas tadvacanam upaśrutya kuvalayā sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntā |
T02avsata_u:6348: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitvā nṛtyati gāyati vādayate strīliṅgāni strīcihnāni strīnimittāni copadarśayati |
T02avsata_u:6349: ye sarāgā bhikṣavas te tayā saṃbhrāmitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:6350: tato bhagavān rāgabahulānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ vinayanārthaṃ kuvalayāyāś ca rūpayauvanamadāpanayanārthaṃ tadrūpān ṛddhyabhisaṃkārān abhisaṃkṛtavān*,
T02avsata_u:6351: yena kuvalayā jīrṇā vṛddhā palitaśiraskā khaṇḍadantā kubjagopānasīvaktrā nirmitā |
T02avsata_u:6352: tatkālasamanantaram eva kuvalāyā ātmānaṃ bībhatsam abhivīkṣya yo
T02avsata_u:6355: | tataḥ kuvalayā apagatamadā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ vijñāpitavatī: sādhu me bhagavāṃs tathā dharmaṃ deśayatu, yathāham asmāt pūtikalevarād (Speyer: pūtikaḍevarād) alpakṛcchreṇa parimucyeyeti |
T02avsata_u:6356: atha bhagavān kuvalāyās teṣāṃ cāvītarāgāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tāthavidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān*, yāṃ śrutvā kaiścid
T02avsata_u:6357: viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*, kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam*, kaiścid
T02avsata_u:6358: anāgāmiphalm*, kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
T02avsata_u:6360: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6361: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā
T02avsata_u:6364: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6365: tair api naṭais tena saṃvegena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* ||
T02avsata_u:6366: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavatā kuvalayā naṭadārikā
T02avsata_u:6367: rūpayauvanamadamattā jarayā saṃvejya yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā iti |
T02avsata_u:6368: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ
T02avsata_u:6369: mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena kuvalayā dārikā rūpayauvanamadamattā jarayā saṃvejya yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā |
T02avsata_u:6370: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ kuvalayā dārikā saṃvejya pañcasu vratapradeśeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitā |
T02avsata_u:6371: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:6373: nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* |
T02avsata_u:6375: yāvad asau rājā devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:6376: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6377: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:6378: dāriko jāto abhirūpo darśanīyo prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaṇaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6379: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārikasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:6380: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya pitā kāśirājaḥ, ayaṃ cābhirūpo darśaniyaḥ prāsādikaḥ, tasmād bhavatu dārikasya kāśisundara iti nāma |
T02avsata_u:6381: kāśisundaro dārakaḥ aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:6383: dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:6390: yāvad apareṇa samayena phalānām artham anyataraṃ parvatakandaram anupravṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6392: ṛiṣikumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃraktā nṛtyati gāyati vādayati strīcihnāni strīnimittāni strīvikrīḍitāny upadarśayati |
T02avsata_u:6393: yāvat kāśisundareṇa ṛṣiṇā tasyā dārikāyā dharmadeśanā dattā |
T02avsata_u:6394: jīrṇāsi bhagini, prathamas te svaro madhuraḥ snigdhaś ca, paścimas te jarjarībhūta iti
T02avsata_u:6395: tatas tena tasyā dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā kinnarakanyāyā yo 'bhūd rūpamadaḥ
T02avsata_u:6398: tayā prasādajātayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: yasmin samaye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyethāḥ, tadā te 'haṃ śrāvikā syām iti
T02avsata_u:6399: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:6402: bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti: kāni bhadanta kuvalayayā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni, yenābhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā saṃvṛttā, kāni karmaṇi kṛtāni yenārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam api bhagavān āha: kuvalayayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:6404: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na
T02avsata_u:6405: tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:6407: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_75.1 ||
T02avsata_u:6408: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:6411: tatra śobhanena (Speyer: śobhena) rājñā bhagavataḥ sakāśāt satyadarśanaṃ kṛtvā naṭācāryāṇām ājñā dattā: bauddhaṃ nāṭakaṃ mama purastān nāṭayitavyam iti |
T02avsata_u:6412: tair ājñā śirasi pratigṛhītā: evaṃ bhadanteti |
T02avsata_u:6413: tataḥ sarvanaṭair bauddhaṃ nāṭakaṃ vicārya muninirjitaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6418: tato rājñā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditena naṭācāryapramukho naṭagaṇo mahatā dhanaskandhenācchāditaḥ
T02avsata_u:6419: tatas te bhagavacchāsane labdhaprasādā dānapradānāni datvā samyakpraṇidhānaṃ cakruḥ: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena
T02avsata_u:6420: cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca anāgatān buddhān ārāgayema, mā virāgayemeti ||
T02avsata_u:6421: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo ye te naṭāḥ, ime te kuvalayāpramukhāḥ |
T02avsata_u:6422: yad ebhis tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6423: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām
T02avsata_u:6425: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv
T02avsata_u:6429: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:6433: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho vārāṇasyāṃ viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:6434: vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ rājā brahmadatto rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* priyam ivaikaputrakaṃ rājyaṃ pālayati |
T02avsata_u:6435: yāvad asau rājā devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:6436: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6437: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:6438: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā |
T02avsata_u:6439: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārikāyā nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:6441: ūcuḥ: yasmād iyaṃ kāśirājasya duhitā surūpā ca, tasmād bhavatu dārikāyāḥ
T02avsata_u:6443: kāśisundarī dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattā dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:6445: dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:6447: yadā kāśisundarī dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā, tadā prātisīmaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ rājabhī rājñe brahmadattasya dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam*: śrutam asmābhir yathā tava duhitā jāteti |
T02avsata_u:6448: tad arhasy asmākaṃ putrāṇām anyatarasmai anupradātum iti |
T02avsata_u:6449: tato rājā śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaś cintayati: yady ekasmai dāsyāmi, apareṇa saha me (Speyer: me saha) virodho bhaviṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:6450: kāśisundarī dārikā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā |
T02avsata_u:6451: tayā pitā śokārto dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaś ca: tāta kimarthaṃ śokaḥ kriyata iti |
T02avsata_u:6453: tataḥ kāśisundarī pitaram uvāca: kriyatāṃ tāta prātisīmānāṃ rājñāṃ dūtasaṃpreṣaṇam* |
T02avsata_u:6454: saptame divase kāśisundarī dārikā svayaṃvaram avatariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:6455: yena vo yat karaṇīyaṃ sa tat karotv iti |
T02avsata_u:6456: yāvat saptame divase ṣaṭ prātisīmā rājānaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:6457: kāśisundary api ratham abhiruhya kāṣāyaṃ dhvajam ucchrāpya buddhapaṭaṃ hastena gṛhītvā rājasabhāṃ gatvovāca: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ prātisīmā rājānaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6458: nāhaṃ bhavatāṃ rūpayauvanakulabhogaiśvaryaṃ tulayāmi, api tu nāhaṃ kāmair arthinī |
T02avsata_u:6459: ya eṣa eva me bhagavān buddhaḥ paṭe likhitas tasyāhaṃ śrāvikā |
T02avsata_u:6461: yāvad ṛṣipatanaṃ gatvā bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam idam avocat*: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣu{ṇī}bhāvam* |
T02avsata_u:6465: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ
T02avsata_u:6467: viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6468: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā |
T02avsata_u:6469: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6470: tatas te rājaputrās tasyā rūpayauvanaśobhāṃ samanusmṛtya rāgamadamattāḥ pravrajitām api prārthayituṃ pravṛttāḥ |
T02avsata_u:6471: sā taiḥ prārthyamānā vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam (Speyer:
T02avsata_u:6472: gagaṇatalam) abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhā |
T02avsata_u:6474: tatas te rāputrā atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā āhṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayitum ārabdhāḥ: marṣaya bhagini |
T02avsata_u:6476: sākṣātkṛtāḥ, asthānam etad yat tvaṃ kāmān parimuñjīthā iti |
T02avsata_u:6477: tataḥ kāśisundarī dārikā gaganatalād avatīrya janakāyasya purastāt sthitvā tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavatī, yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrair mahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ ||
T02avsata_u:6478: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta kāśisundaryā karmāṇi kṛtāni,
T02avsata_u:6481: bhagavān āha: kāśisundaryaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi
T02avsata_u:6482: kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
T02avsata_u:6484: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:6485: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:6487: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_76.1 ||
T02avsata_u:6488: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe triṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kanakamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan
T02avsata_u:6489: samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:6490: <The name of the place is missing.> |
T02avsata_u:6491: yāvat tatrānyatarā rājaduhitā śrāddhā bhadrā kalyāṇāśayā ātmahitaparahitapratipannā |
T02avsata_u:6492: tayā vihāraṃ kārayitvā sarvopakaraṇaiḥ paripūrya bhagavate saśrāvakasaṃghāya pratipāditaḥ
T02avsata_u:6493: kanakamunau ca samyaksaṃbuddhe pravrajya daśavarṣasahasrāṇi maitrī bhavitā
T02avsata_u:6494: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yā sā rājaduhitā, iyaṃ sā kāśisundarī dārikā |
T02avsata_u:6495: yad anayā vihāraḥ pratipāditas tenābhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6496: yat kanakamunau bhagavati pravrajya daśavarṣasahasrāṇi maitrī bhāvitā tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
T02avsata_u:6497: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ |
T02avsata_u:6498: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6501: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:6505: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:6506: śrāvastyāṃ puṣyo nāma śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:6508: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:6509: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6510: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:6511: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā muktāmālayā śirasi baddhayā |
T02avsata_u:6512: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārikāyā nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:6514: yasmād asyā jātamātrāyā muktamālā śirasi prādurbhūtaṃ, tasmād bhavatu dārikāyā mukteti nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:6515: muktā dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattā dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:6516: sā 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś
T02avsata_u:6519: yāvan muktā dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6520: tasyāḥ sā muktāmālā avatāritā punaḥ prādurbhavati |
T02avsata_u:6521: tataḥ sā dārikā kṛpaṇavanīpakān dṛṣṭvā bhāgasaṃvibhāgaṃ karoti |
T02avsata_u:6522: yadā ca pradeyā saṃvṛttā, tadā tasyā bahavo
T02avsata_u:6523: yācanakā āgacchanti rājaputrā amātyaputrāḥ śreṣṭhiputrāś ca |
T02avsata_u:6525: pitā śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaś cintayati: yady ekasmai dāsyāmi, anye me 'mitrā bhaviṣyantīti |
T02avsata_u:6527: dārikā pitaraṃ vijñāpayāmāsa: tāta kimarthaṃ śokaḥ kriyata iti |
T02avsata_u:6529: tato dārikā kathayati: tāta nāhaṃ kāmair arthinī |
T02avsata_u:6531: yāvad anāthapiṇḍadasya supriyo nāma kanīyaḥ putras tena pitā vijñaptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6534: kṛtam*: dīyatāṃ muktā dārikā mama putrāya |
T02avsata_u:6535: evaṃ kṛtaṃ sāṃbandhikaṃ yāvajjīvasukhyaṃ kṛtaṃ ca bhaviṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:6536: tataḥ puṣyeṇa gṛhapatinā svasyāṃ duhitari so 'rtho niveditaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6537: sā kathayati: samayato yadīndriyāṇāṃ paripākān mayā saha bhagavacchāsane pravrajati, evam ahaṃ taṃ bhartāraṃ varayāmīti |
T02avsata_u:6539: yāvad ubhāv eva gṛhān niṣkramya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitau |
T02avsata_u:6540: tābhyāṃ yujyamānābhyāṃ ghaṭamānābhyāṃ vyāyacchamānābhyām idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6541: arhantau saṃvṛttau traidhātukavītarāgau samaloṣṭakāñcanāv ākāśapāṇitalasamacittau vāsīcandanakalpau vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośau vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptau bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhau |
T02avsata_u:6542: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyau mānyāv abhivādyau ca saṃvṛttau ||
T02avsata_u:6544: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta muktayā karmāṇi kṛtāni yena muktāmālayā śirasy ābaddhayā, pravrajya cārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti |
T02avsata_u:6545: bhagavān āha: muktayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi
T02avsata_u:6548: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na
T02avsata_u:6549: tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:6551: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_77.1 ||
T02avsata_u:6552: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02avsata_u:6554: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:6555: yāvad anyatamaḥ sārthavāhaḥ sa mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6558: tasya ca bhāryā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā |
T02avsata_u:6560: vārāṇasyām anyatamo gṛhaptiḥ śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6561: tasya buddhir utpannā: yanv ahaṃ chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya śāsane pañcavārṣikaṃ kuryām iti |
T02avsata_u:6562: tena rājñaḥ kṛkiṇo niveditam*: icchāmy ahaṃ chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ samādāpya bhagavataḥ pañcavārṣikaṃ kartum iti |
T02avsata_u:6564: athāsau gṛhapatir hastiskandhārūḍho vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryāṃ rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cchandakabhikṣaṇaṃ yācituṃ pravṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6567: yāvat sārthavāha āgatas taṃ muktāhāraṃ śiraso 'panītaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭavān*: bhadre kvāsau muktāhāra iti |
T02avsata_u:6568: tatas tayoktam*: āryaputra prītiṃ janaya, prasādam utpādaya,
T02avsata_u:6570: yāvat sārthavāhena puṣkalena mūlyena niṣkrīya tasyai patnyai dattaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6573: svāminocyate: bhadre mayā prabhūtena hiraṇyasuvarṇenāyaṃ krītaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6576: dārikā taṃ gṛhītvā prabhūtaṃ puṣpasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā gandhamālyāni ca gṛhītvā ṛṣipatanaṃ gatā
T02avsata_u:6577: tato gandhakuṭyāṃ gandhapralepaṃ kṛtvā puṣpair ākīrya muktāhāraṃ bhagavato mūrdhni kṣiptavatī
T02avsata_u:6578: sa sahasā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya mūrdhani sthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6579: tataḥ prasādajātayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ labhinī syām*, evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:6580: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau tena kālena tena samayena sārthavāhabhāryā, iyaṃ sā muktā
T02avsata_u:6581: yad anayā bhagavati kāśyape kārāḥ kṛtās tenābhirūpā darśaniyā prāsādikā |
T02avsata_u:6586: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām
T02avsata_u:6588: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv
T02avsata_u:6592: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:6595: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kacaṅgalāyāṃ viharati kācaṅgalīye vanaṣaṇḍe |
T02avsata_u:6597: sā ghaṭam ādāya udakārthinī kūpam upasṛptā |
T02avsata_u:6598: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate: gaccha ānanda,
T02avsata_u:6599: etasyāṃ vṛddhāyāṃ kathaya: bhagavāṃs trṣitaḥ, pānīyam anuprayacchasveti |
T02avsata_u:6601: yāvat kacaṅgalā pānīyaghaṭaṃ pūrayitvā bhagavataḥ sakāśaṃ gatā |
T02avsata_u:6602: dadarśa kacaṅgalā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:6605: sā ūrdhvabāhuḥ putra putreti bhagavantaṃ pariṣvaktum ārabdhā |
T02avsata_u:6607: bhagavān āha: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣava imāṃ vṛddhāṃ vārayata |
T02avsata_u:6609: pañca janmaśatāny eṣā mama mātā āsīn nirantaram* |
T02avsata_u:6610: iyaṃ me putrasnehena gātreṣu samaślikṣata || AVŚ_78.1 ||
T02avsata_u:6611: saced eṣā nivāryeta mama gātreṣu śleṣaṇāt* |
T02avsata_u:6612: idānīṃ rudhiraṃ hy uṣṇaṃ kaṇṭhād asyāḥ sravet kṣaṇāt* || AVŚ_78.2 ||
T02avsata_u:6615: yāvad asau putrasnehaṃ vinodya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:6616: bhagavān cāsyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā kacaṅgalayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6618: yat kartavyaṃ hi putreṇa mātur duṣkarakariṇā |
T02avsata_u:6619: tat kṛtaṃ bhavatā mahyaṃ cittaṃ mokṣaparāyaṇam* || AVŚ_78.4 ||
T02avsata_u:6621: durgatibhyaḥ samuddhṛtya svarge mikṣe ca te aham* |
T02avsata_u:6622: sthāpitā sarvayatnena viśeṣaḥ sumahān kṛtaḥ || AVŚ_78.5 ||
T02avsata_u:6623: yāvad asau svāminam anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitā |
T02avsata_u:6624: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6625: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā |
T02avsata_u:6626: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6627: yadā bhagavān bhikṣuṇīnāṃ saṃkṣepeṇoddiśya pratisaṃlayanāya praviśati, tadā kacaṅgalā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ vyākaroti |
T02avsata_u:6628: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: eṣāgra me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇāṃ yaduta kacaṅgalā bhikṣuṇīti ||
T02avsata_u:6629: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta kacaṅgalayā karma kṛtaṃ yena vṛddhā pravrajitā,
T02avsata_u:6630: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena bhagavān paścimagarbhavāsena *{S:
T02avsata_u:6633: bhagavān āha: kacaṅgalayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi
T02avsata_u:6636: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na
T02avsata_u:6637: tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:6639: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_78.1 ||
T02avsata_u:6640: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani bodhisatvacaryāyāṃ vartamānasyaiṣā me pañca janmaśatāni mātā āsīt* |
T02avsata_u:6646: kiṃ tv anayā naivaṃvidhāni maheśākhyasaṃvartanīyāni karmāṇi kṛtāni, yathā mahāmāyā kṛtavatī
T02avsata_u:6651: yat tatrānayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthanakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam*,
T02avsata_u:6652: tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*, sūtrantavibhākartrīṇāṃ cāgratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭā |
T02avsata_u:6653: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
T02avsata_u:6655: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6658: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:6662: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:6663: tena khalu samayena rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājā ca brāhmadatta ubhāv apy etau parasparaviruddhau
T02avsata_u:6664: yāvad rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ svaviṣayaparyantaṃ gatvā kāṣṭhavāṭaṃ baddhvāvasthitaḥ, rājā brahmadattaś ca
T02avsata_u:6665: caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ nadyāḥ kūle kāṣṭhavāṭaṃ baddhvāvasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6667: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:6668: brahmadatto 'pi devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:6669: yenaikadivasa eva rājñaḥ prasenajitkauśalasya duhitā jātā, brahmadattasya putraḥ || yāvad ubhayor api skandhāvāre brahmadattasya skandhāvāre pravartate yenāyam evaṃvidha utsava iti |
T02avsata_u:6670: tair ākhyātam*: rājño brahmadattasya putro jāta iti |
T02avsata_u:6674: tato rājñā brahmadattena rājñaḥ prasenajito dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ
T02avsata_u:6675: kṛtam*: śrutaṃ mayā yathā tava duhitā jāteti |
T02avsata_u:6678: kiṃ tu dīyatām eṣā dārikā mama putrāya |
T02avsata_u:6679: evaṃ kṛte sāṃbandhike yāvajjīvaṃ vairotsargaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:6680: rājñā prasenajitā pratijñātam*: evam bhavatv iti |
T02avsata_u:6681: tatas tābhyāṃ parasparaṃ prītau kṛtāyāṃ kṣeme jāte rājñā brahmadattena dārakasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ kṣemaṃkara iti |
T02avsata_u:6682: rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena dārikāyā jātāyā jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kṣemeti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6685: atha sa dārako dārikāyā hārārdhahāramālāṃ badhnan kaṇṭhemaṇīn preṣayati |
T02avsata_u:6686: yadāsau dārikā mahatī saṃvṛttā, tayā te pṛṣṭāḥ: kuta etāni prābhṛtāny āgacchanti? preṣyair vistareṇa sa vṛtānta (Speyer: vṛttānta)
T02avsata_u:6688: śrutvā ca pitaraṃ vijñāpayāmāsa: tāta nāhaṃ kāmair arthinī,
T02avsata_u:6691: naitad dārike śakyaṃ mayā kartum*, yasmāt tava janmani mama kṣemaṃ jātam
T02avsata_u:6693: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena rājño brahmadattasya dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam*: eṣā me dārikā pravrajitum icchati |
T02avsata_u:6695: yāvad rājñā brahmadattena divasaḥ pratigṛhītaḥ: saptame 'hani
T02avsata_u:6697: yat te kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat kuruṣveti |
T02avsata_u:6698: eṣa vṛttāntaḥ kṣemayā dārikayā śrutaḥ: saptame divase vivāho bhaviṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:6699: tataḥ kṣemā bhītā trastā saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpā śaraṇapṛṣṭham abhiruhya jetavanābhimukhī buddhaṃ bhagavantam āyācituṃ pravṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6702: kṛpakaruṇavihāro dhyāyamāno maharṣiḥ praśamadamavidhijñaḥ pāpahaḥ śāntacittaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6703: mama vidhivadapāyān mocaya tvaṃ hi nāthaḥ śaraṇam upagatāhaṃ lokanāthaṃ hy anāthā || AVŚ_79.1
T02avsata_u:6704: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* |
T02avsata_u:6705: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛtt{ak}ānām ekārakṣāṇām ekavīrāṇām advitīyānām
T02avsata_u:6706: advayavādināṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā
T02avsata_u:6707: lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko
T02avsata_u:6709: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca
T02avsata_u:6714: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet || AVŚ_79.1 ||
T02avsata_u:6715: atha bhagavān kṣemāyā vinayakālam avekṣya ṛddhyā upasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6716: upasaṃkramya tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā kṣemayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam abhijñānirhāraś ca |
T02avsata_u:6718: yāvat saptame divase vivāhakāle saṃprāpte pratyupasthite rājakumāre anekajanaśatasahāye vedīmadhyagatāyāṃ brāhmaṇena purohitena lājā ghṛtasarpiṣānupradattā |
T02avsata_u:6719: tato dārakadārikāhastasaṃśleṣaṇe kriyamāṇe kṣemā paśyatām anekeṣāṃ prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhiruhya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhā |
T02avsata_u:6720: tato rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājā ca brahmadattaḥ kṣemaṃkaraś ca rājakumāro
T02avsata_u:6721: 'nye ca kutūhalābhyāgatāḥ satvā vismayam upagatāḥ pādayor nipatya vijñāpayitum ārabdhāḥ: marṣaya bhagini ya ete tvayā dharmāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
T02avsata_u:6722: asthānam etad yat tvaṃ kāmān parimuñjīthā iti |
T02avsata_u:6723: atha kṣemā gaganatalād avatīrya janakāyasya puraḥ sthitvā tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavatī, yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6724: tataḥ kṣemā dārikā pitaram anujñāpya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntā |
T02avsata_u:6727: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6730: saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā |
T02avsata_u:6731: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6732: yadā bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: eṣā agrā me
T02avsata_u:6733: bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ mahāprājñānāṃ mahāpratibhānāṃ yaduta kṣemā bhikṣuṇīti
T02avsata_u:6734: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta kṣemayā karmāṇi kṛtāni yena mahāprājñānāṃ mahāpratibhānām agrā nirdiṣṭā |
T02avsata_u:6736: anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:6738: | ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:6739: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:6741: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_79.1 ||
T02avsata_u:6742: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02avsata_u:6744: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:6745: yāvat tatrānyatarā śreṣṭhiduhitā bhagavataḥ kāsyapasya śāsane pravrajitā |
T02avsata_u:6746: tayā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya śāsane dānapradānāni dattāni, dvādaśa varṣasahasrāṇi ca brahmacaryavāsaḥ
T02avsata_u:6747: paripālitaḥ, na ca kaścid guṇagaṇo 'dhigataḥ, yasyās tūpādhyāyikāyāḥ sakāśe pravrajitā āsīt*, sā bhagavatā kāśyapena prajñāvatīnām agrā nirdiṣṭā |
T02avsata_u:6748: tatas tayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: yathaiṣā upādhyāyikā prajñāvatīnām agrā nirdiṣṭā, evam aham apy anāgate 'dhvani yo 'sau
T02avsata_u:6749: bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava
T02avsata_u:6750: varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha
T02avsata_u:6751: iti, tasyāhaṃ śāsane pravrajitvā prajñāvatīnām agrā bhaveyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:6752: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau tena kālena tena samayena śreṣṭhiduhitā, iyaṃ sā kṣemā bhikṣuṇī |
T02avsata_u:6755: yat tayā dvādaśa varṣasahasrāṇi brahmacaryavāsaḥ paripālitaḥ, tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
T02avsata_u:6756: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām
T02avsata_u:6758: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv
T02avsata_u:6762: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:6766: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:6767: tena khalu samayena prasenajit kauśalo rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* priyam ivaikaputrakaṃ rājyaṃ pālayati |
T02avsata_u:6768: yāvat sa rājā anyatamayā devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:6769: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6770: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:6771: dārikā jātā aṣṭādaśabhir daurvarṇikair aṅgaiḥ samanvāgatā |
T02avsata_u:6772: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā virūpeti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate |
T02avsata_u:6773: yadā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā, tadā yasmai pradīyate, sa tāṃ virūpeti kṛtvā na pratigṛhṇāti
T02avsata_u:6774: yāvad dakṣiṇāpathād gaṅgo nāma sārthavāho 'bhyāgato vistīrṇavibhavaḥ
T02avsata_u:6775: | tato rājñaḥ prasenajito buddhir utpannā: ayaṃ gaṅgasārthavāha etasyā
T02avsata_u:6778: tato rājñā rātrau saṃprāptāyāṃ bhagnacakṣuṣpathe (Speyer: bhagne cakṣuṣpathe) gaṅgaṃ dūtenāhvāpya sā dārikā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā bhāryārthe dattā gaṅgāya |
T02avsata_u:6780: yāvad gaṅgena sārthavāhena dvitīye divase prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ sā dārikā dṛṣṭā paramabībhatsā
T02avsata_u:6781: yāṃ dṛṣṭvā rājāpekṣayā na śaknoty avamoktum*
T02avsata_u:6783: yāvad gaṅgaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kasmiṃścit parvaṇy upasthite goṣṭhikānāṃ madhyaṃ gataḥ |
T02avsata_u:6784: goṣṭhikaiś ca kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ: saha bhāryayā amukam
T02avsata_u:6785: udyānaṃ yo no yāsyati, sa goṣṭhikānāṃ pañca purāṇaśatāni daṇḍam anupradāsyatīti |
T02avsata_u:6786: tato gaṅgaḥ svagṛham āgatya śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ kṛtvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6787: tasya buddhir utpannā: varam ahaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyām*, na cāham etām eteṣāṃ darśayeyam* |
T02avsata_u:6789: atha gaṅgo dvāraṃ baddhvā pañca purāṇaśatāni
T02avsata_u:6792: tato dārikāyā mahad daurmanasyam utpannam*: kiṃ mamānenaivaṃvidhena jīvitena, yatra me na ca svāmicittaṃ sukhitam*, na cāham* |
T02avsata_u:6795: tato rajjuṃ gṛhītvā avarakaṃ praviṣṭā udbandhanahetoḥ ||
T02avsata_u:6796: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* |
T02avsata_u:6797: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛtt{ak}ānām ekārakṣāṇām śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ
T02avsata_u:6798: saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ
T02avsata_u:6801: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*, kasyānavaropitāni kuśalamulāny
T02avsata_u:6805: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet || AVŚ_80.1 ||
T02avsata_u:6806: tato bhagavatā jetavanāvasthitena kanakavarṇā prabhā utsṛṣṭā, yayā tad gṛhaṃ sūryasahasreṇevāvabhāsitam*
T02avsata_u:6807: ṛddhyā copasaṃkramya tadgalād udbandhanam avamucya dārikāṃ samāśvāsitavān* |
T02avsata_u:6809: tathāgatasya tathāgatapraveditasya dharmavinayasya manuṣyatvasya āryāyatane pratyājātatvasya indriyair avikalatvasya kuśaladharmacchandakasya āścaryādbhuto loke prādurbhāvaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6810: tato bhagavatā tasyā dārikāyās tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6811: tato labdhaprasādayā bhagavān bhaktena pratipāditaḥ paṭena cācchāditaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6816: tato goṣṭhikānāṃ buddhir utpannā: nūnam asya bhāryā paramadarśanīyā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6817: sa eṣa īrṣyāprakṛtir daṇḍam utsahate dātum*, na ca tāṃ
T02avsata_u:6819: yan nu vayam enaṃ viruddhair madyaiḥ pāyayitvā tāḍam ādāya gṛham asya gatvā bhāryāṃ paśyemeti
T02avsata_u:6820: tatas tais taṃ ghanaghanena viruddhamadyena pānena kṣībaṃ (Speyer: kṣīvaṃ) kṛtvā tāḍam apahṛtya gṛhaṃ gatvā dvāram avamucya dārikā dṛṣṭā |
T02avsata_u:6821: tato dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam upagatāś cintayanti: sthāne 'sau na darśayaty asmākam iti |
T02avsata_u:6822: tatas te punar āgatya madyavaśāt suptam utthāpya
T02avsata_u:6824: ūcuḥ: lābhās te gaṅga sulabdhāḥ, yasya te evaṃvidhā darśanīyā dāriketi |
T02avsata_u:6825: tato gaṅgo bhūyasyā mātrayā duḥkhī durmanā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6829: dvāram avamucya tāṃ bhāryāṃ dṛṣṭavān vanadevatām iva kusumitamadhye 'tīva
T02avsata_u:6831: tataḥ pṛcchati: bhadre kim etat*? kiṃ kṛto rūpaviśeṣa iti
T02avsata_u:6834: yāvad asau dārikā krameṇa bhartāram anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitā |
T02avsata_u:6835: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6836: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā |
T02avsata_u:6837: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā ||
T02avsata_u:6838: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kiṃ bhadanta gaṅgarasthayā karma kṛtam*, yenāḍhye jātā |
T02avsata_u:6839: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena virūpā saṃvṛttā, pravrajya cārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti |
T02avsata_u:6840: bhagavān āha: gaṅgarasthayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi
T02avsata_u:6841: kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
T02avsata_u:6843: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:6844: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:6846: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_80.1 ||
T02avsata_u:6849: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya |
T02avsata_u:6850: yāvad anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhas tad gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo virūpaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6851: sa tayā bahu paribhāṣya gṛhān niṣkāsitaḥ: kenāyaṃ virūpo mama
T02avsata_u:6853: tataḥ pratyekabuddhas tasyā anugrahārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6855: | yāvad asau kṣamitaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaś ca |
T02avsata_u:6857: yan mayā pratyekabuddhaḥ paribhāṣitaḥ, mā asya karmaṇo vipākam
T02avsata_u:6858: anubhaveyam*, evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhinī syāṃ*, prativiśiṣṭataraṃ ca śāstāram ārāgayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:6860: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau śreṣṭhibhāryā, iyam asau gaṅgarasthā |
T02avsata_u:6861: yad anayā pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye rājakule pratyāgatā
T02avsata_u:6866: tatrānayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalam āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ kṛtam*, brahmacaryavāsaś ca paripālitaḥ, tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ,
T02avsata_u:6868: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6871: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:6875: samudraḥ sumanāś caiva hiraṇyapāṇis tripiṭena ca |
T02avsata_u:6877: bhadriko rāṣṭrapālaś ca vargo bhavati samudditaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:6880: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:6883: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:6884: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato buddhir utpannā: yāvad ahaṃ yuvā, tāvad dhanasaṃcayaṃ
T02avsata_u:6886: tataḥ sārthavāhaḥ pañcavaṇikchataparivāro *{Vaidya: ŚvaṇikśataŚ}* yānapātram ādāya bhāryāsahāyo mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6890: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam*:
T02avsata_u:6891: yasmāt samudramadhye jātas tasmāt samudra iti nām |
T02avsata_u:6892: yāvad asau sārthavāhaḥ svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsidhhayānapātro mahāsamudrāt pratyāgataḥ ||
T02avsata_u:6893: yadā samudro darako mahān saṃvṛttas tadā pitrā sārthavāhatve pratiṣṭhāpya pañcavaṇikchataparivāro *{Vaidya: ŚvaṇikśataŚ}* mahāsamudraṃ saṃpreṣitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6894: so 'nupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇo grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīpaṭṭanāny avalokayan samudratīram anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6895: sa pñcabhiḥ purāṇaśatair vahanaṃ bhṛtvā pañca pauruṣeyān*
T02avsata_u:6896: gṛhītvā āhāraṃ nāvikaṃ kaivartaṃ karṇadhāraṃ ca trir api ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6897: tatas teṣāṃ samudramadhyagatānāṃ kālikāvātena tad vahanam itaś cāmutaś ca paribhrāmyate |
T02avsata_u:6900: tathāpi tad vahanaṃ vāyunā bhrāmyata eva |
T02avsata_u:6901: yāvad anye vaṇijo devatāsahasrāṇy āyācituṃ pravṛttāḥ |
T02avsata_u:6903: śivavaruṇakuberā vāyur agni mahendro bhuvi ca tuvimagho yo viśvadevo maharṣiḥ |
T02avsata_u:6904: vayam iha maraṇārtā vaḥ prapannāḥ sma śīghraṃ vyasanam idam upetaṃ trātum icchantu sārtham*
T02avsata_u:6906: tatas teṣām evam api paridevamānānāṃ nāsti kaścit trātā |
T02avsata_u:6908: sa uvāca: kiṃ vo bhavantaḥ ṣaṭ śāstāra anye ca devatāḥ kariṣyanti? buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyakṣadevataṃ bhāvena śaraṇaṃ prapadyadhvam* |
T02avsata_u:6910: tataḥ samudrapramukhāni pañca vaṇikchatāni ekasvareṇa bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannāni ||
T02avsata_u:6911: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* |
T02avsata_u:6912: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttānām ekārakṣāṇām śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ
T02avsata_u:6913: saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ
T02avsata_u:6916: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*, kasyānavaropitāni kuśalamulāny
T02avsata_u:6920: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet || AVŚ_81.1 ||
T02avsata_u:6921: yāvad bhagavatā jetavanāvasthitena sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇā marīcaya utsṛṣṭāḥ, yais te vaṇijaḥ samantād avabhāsitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:6924: yāvat samudraḥ svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsiddhayānapātraḥ pratyāgatas tenaiva maraṇasaṃvegena dānapradānāni datvā bandhujanaṃ samāśvāsya śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakān saṃtarpya pañcavaṇikchataparivāro bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6925: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6926: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6929: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavatā imāni samudrapramukhāni pañca vaṇikchatāni iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditāni, vyasanāt paritrātāni, atyantaniṣṭe ca nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitānīti |
T02avsata_u:6930: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ imāni samudrapramukhāni pañca vaṇikchatāni iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditāni,
T02avsata_u:6932: vyasanāt paritrātāni, atyantaniṣṭe ca nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitānīti |
T02avsata_u:6933: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena
T02avsata_u:6935: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye ||
T02avsata_u:6936: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany anyatarasmin samudratīre pañcābhijñaḥ ṛṣiḥ prativasati, kaṣṭatayā mūlaphalāmbubhakto 'jinavalkalavāsī agnihotrikaḥ (Speyer: agnihotrakaḥ) |
T02avsata_u:6937: sa ca kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalo vyasanagatānāṃ paritrātā |
T02avsata_u:6940: tam ṛṣiṃ dṛṣṭvā prasādajātāni pādayor nipatya vijñāpayitum ārabdhāni: yady asmākaṃ bhagavan
T02avsata_u:6941: samudramadhyagatānāṃ kiṃcid vyasanam utpadyate, bhagavatā tāvad ete
T02avsata_u:6944: tatas te vaṇijo ratnāny ādāya jambudvīpābhimukhāḥ saṃprasthitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:6947: tataḥ saṃsiddhayānapātrāḥ pratyāgatā ṛṣisamīpam upagamyocuḥ: bho maharṣe anena
T02avsata_u:6948: duṣkareṇa vyavasāyena kāruṇyabhāvāc ca kiṃ prārthayasa iti |
T02avsata_u:6950: andhe loke 'nāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayitā, amuktānāṃ
T02avsata_u:6952: tair uktam*: yadā tvaṃ buddho bhaves tadā asmān api samanvāharethā iti |
T02avsata_u:6954: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena ṛṣir āsīt*,
T02avsata_u:6956: ye te vaṇijaḥ, ime te samudrapramukhās tadāpy ete mayā
T02avsata_u:6961: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ,
T02avsata_u:6963: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6966: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:6969: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:6970: śrāvastyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:6975: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putrāḥ prajāyante ca mriyante ca |
T02avsata_u:6978: tato gṛhapater iyaṃ buddhir utpannā: ayaṃ sthavirāniruddho vipākamaheśākhyaḥ, etaṃ tāvad āyāciṣye: yadi me putro jāyate, asya paścācchramaṇaṃ dasyāmīti |
T02avsata_u:6981: tataḥ piṇḍakena pratipādyāyācitaḥ: yadi me putro
T02avsata_u:6983: sthavirāniruddhenoktam*: evam astu, kiṃ tu smartavyā te pratijñeti ||
T02avsata_u:6984: yāvad apareṇa samayena patnyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:6985: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:6988: dārako jātaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko divyasumanaḥkañcikayā prāvṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6989: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā sumanā iti nāmadheyaṃ
T02avsata_u:6991: tataḥ sthavirāniruddham antargṛhe bhaktenopanimantrya sa dārako niryātitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6992: tataḥ sthavirāniruddhenāsmai kāṣāyāṇi dattāni, āśīr vādaś ca: dīrghāyur bhavatv iti ||
T02avsata_u:6993: yadā saptavarṣo jātas tadā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ sthavirāya dattaḥ |
T02avsata_u:6995: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:6996: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7000: yadā pāṃsukūlaṃ pratisaṃskaroti, tadā ekaikasmin* sūcīpradeśe aṣṭau vimokṣān samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca ||
T02avsata_u:7001: yāvad apareṇa samayena sthavirāniruddhenoktaḥ: gaccha putraka, nadyā ajiravatyā udakam ānayeti
T02avsata_u:7002: tataḥ sumanāḥ śramaṇoddeśo ghaṭam ādāyājiravatīm avatīrṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7003: tatra snātvā udakasya ghaṭaṃ pūrayitvā vihāyasaṃ prasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7004: agrato ghaṭo gacchati, tataḥ sumanāḥ śramaṇoddeśaḥ
T02avsata_u:7005: | tasmiṃś ca samaye bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati
T02avsata_u:7006: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate: imaṃ paśya śāriputra śramaṇoddeśam āgacchantam udakasya ghaṭaṃ pūrayitvā smṛtimantaṃ susamāhitendriyam* |
T02avsata_u:7007: hitvā rāgaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca abhidhyāṃ ca virāgayan* |
T02avsata_u:7010: yadā bhagavatā sumanāḥ śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣusaṃghasya purastāt stutaḥ praśastaś ca, tadā bhikṣūṇāṃ saṃdeho jātaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7011: kāni bhadanta sumanasā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni, yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko divyayā ca sumanasāṃ kañcukayā prāvṛtto jātaḥ, tīkṣnendriyaḥ, arhatvaṃ ca prāptam iti
T02avsata_u:7012: | sumanasaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:7015: pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:7016: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:7018: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_81.2 ||
T02avsata_u:7019: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:7024: yadā vṛddho bhūtas tadā tasya vipratisāro jātaḥ: na me śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yad ahaṃ bhagavacchāsane na pravrajita iti |
T02avsata_u:7025: tatas tena keśanakhanastūpe sumanaḥpuṣpāropaṇaṃ kṛtam*, vipaśyī ca samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7026: tataḥ tena pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
T02avsata_u:7027: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlema cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca anāgatān samyaksaṃbuddhānām ārāgayeyam*
T02avsata_u:7028: yasya ca śāsane pravrajeyam*, tatra daharāvasthāyām āryadharmān adhigaccheyam iti |
T02avsata_u:7032: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ,
T02avsata_u:7034: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7037: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:7040: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:7041: śrāvastyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
T02avsata_u:7045: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ: anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛham*, na me putro
T02avsata_u:7047: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:7050: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti |
T02avsata_u:7052: yady evam abhaviṣyat*, ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7053: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca |
T02avsata_u:7055: | mātāpitarāu raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau, mātā kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī,
T02avsata_u:7057: eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca |
T02avsata_u:7059: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmād devanikāyāc cyutvā tasya prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7062: raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti, viraktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti |
T02avsata_u:7069: saced dārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati |
T02avsata_u:7071: kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati |} sā āttamanāḥ svāmina ārocayati: diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhase |
T02avsata_u:7073: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:7074: so 'py āttamanāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya (Speyer: atyunnamayya) dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udānayati: apy evāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ
T02avsata_u:7081: | asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyati: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor
T02avsata_u:7083: āpannasatvāṃ caināṃ viditvopariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati, śīte śītopakaraṇair
T02avsata_u:7084: uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyais tiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitair āhāraiḥ |
T02avsata_u:7085: hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharāṃ bhūmim* |
T02avsata_u:7086: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya ||
T02avsata_u:7087: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:7090: yadā tad apanītaṃ bhavati tadā anyat prādurbhavati |
T02avsata_u:7091: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:7092: jñātayaḥ ūcuḥ: yasmād asya jātamātrasya pāṇidvaye lakṣaṇāhataṃ karmavipākajaṃ dīnāradvayaṃ prādurbhūtam*, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya hiraṇyapāṇir iti nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:7093: hiraṇyapāṇir dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ
T02avsata_u:7095: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:7097: sa śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko
T02avsata_u:7100: ya yadā vīthīm avatīrṇo bhavati, tadā śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakān dṛṣṭvā pāṇidvayaṃ prasārayati
T02avsata_u:7101: tato lakṣaṇāhatasya hiraṇyasuvarṇasya rāśiḥ prādurbhavati, yena tān saṃtarpayati |
T02avsata_u:7103: yāvad hiraṇyapāṇir dārako 'pareṇa samayena jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:7104: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:7106: prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:7110: icchāmy aham ācārya bhagavataḥ saśrāvakasaṃghasya bhaktaṃ kartum iti |
T02avsata_u:7112: tato hiraṇyapāṇinā buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya purastāt sthitvā pāṇidvayaṃ prasārya hiraṇyasuvarṇasya mahān rāśiḥ sthāpitaḥ, yaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃghasthaviro 'nye ca bhikṣavaḥ sthavirānandaś ca paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7113: tato hiraṇyapāṇir dārako buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:7114: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā hiraṇyapāṇidārikeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ
T02avsata_u:7116: dṛṣṭasatyo jñātīnāṃ bhāgasaṃvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇkṛpaṇanīpakān saṃtarpya mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7117: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:7118: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7121: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta hiraṇyapāṇinā karmāṇi kṛtāni, yenāsya pāṇidvaye lakṣanāhataṃ dīnāradvayaṃ jātam*, pravrajya cārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti |
T02avsata_u:7122: bhagavān āha: hiraṇyapāṇinaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi
T02avsata_u:7123: kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
T02avsata_u:7125: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:7126: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:7128: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_83.1 ||
T02avsata_u:7129: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
T02avsata_u:7132: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:7133: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7134: tasya rājñā kṛkiṇā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena |
T02avsata_u:7135: tatra ca stūpamahe vartamāne dyūtakareṇa dīnāradvayaṃ tasmin stūpe yaṣṭyāṃ samāropitam* |
T02avsata_u:7137: kṛtavān*: yatra yatra jāyeya, tatra tatra hastagatenaiva suvarṇeneti ||
T02avsata_u:7138: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:7139: samayena dyūtakara āsīt*, ayaṃ sa hiraṇyapāṇiḥ |
T02avsata_u:7140: yad anena stūpe dīnāradvayaṃ samāropitam*, tenāsyaivaṃvidho viśeṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7141: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:7142: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ,
T02avsata_u:7144: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7147: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:7150: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:7151: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca {subhikṣaṃ ca} ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* |
T02avsata_u:7153: yāvad asau devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:7154: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:7155: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:7156: dārako jātaḥ kāṣāyavastraṃ prāvṛtya śramaṇaveṣadhārī jātismaraś ca |
T02avsata_u:7157: sa jātamātraḥ pṛcchati: kiṃ bhagavān ihaiva śrāvastyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanakāśyapānandaprabhṛtayo vā mahāśrāvakā iti |
T02avsata_u:7158: tato 'sya mātā vismayaharṣapūrṇā kathayati: putraka bhagavān ihaiva śrāvastyāṃ mahāśrāvakāś ceti |
T02avsata_u:7159: yāvad eṣo 'rtho rājñaḥ prasenajito niveditaḥ: putras te jātaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7161: sa bhagavato mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ ca pravṛttim anveṣata iti |
T02avsata_u:7162: tato rājñā prasenajitā tasyānugrahāryaṃ bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho bhaktenopanimantritaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7163: atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena rājñaḥ prasenajito bhaktābhisāras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7164: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7165: tato rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ putram utsaṅge kṛtvā bhagavato darśayati: ayaṃ me bhagavan putro jātamātra eṣa
T02avsata_u:7170: sa kathayati: vande tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham iti |
T02avsata_u:7171: tato rājā prasenajit param vismayam āpannaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:7172: yadā saptavarṣo jātas tadā bhagavacchāsane pravrajitas tair eva kāṣāyaiḥ prāvṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7173: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:7174: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7177: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta tripiṭena karmāṇi kṛtāni, yena kāṣāyavastraprāvṛto jātaḥ śramaṇaveṣadhārī jātismaraḥ |
T02avsata_u:7180: anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:7182: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:7183: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:7186: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_84.1 ||
T02avsata_u:7187: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02avsata_u:7189: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:7190: yāvad rājñaḥ kṛkiṇaḥ putra ṛṣipatanaṃ gataḥ
T02avsata_u:7191: | athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
T02avsata_u:7192: samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:7194: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:7195: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī saṃsāravairāgyikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāre doṣadarśī nirvāṇe guṇadarśī bhūtvā rājānaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa: anujānīhi māṃ tāta, bhagavacchāsane pravrajiṣyāmīti |
T02avsata_u:7196: rājovāca: na śakyam etan mayā kartum* |
T02avsata_u:7202: tenaiko bhaktacchedaḥ kṛtaḥ, dvau trayo vā yāvat ṣaḍ bhaktacchedāḥ kṛtāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7208: karitaḥ: tāvat te 'smākaṃ darśanaṃ na deyam*, yāvat trayaḥ piṭakā adhītā iti |
T02avsata_u:7209: yāvad asau pitaram anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7210: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena nacireṇa trayaḥ piṭakā adhītāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7213: abhavat*: yanv ahaṃ pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ niryātayeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:7215: sa pṛṣṭaś ca: kiṃ putra asti kiṃcid adhītam iti? tenoktam*: trayaḥ piṭakā iti |
T02avsata_u:7216: tatas tena pitus tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā rājā
T02avsata_u:7218: tataḥ prasādajātaḥ kathayati: putra kena te
T02avsata_u:7220: tenoktam*: icchāmy ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃgham upanimantrya ṣaḍbhiḥ pariṣkārair ācchādayitum iti |
T02avsata_u:7223: tatas tripiṭena bhagavān viṃśatisahasraparivāraḥ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7224: ekaikaś ca bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pariṣkārair ācchāditaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7226: yan mayā idānīṃ kṛcchreṇa pravrajyā pratilabdhā, tathāgate ca saśrāvakasaṃghe kārāḥ kṛtāḥ, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena
T02avsata_u:7227: deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatra yatra jāyeya tatra tatra kāṣāyavastraprāvṛta eva śramaṇaveṣadhārī jātismaraś ca syām iti ||
T02avsata_u:7228: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:7230: tenaiva hetunā āḍhye rājakule putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko jātismaraś ca saṃvṛttaḥ
T02avsata_u:7231: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām
T02avsata_u:7233: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv
T02avsata_u:7237: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:7240: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:7241: śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ sārthavāha āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:7243: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:7244: tena khalu samayena durbhikṣam abhūt kṛcchram* |
T02avsata_u:7247: naimittikaiś ca nirdiṣṭo devo na varṣiṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:7249: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:7251: yatra ca divase dārako jātas tatraiva divase 'nāvṛṣṭir bhagnā |
T02avsata_u:7253: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
T02avsata_u:7255: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya samantād yaśo
T02avsata_u:7256: visṛtam*, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya yaśomitra iti nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:7257: yaśomitro dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:7258: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:7260: yadā yaśomitro mahān saṃvṛttas tadā jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena |
T02avsata_u:7261: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:7263: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:7264: tasya bhagavatā tādṛśī saṃsāravairāgyikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāradoṣadarśī nirvāṇaguṇadarśī bhūtvā mātapitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7265: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:7266: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7271: yadā nidāghakāle bhikṣavas tṛṣārtāḥ pānakasyārthe saṃgham avataranti, tadāpy asau nāvatarati
T02avsata_u:7273: supremakā bhikṣavaḥ pṛcchanti: kena hetunā bhavatas tṛṣā na bādhata iti |
T02avsata_u:7274: sa kathayati: mamaitābhyāṃ daṃṣṭrābhyām aṣṭāṅgopetaṃ pānīyaṃ prasravati,
T02avsata_u:7275: yena na me tṛṣā bādhatā iti ||
