T02avsata_u:7276: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta yaśomitreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni, yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ, daṃṣṭrāntarāc cāṣṭāṅgopetaṃ pānīyaṃ prasravati,
T02avsata_u:7278: bhagavān āha: yaśomitreṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi
T02avsata_u:7281: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na
T02avsata_u:7282: tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:7285: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_85.1 ||
T02avsata_u:7286: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02avsata_u:7288: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:7293: sa upasthāyakam ātmānaṃ matvā vṛddhatarāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkaroti |
T02avsata_u:7298: svakaṃ kamaṇḍalukam upagṛhya pānīyaṃ pāsyāmīti paśyati nirudakam* |
T02avsata_u:7305: sa udvignaḥ svakānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇām udvejanārthaṃ śraddhādeyasya ca
T02avsata_u:7307: tatra śāṭakaṃ baddhvā samabhirūḍhaḥ, svakarmāṇi mamety avetya
T02avsata_u:7309: yāvad dvitīye divase prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām etad vṛttāntaṃ sabrahmacāriṇām ārocayati |
T02avsata_u:7310: tato 'sya sabrahmacāriṇaḥ pretakaraṇaṃ śrutvodvignāḥ, itaś cāmutaś cārocayitum ārabdhāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7317: eṣa vṛttānto vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ samantato visṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7320: yāvad upādhyāyena vṛddhānte niṣādayitvā udakapurṇā kuṇḍikā dattā |
T02avsata_u:7322: sa pratyakṣaphaladarśī tenaiva saṃvegena buddhe bhagavti śrāvakeṣu ca prasādam utpādya tīvreṇāśayena tad udakaṃ saṃghe cāritavān* |
T02avsata_u:7323: tato bhagavatā tasyānugrahārthaṃ gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya bhītānām āśvāsanakareṇa tad udakaṃ gṛhītaṃ mahāśrāvakaiś ca |
T02avsata_u:7325: yāvat sarvasaṃghe cāritam*, tadāpi na kṣīyate |
T02avsata_u:7326: tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:7328: yadā tasmād glānyād vyutthitaḥ, tadā tena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ pānīyenālpotsukaḥ kṛtaḥ
T02avsata_u:7329: dvādaśa varṣasahasrāṇi tena saṃghe pānīyaṃ cāritam* |
T02avsata_u:7330: yāvan maraṇakālasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān*: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava
T02avsata_u:7331: varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
T02avsata_u:7332: tam aham ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam*, daṃṣṭrāntarāc ca me 'ṣṭāṅgopetaṃ
T02avsata_u:7335: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:7337: yat tena dvādaśa varṣasahasrāṇi saṃghe pānīyaṃ cāritam*, praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam*, teneha janmani
T02avsata_u:7340: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
T02avsata_u:7342: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7345: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:7348: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu varṣā upagataḥ pāṇḍukambalaśilāyāṃ pārijātasya kovidārasya
T02avsata_u:7350: mātur janitryā dharmaṃ deśayati, anyeṣāṃ ca devānām* |
T02avsata_u:7351: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ śrāvastyāṃ varṣā upagato jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme
T02avsata_u:7352: atha catasraḥ parṣado yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ, mahāmaudgalyāyanapādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7353: catasraḥ parṣada āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano dharmakathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati |
T02avsata_u:7354: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* |
T02avsata_u:7355: atha catasraḥ parṣada utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyam idam
T02avsata_u:7356: avocat*: kaccit te bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana śrutaṃ kutra bhagavān etarhi varṣā upagata iti |
T02avsata_u:7357: mahāmaudgalyāyana āha: śrutaṃ me bhavanto bhagavān deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu varṣā upagataḥ, pāṇḍukambalaśilāyāṃ pārijātasya kovidārasya nātidūre |
T02avsata_u:7358: mātur janitryā dharmaṃ deśayati, anyeṣāṃ ca devānāṃ
T02avsata_u:7360: atha catasraḥ parṣadaḥ āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāḥ
T02avsata_u:7361: atha catasraḥ parṣadas trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇām atyayād yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ
T02avsata_u:7362: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7363: catasraḥ parṣada āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati (Speyer:
T02avsata_u:7366: anekaparyāyeṇa dhamyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* |
T02avsata_u:7367: atha catasraḥ parṣada utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyam idam avocat*: yat khalu bhadantamahāmaudgalyāyano jānīyāt* (Speyer: jānāyāc; MS: -maudgalyāyana
T02avsata_u:7368: jānīyā cira-): ciradṛṣṭo 'smābhir bhagavān*, paritṛṣitāḥ smo vayaṃ
T02avsata_u:7374: upasaṃkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva, alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛccha, alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca |
T02avsata_u:7375: evaṃ ca vada: jambūdvīpe bhadanta catasraḥ parṣada ākāṅkṣanti bhagavato darśanam*
T02avsata_u:7376: | evaṃ cāhuḥ: nāsti khalu bhadanta jambūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tadrūpā
T02avsata_u:7377: ṛddhir vā anubhāvo vā yena jambūdvīpakā manuṣyā devāṃs trāyastriṃśān
T02avsata_u:7380: asti khalu devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ tadrūpā ṛddhiś cānubhāvaś ca, yena devās trāyastriṃśā jambūdvīpam avatareyur bhagavantaṃ
T02avsata_u:7382: sādhu bhagavān devebhyas trāyastriṃśebhyo jambūdvīpam avatared anukampām upādāyeti |
T02avsata_u:7383: adhivāsayaty āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaś catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena |
T02avsata_u:7384: atha catasraḥ parṣada āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:7386: tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkuñcitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet*, prasāritaṃ vā saṃkuñcayet*, evam evāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ śrāvastyām antarhito deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu pratyaṣṭhāt pāṇdukambalaśilāyāṃ pārijātasya kovidārasya nātidūre |
T02avsata_u:7387: tena khalu samayena bhagavān anekaśatāyā devaparṣado dharmaṃ deśayati |
T02avsata_u:7388: adrākṣīc ca mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavantam anekaśatāyā devaparṣadaḥ purastān niṣaṇṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam* |
T02avsata_u:7390: prāvirakārṣīt*: ihāpi bhagavān ākīrṇo viharati tadyathā jambūdvīpe
T02avsata_u:7392: atha bhagavān āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya cetasā cittam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*: na khalu maudgalyāyana svairatvam eṣām*, api tu yadā me evaṃ bhavati: āgacchantv
T02avsata_u:7394: yadā me evaṃ bhavati: gacchantv iti, tadā gacchanti |
T02avsata_u:7395: iti me cetasā cittam ājñāya āgacchanti ca gacchanti ||
T02avsata_u:7397: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7398: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān maudgalyāyanaḥ sarvāṃ devaparṣadam avalokya bhagavantam idam avocat: vicitrā bateyaṃ devaparṣat saṃniṣaṇṇā saṃnipatitā |
T02avsata_u:7399: santy asyāṃ devaparṣadi devatā yā buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ kāyasya bhedād ihopapannāḥ
T02avsata_u:7400: santi dharme, santi saṃghe, santi āryakāntaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ, kāyasya bhedād ihopapannāḥ
T02avsata_u:7402: atha bhagavān āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya bhāṣitam anuvarṇayann āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*: evam etan maudgalyāyana, evam evam etat* |
T02avsata_u:7404: santy asyāṃ devatā yā buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ, kāyasya bhedād ihopapannāḥ
T02avsata_u:7405: santi dharme, santi saṃghe, santi āryakāntaiḥ śīlaiḥ
T02avsata_u:7407: atha śakro śakro devānām indro bhagavata āyuṣmataś ca mahāmaudgalyāyanasya bhāṣitam anuvarṇayann āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*: evam etad bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana, evam etat* |
T02avsata_u:7410: devatāḥ, yā buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ, kāyasya bhedād ihopapannāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7411: santi dharme, santi saṃghe, santy āryakāntaiḥ śīlaiḥ
T02avsata_u:7413: athānyatamo devaputro bhagavata āyuṣmataś ca mahāmaudgalyāyanasya śakrasya ca devānām indrasya bhāṣitam anuvarṇayann āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*: evam etad bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana,
T02avsata_u:7416: santy asyāṃ devaparṣadi devatāḥ, yā buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ kāyasya
T02avsata_u:7419: santi āryakāntaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ kāyasya bhedād ihopapannā iti ||
T02avsata_u:7420: tatrānekāni devatāśatāni anekāni devatāsahasrāṇy anekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataḥ purastāt pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtya tatraivāntarhitāni ||
T02avsata_u:7421: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ praviviktāṃ devaparṣadaṃ viditvā ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*: jambūdvīpe bhadanta catasraḥ parṣado bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandante alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchanti, alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca
T02avsata_u:7425: mahāmaudgalyāyana āha: jambūdvīpe bhadanta catasraḥ parṣada ākāṅkṣanti bhagavato darśanam*
T02avsata_u:7427: nāsti bhadanta jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tadrūpā ṛddhir vā anubhāvo vā yena jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā devāṃs trāyastriṃśān abhiroheyur bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya asti tu bhadanta devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ tadrūpā ṛddhiś cānubhāvaś ca, yena devās trāyastriṃśā
T02avsata_u:7429: sādhu bhagavān devebhyaś trāyastriṃśebhyo 'vatared anukampām upādāya |
T02avsata_u:7430: bhagavān āha: tena hi tvaṃ gaccha maudgalyāyana jambūdvīpam* |
T02avsata_u:7431: gatvā ca catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām ārocaya: avatariṣyati bhavanto bhagavān itaḥ saptame divase devebhyas trāyastriṃśebhyo jambūdvīpaṃ sāṃkāśye nagare āpajjure dāve udumbaramūle iti ||
T02avsata_u:7432: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya pādau śirasā vanditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ saṃpanno yathā samāhite citte tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkuñcitaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayet*,
T02avsata_u:7434: prasāritaṃ vā saṃkuñcayet*, evam evāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣv antarhitaḥ, jambūdvīpe pratyaṣṭhāt* |
T02avsata_u:7435: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano jambūdvīpam āgatya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām ārocayati:
T02avsata_u:7436: avatariṣyati bhavanto bhagavān itaḥ saptame divase devebhyas trāyastriṃśebhyo jambūdvīpaṃ sāṃkāśye nagare āpajjure dāve udumbaramūle iti ||
T02avsata_u:7437: avatīrṇo bhagavāṃs tataḥ saptame divase devebhyas trāyastriṃśebhyaḥ sāṃkāśye nagare āpajjure dāve udumbaramūle |
T02avsata_u:7438: yadā bhagavān sāmkāśyaṃ nagaram avatīrṇaḥ, tadā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bhagavato darśanāya saṃnipatitāni |
T02avsata_u:7440: tena bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghas te ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā bhaktenopanimantritāḥ yāvad gaṇḍīdeśanākāle sahacittotpādād divyāny āsanāny udārapaṭācchāditāni prādurbhūtāni, divyāni ca bhakṣyabhojyāni |
T02avsata_u:7443: tato 'sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvopapādukena bhikṣuṇā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā
T02avsata_u:7445: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7448: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta upapādukena karmāṇi kṛtāni, yenopapādukaḥ
T02avsata_u:7449: saṃvṛttaḥ? sahacittotpādāc cāsya yac cintayati, tat prārthayate, tat sarvaṃ saṃṛdhyatīti |
T02avsata_u:7450: bhagavān āha: upapādukenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:7452: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:7453: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:7456: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_86.1 ||
T02avsata_u:7457: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:7459: yāvad anyatarasmin grāmake 'raṇyāyatane pañca bhikṣavo varṣā
T02avsata_u:7463: tair yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:7464: pañcamena pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: yathaibhir mām āgamya arhatvaṃ
T02avsata_u:7465: sākṣātkṛtam*, anena me kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca
T02avsata_u:7467: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena vaiyāvṛtyaṃ kṛtavān*, ayaṃ sa upapāduka iti |
T02avsata_u:7469: yenopapādukaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ? bhagavān āha: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany
T02avsata_u:7471: viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi) prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi
T02avsata_u:7472: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:7473: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:7475: tasya bhāryā prasavakāle duḥkhavedanābhibhūtā ārtasvarā kradanti
T02avsata_u:7476: | sa taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā paraṃ saṃvegam āpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7477: sa śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7478: tasya buddhir utpannā: yanv ahaṃ bhagavacchāsane pravrajya praṇidhānaṃ kuryām*, yena na
T02avsata_u:7480: sa tenaiva saṃvegena bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya pravacane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7481: tena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatra yatra jāyeya,
T02avsata_u:7482: tatra tatropapāduko bhaveyam*, mā kadācid garbhaśayyāṃ pratyanubhaveyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:7483: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena sārthavāha āsīt*, ayaṃ sa upapādukaḥ
T02avsata_u:7485: yat tatrānenendriyāṇi paripācitāni, tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:7486: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo
T02avsata_u:7488: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7491: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:7494: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme |
T02avsata_u:7495: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:7497: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:7498: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:7501: aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:7503: darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam*
T02avsata_u:7504: | tasya janmany anekāny adbhutāni prādurbhūtāni, yaiḥ kapilavastu nagaraṃ
T02avsata_u:7506: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:7507: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya janmani kapilavastu nagaraṃ samantataḥ śobhitam*, tasmād asya
T02avsata_u:7510: aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:7511: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś
T02avsata_u:7514: sa yadā mahān samvṛttas tadā nyagrodhārāmaṃ gato bhagavato darśanāya
T02avsata_u:7515: | dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
T02avsata_u:7516: aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:7518: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:7519: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā śobhitena
T02avsata_u:7520: dārakeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:7521: sa dṛṣṭasatyo mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7522: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:7523: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7526: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta śobhitena karmāṇi kṛtāni, yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam*, janmani cāsyānekāni adbhutāni prādurbhūtāni, yaiḥ kapilavastu nagaraṃ samantataḥ
T02avsata_u:7527: śobhitam*? bhagavān āha: śobhitenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat
T02avsata_u:7530: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:7531: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:7533: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_87.1 ||
T02avsata_u:7535: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksaṃbuddho
T02avsata_u:7536: loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:7539: yāvat kasmiṃścit parvaṇi pratyupasthite goṣṭhikāḥ stūpasamīpaṃ gatāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7540: tais taṃ stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā pasādajātaiḥ puṣpāropaṇaṃ kartum ārabdham* |
T02avsata_u:7541: tatraiko goṣṭhikaḥ kathayati: ahaṃ na karomi, mama vibhavo nāstīti |
T02avsata_u:7544: tena vicitrapuṣpasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā tasminn eva stūpe puṣpāropaṇaṃ kṛtam* ||
T02avsata_u:7545: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:7546: samayena goṣṭhika āsīt, yena vipratisārajātena krakucchandasya
T02avsata_u:7547: keśanakhastūpe puṣpāripaṇaṃ kṛtam*, ayam asau śobhitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7548: anyāny api hi bhikṣavaḥ śobhitena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni |
T02avsata_u:7552: tataḥ prasādajātena pādayor nipatya piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ paṭena cācchāditaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:7553: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena śreṣṭhī,
T02avsata_u:7559: tatas tena prasādajātena tṛṇāny utpāṭya saṃmārjanīṃ gṛhītvā stūpāṅgaṇaṃ ca saṃmṛṣṭam* |
T02avsata_u:7560: tataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena
T02avsata_u:7561: deydharmaparityāgena ca abhirūpaḥ syāṃ darśanīyaḥ prasādikaḥ, anāgatāṃś ca buddhān ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:7562: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:7563: samayena kāṣṭhahāraka āsīt, ayam evāsau śobhitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7565: saṃmṛṣṭam*, tena yatra yatra jātas tatra tatrābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādikaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7567: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām
T02avsata_u:7569: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv
T02avsata_u:7573: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:7576: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ
T02avsata_u:7579: tena khalu samayena dakṣiṇāpathe kalpo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* |
T02avsata_u:7582: 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:7583: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ
T02avsata_u:7584: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kapphiṇa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam* |
T02avsata_u:7585: kapphiṇo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:7587: dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:7589: yasminn eva divase kapphiṇaḥ kumāro jātaḥ,
T02avsata_u:7590: tasminn eva divase aṣṭādaśānām amātyasahasrāṇāṃ putrā jātāḥ, sarve mahānagnāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7592: yad rājā kalpaḥ kāladharmeṇa saṃyuktaḥ, tasyātyayāt kapphiṇaḥ kumāro
T02avsata_u:7597: purastāt pṛṣṭhataś ca sarvabalaugham avalokyāmātyān āmantrayate: asti bhavantaḥ kasyacid
T02avsata_u:7598: evaṃrūpo balaughaḥ tadyathā mamaivaitarhīti? tataḥ priyavādibhir amātyair
T02avsata_u:7602: rājñā uktāḥ: bho vaṇijaḥ, kas tatra rājeti |
T02avsata_u:7603: vaṇijaḥ kathayanti: deva kecid deśā gaṇādhīnāḥ kecid rājādhīnā iti |
T02avsata_u:7604: yāvad rājñā mahākapphiṇena śrāvastyādiṣu ṣaṭsu mahānagareṣu dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:7605: yady utthitā bhavatha nopaveṣṭavyam*, śīghram āgantavyam*, anyathā va uttamena daṇḍena samanuśāsiṣyāmīti
T02avsata_u:7606: etad vacanam upaśrutya ṣaṇmahānagaravāsino rājāno bhītās trastāḥ saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ saṃgamya samāgamya ekasamūhena śrāvastīm anuprāptāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7608: taiḥ sa vṛttānto bhagavato vistareṇa niveditaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7609: bhagavatā te samāśvāsitāḥ, uktāś ca: sa dūto matsakāśam ānetavya iti |
T02avsata_u:7611: asty asmākaṃ rājādhirāja, taṃ tāvat paśyeti ||
T02avsata_u:7612: tato bhagavatā dūtāgamanam avetya jetavanaṃ catūratnamayam nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaram* |
T02avsata_u:7614: sthāpitāḥ, airāvatasadṛśā hastinaḥ, bālāhakasadṛśā aśvāḥ, nandīghoṣasadṛśā
T02avsata_u:7617: nirmitaḥ, saptatālodgataṃ ca simḥāsanaṃ yatra bhagavān niṣaṇṇāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7618: tato dūtas tathāvidhāṃ śobhāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7619: tato bhagavatā lekhaṃ lekhayitvā sa dūto 'bhihitaḥ: kapphiṇo madvacanād vaktavyaḥ:
T02avsata_u:7620: lekhavācanasamakālam eva yady utthito bhavasi, nopaveṣṭavyam*, śīghram
T02avsata_u:7623: athavā nāgacchasi, aham eva mahatā balaughena sārdham āgamiṣyāmīti |
T02avsata_u:7624: tato dūtena gatvā rājño mahākapphiṇasya lekhaṃ vācikaṃ ca yat saṃdiṣṭaṃ tat sarvaṃ niveditam*
T02avsata_u:7627: prātisīmāś ca rājāno rājānaṃ mahākapphiṇaṃ pratyudgatāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7630: tato bhagavatā tasyāgamanam avetya jetavanaṃ catūratnamayaṃ nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaram* |
T02avsata_u:7632: airāvatasadṛśā hastinaḥ, bālāhakasadṛśā aśvāḥ, nandīghoṣasadṛśā rathāḥ,
T02avsata_u:7635: saptatālodgataṃ ca siṃhāsanaṃ sarvaṃ tathaiva nirmitam* |
T02avsata_u:7640: tato bhagavatā laukikaṃ cittam utpāditam*: aho bata śakro devendra aindraṃ dhanur ādāya āgacchatv iti |
T02avsata_u:7641: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakro devendraḥ sārathiveṣeṇa aindraṃ dhanur upanāmayati |
T02avsata_u:7644: tac ca rājā mahākapphiṇa utkraṣṭum api na
T02avsata_u:7647: | svayaṃ ca tad dhanur ardhacandrākāreṇāropya śaraḥ kṣiptaḥ, yena tāḥ saptāyobheryaś chidrīkṛtāḥ
T02avsata_u:7650: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ || AVŚ_88.1 ||
T02avsata_u:7651: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati |
T02avsata_u:7652: prahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati || AVŚ_88.2 || iti sa ca śabdo yāvad akaniṣṭhān devān gataḥ |
T02avsata_u:7655: tasya buddhir utpannā: kim idam iti |
T02avsata_u:7656: tato bhagavān rājño mahākapphiṇasya cittaprakāram upalakṣya rājaveṣam antardhāpya idaṃ sūtram āradbhavān*: <Cf. DbSū(2)>
T02avsata_u:7657: daśabalasamanvāgato bhikṣavas tathāgato 'han samyaksaṃbuddhaś catur vaiśāradyaviśārada udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānīte, brahmacaryaṃ
T02avsata_u:7658: pravartayati, parṣadi samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati: yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavati,
T02avsata_u:7671: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati |
T02avsata_u:7672: yaduta asminn asatīdaṃ na bhavati, asya nirodhād idaṃ nirudhyate |
T02avsata_u:7685: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati |
T02avsata_u:7687: dharmaḥ, uttāno vivṛtaś chinnaplotiko yāvad devamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksuprakāśitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7688: evaṃ svākhyāte me dharme uttāne vivṛte chinnaplotike yāvad devamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksuprakāśite yāvad alam eva bhikṣavaḥ śraddhāpravrajitena kulaputreṇa alaṃ yogāya alam apramādāya, alaṃ śāstuḥ śāsane yogam āpattum*, kāmaṃ tvaksnāyvasthy avatiṣṭhatām*, pariśuṣyatu śarīrān māṃsaśoṇitam* atha ca punar yat tadārabdhavīryeṇa prāptavyaṃ sthāmavatā vīryavatā utsāhinā dṛḍhaparākrameṇānikṣiptadhureṇa kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu, tadvahanānuprāptā na vīryasya sraṃsanaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T02avsata_u:7689: tat kasya hetoḥ? duḥkhaṃ hi kusīdo viharati vyavakīrṇa, pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ
T02avsata_u:7690: sāṃkleśikaiḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ sajvarair duḥkhavipākaiḥ āyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇīyaiḥ mahataś cārthasya parihāṇir bhavati |
T02avsata_u:7691: ārabdhavīryas tu sukhaṃ viharaty avakīrṇaḥ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ sāṃkleśikaiḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ sajvarair duḥkhavipākaiḥ āyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇīyaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:7693: maṇḍayeyam idaṃ pravacanaṃ yaduta śāstā ca saṃmukhībhūtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7694: dharmaś ca deśyata aupaśamikaḥ pārinirvāṇikaḥ saṃbodhigāmī sugatapraveditaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7695: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ātmārthaṃ ca samanupaśyadbhiḥ parārthaṃ cobhayārthaṃ ca, idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣitavyam:
T02avsata_u:7696: kaccin naḥ pravrajyā amoghā bhaviṣyati, saphalā sukhodayā sukhavipākā |
T02avsata_u:7699: kārāḥ kṛtāḥ kaccid atyarthamahāphalā bhaviṣyanti, mahānuśaṃsā mahādyutayo mahāvaistārāḥ
T02avsata_u:7701: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe rājñā mahākapphiṇena aṣṭādaśāmātyagaṇasahasraparivāreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* sa dṛṣṭasatyo bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7702: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:7703: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7706: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta kapphiṇena karmāṇi kṛtāni, yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'ṣṭādaśāmātyagaṇasahasraparivāro mahānagnabalaḥ,
T02avsata_u:7708: bhagavān āha: kapphiṇenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi
T02avsata_u:7712: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
T02avsata_u:7713: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva
T02avsata_u:7714: skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:7716: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_88.3 ||
T02avsata_u:7717: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:7718: sa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīm upaniśritya viharati bandhumatīyake dāve |
T02avsata_u:7719: yāvad anyatamena sārthavāhena mahāsamudrāt prabhūtāni ratnāny ānītāni |
T02avsata_u:7721: vihāraṃ ca kārayitvā cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya bhikṣusaṃghāya
T02avsata_u:7723: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yo 'sau sārthavāhaḥ, eṣa evāsau kapphiṇo rājā tena kālena tena samayena
T02avsata_u:7724: yad anena vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghas traimāsyaṃ svāntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ, vihāraṃ ca kārayitvā cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya niryātitaḥ {tenedānīm abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ} aparāṇy api bhikṣavaḥ kapphiṇena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni |
T02avsata_u:7725: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca
T02avsata_u:7728: so 'pareṇa samayena saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye, saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu,
T02avsata_u:7732: parinirvṛtasya ca śarīrastūpaṃ kārayitvā amātyagaṇasahāyena tailābhiṣeko dattaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7737: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ |
T02avsata_u:7738: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7741: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:7745: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme ||
T02avsata_u:7746: yadā bhagavān ṣaḍvarṣābhisaṃbuddho dvādaśavarṣanirgataḥ kapilavastu anuprāptaḥ, tadā droṇodanāmṛtodanapramukhair anekaiḥ śākyasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtaṃ sthāpayitvā rājānaṃ śuddhodanam* |
T02avsata_u:7747: tato rājā śuddhodanas tāṃ putraśobhāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7748: tasya buddhir utpannā: yadi me putro na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyat*, so 'yam abhaviṣyad rājā cakravartī caturantavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7750: yanv ahaṃ śākyakulebhya ekaikaṃ pravrājayeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:7751: tato rājñā śuddhodanena nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*: sarvaśākyaiḥ saṃnipattavyam iti
T02avsata_u:7752: tataḥ sarvaśākyeṣu saṃnipatiteṣu rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ śākyāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7753: yadi sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāro na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyat*, yad yuṣmābhir evopasthānaṃ kṛtam abhaviṣyat* |
T02avsata_u:7754: tad idānīm asya pravrajitasya ekaikena kulapuruṣeṇa śākyenopasthāyakena pravrajitavyam iti
T02avsata_u:7756: teṣām upālir nāma kalpaka upasthāyakaḥ tān pravrajitān dṛṣṭvā roditum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7757: tataḥ śākyaiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ: kimartham upāle rudyata iti |
T02avsata_u:7758: sa karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair uvāca: yūyaṃ pravrajitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7760: tataḥ śākyā ūcuḥ: tena hi upāle, paṭakaṃ prasārayeti |
T02avsata_u:7762: tataḥ śākyaiḥ śarīrāvalagnānāṃ hārārdhahāramaṇimukhtāvaiḍūryakeyūrāṅgulīyakānāṃ mahān rāśiḥ kṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7763: tata upāleḥ kalpakasya tān dṛṣṭvā vicitraṃ cālaṃkāram abhivīkṣya yoniśo manasikāra utpannaḥ: ime tāvac chākyāḥ
T02avsata_u:7764: kularūpayuvanavanto 'ntaḥpurāṇi imaṃ cālaṃkāraṃ kheṭavad utsṛjya pravrajitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7765: kim utāham alpavibhavaḥ imam alaṃkāraṃ gṛhaṃ neṣyāmi? alam anena |
T02avsata_u:7767: athopāliḥ kalpako yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ, upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat*: yadi bhagavan mādṛśānāṃ pravrajyā asti,
T02avsata_u:7768: labheyāhaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam*,
T02avsata_u:7771: tato bhadrikapramukhāni pañca śākyaśatāni bhikṣunepathyadhārīṇi (Speyer: bhikṣuveṣadhārīṇi) buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya praṇāmaṃ
T02avsata_u:7773: te upāliṃ jñātvā kularūpavibhavānvitatvān necchanty upāleḥ
T02avsata_u:7777: bhadrika kartavyo 'sya praṇāmaḥ, yasmād idaṃ māmakaṃ śāsanaṃ na kularūpayauvanaiśvaryacāturvarṇyaviśuddhim apekṣata iti |
T02avsata_u:7778: tato mūlanikṛttā iva drumā bhadrikapramukhāni pañca śākyaśatāni dharmatām avalambya pādayor nipatitāni |
T02avsata_u:7779: teṣām pādavandanasamakālam eveyaṃ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā |
T02avsata_u:7780: tatrāyuṣmatā bhadrikeṇa yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:7781: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7786: samayena pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ gocarāya prasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7788: tena khalu samayena rājā prasenajit kauśala ekapuṇḍarīkaṃ hastināgam abhiruhya dīrgheṇa cārāyaṇena sārathinā bhagavato darśanāya saṃprasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7789: dadarśa rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhadrikaṃ śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasam*, parameṇa ca cittadamavyupaśamanasamanvāgataṃ pāṃsukūlaprāvṛtaṃ lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā tasmāc caṇḍālakaṭhinān nirgacchantam* |
T02avsata_u:7790: dṛṣṭvā ca punar dīrghaṃ cārāyaṇaṃ sārathim āmantrayate: syād ayaṃ cārāyaṇa bhadriko bhikṣuḥ? evaṃ yathā vadasi |
T02avsata_u:7791: iti śrutvā rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ saṃmoham āpannaḥ,
T02avsata_u:7794: tato rājā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam uvāca: bhagavan, adbhutaṃ me dṛṣṭam* |
T02avsata_u:7795: asau bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ pāṃsukūlaprāvṛto lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā devamanuṣyāvarjanakareṇātipraśānteneryāpathena piṇḍapātam ādāya
T02avsata_u:7797: tasya mamaitad abhavat*: āścarya yāvat suvinītaṃ bhagavacchāsanam*, yatra nāma evaṃvidhāḥ kumārāḥ sukhaidhitā evaṃvinītapracārāḥ saṃvṛttā iti |
T02avsata_u:7800: ayaṃ mahārāja bhadriko 'raṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā trir udānayati: aho bata saukhyam* |
T02avsata_u:7801: yad aham apravrajitaḥ san rājakulamadhyagato 'mātyanaigamajānapadasusaṃrakṣitaḥ prākāraparikhādvārastūpābhinigūḍhaḥ pariśaṅkitahṛdayaḥ saṃvignaḥ samantataḥśaṅkī nidrāṃ nāsādayāmi |
T02avsata_u:7803: etarhi nirapekṣaḥ kāye jīvite ca sukhaṃ yatratatrastho viharāmīti ||
T02avsata_u:7804: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta bhadrikeṇa pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni,
T02avsata_u:7805: yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādika āḍhye rājakule pratyājātaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7808: anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:7812: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
T02avsata_u:7813: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva
T02avsata_u:7814: skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:7815: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api |
T02avsata_u:7816: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_89.1 ||
T02avsata_u:7819: yāvad anyatarā dārikā pūpalikā ādāya gacchati |
T02avsata_u:7820: tatas tena koṭṭamallakena sā dārikā pūpalikānām arthe abhibhūtā |
T02avsata_u:7821: tato balād ekām pūpalikām ādāya itas tataḥ (Speyer: ta<tas ta>taḥ) palāyitum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7825: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya |
T02avsata_u:7826: tadā anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhas tasya koṭṭamallakasyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7827: tataḥ koṭṭamallasya taṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ śānteryāpathaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahān prasādo jātaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7828: tena svaṃ vyasanam agaṇayya pratyekabuddhāya pūpalikā pratipāditā
T02avsata_u:7829: | tasya vipraharṣasaṃjananārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam
T02avsata_u:7831: tataḥ koṭṭamallakas tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūlanikṛttā iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ: yan me siddhavrato dakṣiṇīyaḥ pūpalikayā pratipāditaḥ, anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatra yatra jāyeya, tatra tatroccakulīnaḥ syām*, evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām*,
T02avsata_u:7832: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:7833: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:7835: yat tena pratyekabuddhaḥ pūlikayā pratipāditaḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye śākye pratyāgataḥ
T02avsata_u:7839: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo
T02avsata_u:7841: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7844: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:7848: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ sthūlakoṣṭham upaniśritya viharati sthūlakoṣṭhakīye
T02avsata_u:7850: tena khalu samayena sthūlakoṣṭhake kauravyo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* |
T02avsata_u:7852: tasya bhrātṛputro rāṣṭrapālo nāmnā abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7853: tasya vinayakālam avekṣya bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ sthūlakoṣṭhakaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7854: dadarśa rāṣṭrapālo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:7856: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya pravrajyāṃ yācate |
T02avsata_u:7858: vatsa anujñāto 'si mātāpitṛbhyām iti? rāṣṭrapālaḥ kathayati: no bhadanteti |
T02avsata_u:7859: bhagavān āha: na hi vatsa tathāgatā vā tathāgataśrāvakā vā anujñātaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ pravrājayanti, upasaṃpādayanti ceti ||
T02avsata_u:7861: upasaṃkramya buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate: dṛṣṭo mayā bhagavāñ chākyamuniḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sphītaṃ cakravartirājyam apahāya pravrajitaḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ cāntaḥpurasahasrāṇi
T02avsata_u:7862: | muṇḍaḥ saṃghāṭipravṛtto 'sminn eva sthūlakoṣṭhake piṇḍapātam aṭati |
T02avsata_u:7863: tad arhato yuvāṃ mām anujñātum*: yad ahaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajeyam iti
T02avsata_u:7866: dvau trayo vā yāvac chaḍ bhaktacchedāḥ kṛtāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:7867: atha rāṣṭrapālasya mātāpitarau yena rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tenopasaṃkrāntau |
T02avsata_u:7869: yat khalu tāta rāṣṭrapāla jānīyāḥ: tvaṃ hi sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī |
T02avsata_u:7872: durabhiramam ekatvam*, durabhisaṃbodhāny araṇyavanaprasthāni, prāntāni śayanāsanāny adhyāvastum*
T02avsata_u:7873: ihaiva tvaṃ tāta rāṣṭrapāla niṣadya kāmāṃś ca
T02avsata_u:7874: paribhuṅkṣva, dānāni ca dehi, puṇyāni ca kuru |
T02avsata_u:7877: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarau jñātīn udyojayataḥ:
T02avsata_u:7878: aṅga tāvaj jñātayaḥ tātaṃ rāṣṭrapālam utthāpayata |
T02avsata_u:7879: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya jñātayo yena rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ
T02avsata_u:7880: upasaṃkramya rāṣṭrapālaṃ gṛhapatiputram evam avocan: yat khalu tāta
T02avsata_u:7881: rāṣṭrapāla jānīyāḥ: tvaṃ hi sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī |
T02avsata_u:7883: | duṣkaraṃ brahmacaryam, duṣkaraṃ prāvivekyaṃ, durabhiramam ekatvam,
T02avsata_u:7885: | ihaiva tvaṃ tāta rāṣṭrapāla niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅkṣva, dānāni ca dehi, puṇyāni ca kuru |
T02avsata_u:7887: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarau rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya vayasyakān udyojayataḥ: aṅga tāvat kumārāḥ, tātaṃ rāṣṭrapālam utthāpayata |
T02avsata_u:7888: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya vayasyakā yena rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ
T02avsata_u:7889: upasaṃkramya rāṣṭrapālaṃ gṛhapatiputram idam avocan: yat khalu saumya rāṣṭrapāla jānīyāḥ: tvaṃ hi sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī |
T02avsata_u:7894: ihaiva tvaṃ saumya rāṣṭrapāla niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅkṣva, dānāni ca dehi, puṇyāni ca kuru
T02avsata_u:7896: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya vayasyakā yena rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarau tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7897: upasaṃkramya rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarāv idam avocan*: amba tāta, anujānītaṃ saumya rāṣṭrapālaṃ pravrajituṃ samyag eva śraddhayā agarād anagārikām*, kiṃ mṛtena kariṣyatha? sacet tātaḥ pravrajyāyām abhiraṃsyate, jīvantam enaṃ drakṣyadhve |
T02avsata_u:7898: sacen nābhiramate, kā anyā putrasya gatir anyatra mātāpitarāv eva |
T02avsata_u:7899: evam āvāṃ kumārakāḥ tātaṃ rāṣṭrapālam anujānīyāvaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7901: atha rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputro 'nupūrveṇa kāyasya sthāmaṃ ca balaṃ ca saṃjanayya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7903: ekānte sthito rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputro bhagavantam idam avocat*: anujñāto 'smi bhagavan mātāpitṛbhyām*
T02avsata_u:7904: labheyāhaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* |
T02avsata_u:7906: labdhavān rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputraḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam*
T02avsata_u:7907: | sa evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sann idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ
T02avsata_u:7908: viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:7915: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: eṣo 'gro
T02avsata_u:7916: me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ {āraṇyakānāṃ }yaduta rāṣṭrapālo bhiksur iti ||
T02avsata_u:7917: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta rāṣṭrapālena karmāṇi kṛtāni, yenāḍhye rājakule pratyājata iti |
T02avsata_u:7920: bhagavān āha: rāṣṭrapālenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:7922: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:7923: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:7926: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_90.1 ||
T02avsata_u:7927: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani videharājaḥ saparivāraḥ paracakravitrāsito 'ṭavīm anuprāptaḥ
T02avsata_u:7928: sa madhyāhne tīkṣṇasūryaraśmiparitāpitaḥ sabalaugha itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramati,
T02avsata_u:7930: asati ca buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya |
T02avsata_u:7931: yāvad anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhas tasmin kāntāramārge prativasati |
T02avsata_u:7932: tena kāruṇyam utpādya tasya videharājasya mārgo vyapadiṣṭaḥ, pānīyahradaś ca darśitaḥ, yena sa rājā iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7933: tato rājñā prasādajātena svanagaram ānīya traimāsyaṃ sarvopakaraṇair upasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7935: praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtavān: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ labhī syām*, prativiśiṣṭataraṃ ca śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:7936: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:7937: samayena rājā babhūva, ayaṃ sa rāṣṭrapālaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7938: aparāṇy api rāṣṭrapālena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni |
T02avsata_u:7939: asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:7940: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:7941: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ kṛkī rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* |
T02avsata_u:7944: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:7948: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:7951: tena prasādajātena bhagavān kāśyapaḥ saparivāra upasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7953: parinirvṛtasya ca stūpe kanīyāñ chatram āropitavān* |
T02avsata_u:7954: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau rājaputraḥ, ayam evāsau rāṣṭrapālas
T02avsata_u:7956: aparāṇy api rāṣṭrapālena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni |
T02avsata_u:7957: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryām anyatamo mūliko brāhmaṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7959: tena tatra paryaṭatā vanānte glānaḥ pratyekabuddho dṛṣṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7961: yadā glānyād vyutthitaḥ, tadā piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ
T02avsata_u:7962: labhī syām*, prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam
T02avsata_u:7964: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena mūliko brāhmaṇaḥ, ayam evāsau rāṣṭrapālaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7965: tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre na kadācid duḥkham anubhūtavān* |
T02avsata_u:7966: idānīm apy āḍhye rājakule pratyājāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7968: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām
T02avsata_u:7970: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv
T02avsata_u:7974: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:7978: subhūtiḥ sthaviraś cāpi hasta lekuñcikas tathā |
T02avsata_u:7979: saṃsāro guptikaś cāpi virūpo gaṅgikena ca |
T02avsata_u:7980: dīrghanakhaḥ saṃgītiś ca vargo bhavati samudditaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:7983: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:7984: yadā bhagavatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya śrāvakā niyuktās teṣu janapadeṣu vineyajanānugrahārtham*, tadā ye 'dhyāyinas te sumerupariṣaṇḍāyāṃ dhyānaparā sthitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:7986: sa taṃ sumerupariṣaṇḍāyām āropya bhakṣayitum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7987: tato nāgapotalako jīvitād vyaparopyamāṇo mahāśrāvakāṇām antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ
T02avsata_u:7988: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā śrāvastyāṃ bhūtir nāma brāhmaṇaḥ, tasyāgramahiṣyāḥ kukṣāv upapannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7989: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:7991: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:7993: yasmād asya pitā bhūtiḥ, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya subhūtir iti nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:7994: subhūtir dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān samvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7995: sa pūrveṇa hetubalādhānena atīva roṣaṇaḥ krodhaparyavasthānabahulo mātāpitṛbhyām ātharvaṇād vinivartya ṛṣiṣu pravrājitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:7996: sa ca tatra dhyānaparaḥ saṃyato 'nyatarad vanaṣaṇḍam upaniśritya viharati |
T02avsata_u:7997: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe devatā prativasati dṛṣṭasatyā |
T02avsata_u:7998: tasyāḥ kāruṇyam utpannam*: ayaṃ kulaputraḥ krodhaparyavasthānabahalo viśeṣaṃ nādhigacchati
T02avsata_u:7999: yanv aham enaṃ bhagavaddarśane niyojayeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:8000: tatas tayā devatayā subhūteḥ purastād buddhasya varṇo bhāṣito dharmasya ca saṃghasya ca |
T02avsata_u:8004: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:8008: tataḥ prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:8009: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā subhūtinā kulaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:8011: | tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena maitrībhāvanayā cittaṃ
T02avsata_u:8013: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8016: tatra āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ: kuto 'haṃ cyutaḥ,
T02avsata_u:8018: paśyati: pañca jātiśatāni nāgebhyaś cyuto nāgeṣv evopapannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8019: tasya buddhir utpannā: mayā atīva evaṃvidho
T02avsata_u:8020: dveṣapratyayopasaṃbhāraḥ kṛtaḥ, yenāhaṃ pañca janmaśatāni nāgeṣūpapannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8022: idānīṃ punas tathā kariṣyāmi yat pareṣām antike dveṣopasaṃbhāro notpatsyate |
T02avsata_u:8023: yena samanvāgataḥ kāyasya bhedād apāyaṃ durgatiṃ vinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyate |
T02avsata_u:8026: yadā saṃghe vā grāme vā deśe vā janapade vā bhikṣāhetor vihartukāmo bhavati, tadā pūrvataraṃ gocaram avalokayati: mā māṃ kaścit
T02avsata_u:8027: kāraṇena dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ pradūṣayiṣyati, antataḥ kuntapipīlakā apīti |
T02avsata_u:8031: tata āyuṣmataḥ subhūter buddhir utpannā: yanv aham idānīṃ mahājanānugrahārthaṃ kuryām iti
T02avsata_u:8032: tatas tena ṛddhyā pañca suparṇiśatāni nirmitāni, yāni dṛṣṭvā nāgā bhītās trastā saṃvignā itaś cāmutaś ca saṃbhrāntāḥ |
T02avsata_u:8035: punar api mahāntaṃ nāgarūpam abhinirmāya pañca garuḍaśatāny abhidrutāni |
T02avsata_u:8037: evaṃ tena nāgānāṃ garuḍānāṃ ca pañca kulaśatāni vinītāni |
T02avsata_u:8038: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇām araṇāvihāriṇāṃ yaduta subhūtiḥ kulaputraḥ ||
