T02avsata_u:8217: upasaṃkramya pañca bhikṣuśatāny etam evārtham ebhiḥ padair ebhir vyañjanaiḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭavān*
T02avsata_u:8218: tair api mama eṣa evārtha ebhiḥ padair ebhir vyañjanaiḥ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭair vyākṛtaḥ,
T02avsata_u:8220: tad idaṃ bhadanta āścaryaṃ yāvac chāstuḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca arthenārthaḥ, padena padam*, vyañjanena vyañjanaṃ saṃsyandate sameti yadutāgrapadaiḥ ||
T02avsata_u:8221: kaṃ punas tvam ānanda sthavirakaṃ bhikṣuṃ saṃjānīyāḥ? sthavirako bhadanta bhikṣur arhan kṣīṇāśravaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyo 'pahṛtabhāro
T02avsata_u:8223: tāny api bhikṣuśatāni sarvāṇy arhanti kṣīṇāsravāṇi kṛtakṛtyāni kṛtakaraṇīyāny apahṛtabhārāṇy anuprāptasvakārthaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittāni ||
T02avsata_u:8225: yadā bhagavatā āyuṣmatānandena sthavirakas te ca bhikṣava udbhāvitāḥ prakāśitāś ca, tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta sthavirakeṇa karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni, yena ṣaṣṭi varṣāṇi mātuḥ kukṣāv uṣitaḥ, kāni karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:8226: yena dhandhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paramadhandhaḥ, pravrajya cārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*?
T02avsata_u:8227: bhagavān āha: sthavirakeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi
T02avsata_u:8228: kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni
T02avsata_u:8230: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:8231: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:8233: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_92.8 ||
T02avsata_u:8234: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02avsata_u:8236: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:8242: sthavira āha: vatsa adyāpi prag eva,
T02avsata_u:8244: dvir api trir api taruṇabhikṣuṇā sthavira utthāpyate: uttiṣṭha gocaragrāmaṃ gamiṣyāva iti
T02avsata_u:8245: dvir api trir api sthavira āha: vatsa, adyāpi prag eva, gaccha tāvat kuśalapakṣaṃ
T02avsata_u:8250: svapihi gṛhe ṣaṣṭi varṣasahasrāṇi}, tasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaṣṭi varṣasahasrāṇi mātuḥ kukṣāv uṣitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8253: yad anena tatra paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam*, tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:8255: ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti, ye sthavirakasya pṛthagjanabhūtasya |
T02avsata_u:8256: eṣa eva guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati yas tasyaivārhatvaṃ prāptasya |
T02avsata_u:8259: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:8263: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:8264: śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:8266: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:8267: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:8268: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:8269: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ prakṛtijātismaraś ca
T02avsata_u:8270: sa svakaṃ hastaṃ gṛhītvā āliṅgate cumbati pariṣvajati, vācaṃ bhāṣate: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhau, aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakāv iti |
T02avsata_u:8271: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:8272: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād ayaṃ jātamātra eva hastāv āliṅgate cumbati, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya hastaka iti nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:8273: hastako dāraka aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:8275: dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:8277: yadā tatra deśe kiṃcid bhavati bhayam*, tadā sa janakāyo bhīta itaś cāmutaś codbhrānto bhāṇḍaṃ gopāyati |
T02avsata_u:8279: gopāyati, janakāyasya caivaṃ kathayati: mā bhavanto dakṣiṇīyeṣu cittaṃ
T02avsata_u:8280: pradūṣayata, mā paruṣāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣayadhvam*, aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakau, aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakāv iti ||
T02avsata_u:8281: yāvad apareṇa samayena hastako jetavanaṃ gataḥ |
T02avsata_u:8282: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam*
T02avsata_u:8284: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:8286: 'sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā hastakena
T02avsata_u:8287: viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*
T02avsata_u:8288: sa dṛṣṭasatyo mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8289: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:8290: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto
T02avsata_u:8296: deśayati: mā bhavanto dakṣiṇīyeṣu cittaṃ pradūṣayata, mā kharāṃ vācaṃ
T02avsata_u:8298: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakau, aho bata me
T02avsata_u:8300: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta hastakena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni
T02avsata_u:8301: yenārhatvaprāpto 'py evam eva kathayati: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakau, aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakāv iti |
T02avsata_u:8305: hastakenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:8307: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:8308: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:8311: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_93.1 ||
T02avsata_u:8312: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02avsata_u:8314: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:8317: tatra yo 'sāv arhan* bahuśrutaḥ, sa jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ bahūni ca nimantraṇakāni pratilabhate |
T02avsata_u:8318: sa taṃ saṃśīlikabhikṣuṃ yatra nimantrito bhavati, tatra paścācchramaṇaṃ nayati |
T02avsata_u:8321: nimantraṇakaṃ gantukāmas taṃ paścācchramaṇam āgacchati, na ca pratilabhate |
T02avsata_u:8322: tatas tena tasyādarśanād anyo bhikṣur nītaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8323: yāvat tatra taruṇabhikṣubhir auddhatyābhiprāyair evam uktam*: paśyata bhadantā yāvat tenāyaṃ paścācchramaṇo 'dya na nīto 'nyo nīta iti |
T02avsata_u:8324: tatas tena krodhābhibhūtenārhato 'ntike cittaṃ pradūṣya kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam* |
T02avsata_u:8326: yadā āśayato vipratisārajātena atyayam atyayato deśitaṃ vivṛtam uttānīkṛtam*, tena hastau pratilabdhau |
T02avsata_u:8327: yat punas tena paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ
T02avsata_u:8330: āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam*, tena mama śāsane
T02avsata_u:8332: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ,
T02avsata_u:8334: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8337: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:8340: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:8341: śrāvastyām anyatamo brahmaṇa āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:8343: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:8344: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:8345: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:8347: jātamātrasya cāsya mātuḥ stanābhyāṃ kṣīram antarhitam* |
T02avsata_u:8348: yāvat tena brāhmaṇena tasyānyā dhātrī ānītā |
T02avsata_u:8351: yadāsya kṣīrasaṃbhavaḥ sarvair apy upāyair na
T02avsata_u:8355: yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā udarapūraṇam api nāsādayati |
T02avsata_u:8356: paśyati ca bhikṣūn sunivasitān suprāvṛtān bhramarasadṛśāni pātrāṇi gṛhītvā śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya praviśataḥ |
T02avsata_u:8359: sa mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajito 'py udarapūraṇaṃ nāsādayati |
T02avsata_u:8360: tena tenaiva saṃvegena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād
T02avsata_u:8362: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8366: yāvad asāv apareṇa samayena bhagavato gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmārjituṃ pravṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8367: sa tāṃ saṃmṛjya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya
T02avsata_u:8369: tatas tena prabhūtaḥ praṇītaś ca piṇḍapāta āsāditaḥ, yenāsya saṃtarpitānīndriyāṇi mahābhūtāni
T02avsata_u:8370: tatas tena saṃtarpitendriyeṇa kṛtsnā rātrir dhyānavimokṣasamāpattibhir atināmitā |
T02avsata_u:8372: śobhano 'yam upāyo yanv ahaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ vijñāpayeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:8373: tena sarva eva bhikṣusaṃgho vijñāpitaḥ: ahaṃ bhadanta alpapuṇyo yadā gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmṛjya piṇḍapātaṃ praviśāmi, tadā tṛptiṃ labhe |
T02avsata_u:8376: tataḥ saṃghena kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ: na kenacid bhagavato gandhakuṭī saṃmrāṣṭavyeti |
T02avsata_u:8377: sa visrabdho gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmṛjya paścāc chrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya praviśati ||
T02avsata_u:8378: tasmiṃś ca samaye āyuṣmāñ chāradvatīputraḥ pañcaśataparivāro janapade varṣoṣitaḥ śrāvastyām abhyāgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:8379: tataḥ śāstur gauravajāto gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmārṣṭum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8382: sthavira udare mama prahāro dattaḥ, yat te gandhakuṭī saṃmṛṣṭeti |
T02avsata_u:8383: sthaviraḥ prāha: katham iti? lekuñcikaḥ kathayati: sthavira, yadāhaṃ gandhakuṭīṃ na saṃmārjitavāṃs tadā piṇḍapātaṃ nāsādayāmīti |
T02avsata_u:8385: sthaviraśāriputreṇoktam: yady evam aham anyatra nimantritaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8391: yadā gṛhapater gṛhasamīpaṃ gatas tadā lekuñcikasya karmavipākena tasmin gṛhe mahān kalahaḥ samutpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8392: tata āyuṣmato lekuñcikasyaitad abhavat: mamālpapuṇyatayā tatra kalaho jāta iti |
T02avsata_u:8393: tataḥ pratinivṛtya vihāraṃ gatvā bhaktacchedam akarot* |
T02avsata_u:8394: tato dvitīye divase sthaviraśāriputreṇocyate: kimarthaṃ tvaṃ na gata iti |
T02avsata_u:8396: sthavireṇa nāvagatam*: mamālpapuṇyatayā yādṛśas tatra kalaho jāta iti |
T02avsata_u:8397: tataḥ sthaviraśāriputreṇānyatra divase taṃ puraskṛtya tad gṛhaṃ praveśitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8398: saṃghamadhye copaviṣṭasya sataḥ pradakṣiṇaś cāhāro dīyate |
T02avsata_u:8403: uvāca: tena hi tvam ihaiva jetavane tiṣṭha, ahaṃ te piṇḍapātam āneṣyāmīti
T02avsata_u:8408: caturthe divase sthavirānandenāsthāṃ kṛtvā piṇḍapāto dattaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8413: pañcame divase sthaviramaudgalyāyanena śrutvā lekuñcikasyāthāya piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā ṛddhyā saṃprasthitam* |
T02avsata_u:8414: lekuñcikasya karmavipākena suparṇinā pakṣirājena pakṣaiḥ parāhatya mahāsamudre pātitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8417: tasyaitad abhavat*: yanv ahaṃ lekuñcikasya piṇḍapātaṃ lekuñcikasya kuṭikādvāre 'vasthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8418: tato lekuñcikasya karmavipākena tad api dvāraṃ śilābhir
T02avsata_u:8420: tataḥ śāriputreṇa ṛddhyā mokṣyāmīti tat pātraṃ pṛthivyāṃ
T02avsata_u:8425: sthaviraśāriputreṇa ṛddhyā samuddhṛtya tat piṇḍakaṃ mukhadvāraśleṣite piṇḍapāte tasya karmāvaraṇena tan mukham ekadhanaṃ saṃvṛttam* |
T02avsata_u:8426: tata āyuṣmāñ chāriputro lekuñcikasyābhavyatāṃ jñātvā saṃvignaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8427: tena ca bhadantena ṣaḍ bhaktacchedāḥ kṛtāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:8428: tataḥ saptame divase āyuṣmāl lekuñcikaḥ satvānām udvejanārthaṃ karmaṇāṃ cāvipraṇaśasaṃdarśanārthaṃ karmabalodbhāvanārthaṃ ca bhasmanā pātraṃ pūrayitvā buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya purastān niṣadya udakenāloḍya pītvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8429: tam abhivīkṣya bhikṣavaḥ saṃvignāḥ tasya śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta lekuñcikena karmāṇi kṛtāni, yenārhatvaprāpto 'pi ṣaḍ bhaktacchedān kṛtvā
T02avsata_u:8430: saptame divase nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛta iti |
T02avsata_u:8432: lekuñcikenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:8435: pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:8436: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:8438: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_94.1 ||
T02avsata_u:8443: yāvad asyāḥ putraḥ svagṛhe svāmī saṃvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8444: sa ca matsarī kuṭukuñcakaḥ āgṛhītapariṣkāraḥ kākāya baliṃ na pradātuṃ vyavasyati |
T02avsata_u:8446: tasya mātā tenaiva pūrvakrameṇa śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānapradānāny anuprayacchati
T02avsata_u:8451: kathayati: putraka iha kule eṣa kuladharma iti |
T02avsata_u:8456: tatas tena mātsaryābhibhūtena krodhenāvṛtabuddhinā bhūyo nivāryata eva |
T02avsata_u:8457: yadā sarvāvasthāyāṃ na śaknoti vārayitum*, tadā mātaram uvāca: amba kiṃcit karaṇīyam asti, avavarakaṃ praviśeti |
T02avsata_u:8459: tatas tena dvāraṃ baddhvā ekaṃ bhaktacchedaṃ kāritā |
T02avsata_u:8464: yāvat tenāsau kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptā sakaruṇakaruṇaṃ vikrośamānā ṣaḍ bhaktacchedān kāritā, tathāpi na pratimuktā |
T02avsata_u:8467: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:8469: yad anena mātur apakāraḥ kṛtas tasya karmaṇo vipākena kalpam avīcau mahānaraka utpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8470: tenaiva hetunā idānīm apy arhatvaprāptaḥ ṣaḍ bhaktacchedān kṛtvā bhasmād anāhāra eva parinirvṛtaḥ
T02avsata_u:8471: anyāny api bhikṣavo lekuñcikena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni |
T02avsata_u:8472: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo brāhmaṇo devatārcikaḥ sarveṣāṃ vārāṇaseyānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ
T02avsata_u:8473: satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'bhimataś ca sarvajanasya |
T02avsata_u:8474: dharmatā caiṣā yad asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya |
T02avsata_u:8475: yāvad anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho vārāṇasīṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8476: sa ca tatra pūrṇahastaḥ pūrṇapātro nirgacchati |
T02avsata_u:8480: asamanvāhṛtya ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartata iti
T02avsata_u:8485: na ca tasya brāhmaṇasya vipratisāro jātaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:8486: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau brāhmaṇaḥ, ayam evāsau lekuñcikaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8490: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ |
T02avsata_u:8491: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv
T02avsata_u:8495: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:8498: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ
T02avsata_u:8501: śrāvastyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:8503: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:8504: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:8505: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:8507: sa jātamātra eva gṛham avalokya vācaṃ niścārayati
T02avsata_u:8508: sma: duḥkho bhavantaḥ saṃsāraḥ, paramaduḥkhaḥ saṃsāraḥ |
T02avsata_u:8510: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:8511: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād ayaṃ jātamātra eva saṃsāra iti ghoṣayati, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya saṃsāra iti nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:8512: saṃsāro dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:8513: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:8515: yadā saṃsāro dārakaḥ krameṇa mahān saṃvṛttaḥ, sa prakṛtijātismaratvāc ca janakāyasya dharmaṃ deśayati: mā bhavanto guruṣu gurusthānīyeṣu mātāpitṛṣv ācāryopādhyāyeṣu vā kharavācaṃ niścārayata duḥkhaṃ saṃsāra iti |
T02avsata_u:8516: yāvad apareṇa samayena itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramañ jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:8517: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:8520: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:8522: kṛtā, yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāro dārakaḥ saṃsāre doṣadarśī bhūtvā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8523: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:8524: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8528: mā āyuṣmanto guruṣu gurusthānīyeṣu mātāpitṛṣv ācāryopādhyāyeṣu {vā}
T02avsata_u:8531: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta saṃsāreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni, yena pañca janmaśatāni
T02avsata_u:8537: anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:8539: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:8540: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:8543: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_95.1 ||
T02avsata_u:8544: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02avsata_u:8546: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:8547: vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhīputraḥ sthavirasakāśe pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8552: sthavira āha: vatsa adyāpi prātar eva, gaccha tāvat kuśalapakṣaṃ pratijāgṛhīti |
T02avsata_u:8553: dvir api trir api taruṇabhikṣuṇā sthavira utthāpyate: uttiṣṭha gocaragrāmaṃ gamiṣyāva
T02avsata_u:8555: dvir api trir api sthavira āha: vatsa adyāpi prātar eva, gaccha tāvat kuśalapakṣaṃ pratijāgṛhīti
T02avsata_u:8556: tatas tena taruṇabhikṣuṇā rasagṛdhreṇa kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam: mā tvaṃ pañcabhir api janmaśatair jīvaḥ kośān
T02avsata_u:8558: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:8560: yad anenārhato 'ntike cittaṃ pradūṣya kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam*, tasya karmaṇo vipākena pañca janmaśatāni mṛtakuṇapa eva mātuḥ kukṣer nirgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:8561: nirgateṣu pañcasu janmaśateṣu idānīm anena manuṣyatvam āsāditam* |
T02avsata_u:8563: kathayati: duḥkhaṃ saṃsāraḥ, paramaduḥkhaṃ saṃsāra iti |
T02avsata_u:8564: yad anena vipratisārajātena sthavirasyātyayo deśitaḥ, brahmacaryavāsaś ca paripālitaḥ, tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:8565: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ,
T02avsata_u:8567: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8570: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:8574: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:8575: yadā bhagavatā stavakarṇikanimantritena saupārake nagare mahājanavineyākarṣaṇaṃ
T02avsata_u:8576: kṛtam*, tadā sarvaḥ saupārakanivāsī janakāyo buddhanimno dharmapravaṇaḥ
T02avsata_u:8578: saupārake nagare 'nyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
T02avsata_u:8581: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:8582: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:8583: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:8584: dārako jātaḥ jātamātrasya sarvaśarīraṃ piṭakaiḥ sphuṭaṃ saṃvṛttam* |
T02avsata_u:8585: yadā te piṭakāḥ sphuṭitāḥ, tadā ekadhano māṃsapiṇḍaḥ
T02avsata_u:8587: pūyaśoṇitaṃ cāsya śarīrāt pragharan mahaddaurgandhaṃ janayati
T02avsata_u:8589: svayam evārabdhaś cikitsāṃ kartum*, na cāsau vyādhir upaśamaṃ gacchati karmabalādhānaprāptatvāt*
T02avsata_u:8590: sa svaśarīraṃ tathā vikṣatam apatrāpya parigṛhītaṃ vastrair gopāyati |
T02avsata_u:8592: yāvad guptiko dārako mahān saṃvṛttas tasya vayasyakāḥ sahajātakāḥ śrāvastyāḥ saupārakanagaram anuprāptāḥ |
T02avsata_u:8593: tatas taiḥ pitur asya kathyate: tāta yady eṣa śrāvastīṃ nīyate, śakyetāsmād vyādheḥ parimocayitum*, yasmāt tatra santi vaidyabhaiṣajādayaḥ sulabhā iti ||
T02avsata_u:8594: tataḥ pitrā tad vacanam upaśrutya prabhūtāni ratnāni paricārakāṃś ca datvā śrāvastīm anupreṣitaḥ
T02avsata_u:8596: tatrāpy asya karmajo vyādhiḥ saty api vaidyadravyauṣadhiparicārakabāhulye na śakyate cikitsitum*
T02avsata_u:8597: yāvad asāv apareṇa samayena jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ |
T02avsata_u:8598: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:8601: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:8602: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā pañcopādānaskandhā rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato
T02avsata_u:8605: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ
T02avsata_u:8607: sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:8608: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8611: te 'py asya sahajātakās tenaiva saṃvegena pravrajitāḥ ||
T02avsata_u:8613: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmantaṃ guptikam idam avocan*: kim āyuṣman guptika pralopadharma, kiṃ vā atra
T02avsata_u:8616: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam āyuṣmantaḥ pralopadharma
T02avsata_u:8618: kiṃ manyadhve āyuṣmantaḥ: rūpaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā? anityam idam āyuṣman guptika |
T02avsata_u:8619: yat punar anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā tan na vā, duḥkham*? duḥkham idam āyuṣman guptika |
T02avsata_u:8620: yat punar anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharma, satyam api tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacched etan mama, eṣo 'ham asmi, eṣa me ātmety evam etat? no āyuṣman guptika |
T02avsata_u:8621: kiṃ manyadhve āyuṣmantaḥ: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā
T02avsata_u:8622: vijñānaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā? anityam idam āyuṣman guptika |
T02avsata_u:8623: yat punar anityaṃ duḥkham*? duḥkham idam āyuṣman guptika |
T02avsata_u:8625: vipariṇāmadharma, api tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacchet*: etan
T02avsata_u:8626: mama, eṣo 'ham asmi, eṣa me ātmeti? no āyuṣman guptika |
T02avsata_u:8627: tasmāt tarhi āyuṣmanto yat kiṃcid rūpam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā, yad vā dūre, yad vāntike,
T02avsata_u:8628: tat sarvaṃ naitan mama, naiṣo 'ham asmi, naiṣa me ātmety evam etad yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyam* |
T02avsata_u:8629: yā kācid vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yat kiṃcid vijñānam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā, yad vā dūre, yad vāntike,
T02avsata_u:8630: tat sarvaṃ naitan mama, naiṣo 'ham asmi, naiṣa me ātmety evam etad yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyam* |
T02avsata_u:8631: evaṃdarśī āyuṣmantaḥ śrutavān āryaśrāvako rūpād api nirvidyate, vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo
T02avsata_u:8634: vimuktam evaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ bhavati: kṣīṇā me jātiḥ, uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ
T02avsata_u:8637: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe teṣāṃ sahajātakānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* |
T02avsata_u:8638: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta guptikena karmāṇi kṛtāni, yenāsya śārīram evaṃ bībhatsavyādhibahulaṃ durgandhaṃ saṃvṛttam* kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena tīkṣṇaniśitabuddhiḥ saṃvṛttaḥ, pravrajya cārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti
T02avsata_u:8640: guptikenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:8643: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:8644: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:8646: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_96.1 ||
T02avsata_u:8650: tatas tena rājā prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ datvā vijñāpitaḥ: deva ayaṃ śreṣṭhī aparādhikaḥ, kriyatām asya daṇḍanigraha iti |
T02avsata_u:8653: tato rudhirāvasiktaśarīrasya prabhūtaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca viṣacūrṇaṃ datvoptam*, yenāsya tac charīram ekadhanaṃ māṃsapiṇḍavad avasthitam* |
T02avsata_u:8654: tatas tasya śreṣṭhino vayasyakaiḥ śrutam*: yathā tenaivaṃvidhaṃ karma kṛtam iti |
T02avsata_u:8655: tatas taiḥ sametair bhūtvā {upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ} yair upakaraṇaviśeṣais tasmād vyādheḥ parimocitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8656: tato 'sau tenaiva ca saṃvegena gṛhān niṣkramya pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8657: tena anācāryakeṇa saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayitvā pratyekā bodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā |
T02avsata_u:8658: tato 'sya cittam utpannam*: bahv anena śreṣṭhinā matsaṃtāpād apuṇyaṃ prasūtam* |
T02avsata_u:8659: yanv aham enaṃ gatvā saṃvejayeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:8660: tatas tasyāgrato gatvā upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ
T02avsata_u:8662: sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṃ vijñāpayati: avatara, avatara mahādakṣiṇīya, kṛtāparādho 'haṃ tavāntike,
T02avsata_u:8664: tenāsau pratyekabuddhaḥ kṣamāpayitvā piṇḍakena pratipādya paṭenācchāditaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8666: yan mayā krodhābhibhūtena tavāparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ, mā asya karmaṇo vipākaṃ
T02avsata_u:8668: yan mayā satkāraḥ kṛtaḥ, anenaivaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*, prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:8669: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:8670: samayena śreṣṭhī āsīt*, ayam sa guptikaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8671: tasya karmaṇaḥ prabhāvāt pañca janmaśatāni kaśābhis tāḍyamānaḥ kālaṃ kṛtavān* |
T02avsata_u:8672: tenaiva hetunā ayam evaṃvidhaṃ āśraya āsāditaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8673: bhūyaḥ kāśyape bhagavati sahajātakair vayasyakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pravrajita āsīt*| tatraibhir brahmacaryavāsaḥ paripālitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8675: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ,
T02avsata_u:8677: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8680: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:8684: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
T02avsata_u:8685: anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:8687: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:8688: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:8689: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:8694: tasya mātāpitarau sarvāṅgaṃ durvarṇaṃ durdarśanaṃ vikṛtarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā cintāparau vyvasthitau
T02avsata_u:8695: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyvasthāpyate: kiṃ nāma bhavatu
T02avsata_u:8696: dārakasya? jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād ayaṃ jātamātra evaṃ vikṛtarūpaḥ, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya virūpa iti nāma ||
T02avsata_u:8697: ydā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā tasya lajjayā mahān saṃkoco jātaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8698: kutrānyatra gamiṣyāmi, kva tiṣṭhāmi, iti vicārya sujīrṇodyānaṃ jagāma |
T02avsata_u:8700: sa bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā jehrīyamāṇa itaś cāmutaś ca palāyitum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8701: tato bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathādhiṣṭhito yan na śaknoti palāyitum* |
T02avsata_u:8702: tato bhagavān saha śrāvakair nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8703: tato nirodhād vyutthāya virūpam ātmānaṃ nirmitavān* |
T02avsata_u:8704: nirmāya śarāvaṃ bhojanapūrṇam ādāya virūpam āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣajāta āmantritavān*: ehi sahāyaka, kuta āgamiṣyate, tiṣṭha,
T02avsata_u:8709: tato virūpo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati: abhirūpataras tvam idānīṃ saṃvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8711: bhagavān āha: vidyā me asti cittaprasādajananī nāmnā, tasyā eṣa prabhāva iti |
T02avsata_u:8712: tatas tena bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasāditam*, teṣāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇām
T02avsata_u:8716: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta virūpeṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni, yenaiva durvarṇo durdarśano 'ṣṭādaśabhir daurvarṇikadoṣaiḥ samanvāgataḥ pravrajya cārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti |
T02avsata_u:8718: anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:8721: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
T02avsata_u:8722: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva
T02avsata_u:8723: skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:8725: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_97.1 ||
T02avsata_u:8726: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani puṣyo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* |
T02avsata_u:8729: paśyati tasmin kāle dvau bodhisatvau saṃnikṛṣṭau: bhagavāñ chākyamunir maitreyaś ca |
T02avsata_u:8730: maitreyasya svasaṃtatiḥ paripakvā, śāstur vaineyā aparipakvāḥ |
T02avsata_u:8733: atha puṣyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śākyamuner bodhisatvasya saṃtatiparipācanārthaṃ himavantaṃ parvatam abhiruhya ratnaguhāṃ praviśa paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā tejodhātuṃ samāpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8734: tasmiṃś ca kāle śākyamunir bodhisatvaḥ phalamūlānām arthe himavantaṃ parvatam abhirūḍhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8735: sa itas tataś cañcūryamāṇo dadarśa puṣyaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvātriṃṣatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* |
T02avsata_u:8736: sahadarśanāc cānena tathāvidhaṃ cittasamādhānaṃ samāsāditam*, yad ekapādena sapta rātriṃdivāni ekayā gāthayā stutavān*:
T02avsata_u:8737: na divi bhuvi vā nāsmiṃl loke na vaiśravaṇālaye na marubhavane divye sthāne na dikṣu vidikṣu vā |
T02avsata_u:8738: caratu vasudhāṃ sphītāṃ kṛtsnāṃ saparvatakānanāṃ puruṣavṛṣabhāsty anyas tulyo mahāśramaṇas tava || AVŚ_97.2 ||
T02avsata_u:8739: atha puṣyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ paripakvasaṃtatiṃ śākyamuniṃ bodhisatvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhukāram adāt*: sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa |
T02avsata_u:8741: nava kalpāḥ parāvṛttāḥ saṃstutyādya tathāgatam* || AVŚ_97.3 ||
T02avsata_u:8742: tato bhagavān maheśākhyābhir devatābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ sthitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8743: tatra guhānivāsinī devatā alpeśākhyatvān na śaknoti tāṃ guhāṃ samabhiroḍhum* |
T02avsata_u:8745: yadā suciram api bhīṣayamāṇā na śaknoti bhagavato 'pakāraṃ kartum*, tadā tayā prasādo labdhaḥ: śobhano 'yam ṛṣiḥ siddhavrataś ceti |
T02avsata_u:8746: tataḥ sā udāraṃ rūpam abhinirmāya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayitvā piṇḍakena pratipāditavatī
T02avsata_u:8748: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:8749: samayena guhānivāsinī devatā babhūva, ayam virūpaḥ saḥ |
T02avsata_u:8750: tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ duḥkham anubhūtavān* |
T02avsata_u:8751: idānīm api tenaiva hetunā virūpaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8752: yad anena paścāc cittaṃ prasāditam*, tenāsya apagatā alakṣmīḥ prādurbhūtā |
T02avsata_u:8754: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ,
T02avsata_u:8756: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8759: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:8762: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve |
T02avsata_u:8763: vārāṇasyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
T02avsata_u:8765: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:8766: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā |
T02avsata_u:8767: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ: anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛham*, na me putro na duhitā |
T02avsata_u:8768: mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:8771: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate |
T02avsata_u:8773: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate sma |
T02avsata_u:8774: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti |
T02avsata_u:8776: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8777: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca |
T02avsata_u:8780: saṃnipatitau, mātā ca kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī, gandharvaś ca pratyupasthito
T02avsata_u:8782: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti |
T02avsata_u:8785: satvanikāyāc cyutvā tasya prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8789: pañca? raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti viraktaṃ {puruṣaṃ} jānāti |
T02avsata_u:8794: saced dārako bhavati, dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati |
T02avsata_u:8795: saced dārikā bhavati, vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya
T02avsata_u:8797: sā āttamanāttamanāḥ svāmina ārocayati: diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhase |
T02avsata_u:8799: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya
T02avsata_u:8801: so 'py āttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya (Speyer: atyunnamayya) dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum
T02avsata_u:8802: udānayati: apy evāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam* |
T02avsata_u:8808: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā mama nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyate: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti |
T02avsata_u:8809: āpannasatvāṃ caināṃ viditvā upariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati, śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair
T02avsata_u:8811: hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharāṃ bhūmim* |
T02avsata_u:8812: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya |
T02avsata_u:8813: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:8815: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā gaṅgika iti nāma kṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:8817: aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:8818: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś
T02avsata_u:8821: sa ca nirbhedabhāgīyaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgato gṛhāvāse nābhiramate
T02avsata_u:8822: | sa mātāpitarau pādayor nipatya vijñāpayati: amba tāta anujānītaṃ mām*,
T02avsata_u:8827: manuṣyapratilābhaḥ, durlabhaś ca tathāgataprādurbhāvaḥ, tathendriyasaṃpad api durlabhā |
T02avsata_u:8828: ko me upāyo bhaved yad ahaṃ bhagavacchāsane pravrajeyam iti
T02avsata_u:8829: | tasyaitad abhavat*: yanv ahaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā ātmānamātmanā jīvitād
T02avsata_u:8830: vyaparopayeyam*, yathā manuṣyātvam āsādya laghu laghv eva pravrajeyam iti |
T02avsata_u:8831: tenaivaṃ vicintya viṣaṃ bhakṣitam*, na ca kālaṃ karoti |
T02avsata_u:8833: parvatād ātmānam utsṛṣṭavān*, nadyāṃ cārakāyāṃ patitaḥ, tatrāpi kālaṃ na
T02avsata_u:8835: tasya buddhir utpannā: kaḥ upāyaḥ syād yena kālaṃ kuryām iti |
T02avsata_u:8836: tasyaitad abhavat*: sarvathāyaṃ rājā ajātaśatruś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ
T02avsata_u:8838: yanv aham asya gṛhe rātrau saṃdhiṃ chindyām iti |
T02avsata_u:8839: sa rājagṛhaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā rātrau saṃprāptāyāṃ bhagne cakṣuṣpathe saṃdhim ārabdhaś chettum*
T02avsata_u:8841: upanītaḥ: ayaṃ deva cauro duṣṭo 'pakārī ca, yo rājakule rātrau saṃdhiṃ chindatīti |
T02avsata_u:8843: tato rājñā aparādhika iti kṛtvā vadhya utsṛṣṭaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8844: tato vyadhyaghātair nīlāmbaravasanaiḥ karavīramālāsaktakaṇṭheguṇa udyataśastrapāṇibhī rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu śrāvaṇāmukheṣv anuśrāvya dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa niṣkāsya śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ nīyate |
T02avsata_u:8845: sa nīyamānas tān vadhyaghātān āha: śīghraṃ śīghraṃ bhavanto gacchantu, mā kadācid rājñaś
T02avsata_u:8847: tato vyadhyaghātair eṣā pravṛttī rājño niveditā |
T02avsata_u:8848: tato rājñā pratinivartya pṛṣṭhaḥ: ko hetur yat tvam iṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ parityaktum icchasīti
T02avsata_u:8849: tena sa vṛttānto vistareṇa rājñe samākhyātaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8850: tato rājā ajātaśatruḥ kadambapuṣpavad āhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ sāśrukaṇṭho rudan mukha udānam udānayati: aho suparipakvā asya
T02avsata_u:8852: yatra nāmāyaṃ pravrajyāhetor idam iṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ parityaktuṃ vyavasitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8853: tato rājñā samāśvāsyoktaḥ: putraka ahaṃ prabhus te jīvitasya |
T02avsata_u:8856: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:8857: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8860: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ śraddhāpravrajitānāṃ yaduta gaṅgiko vārāṇaseyaḥ śreṣṭhiputra iti ||
T02avsata_u:8861: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta gaṅgikena karmāṇi kṛtāni, yenaiṣāṃ vipākān nāgniḥ kāye 'vakāśati, na viṣam*, na ca śastram*, nodakena kālaṃ karoti,
T02avsata_u:8864: anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:8866: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na
T02avsata_u:8867: vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni
T02avsata_u:8870: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_98.1 ||
T02avsata_u:8873: yāvat tena pāthān hatvā bhāṇḍam āsāditam* |
T02avsata_u:8875: yāvad anyatamasmin śmaśāne pratyekabudho nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8878: mātaṅgas tasya purastād bhāṇḍam apasṛjya tatraiva nilīnaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8879: tats te taskarāḥ pratyekabuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā asyārabdhāḥ kṣeptuṃ śastram agniṃ ca |
T02avsata_u:8880: na cāsya cīvarakarṇakam api śaknuvanti cālayitum*, yasmād asau nirodhasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ
T02avsata_u:8881: yadā te taskarāḥ śrāntāḥ prakrāntāḥ, tadā sa pratyekabuddhaḥ krameṇa samādhivyutthitaḥ
T02avsata_u:8882: tatas tena śmaśānamoṣakeṇa mātaṅgena taṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇidhānaṃ
T02avsata_u:8883: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*, yathā cāyam aparopakramaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8884: evam aham api yatra yatra jāyeya, tatra tatrāparopakramaḥ syām*,
T02avsata_u:8885: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:8886: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:8887: samayena śmaśānamoṣako mātaṅgaḥ, ayam sa gaṅgikaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8891: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ |
T02avsata_u:8892: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8895: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:8898: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
T02avsata_u:8899: tena khalu samayena nāladagrāmake tiṣyo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8900: tena śārī nāma dārikā māṭharasakāśāl labdhā |
T02avsata_u:8901: yadā śāriputraḥ sārīkukṣim avakrāntaḥ, tadā bhrātrā saha dīrghanakhena vivādaṃ kurvantī nigrahasthānaṃ prāpayati |
T02avsata_u:8902: tato dīrghanakhena dakṣiṇāpathaṃ gatvā bahūni śāstrāṇy adhītāni |
T02avsata_u:8904: tena dvir aṣṭavarṣeṇaindraṃ vyākaraṇam adhītam*, sarvavādinaś ca nigṛhītāḥ |
T02avsata_u:8906: yāvad dīrghanakhena pravrājakena śrutam*: bhāgineyena te sarve tīrthakarā nigṛhītāḥ |
T02avsata_u:8909: śrutvā cāsya mahatī paribhavasaṃjñā utpannā, sarvaśāstreṣu cāsya anaiṣṭhikasaṃjñā utpannā
T02avsata_u:8911: tasmiṃś ca samaye bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* |
T02avsata_u:8912: śāriputro 'pi bhagavataḥ purastāt sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavanataṃ vījayan* |
T02avsata_u:8913: atha dadarśa dīrghanakhaparivrājako bhagavantam ardhacandrākāreṇopaviṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam*, śāriputraṃ ca vyajanavyagrahastaṃ bhagavantaṃ vījayamānam* |
T02avsata_u:8914: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavantam idam avocat*: sarvaṃ me bho gautama na kṣamata iti |
T02avsata_u:8915: bhagavān āha: eṣāpi te agnivaiśyāyana dṛṣṭir na kṣamate, yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ: sarvaṃ me na kṣamata iti |
T02avsata_u:8916: eṣāpi me bho gautama dṛṣṭir na kṣamate, yeyaṃ me dṛṣṭiḥ: sarvaṃ me na kṣamata iti |
T02avsata_u:8917: api tu te agnivaiśyāyana evaṃ jānato 'yāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ; anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer
T02avsata_u:8918: apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ? api me bho gautama evaṃ jānata
T02avsata_u:8919: evaṃ paśyato 'syāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ
T02avsata_u:8920: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8921: bahujanena te agnivaiśyāyana na saṃsyandiṣyati (Speyer: saṃsyadiṣyati) |
T02avsata_u:8924: katame trayaḥ? ihāgnivaiśyāyana eka evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati
T02avsata_u:8926: punar aparam ihaika evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati evaṃvādī: sarvaṃ me na kṣamata iti |
T02avsata_u:8927: punar aparam eka evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati evaṃvādī: evaṃ me kṣamate, ekaṃ na me kṣamata iti |
T02avsata_u:8928: tatrāgnivaiśyāyana yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sarvaṃ me kṣamata iti, iyṃ dṛṣṭiḥ saṃrāgāya saṃvartate
T02avsata_u:8929: nāsaṃrāgāya, saṃdveṣāya nāsaṃdveṣāya, saṃmohāya nāsaṃmohāya, saṃyogāya
T02avsata_u:8930: nāsaṃyogāya, saṃkleśāya na vyavadānāya, saṃcayāya nāpacayāya,
T02avsata_u:8932: tatrāgnivaiśyāyana yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ: sarvaṃ me na kṣamata iti, iyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ asaṃrāgāya saṃvartate na saṃrāgāya, asaṃdveṣāya na saṃdveṣāya, asaṃmohāya na saṃmohāya, visaṃyogāya na saṃyogāya, vyavadānāya na saṃkleśāya, asaṃcayāya na saṃcayāya |
T02avsata_u:8935: ekaṃ me kṣamate, ekaṃ me na kṣamata iti, yat tāvad asya kṣamate, tat saṃrāgāya saṃdveṣāya saṃmohāya saṃyogāya saṃkleśāya, na vyavadānāya nāpacayāya |
T02avsata_u:8938: kṣamate, tad asaṃrāgāya saṃvartate na saṃrāgāya, asaṃdveṣāya na saṃdveṣāya, asaṃmohāya na saṃmohāya, asaṃyogāya na saṃyogāya, vyavadānāya na saṃkleśāya, apacayāya na saṃcayāya |
T02avsata_u:8940: tatrā śrutavān āryaśrāvaka idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣyate: ahaṃ caivaṃdṛṣṭiḥ syām*, evaṃvādī: sarvaṃ me kṣamate |
T02avsata_u:8941: dvābhyāṃ me sārdhaṃ syād vigrahaḥ syād vivādaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8942: yaś ca evaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī: sarvaṃ me na kṣamata iti, yaś ca evaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādi: ekaṃ me kṣamate ekaṃ me na kṣamata iti |
T02avsata_u:8943: vigrahe sati vivādaḥ, vivāde sati vihiṃsā |
T02avsata_u:8944: iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann
T02avsata_u:8946: imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjati, anyāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ nopādatte |
T02avsata_u:8947: evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ, anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer
T02avsata_u:8949: tatra śrutavān āryaśrāvaka idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣyate: ahaṃ ced evaṃdṛṣṭiḥ
T02avsata_u:8950: syām evaṃvādī: sarvaṃ me na kṣamata iti, dvābhyāṃ me sārdhaṃ syād
T02avsata_u:8952: yaś ca evaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī: sarvaṃ me kṣamata
T02avsata_u:8953: iti, yaś ca evaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādi: ekaṃ me kṣamate ekaṃ me na kṣamata iti |
T02avsata_u:8954: vigrahe sati vivādaḥ, vivāde sati vihiṃsā, iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjati, anyāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ
T02avsata_u:8956: evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8957: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ ||

T02avsata_u:8968: yaś caivaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī: sarvaṃ me kṣamata iti, yaś ca evaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādi: sarvaṃ me na kṣamate iti |
T02avsata_u:8969: vigrahe sati vivādaḥ, vivāde sati vihiṃsā, iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjati, anyāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ
T02avsata_u:8971: evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ |
T02avsata_u:8972: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ ||
T02avsata_u:8973: ayaṃ khalv agnivaiśyāyana kāyo rūpī audārikaś cāturmahābhūtika iti āryaśrāvakeṇa abhīkṣṇam udayavyayānudarśinā vihartavyam*, virāgānudarśinā pratinisargānudarśinā vihartavyam* |
T02avsata_u:8974: yatrāryaśrāvakasya abhīkṣṇam udayavyayānudarśino viharataḥ, yo 'sya bhavati kāye kāyacchandaḥ
T02avsata_u:8975: kāyasnehaḥ kāyapremā kāyālayaḥ kāyaviṣaktiḥ kāyādhyavasānam*, tac cāsya cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati ||
T02avsata_u:8977: katamās tisraḥ? sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca |
T02avsata_u:8978: yasmin samaye śrutavān āryaśrāvakaḥ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ
T02avsata_u:8979: vedayate, dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ: duḥkhā ca aduḥkhāsukhā ca |
T02avsata_u:8980: sukhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate |
T02avsata_u:8982: yasmin samaye āryaśrāvako duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate, dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe
T02avsata_u:8984: duḥkhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate |
T02avsata_u:8986: yasmin samaye āryaśrāvako aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate, dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ, sukhā duḥkhā ca |
T02avsata_u:8987: aduḥkhāsukhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate |
T02avsata_u:8989: tasyaivaṃ bhavati: imā vedanāḥ kiṃnidānāḥ kiṃsamudayāḥ kiṃjātīyāḥ kiṃprabhāvā iti? imā vedanā sparśanidānāḥ sparśasamudayāḥ sparśajātīyāḥ sparśaprabhāvāḥ |
T02avsata_u:8990: tasya sparśasya samudayāt tās tā vedanāḥ
T02avsata_u:8993: tasya sparśasya nirodhāt tās tā vedanā nirudhyante, vyupaśāmyanti śītībhavanti astaṃgacchanti
T02avsata_u:8994: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate sukhāṃ vā duḥkhāṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhā vā, tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāmīti, tasya vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānata utpannāsu vedanāsv anityatānudarśī viharati, vyayānudarśī virāgānudarśī nirodhānudarśī pratisargānudarśī sa kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānaḥ kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedaya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T02avsata_u:8995: jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamāno jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedaya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T02avsata_u:8996: bhedāc ca kāyasyorddhvaṃ jīvitaparyādānād ihaivāsya sarvāṇi vedanāni apariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante apariśeṣam astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti |
T02avsata_u:8998: sukhām api vedanāṃ vedayato bhedaḥ kāyasya bhaviṣyati |
T02avsata_u:9000: duḥkhām api, aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayato bhedaḥ kāyasya
T02avsata_u:9005: duḥkhām api aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayate, visaṃyukto vedayate, na saṃyuktaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9006: kena visaṃyuktaḥ? visaṃyukto rāgeṇa dveṣeṇa mohena, visaṃyukto
T02avsata_u:9008: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmāñ śāriputro 'rdhamāsopasaṃpanno bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ vījayan* |
T02avsata_u:9009: āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitad abhavat*: bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇam eva varṇayati, virāgam eva nirodham eva pratiniḥsargam eva varṇayati |
T02avsata_u:9010: yanv ahaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇānudarśī vihareyam*, virāgānudarśī nirodhānudarśī vihareyam*, pratiniḥsargānudarśī vihareyam iti |
T02avsata_u:9011: āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaiṣāṃ dharmāṇām anityatānudarśino viharato vyayānudarśino virāgānudarśino nirodhānudarśinaḥ pratiniḥsargānudarśino viharataḥ anupādāya āsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktam* dīrghanakhasya ca parivrājakasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* ||
T02avsata_u:9012: atha dīrghanakhaḥ parivrājako dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ
T02avsata_u:9013: śāstuḥ śāsane (Speyer: śāstraśasane) dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat |
T02avsata_u:9014: lābheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* |
T02avsata_u:9017: labdhavān dīrghanakhaparivrājakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam*
T02avsata_u:9018: evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmān eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vyahārṣīt* |
T02avsata_u:9019: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan* yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ
T02avsata_u:9020: keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti, tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ
T02avsata_u:9022: dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā pratipadya pravedayate:
T02avsata_u:9023: kṣīṇā me jātiḥ, uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ, kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti |
T02avsata_u:9024: ājñātavān sa āyuṣmān arhan babhūva suvimuktacittaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9025: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ pratisaṃvitprāptānāṃ yaduta koṣṭhilo bhikṣur iti ||
T02avsata_u:9026: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kāni bhadanta mahākoṣṭhilena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni, yena mahāvādī saṃvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9029: koṣṭhilenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:9032: pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye
T02avsata_u:9033: pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:9035: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_99.1 ||
T02avsata_u:9038: yāvat te cañcūryamāṇā anyatamaṃ khadiravaṇam anuprāptāḥ |
T02avsata_u:9040: paśyata yūyaṃ kamalāyatākṣaḥ kaścid aparakīyo manuṣyaḥ saṃvidyate, yena vayaṃ yakṣabaliṃ datvā prakrāmemeti |
T02avsata_u:9042: tatas tais taskaraiḥ paryaṭadbhir dṛṣṭvā senāpatisakāśaṃ nītaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9043: tataś caurasenāpatinā vadhyatām ayam ity ājñā dattā |
T02avsata_u:9045: pratyekabuddhas teṣām anugrahārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājaḥ khagapatham abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9046: tataḥ senāpatir mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya atyayaṃ deśitavān* |
T02avsata_u:9047: piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān*: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*, prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti ||
T02avsata_u:9048: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena
T02avsata_u:9053: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ,
T02avsata_u:9055: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9058: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* ||
T02avsata_u:9062: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kuśinagaryāṃ viharati mallānām upavartane yamakaśālavane
T02avsata_u:9063: | atha bhagavāṃs tad eva parinirvāṇakālasamaye āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma: prajñāpaya ānanda tathāgatasya āntareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcam* |
T02avsata_u:9064: adya tathāgatasya rātryā madhyame yāme nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
T02avsata_u:9065: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaṃ prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9066: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt* |
T02avsata_u:9067: ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat*: prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9069: upasaṃkramya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati pādaṃ pādenopadhāya ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan nirvāṇasaṃjñām eva manasi kurvann iti ||
T02avsata_u:9070: tatra bhagavān rātryā madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9071: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati atyarthaṃ tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo 'bhūt* ulkāpātā diśodāhāḥ |
T02avsata_u:9073: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati ubhau yamakaśālavanasya drumottamau tathāgatasya siṃhaśayyāṃ
T02avsata_u:9075: samanantaraparinirvṛte bhagavati anyataro bhikṣus tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
T02avsata_u:9077: yad avākiratāṃ puṣpaiḥ śāstāraṃ parinirvṛtam* || AVŚ_100.1 ||
T02avsata_u:9078: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati śakro devendro gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
T02avsata_u:9080: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukham* || AVŚ_100.2 || iti samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati brahmā sahāṃpatir gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
T02avsata_u:9084: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati āyuṣmān āniruddho gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
T02avsata_u:9086: ānijyāṃ śāntim āgamya cakṣumān parinirvṛtaḥ || AVŚ_100.4 ||
T02avsata_u:9091: pradyotasy eva nirvāṇaṃ vimokṣas tasya cetasaḥ || AVŚ_100.6 || iti ||
T02avsata_u:9092: saptāhaparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataś citāṃ
T02avsata_u:9094: yena kāyaratanena nāyako brahmalokam agaman maharddhikaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9095: dahyate sma tanujena tejasā pañcabhir yugaśataiḥ sa veṣṭitaḥ (Speyer:
T02avsata_u:9097: sahasramātreṇa hi cīvarāṇāṃ buddhasya kāyaḥ pariveṣṭito 'bhūt* |
T02avsata_u:9099: dve cīvare tatra tu naiva dagdhe abhyantaraṃ bāhyam atha dvitīyam* ||
T02avsata_u:9100: varṣaśataparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati pāṭaliputre nagare rājā aśoko rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* |
T02avsata_u:9102: yāvad apareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T02avsata_u:9103: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā |
T02avsata_u:9104: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
T02avsata_u:9105: dārako jāto abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ kuṇālasadṛśābhyāṃ
T02avsata_u:9107: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:9109: kuṇālasadṛśe netre, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kuṇāla iti nāmeti |
T02avsata_u:9110: kuṇālo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* |
T02avsata_u:9111: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
T02avsata_u:9113: tatas taṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ rājā utsaṅgena kṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ prekṣya rūpasaṃpadā praharṣita
T02avsata_u:9115: tatra ca samaye gāndhāre puṣpabherotso nāma grāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9116: tatrānyatamasya gṛhapateḥ putro jāto 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam*
T02avsata_u:9119: ratnamayī puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā, puṣpasaṃpannaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca |
T02avsata_u:9120: yatra yatra kumāro gacchati tatra tatra ca puṣkariṇī udyānaṃ ca prādurbhavati |
T02avsata_u:9123: tato 'pareṇa samayena puṣpabherotsād vaṇijaḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena pāṭaliputraṃ gatāḥ |
T02avsata_u:9124: te prābhṛtam ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśam upagatāḥ |
T02avsata_u:9125: tataḥ pādayor nipatya prābhṛtaṃ rājñe upanamayya purastād vyavasthitāḥ |
T02avsata_u:9126: tato rājā aśokas teṣāṃ kuṇālaṃ darśayati: haṃ bho vaṇijaḥ, kadācit kutracid bhavadbhiḥ paryaṭadbhir evaṃvidhaṃ rūpaviśeṣayuktaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvam iti ? tatas te vaṇijaḥ
T02avsata_u:9127: kṛtakarapuṭāḥ pādayor nipatya abhayaṃ mārgayitvā rājānam ūcuḥ: asti deva asmadīye viṣaye sundaro nāma kumāro 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś
T02avsata_u:9129: janmani cāsya divyagandhodakaparipūrṇā ratnamayī puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā, puṣpaphalasamṛddhaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamam* |
T02avsata_u:9130: yatra yatra ca kumāro gacchati tatra tatra puṣkariṇī udyānaṃ ca prādurbhavati |
T02avsata_u:9131: śrutvā rājā aśokaḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9132: kutūhalajātaś ca dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtavān: eṣa rājā aśoka āgantum icchati sundarasya
T02avsata_u:9134: yad vaḥ kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat kurudhvam iti
T02avsata_u:9135: | tato mahājanakāyo bhītāḥ: yadi rājā mahāsādhanena ihāgamiṣyati, mā haiva kaṃcid anartham utpādayiṣyatīti |
T02avsata_u:9136: tataḥ sa kumāro bhadrayānaṃ yojayitvā śatasahasraṃ ca muktāhāraṃ prābhṛtasyārthe datvā aśokasya sakāśaṃ preṣitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9138: śatasahasraṃ ca muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā rājño 'śokasya sakāśam anuprāptaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9139: rājā aśokaś ca sahadarśanāt sundarasya kumārasya rūpaṃ śobhāṃ varṇapuṣkalatāṃ ca divyāṃ puṣkariṇīm udyānaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam upagataḥ ||
T02avsata_u:9140: tato rājā aśokaḥ sthaviropaguptasya vismayajananārthaṃ sundaraṃ ca kumāram ādāya kukkuṭāgāraṃ gataḥ |
T02avsata_u:9141: tatropaguptapramukhāṇy aṣṭādaśārhatsahasrāṇi nivasanti, taddviguṇāḥ śaikṣāḥ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakāḥ
T02avsata_u:9142: | tataḥ sa sthavirasya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
T02avsata_u:9144: tataḥ kumāraḥ paripakvasaṃtatir dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajyābhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9145: sa rājānam aśokam anujñāpya sthaviropaguptasya sakāśe pravrajitaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9146: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* |
T02avsata_u:9147: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9150: tato rājā aśokaḥ saṃdigdhaḥ sthaviraṃ pṛcchati: kāni bhadanta sundareṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni, yenāsyaivaṃvidhaṃ rūpam*, kāni punaḥ karmāṇi
T02avsata_u:9152: puṣpaphalasamṛddhaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamam*? sthaviropagupta āha:
T02avsata_u:9155: mahārāja pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni |
T02avsata_u:9157: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na
T02avsata_u:9158: tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
T02avsata_u:9160: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* || AVŚ_100.1 ||
T02avsata_u:9161: bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja yadā bhagavān parinirvṛtaḥ, tadā āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ pañcaśataparivāro magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ caran dharmasaṃgītiṃ kartukāmaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9162: yāvad anyatamena daridrakarṣakeṇa mahān bhikṣusaṃgho dṛṣṭaḥ, śāstṛviyogāc chokārto 'dhvapariśrānto
T02avsata_u:9165: tatas tena kāśyapapramukhāṇi pañca bhikṣuśatāni jentākasnātreṇopanimantritāni |
T02avsata_u:9166: tatas tena nānāgandhaparibhāvitam uṣṇodakaṃ kṛtvā te bhikṣavaḥ snāpitāḥ,
T02avsata_u:9168: praṇītena cāhāreṇa saṃtarpya śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni datvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: asminn eva
T02avsata_u:9170: kiṃ manyase mahārāja yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena
T02avsata_u:9172: yat tena bhikṣavo jentākasnātreṇa snāpitāḥ, tenāsyaivaṃvidho rūpaviśeṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ,
T02avsata_u:9173: divyacandanodakaparipūrṇā ramaṇīyā puṣkariṇī puṣpaphalasamṛddhaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamaṃ prāptam* |
T02avsata_u:9176: iti hi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ |
T02avsata_u:9177: tasmāt tarhi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T02avsata_u:9179: atha rāhā aśoka āyuṣmataḥ sthaviropaguptasya bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ
